[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/pad+ma dkar po bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D113}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sadad+harma puN Da rI ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po 
[\[1b.2\]]dang po/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i 
[\[1b.3\]]ri la bzhugs te/_dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin 
[\[1b.4\]]tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_/bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu 
[\[1b.5\]]sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa'i 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]nyan thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang 
[\[2a.2\]]ldan pa ltang rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[2a.3\]]na ma gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin nga'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwa dza dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang /_
[\[2a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang /_slob pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gzhan yang slob pa dang mi 
[\[2a.5\]]slob pa'i dge slong nyis stong dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma drug stong dang /_sgra gcan zin gyi ma dge slong ma grags 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs cig go/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang 
[\[2a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/_gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa chen po la gnas pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos yang dag par bstod pa/_lus dang ngag dang sems byams pas yongs su bsgos pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'dzud pa la mkhas pa/_shes rab chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[2b.2\]]khams brgya stong mang por rnam par grags pa/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang dag par sgrol ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[2b.3\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2b.4\]]sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman yang dag 'phags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang /_byang chub 
[\[2b.5\]]sems dpa' zla gang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gnon pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas gnon dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum gnon dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rgyun tu brtson 
[\[2b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[2b.7\]]chen po seng ge dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug la 'di lta ste/_bzang skyong dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon bzang po dang /_mes byin dang /_phug sbas dang /_chus byin dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_bla ma'i blo 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gros dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_'phel ba'i blo gros dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_shin tu yang dag zhugs dang /_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_dpe med blo gros dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_sa 'dzin dag dang yang thabs cig ste/_de dag la sogs 
[\[3a.2\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_'khor lha'i bu nyi khri 'di lta ste/_lha'i bu zla ba dang /_lha'i bu nyi ma dang /_kun du dri dang /_rin chen 'od dang /_lha'i bu snang 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu nyi khri dang yang thabs 
[\[3a.3\]]cig go/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'khor lha'i bu sum khri 'di lta ste/_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_
[\[3a.4\]]'khor lha'i bu sum khri dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_'khor tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong 'di lta ste/_tshangs pa gtsug phud can dang /_tshangs pa skar ma'i 'od dang /_de dag la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go/_/klu'i rgyal 
[\[3a.5\]]po brgyad 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po dang /_gzi can dang /_ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ud pa la dang /_'khor klu bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi 'di lta ste/_
[\[3a.6\]]mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos chen dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos bzang dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po chos 'dzin dang /_'khor mi 'am ci bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi 'di lta ste/_dri za yid du 'ong ba dang /_
[\[3a.7\]]yid 'ong dbyangs dang /_'jam snyan dang /_dri za dbyangs snyan dang /_'khor dri za bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang /_phrag rtsub dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_lha ma 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_'khor lha ma yin bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gzi brjid chen po dang /_lus chen dang /_rdzogs chen dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'phrul 
[\[3b.2\]]chen thob dang /_'khor nam mkha' lding bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_
[\[3b.3\]]bsti stang du byas/_btsun par byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas/_rjed par byas/_gsol ba byas te/_nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[3b.4\]]yongs su bzung ba bshad par bzhed de chos kyi gdan de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas nas/_mtha' yas nges par bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku mi g.yo zhing sems mi g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs 
[\[3b.5\]]ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra dang /_man dA ra chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po rnams kyi me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor bzhi po de dag la 'thor ro/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 
[\[3b.6\]]rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[3b.7\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal phran dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba gang dag 'khor der 'dus nas 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]thams cad bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod de ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du gyur/_shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gcig byung nas/_de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong du song ste/_
[\[4a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi 'gro ba drug po de dag na sems can gang yod pa de dag thams cad ma lus par snang ngo /_/sangs 
[\[4a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang 'chad pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par grag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[4a.4\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rnal 'byor can dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag 'bras bu thob pa dang /_'bras bu ma thob pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan pa dang /_dmigs pa 
[\[4a.5\]]dang /_mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i rgyu'i thabs la mkhas pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/sangs 
[\[4a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che las byas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma 
[\[4a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas ltas cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa 'di 'dir ci'i rgyur 'gyur zhig gu_/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]du byung ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang snang bar gyur pa 'di'i don bdag gis su la dri 'di na don 'di'i lan ldon nus pa ni su yod snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[4b.2\]]ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sngon chad kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltas 'di lta bu byung ba rnams mthong zhing sngon chad chos chen po'i 
[\[4b.3\]]'bel ba'i gtam dag kyang myong bas na/_bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la de'i don dri'o snyam du sems so/_/dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[4b.4\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po de dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/_ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur ltad mor gyur te/_'di snyam du/_bcom ldan 
[\[4b.5\]]'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa bdag cag gis su la dri snyam du sems so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 
[\[4b.6\]]sems kyis shes nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rdzu 'phrul gyi snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong po 'di dag rnam par bkra ba/_mchog tu blta na sdug 
[\[4b.7\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon du bzhud pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su 'dren par snang ba 'di'i rgyu gang rkyen gang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'jam 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]dpal ci yi phyir na 'di lta bu/_/mi yi mgon pos 'od zer gcig pu 'di/_/zhal gyi smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu nas/_/shin tu snang ba'i 'od zer rab tu btang /_/lha rnams dga' bas tsan dan phye ma dang /_/lha yi spos rab yid du 'ong ba dang /_/man dA ra dang many+dzu 
[\[5a.2\]]Sha ka yi/_/me tog dag gi char chen rab tu phab/_/des ni sa 'di kun tu mdzes gyur cing /_/'khor bzhi 'di dag dga' ba rab tu thob/_/zhing rnams 'di dag thams cad rnam drug tu/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs su kun nas g.yos/_/'od zer de yis shar gyi phyogs logs kyi/_/
[\[5a.3\]]zhing ni stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad tshang ba rnams/_/skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu snang /_/zhing rnams gser gyi kha dog bzhin du mdzes/_/mnar med yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/_/zhing de dag na sems can ji snyed pa/_/'gro ba drug po de na yod pa rnams/_/gang dag der yang 
[\[5a.4\]]shi 'pho skye ba rnams/_/de dag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'gro ba bde dang mi bde rnams kyang snang /_/bzang po ngan pa de bzhin bar ma yang /_/'di na 'dug kyang de dag thams cad mthong /_/sangs rgyas seng ge mi yi dbang po rnams/_/chos nyid rab ston rnam par dbye ba mthong /_/
[\[5a.5\]]sems can bye ba mang la rab ston pa/_/snyan pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su gsung ba dag_/zab cing rgya che rmad du byung ba'i sgra/_/so so'i zhing rnams su yang rab tu 'byin/_/dpe dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig bye ba yis/_/sangs rgyas chos 'dir rab tu ston pa ni/_/sems can gang rnams 
[\[5a.6\]]sdug bsngal gzir ba dag_/skye dang rga bas yid skyo mi shes la/_/'di ni dge slong sdug bsngal tha ma zhes/_/de la rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa ston/_/mi rnams gang gis rgya che mthu thob cing /_/sangs rgyas mthong bas de bzhin bsod nams ldan/_/de dag la ni chos tshul 'di 
[\[5a.7\]]brjod cing /_/rang rgyal theg pa yang ni ston pa mdzad/_/gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po gang /_/bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba dag_/bya ba sna tshogs rtag tu byed pa la/_/de dag la ni byang chub phyir bsngags gsung /_/'di na 'dug bzhin de na 'di 'dra dang /_/
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]khyad par gzhan yang stong phrag bye ba dag_/shin tu mthong zhing thos te 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/de dag las ni phyogs tsam smos par bya/_/bdag mthong zhing rnams mang po de dag na'ang /_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/gang rnams bye ba stong phrag mi nyung ba/_/brtson 
[\[5b.2\]]'grus rnam pa mang pos byang chub skyed/_/la la sbyin pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin te/_/nor dang 'gron bu gser dang dngul rnams dang /_/mu tig nor bu man shel byi ru dang /_/bran pho bran mo rta dang shing rta lug_/de bzhin rin chen dag gis brgyan pa'i khyogs/_/yongs su dga' ba'i yid 
[\[5b.3\]]kyis sbyin pa gtong /_/bdag cag gis kyang theg mchog thob shog ces/_/byang chub mchog 'dir yongs su sngo bar byed/_/sbyin pa 'di 'dra 'di dag byin byas na/_/khams gsum nang na theg mchog khyad par can/_/sangs rgyas theg pa bde gshegs gang bsngags pa/_/de ni bdag gis 
[\[5b.4\]]myur du thob gyur cig_/la la rta bzhi can gyi shing rta la/_/kha khyer bcas pa me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan/_/rin chen dag las byas pa'i ba dan can/_/la las de lta bu yang sbyin pa byin/_/de bzhin bu dang chung ma rnams kyang byin/_/la la phangs pa'i sha yang sbyin par byed/_/byang chub 
[\[5b.5\]]dam pa 'di ni tshol ba'i phyir/_/lag pa dang ni rkang pa bslangs na byin/_/la la dag gis mgo dang la las mig_/la la bdag gi lus mchog rab kyang gtong /_/dang ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa rnams byin nas/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes don du gnyer/_/'jam dpal bdag 
[\[5b.6\]]gis mthong ba la la na/_/rgyal srid skyid pa rnam par spang byas te/_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang de bzhin gling kun dang /_/gnyen dang blon po thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren gyi drung dong ste/_/zhi ba'i phyir ni chos rab mchog 'dri zhing /_/ngur smrig gos rnams 
[\[5b.7\]]rab tu gyon byed de/_/skra dang kha spu dag kyang 'dreg par byed/_/bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni/_/dge slong gyur cing nags tshal gnas pa dag_/dgon pa stong pa rnams su gnas 'cha' zhing /_/la la lung nod kha ton byed la dga'/_/bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]la la dag_/ri sul dag tu zhugs pa'i brtan pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rnam par sgom/_/yongs su sems shing nye bar rtogs par byed/_/kha cig gis ni 'dod pa ma lus spangs/_/yongs bsgoms bdag nyid spyod yul rnam par dag_/mngon 
[\[6a.2\]]par shes pa lnga yang der thob nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po dgon par gnas/_/brtan pa la la rkang gshibs der gnas te/_/'dren pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/dga' ba bskyed de rgyal dbang rgyal po la/_/tshigs su bcad pa stong gis mngon par bstod/_/
[\[6a.3\]]dran dang ldan zhing dul ba mi 'jigs pa/_/la la spyod pa phra ba shes pa dag_/rkang gnyis gtso la chos kyang 'dri bar byed/_/thos nas de dag chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/_/yongs bsgoms bdag nyid rgyal dbang sras po rnams/_/la la dag gis de dang der mthong ba/_/dpe dang gtan 
[\[6a.4\]]tshigs khrag khrig du ma yis/_/srog chags bye ba mang la chos rnams ston/_/mchog tu dga' skyes chos rnams rab ston cing /_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud/_/bdud rnams stobs dang bzhon par bcas bcom ste/_/chos kyi rnga 'di shin tu rdung bar byed/_/
[\[6a.5\]]la la bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/_/bde gshegs sras la lha mi gnod sbyin dang /_/srin pos mchod kyang ngo mtshar mi 'dzin cing /_/bsnyems med zhi zhing rab zhi spyod pa mthong /_/phal cher nags gnas de bzhin gzhan dag kyang /_/snang ba'i 'od ni lus las rab gtong 
[\[6a.6\]]ste/_/sems can dmyal nas sems can rnams 'don cing /_/de dag byang chub la yang yang dag 'dzud/_/rgyal ba'i sras po la la brtson 'grus gnas/_/kha cig gis kyang ma lus gnyid spangs nas/_'chag pa byed cing nags tshal gnas pa dag_/de dag brtson pas byang 
[\[6a.7\]]chub mchog la zhugs/_/la la tshul khrims ma ral srung ba ni/_/rtag tu rnam dag nor bu rin chen bzhin/_/la la spyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de dag khrims kyis byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/rgyal sras la la bzod pa'i stobs can te/_/dge slong nga rgyal can dag 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]khro ba dang /_/de bzhin gshe zhing sdig pa 'ang bzod par byed/_/bzod pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni/_/rtsed mo dga' ba thams cad rnam spangs te/_/byis pa'i grogs po rnams kyang yongs spangs nas/_/'phags pa 
[\[6b.2\]]rnams dang 'grogs dga' mnyam par gzhag_/rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems ni rnam spangs nas/_/lo stong bye bar nags dang ri sul na/_/rtse gcig sems su bsam gtan byed pa rnams/_/de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal 
[\[6b.3\]]ba mngon sum du/_/bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin zas dang skom/_/na ba'i sman ni mi nyung mang po dag_/kha cig de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/_/dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal ba mngon sum du/_/de dag gos brgya bye ba sbyin par byed/_/la la stong phrag bya ba brgya ri dang /_/rin 
[\[6b.4\]]thang med pa'i gos rnams rab tu 'bul/_/rin po che dang de bzhin tsan dan gyi/_/gtsug lag khang ni bye ba brgya byas nas/_/stan dang mal cha mang pos brgyan pa rnams/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mngon sum 'bul/_/kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong gtsang ma rnams/_/
[\[6b.5\]]me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/skyes bu khyu mchog nyan thos btsas pa la/_/la la nyin par zhugs phyir rab tu 'bul/_/dga' ba skyes nas sna tshogs rnam mang po/_/de lta bu yi sbyin pa sbyin par byed/_/byin nas byang chub phyir yang brtson 'grus bskyed/_/sbyin 
[\[6b.6\]]pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/la la zhi ba'i chos kyang rab 'chad de/_/dpe dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig du ma yis/_/de dag srog chags bye ba stong la ston/_/de dag ye shes byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/byed pa med pa'i chos rab shes pa ni/_/gnyis 
[\[6b.7\]]med rab zhugs nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra ba/_/ma chags bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po rnams/_/de dag shes rab byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/bdag gis gzhan yang mthong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la/_/byang chub 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]sems dpa' brtan pa mang byung nas/_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la rim gro byed/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag mi nyung ba/_/ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bzhin/_/gang gis bye ba'i zhing rnams rtag brgyan pa/_/rgyal sras de dag byed du 'jug pa mthong /_/
[\[7a.2\]]rin chen sna bdun mchog gi rgyal mtshan gdugs/_/de na bye ba stong rnams bsgreng ba ni/_/'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong phyin pa ste/_/khor yug tu ni dpag tshad nyis stong yod/_/rnam rgyal ba dan bcas pa khor mor mdzes/_/dril dang dril bu g.yer kha rtag tu 'khrol/_/me tog dri dang 
[\[7a.3\]]de bzhin sil snyan gyis/_/lha mi srin po gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod/_/yongs 'dus shing gi me tog rgyas pa bzhin/_/de ltar phyogs bcu de dag mdzes byas te/_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la 'di 'dra 'dir/_/bde gshegs sras kyis mchod pa byed du btsud/_/rgyal bas 'od 
[\[7a.4\]]zer gcig pu 'di btang bas/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag rab rgyas pa/_/bdag dang srog chags bye ba mang po 'dis/_/'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thams cad mthong /_/gang gis 'od zer gcig pu deng btang bas/_/zhing rnams stong phrag mang por ston pa de/_/kye ma skyes 
[\[7a.5\]]bu khyu mchog de yi mthu/_/kye ma ye shes rgya che zag med do/_/rmad du byung ba tshad med 'di 'dra ba'i/_/ltas rnams mthong nas bdag cag ngo mtshar gyur/_/'di yi don rnams 'jam dbyangs rab ston te/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams the tshom gyur pa stsol/_/'khor bzhi 'di dag rab tu 
[\[7a.6\]]dga' sems kyis/_/dpa' bo khyod dang bdag la mngon par lta/_/bde bar gshegs pas de ring ci yi phyir/_/snang ba 'di 'dra 'di ni rab tu btang /_/bde gshegs sras po khyod kyis lung ston la/_/dga' ba skyed cing the tshom rnam par sol/_/'di ltar 'od zer rgya chen rab btang ba/_/
[\[7a.7\]]de dag ci 'dra'i don du 'gyur ba zhig_/bde bar gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa yis/_/byang chub snying por chos mchog gang brnyes pa/_/de dag 'jig rten mgon po 'dir 'chad dam/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lung ston tam/_/zhing rnams stong phrag du ma gang bstan pa/_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]sna tshogs rab tu bkra ba rin chen brgyan/_/mtha' yas spyan can sangs rgyas rnams snang ba/_/'di ni mi chud rgyur 'gyur gor ma chag_/rgyal ba'i sras la byams pas kun dris nas/_/lha mi gnod sbyin srin po de dag dga'/_/'jam dbyangs 'dir ni ci zhig lung ston ces/_/'khor 
[\[7b.2\]]rnams bzhi po de dag shin tu sdod/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos chen po bsgrags 
[\[7b.3\]]pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par dgongs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang /_chos kyi rnga chen po rab tu brdung ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po rab tu bsgreng ba dang /_chos kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar 
[\[7b.4\]]mdzad pa dang /_chos kyi dung chen po rab tu 'bud pa dang /_chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rab tu brdung ba dang /_chos bstan pa chen po mdzad par dgongs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu dag bdag ji ltar spobs pa dang /_ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[7b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di bdag gis mthong ste/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang /_'od zer gyi snang ba 'di btang bas/_bdag ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos chen po bsgrag pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par bzhed pa dang /_
[\[7b.6\]]chos chen po bsgrags pa thos par mdzad pa bzhed pas 'di lta bu'i snga ltas 'di mdzad pa snyam byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bsgrag par bzhed pas snga 
[\[7b.7\]]ltas cho 'phrul chen po 'od zer rab tu btang ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di ston to/_/rigs kyi bu dag bdag gis dran pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag gis mi lang ba tshad med pa de'i pha rol 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams 
[\[8a.2\]]kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_des chos bstan pa tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par 
[\[8a.3\]]ston te 'di lta ste/_nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang rga ba dang /_na ba dang 'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[8a.4\]]bzhi dang ldan pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar 
[\[8a.5\]]thug pa'i chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron [(]mda'i [,]ma de'i [)]pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig 
[\[8a.6\]]'jig rten du byung ste ma pham pa 'di ltar snga rol dang snga rol brjod pa'i tshul 'dis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya bar mtshan gcig pa rigs dang gdung gcig pa sha stag ste/_'di ltar b+ha ra dwa dza'i rigs 
[\[8a.7\]]su 'thun pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri byung ngo /_/ma pham pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri po de dag thog ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa nas tha ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du de dag gis chos bshad pa yang /_tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te 'di lta ste/_nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa 
[\[8b.2\]]las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[8b.3\]]las brtsams te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i chos ston to/_/ma pham pa 'di ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de sngon gzhon nur gyur cing 
[\[8b.4\]]khab na bzhugs pa las mngon par ma byung ba'i tshe sras brgyad yod par gyur te 'di lta ste/_rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_bzang po'i blo gros dang /_mtha' yas blo gros dang /_dkon mchog blo gros dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_the tshom kun bcom dang /_dbyangs kyi blo 
[\[8b.5\]]gros dang /_rgyal bu gzhon nu chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba yod do/_/ma pham pa bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma de'i sras rgyal bu gzhon nu brgyad po de dag rdzu 'phrul chen por gyur te/_de dag re re yang gling chen po bzhi la kun tu longs spyod par gyur cing de dag na rgyal po byed do/_/de dag gis 
[\[8b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de khab nas mngon par byung bar shes shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par thos nas/_rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad spangs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i rjes su rab tu byung nas thams cad kyang bla 
[\[8b.7\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te chos smra bar gyur to/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur to/_/ma pham pa de'i tshe na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/_nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas/_
[\[9a.2\]]de'i tshe skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du chos kyi gdan chen po de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te/_mtha' yas nges par bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku mi g.yo zhing sems mi g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so/_/bcom 
[\[9a.3\]]ldan 'das de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+ju Sha ka chen po dang /_lha'i me tog dag gi char chen po mngon par bab ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mngon par 'thor ro/_/
[\[9a.4\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur te/_'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/ma pham pa yang de'i tshe 'khor der dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_rgyal phran dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba 
[\[9a.6\]]rnams 'dus nas 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sgron ma de'i smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer 
[\[9a.7\]]gcig byung nas de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang bar gyur te/_ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/_da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag snang bar gyur pa bzhin no/_/ma 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]pham pa yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs 'bring na/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu 'khod pa dang /_'khor de na chos nyan pa de dag 'od zer chen po'i snang ba des 'jig rten snang bar byas pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te ltad mo cher byung ngo /_/ma pham pa 
[\[9b.2\]]de'i tshe na yang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mchog ces bya ba byung ste de'i slob ma brgyad brgya yod do/_/bcom ldan 'das de yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog las brtsams te/_dam 
[\[9b.3\]]pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston te/_bar gyi bskal pa drug cu tshang bar gdan gcig la bzhugs nas sku mi bskyod/_sems mi g.yo bar bshad do/_/'khor de dag thams cad kyang stan gcig la 'khod de/_lus mi bskyod sems mi g.yo 
[\[9b.4\]]bar bar gyi bskal pa drug cur bcom ldan 'das de la chos nyan te/_'khor de na sems can 'ga' yang lus ngal ba yang med/_sems skyo ba yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron mas bar 
[\[9b.5\]]gyi bskal pa drug cu 'das kyi bar du/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas/_skad cig de nyid la mya ngan las 
[\[9b.6\]]'da' zhes lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i mdun du/_dge slong dag do mod nam gyi gung thun la de bzhin gshegs pa phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya 
[\[9b.7\]]ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs so/_/ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po 'di/_nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin 
[\[10a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de'i nub mo nam gyi gung 
[\[10a.3\]]thun la/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mchog des blangs te bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du/_bcom 
[\[10a.4\]]ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bstan pa la yang dag par bstan to/_/ma pham pa de la bcom ldan 'das de'i sras blo gros la sogs pa brgyad po de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog de'i slob mar gyur te/_des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 
[\[10a.5\]]smin par byas so/_/de dag gis de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mthong ste/_bkur sti byas nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de dag gi tha ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[10a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad yin no/_/slob ma brgyad brgya po de dag las gcig rnyed pa la rab tu gdu ba bkur sti la gdu ba shes kyi khe la gdu ba grags pa 'dod pas/_de la bstan pa'i tshig dang /_yi ge mi zin mi chags te de'i ming yang grags 
[\[10a.7\]]'dod ces bya bar gyur to/_/des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mnyes par byas so/_/mnyes par byas nas bsti stang byas/_btsun par byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa dang /_bkur ba dang /_rim gro byas so/_/ma pham pa de'i tshe de'i 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de/_gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kho bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces 
[\[10b.2\]]bya ba chos smra bar gyur to/_/gang yang byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba le lo can du gyur pa de ni/_ma pham pa khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba le lo can du gyur pa yin no/_/ma pham pa de ltar kho bos rnam grangs 'dis na bcom 
[\[10b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu'i 'od zer btang ba mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po de bshad par bzhed pa snyam byed do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i 
[\[10b.4\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab bskal pa na/_/de tshe rgyal ba byung ba skye dgu'i mchog_/mtshan ni nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba/_/skye dgu 'dren pa de ni chos ston te/_/sems can mtha' yas bye ba rnam 
[\[10b.5\]]par 'dul/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas bye ba stong /_/mang po de dag ye shes yang dag 'dzud/_/rnam par 'dren pa gzhon nur gyur pa yi/_/de tshe de'i sras gyur brgyad po dag_/thub chen rab tu byung ba de mthong nas/_/'dod spangs thams cad myur bar rab tu byung /_/
[\[10b.6\]]'jig rten mgon po de yi chos bshad pa/_/mtha' yas nges par bstan pa mdo sde mchog_/de ming shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo zhes bya/_/srog chags stong phrag bye ba dag la ston/_/rnam par 'dren pa de yis bshad ma thag_/de tshe skad cig skyil mo krung bcas nas/_/mtha' yas 
[\[10b.7\]]nges bstan ting 'dzin dam pa la/_/thub mchog chos gdan bzhugs nas bsam gtan mdzad/_/lha yi me tog man dA ra ba 'bab/_/ma brdungs par ni rnga yi sgra yang 'byung /_/lha dang gnod sbyin par snang gnas 'khod pa/_/rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod pa byed/_/zhing rnams 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]thams cad de ma thag tu g.yos/_/de na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur/_/smin mtshams nas ni shin tu mdzes pa yi/_/'dren pas 'od zer gcig po rab btang ba/_/shar gyi phyogs su 'od zer de song bas/_/zhing rnams stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad tshang ba dag_/rab tu 
[\[11a.2\]]snang bas 'jig rten thams cad mdzes/_/sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho skye ba ston/_/rnam par 'dren pa'i 'od zer de yi mthus/_/de ltar de na la la rin chen zhing /_/de bzhin kha dog bai dUr+ya yi mdog_/blta na sdug pa sna tshogs snang bar gyur/_/lha dang mi dang de bzhin gnod 
[\[11a.3\]]sbyin klu/_/lha yi bu mo dri za mi 'am ci/_/gang rnams bde bar gshegs la mchod brtson pa/_/de dag 'jig rten khams na mchod byed snang /_/sangs rgyas rang 'byung de dag nyid kyang snang /_/gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur blta na sdug_/bai dUr+ya yi dbus na gser gzugs bzhin/_/
[\[11a.4\]]'khor gyi dbus na chos ni rab tu gsung /_/de na nyan thos grangs yod ma yin te/_/bde gshegs nyan thos de snyed tshad med pa/_/so so'i zhing du rnam par 'dren pa yi/_/'od zer 'od kyis de dag thams cad ston/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing tshul khrims ma nyams te/_/tshul khrims 
[\[11a.5\]]skyon med nor bu rin chen 'dra/_/mi mgon sras dag ri yi sul dag na/_/gnas shing spyod pa de dag snang bar gyur/_/bdog pa thams cad ma lus yongs su gtong /_/brtan pa bzod pa'i stobs can bsam gtan dga'/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i bye snyed mang /_/'od 
[\[11a.6\]]zer de yis thams cad rab tu snang /_/bskyod pa med cing g.yo ba med par yang /_/bzod nas bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par bzhag_/de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog zhugs pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras rnams snang /_/yang dag zhi ba zag pa 
[\[11a.7\]]med pa'i gnas/_/shin tu shes nas yang dag rab ston te/_/'jig rten khams mang du ni chos kyang 'chad/_/de 'dra'i byed pa bder gshegs mthu yis byung /_/nyi ma zla ba sgron ma de yi mthus/_/skyong ba'i 'khor bzhis de dag mthong nas su/_/de tshe thams cad dga' 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bar gnas gyur te/_/'di ltar ci zhig ces ni phan tshun 'dri/_/gnod sbyin lha mis de mchod mi ring bar/_/'jig rten 'dren pa ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs/_/chos smra byang chub sems dpa' gang mkhas pa/_/'od mchog sras la de tshe 'di skad gsungs/_/mkhas pa khyod ni 'jig rten 
[\[11b.2\]]mig dang lam/_/nga yi chos 'dzin shin tu yid brtan pas/_/ji ltar srog chags phan phyir ngas bshad pa/_/nga yi chos mdzod 'di la khyod mngon sum/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po kun bkod de/_/dga' bar byas shing shin tu bsngags bstod nas/_/bar gyi bskal pa drug cu 
[\[11b.3\]]tshang bar ni/_/de tshe rgyal ba de yis chos mchog bshad/_/gdan gcig steng bzhugs 'jig rten mgon po des/_/chos mchog dam pa dag ni gang bshad pa/_/de dag thams cad 'od mchog rgyal ba'i sras/_/chos smrar gyur pa de yis shin tu bzung /_/rgyal ba des ni chos kyi mchog 
[\[11b.4\]]bshad de/_/skye bo du ma rab tu dga' byas nas/_/de yi nyin par lhar bcas 'jig rten mdun/_/rnam par 'dren pa de ni 'di skad gsung /_/nga yis chos kyi tshul 'di rab bstan te/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra bshad zin gyis/_/dge slong do nub nam gyi gung thun la/_/nga ni mya ngan 
[\[11b.5\]]'da' ba'i dus la bab/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab sbyor la/_/bag med ma yin dad pa snying por gyis/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'das par yang /_/rgyal ba drang srong chen po rnyed par dka'/_/rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu myur ba ru/_/mya ngan las ni 'da' ba'i sgra thos nas/_/
[\[11b.6\]]sangs rgyas sras rnams mang po mya ngan skyes/_/sdug bsngal rab dang shin tu ldan par gyur/_/srog chags bsam yas bye mang de dag la/_/mi yi dbang po rgyal pos dbugs phyung ba/_/mya ngan nga 'das dge slong ma 'jigs shig_/nga yi 'og tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/_/byang chub 
[\[11b.7\]]sems dpa' dpal snying mkhas pa 'di/_/zag med ye shes 'di ni rtogs par rig_/nga yi byang chub mchog rab 'thob 'gyur te/_/spyan dang yan lag dri med rgyal bar 'ong /_/de tshe de yi nam gyi gung thun la/_/rgyu zad me dang 'dra bar mya ngan 'das/_/de yi sku gdung shin tu rgyas 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]gyur te/_/mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas so/_/de na dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma/_/gang rnams byang chub mchog la rab zhugs shing /_/bde gshegs de yi bstan la mngon brtson pa/_/de dag mi nyung gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de tshe chos smrar gang gyur dge slong 
[\[12a.2\]]ni/_/gang gis chos de bzung ba 'od mchog ste/_/bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu tshang bar des/_/bskal pa de la chos mchog rab tu ston/_/de yi slob mar gyur pa brgyad brgya dag_/de dag thams cad yongs su smin par byas/_/de dag sangs rgyas bye ba mang po mthong /_/drang srong chen 
[\[12a.3\]]po de dag bkur sti byas/_/de tshe spyad pa rjes su 'thun spyad nas/_/'jig rten mang po khams su sangs rgyas gyur/_/gcig 'og gcig tu de dag rjes bzhin du/_/byang chub mchog tu gcig gis gcig lung bstan/_/sangs rgyas de dag rim gyis byung ba yi/_/tha mar gyur pa 
[\[12a.4\]]mar me mdzad pa ste/_/lha yi lha mchog drang srong mang po'i mchog_/srog chags bye ba stong yang rnam par btul/_/gang sngon bde bar gshegs pa de yi sras/_/de yi tshe na 'od mchog chos smra ba'i/_/slob ma sred dang ldan zhing le lo can/_/shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tshol ba dang /_/shin tu 
[\[12a.5\]]grags pa 'dod pa'i shas che zhing /_/grong nas grong du rgyu bar gyur pa ste/_/de yi kha ton lung nos de bzhin kun/_/de yi tshe na bshad pa rnams mi zin/_/de yi ming yang 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_/grags pa 'dod ces phyogs su rnam par grags/_/de yang dge ba rnams kyi las de 
[\[12a.6\]]dag_/'dren mar gyur pa mngon par 'dus byas pas/_/sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mnyes byas te/_/de dag mchod pa rgya cher byas par gyur/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i spyod pa rab spyad nas/_/sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge 'di yang mthong /_/de ni 'dir yang tha mar byung ba ste/_/rjes bzhin 
[\[12a.7\]]byang chub mchog kyang 'thob 'gyur ba/_/byams pa'i rigs su bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/_/srog chags stong phrag bye ba rnam par 'dul/_/bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la/_/de tshe le lo can du gang gyur pa/_/de na de 'drar gyur pa khyod nyid do/_/de tshe chos 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]smrar gyur pa kho bo ste/_/kho bos de dang de yi rgyu dang bzhis/_/ye shes grags pa de yi ltas byung ba/_/sngon tshe de na kho bos mthong gyur pa/_/de 'dra'i ltas 'di deng yang mthong bas na/_/nges par rgyal ba'i dbang po kun tu spyan/_/shAkya'i rgyal chen don dam gzigs pas kyang /_/
[\[12b.2\]]de tshe kho bos rnam grangs mchog thos gang /_/de dag nyid ni 'dis kyang bshad par dgongs/_/de yi ltas nyid de ring yongs rdzogs kyis/_/rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa/_/shAkya seng ge yang dag 'jog mdzad de/_/chos kyi dngos nyid phyag rgya ston par 'gyur/_/
[\[12b.3\]]thal mo sbyar te sems bzang brtson par gyis/_/'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse ston gyur te/_/mtha' yas pa yi chos kyi char pa 'bab/_/gang dag byang chub phyir zhugs ngoms par mdzad/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub phyir zhugs pa/_/gang dag mkhas pa nyid las skyes 
[\[12b.4\]]gyur pa/_/de dag rnams kyi som nyi gang yin dang /_/yid gnyis the tshom gang yin de sel gyur/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/_gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de 
[\[12b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so/_/bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri dwa ta'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs su chud pa/_
[\[12b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni zab pa mthong bar dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/_sangs 
[\[12b.7\]]rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad spyad pa/_yun ring po nas rjes su zhugs pa/_brtson 'grus mdzad mdzad pa ste/_ngo mtshar 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan zhing shes par dka' ba'i chos rnams mkhyen pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ldem por dgongs te bshad pa ni shes par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang 
[\[13a.2\]]gis rig pa'i chos rnams thabs mkhas pa dang /_ye shes mthong ba dang /_rgyu dang /_gzhi dang /_dmigs pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_rnam par rig byed sna tshogs rnams kyis yang dag par ston te/_thabs mkhas pa de dang de dag gis sems can de dang de la chags pa rnams rab 
[\[13a.3\]]tu 'grel pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni thabs mkhas pa chen po dang /_ye shes mthong ba dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[13a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams ni/_chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rmad 
[\[13a.5\]]du byung ba'i chos dang ldan te/_chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ngo mtshar chen po brnyes pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis bshad pa chog par gyis shig_/shA ri'i bu de 
[\[13a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ngo mtshar mchog brnyes pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mkhyen pa'i chos de yang de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'chad do/_/shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyang 
[\[13a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ston to/_/chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen te chos de dag gang yin pa dang /_chos de dag ji lta bu yin pa dang /_chos de dag ci 'dra ba dang /_chos de dag gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /_chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ci yin pa dang /_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]chos de dag gang yin pa dang /_ji lta bu yin pa dang ci 'dra ba dang /_mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang ngo bo nyid ci yin pa yang mkhyen to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/
[\[13b.2\]]dpa' bo chen po dpag med pa/_/rnam 'dren sems can thams cad kyis/_/rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/_/de dag stobs dang rnam thar dang /_/'jigs med gang dag ci 'dra dang /_/sangs rgyas chos rnams ci 'dra ba/_/sus kyang shes par mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba'i gan 
[\[13b.3\]]dag na/_/zab cing shin tu phra ba dang /_/rig dka' mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/spyod pa dag ni sngan chad bsnyen/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/spyod pa de dag spyad pa yi/_/'bras bu de ni ci 'dra ba/_/byang chub snying por ngas mthong ngo /_/de ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren pa/_/gzhan dag dang 
[\[13b.4\]]ni ngas kyang de/_/ci lta yin dang ci 'dra dang /_/de yi mtshan nyid ci 'dra shes/_/de ni bstan du mi nus te/_/de ni brjod du yong med do/_/mos pa la ni gang gnas pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par/_/gang la chos de bstan pa dang /_/bstan pa dag kyang shes pa yi/_/de 
[\[13b.5\]]'dra'i sems can su yang ni/_/'jig rten dag na yod ma yin/_/gang dag 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i nyan thos pa/_/lhag par byas pa bde bar gshegs pas bsngags/_/zag zad tha ma'i lus 'dzin de dag gi/_/yul ni rgyal ba'i ye shes 'di la med/_/gal te 'jig rten de 
[\[13b.6\]]dag thams cad du/_/shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bas gang gyur te/_/gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas rnam bsams kyang /_/de dag bder gshegs ye shes shes mi nus/_/gal te khyod dang 'dra ba'i mkhas rnams kyis/_/phyogs rnams bcu car gang bar gyur pa dang /_/gang yang 
[\[13b.7\]]nga yi nyan thos 'di gzhan rnams/_/de dag gis kyang de bzhin gang gyur te/_/de dag thams cad gcig tu deng 'dus nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes rnam bsams kyang /_/ji tsam tshad med ye shes ngas shes pa/_/thams cad 'dus pas shes par mi nus so/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]zag pa med par gyur pa'i rang sangs rgyas/_/dbang po rno ba tha ma'i lus 'dzin pas/_/ji ltar smyig dang 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin du/_/phyogs bcu thams cad gang bar gyur pa dag_/gcig tu 'dus nas rnam par bsams byas kyang /_/nga yi chos kyi mchog gi 
[\[14a.2\]]phyogs tsam yang /_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su/_/de yi yang dag don ni yong mi shes/_/byang chub sems dpa' theg par gsar zhugs pa/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bya ba byas/_/shin tu nges don chos smra mang po rnams/_/de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu gang 
[\[14a.3\]]gyur te/_/smyig dang 'dam bu bzhin du 'jig rten kun/_/bar mtshams med par rtag tu gang gyur la/_/gcig tu 'dus nas rnam par sems byed cing /_/shes rab phra bas gzhan du mi sems par/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po dpag med pa/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed du bsam byas 
[\[14a.4\]]kyang /_/chos gang bde bar gshegs pas mngon gzigs pa/_/'di la de dag rnams kyi yul med do/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/mi nyung gang gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis/_/gzhan du mi sems rnam par bsams byas kyang /_/'di la de dag gi yang yul 
[\[14a.5\]]med do/_/zab cing shin tu phra ba'i chos rtogs shing /_/rtog pa med la thams cad zag med pa/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyal ba de dag dang /_/ngas ni 'di na de dag ci 'dra shes/_/gzhan min gsung ba rgyal ba drang srong che/_/yun ring dus na mchog gi don 'chad kyis/_/bde 
[\[14a.6\]]bar gshegs pas gang bstan de la ni/_/mos pa phun sum tshogs byos shA ri'i bu/_/nyan thos pa ni 'di dag thams cad dang /_/rang sangs rgyas su mi gang zhugs pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das la ngas ni gang bkod cing /_/sdug bsngal rgyud las yang dag dkrol la bsgo/_/gang 
[\[14a.7\]]phyir 'jig rten du ni chos mang bshad/_/de dang de la chags pa rab dgrol zhing /_/theg pa gsum dag nye bar bstan pa ni/_/de dag nga yi thabs mkhas mchog yin no/_/de nas 'khor de na kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa nyan thos chen po gang dag dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dbang dang ldan par gyur pa stong nyis brgya dang /_gzhan yang gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang /_gang yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[14b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa cher bsngags pa dang /_chos zab mo de yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsung zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka'o zhes gsungs pa'i rgyu ni gang /_
[\[14b.3\]]gzhi ni ci zhig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba gcig go/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/bdag cag rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yin mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de'i don bdag cag 
[\[14b.4\]]gis ma rig go snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor bzhi po de dag som nyi dang the tshom za bar rig ste sems kyi rnam par rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas/_bdag nyid kyang chos la the tshom za bar gyur te de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_bcom 
[\[14b.5\]]ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mkhyen pa'i chos bstan pa yang dang yang bsngags pa mdzad pa dang /_chos zab mo ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba dang /_ldem por dgongs te bshad pa 
[\[14b.6\]]yang shes par dka'o zhes yang dang yang gsungs pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu sngon chad ma thos te/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang the tshom dang som nyi 'tshal na/_/de bzhin 
[\[14b.7\]]gshegs pas ci la dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zab mo yang dang yang gsung ba mdzad pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/stobs dang rnam thar bsam 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]gtan dag_/dpag tu med pa ngas thob ces/_/ring nas mi yi nyi ma yis/_/deng gdong bka' mchid 'di 'dra mdzad/_/khyod la zhu ba ma mchis par/_/byang chub snying po'ang brjod pa mdzad/_/khyod la su yang mi zhu bar/_/ldem por dgongs te bshad pa brjod/_/
[\[15a.2\]]ma zhus par ni gsung mdzad de/_/nyid kyi spyod pa bsngags pa mdzad/_/ye shes brnyes pa brjod mdzad cing /_/zab mo dag kyang rab bshad pas/_/dbang ldan gyur cing zag med pa/_/mya ngan 'das par gang bzhugs rnams/_/rgyal ba ci zhig gsung snyam ste/_/de ring 'di dag 
[\[15a.3\]]the tshom 'gyur/_/rang rgyal byang chub gang 'tshal ba/_/dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/lto 'phye che dang dri za dag_/the tshom 'tshal zhing rnam sems te/_/de dag phan tshun gtam mchi zhing /_/rkang gnyis mchog la rab blta na/_/thub pa chen po 
[\[15a.4\]]lung bstan gsol/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams/_/'di na ji snyed mchis pa kun/_/de yi nang na bdag mchog ces/_/drang srong mchog gis bstan lags na/_/mi yi gtso bo nyid kyi gnas/_/'di la bdag kyang the tshom 'tshal/_/mya ngan 'das mthar bdag phyin 
[\[15a.5\]]tam/_/'on te bdag la spyod bstan tam/_/rnga mchog dbyangs kyis rab tu gsung phyung ste/_/chos 'di ji lta lags pa bshad du gsol/_/rgyal sras thugs sras mchis pa 'di dag rnams/_/thal mo sbyar bar bgyis nas rgyal la lta/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin srin por 
[\[15a.6\]]bcas/_/bye ba stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/byang chub mchog 'di 'tshal ba gang lags pa/_/brgyad khri tshang bar gang mchis de dag dang /_/sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang /_/bye ba stong gi zhing nas lhags pa dag_/spyod pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs bgyi 
[\[15a.7\]]zhes/_/thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par mchis/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci zhig bya/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad na lha dang 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dngangs par 'gyur ro/_/yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gnyis su gsol ba btab pa/_don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[15b.2\]]'das 'khor 'di na srog chags brgya phrag mang po/_srog chags stong phrag mang po/_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba shes rab dang ldan pa gang dag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad 
[\[15b.3\]]pa dang yid ches pa dang 'dzin par 'gyur ba mchis so/_/de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/_/srog chags stong rnams 'khor na mchis pa dag_/dad dga' bde bar gshegs la gus pa ste/_/khyod kyis chos bstan de dag 'tshal bar 
[\[15b.4\]]'gyur/_/mi dbang rgyal po gsal bar bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan gnyis su yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci zhig bya/_shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[15b.5\]]'di dngangs par 'gyur te/_/dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur pa rnams g.yang sa chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/nga yi chos 'di bshad pas chog_/ye shes 'di phra brtag mi nus/_/
[\[15b.6\]]byis pa mang 'khod nga rgyal can/_/nga yis chos bshad mi shes spong /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du yang gsol ba btab pa don 'di nyid/_bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_bcom 
[\[15b.7\]]ldan 'das 'khor 'di na bdag dang 'dra ba brgya phrag mang du mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya phrag mang po srog chags stong phrag mang po srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi srid pa 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]dag na yongs su smin par mdzad pa gzhan dag kyang mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad par 'gyur yid ches par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de yang de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 
[\[16a.2\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gis chos bshad gsol/_/khyod la sras kyi thu bo bdag gsol pa/_/'di na srog chags bye ba stong mchis pa/_/de dag khyod kyis chos bshad 'di dad 'gyur/_/sngon gyi srid pa rnams su khyod kyis 
[\[16a.3\]]gang /_/yun ring rtag tu sems can smin mdzad pa/_/de kun thal mo sbyar te 'di na mchis/_/de dag chos 'di la ni dad par 'gyur/_/bdag 'dra brgya phrag bcu gnyis 'di dag dang /_/gang dag byang chub mchog tu zhugs pa dag_/de la gzigs nas bde gshegs rab bshad de/_/
[\[16a.4\]]de dag dga' ba mchog kyang bskyed du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lan gsum gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum gyi bar 
[\[16a.5\]]du gsol ba 'debs na/_shA ri'i bu de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa la khyod la ji skad byas/_shA ri'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/_'khor de nas dge slong dang 
[\[16a.6\]]dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lnga stong stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'khor de nas dong ngo /_/'di ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma thob par ni thob par 'du shes/_khong du ma 
[\[16a.7\]]ma chud par ni khong du chud par 'du shes pa de dag rang gi skyon shes te/_'khor de nas dong ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu nga'i 'khor shin te 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ma med par gyur te/_shA ri'i bu snying po ma yin pa med par gyur la dad pa'i snying po la gnas te lhag pa'i nga rgyal can de dag dong ba yang legs so/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na de'i don bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[16b.2\]]nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni brgya la res 'ga' zhig 'di lta bu'i chos bstan pa gsung ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_u dum bA ra'i tshal la me tog ni brgya la res 'ga' 'byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 
[\[16b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yang brgya la res 'ga' zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu gsung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu nga la yid ches par gyis shig nga ni bden par smra ba'o/_/nga ni yang dag par smra ba'o/_/nga ni gzhan ma yin par smra ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem por dgongs te 
[\[16b.4\]]bshad pa'i don khong du chud par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu ngas nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa dang brjod pa dang dpe sna tshogs dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa brgya stong dag gis chos rab tu bshad pa ni brtag tu med cing rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir te/_shA ri'i 
[\[16b.5\]]bu chos de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu bya ba gcig dang byed pa gcig dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po'i phyir/_/bya ba gang dang byed pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[16b.6\]]'jig rten du 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po dang bya ba gang dang byed pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[16b.7\]]ba gang zhe na/_de ni sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzud pa'i rgyu'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par bstan pa'i rgyu'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la zhugs pa'i rgyu'i phyir/_
[\[17a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par bya ba'i rgyu'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig 
[\[17a.3\]]rten du 'byung ngo /_/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam du gzud pa'i rgyu'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig po dang byed pa 
[\[17a.4\]]gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po dang 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po de de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i 
[\[17a.5\]]bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par ston pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug par byed pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu nga ni de 
[\[17a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par byed pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam la 'dzud pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu nga yang theg pa gcig las brtsams te sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[17a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/_theg pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba gang yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na yang chos nyid ni 'di'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su byung ste/_sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye 
[\[17b.2\]]bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa sna 
[\[17b.3\]]tshogs kyis chos bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang /_shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/_gang 'di sems 
[\[17b.4\]]can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'dzud pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du 
[\[17b.5\]]chud par byed pa/_sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag gis chos de thos 
[\[17b.6\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 
[\[17b.7\]]'byung ba/_sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang bsam pa dang khams tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang /_shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas 
[\[18a.2\]]sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/_de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/_gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[18a.3\]]ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/_sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i 
[\[18a.4\]]chos ston par 'gyur te/_/shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[18a.5\]]da ltar byung ba'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa/_sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha 
[\[18a.6\]]dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs 
[\[18a.7\]]pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang /_thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang /_shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/_gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug 
[\[18b.2\]]par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/_sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[18b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las/_sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang 
[\[18b.4\]]sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/_sna 
[\[18b.5\]]tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston to/_/shA ri'i bu nga yang theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[18b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/_gang 'di'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par 
[\[18b.7\]]byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/_sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag da ltar nga la 'di ltar chos nyan pa de dag thams cad 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang na yang theg pa gnyis su gdags pa yang med na gsum du lta ga la yod/_'on kyang de 
[\[19a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam bskal pa'i snyigs ma las byung ngam sems can gyi snyigs ma'am/_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'am/_lta ba'i snyigs ma'am/_tshe'i snyigs ma las byung na/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta bur bskal pa dang 
[\[19a.3\]]'khrul pa'i snyigs ma dang dri ma mang po dang brkam pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de'i tshe/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gcig po de las theg pa gsum du bshad de 
[\[19a.4\]]bstan to/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar gang nyan thos sam dgra bcom pa'am rang sangs rgyas rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la mi nyan mi 'jug khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag ni/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos 
[\[19a.5\]]ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa yang ma yin rang sangs rgyas kyang ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu yang dge slong ngam dge slong ma la la dgra bcom par khas 'che zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su mi 'dzin te/_
[\[19a.6\]]nga ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bcad pa'o zhes zer zhing nga'i lus 'di tha ma mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes zer ba ni/_shA ri'i bu de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du 
[\[19a.7\]]gyur te/_chos 'di thos nas dad par mi 'gyur ba'i go skabs med cing gnas ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/_mdo sde 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa 'am 'chang ba'i nyan thos mi 'byung ste/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan las chos 'di la the tshom med par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu nga la dad par gyis shig yid ches par gyis shig rtogs par gyis 
[\[19b.2\]]shig shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba med de/_shA ri'i bu theg pa 'di ni gcig tu zad de 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/nga rgyal can gyi 
[\[19b.3\]]dge slong dang /_/dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang /_/dge bsnyen ma rnams ma dad pa/_/lnga stong las ni mi nyung ba/_/bslab pa zhig ral ldan pa rnams/_/nyes pa 'di dag mthong gyur nas/_/skyon rnams yongs su sbed pa'i phyir/_/byis pa'i blo can de dag dong /_/gang gis 
[\[19b.4\]]chos 'di nyan par 'gyur ba yi/_/de dag la ni dge ba de med de/_/'khor gyi snyigs ma nyid du mkhyen nas su/_/'jig rten mgon po ngas kyang bstsal ba yin/_/nga yi 'khor ni legs par 'khod/_/shun pa med cing dag pa ste/_/snying po ma yin kun med gyur/_/'di dag 
[\[19b.5\]]snying po rab tu gnas/_/skyes bu dam pa skyob pa sangs rgyas dag_/thabs la mkhas pa brgya phrag du ma yis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ni ci gsung ba/_/ci 'dra nga la nyon cig shA ri'i bu/_/de dag spyod pa bsam pa ci 'dra'ang mkhyen/_/srog chags bye ba mos pa 
[\[19b.6\]]tha dad pa/_/de dag sngan chad dge ba ci byas dang /_/las rnams sna tshogs dag ni mkhyen nas su/_/nges pa'i tshig dang gzhi rnams sna tshogs kyis/_/srog chags de dag khong du chud par byed/_/ngas ni rgyu dang dpe yang brgya dag gis/_/sems can de lta de ltar mgu bar byas/_/
[\[19b.7\]]mdo sde de bzhin tshigs su bcad pa'ang bshad/_/de lta byung dang skyes rabs rmad byung dang /_/gleng gzhi de bzhin gtan la dbab pa dang /_/dbyangs bsnyad dpe brgya sna tshogs rnams kyis bshad/_/mi mkhas gang dag dman la mngon dga' zhing /_/sangs rgyas bye ba mang 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]la spyod ma spyad/_/'khor bar chags shing shin tu sdug bsngal ba/_/de la mya ngan 'da' ba nye bar bstan/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rtogs bya'i phyir/_/da ltar rang byung ba ni thabs mdzad de/_/khyed cag sangs rgyas su yang 'grub bo zhes/_/de rnams la ni 
[\[20a.2\]]re shig mi gsung ngo /_/ci'i phyir zhe na skyob pa dus la bzhes/_/dal ba gzigs te de nas gdod 'chad do/_/dal ba de ni brgya la deng thob pas/_/de phyir yang dag nges pa 'dir bshad do/_/nga yi bstan pa yan lag dgu po yang /_/sems can dag gi mthu dang stobs las 
[\[20a.3\]]bshad/_/'di ltar thabs kyis mchog sbyin ye shes la/_/rab tu gzud pa'i phyir ni ngas bshad do/_/gang dag rtag tu rnam par dag gyur pa/_/gsal gtsang rab tu des pa sangs rgyas sras/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mang la lhag byas pa/_/de dag la ni rab rgyas mdo rnams 
[\[20a.4\]]bshad/_/'di ltar de dag bsam pa rdzogs pa dang /_/rnam par dag pa'i tshul dang ldan gyur pa/_/de dag la ni ma 'ongs dus na yang /_/phan zhing brtse ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gsung /_/thos nas 'gro mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam ste/_/thams cad shin tu dga' 
[\[20a.5\]]bas khyab par 'gyur/_/de dag spyod pa rnams kyang ngas shes nas/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde rab tu bshad/_/'di ltar 'dren pa'i nyan thos de dag las/_/gang dag nga yis bstan pa 'di thos pa/_/tshigs bcad gcig tsam thos sam bzung yang rung /_/thams cad 
[\[20a.6\]]the tshom med par byang chub 'gyur/_/theg pa tha dad par ni gang ston pa/_/skyes mchog rnams kyi thabs mkhas ma gtogs par/_/theg pa gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin/_/'jig rten na ni nam yang gsum du med/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes bstan pa'i 
[\[20a.7\]]phyir/_/'jig rten du yang 'jig rten mgon po byung /_/bya ba gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin/_/sangs rgyas theg pa dman pas mi 'dren to/_/rang 'byung bdag nyid ci la gnas pa dang /_/sangs rgyas ji lta bu dang ci 'dra ba/_/stobs dang bsam gtan rnam 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]thar dbang po rnams/_/de dag nyid la sems can rab tu 'jog_/byang chub rdul med dam pa thob nas su/_/theg pa dman la sems can gcig bkod na/_/'di ni nga yi legs pa ma yin te/_/ser sna'i nyes pa'ang nga la yod par 'gyur/_/nga la ser sna dag ni cung zad med/_/
[\[20b.2\]]nga la phrag dog med cing 'dod chags med/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams thams cad ngas bshad de/_/de phyir 'gro ba rtogs pas nga sangs rgyas/_/ji ltar mtshan rnams kyis ni nga brgyan te/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rab snang byed/_/srog chags brgya phrag du mas mdun 
[\[20b.3\]]bltas shing /_/chos kyi rang bzhin phyag rgya 'di bshad do/_/nga ni 'di snyam sems te shA ri'i bu/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi gzugs ldan zhing /_/bdag 'od rang byung 'jig rten rig par yang /_/de ltar ci nas sems can kun 'gyur snyam/_/ji ltar mthong zhing ji ltar 
[\[20b.4\]]bsams pa dang /_/nga yis sngan chad ji ltar brnags pa de/_/nga yi smon lam de dag yongs rdzogs te/_/byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni ma bstan to/_/sems can rnams la byang chub 'dun skyed ces/_/ngas ni de skad smras na shA ri'i bu/_/mi shes sems can rnams ni 
[\[20b.5\]]'dir myos te/_/nga yi legs bshad 'dzin par gzhar mi 'gyur/_/de dag 'di 'dra'i tshul du ngas shes te/_/tshe rabs snga mar spyod pa rnams ma spyad/_/'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la chags shing zhen/_/sred pas brgyal zhing gti mug myos pa rnams/_/de dag 'dod 
[\[20b.6\]]rgyus ngan 'gror rab tu ltung /_/'gro ba drug tu kun tu nyon mongs te/_/dur khrod de dag phyi phyir 'phel bar byed/_/bsod nams chung bas sdug bsngal kun gyis gzir/_/lta ba'i thibs por rtag tu rnam par chags/_/yod dang med dang de bzhin yod med pa/_/ltar 
[\[20b.7\]]gyur drug cu gnyis la brten nas su/_/dngos po med la yongs su 'dzin cing gnas/_/sbyang bar dka' zhing log byed nga rgyal can/_/byis pa thos nyung yon po g.yo byed rnams/_/tshe rabs bye ba phrag stong nam du yang /_/de dag sangs rgyas sgra 'di mi thos so/_/nga yi 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]thabs kyis de la shA ri'i bu/_/sdug bsngal mthar phyung shig ces de skad rmas/_/sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong bas na/_/de dag mya ngan 'das pa nye bar bstan/_/'di ltar ngas ni chos rnams 'di dag kun/_/gdod nas rab zhi mya ngan rtag 
[\[21a.2\]]'das bshad/_/sangs rgyas sras de spyod pa kun rdzogs nas/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe la rgyal bar 'gyur/_/theg pa gsum du gang rnams bstan pa ni/_/nga yi thabs mkhas tshul ni de 'dra ste/_/theg pa gcig ste de bzhin tshul yang gcig_/de ltar 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad 
[\[21a.3\]]pa gcig_/gang 'dir la la the tshom yod pa dag_/the tshom za dang de bzhin som nyi spongs/_/gzhan du mi gsung 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams/_/theg pa 'di ni gcig ste gnyis su med/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang byung ba/_/sangs rgyas stong ngam mya ngan yongs 
[\[21a.4\]]'das shing /_/'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med la/_/gang dag tshad ni nam yang yong med pa/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag thams cad kyis/_/dpe dang gzhi dang rgyu dang bcas pa dang /_/thabs la mkhas pa brgya phrag du ma yis/_/rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams rab 
[\[21a.5\]]bshad pa/_/de dag thams cad theg pa gcig ston cing /_/srog chags stong phrag bye ba bsam yas rnams/_/theg pa gcig po la yang rab 'dzud de/_/theg pa gcig la yongs su smin par byed/_/mos dang de bzhin bsam pa rnams mkhyen nas/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[21a.6\]]pas lhar bcas 'jig rten du/_/rgyal ba'i thabs gzhan rnam pa mang po dag_/gang gis chos mchog 'di ni rab bstan pa/_/sems can gang gis de las mngon sum der/_/chos nyan pa dang 'on te thos ldan pa/_/sbyin pa sbyin zhing tshul khrims spyod pa dang /_/bzod 
[\[21a.7\]]pas spyod pa thams cad bsgrubs pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan lhag par byas pa dang /_/shes rab kyis ni chos 'di rnam bsams te/_/rnam pa tha dad bsod nams sus byas pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyal ba de dag 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]gi/_/bstan pa de la sems can gang zhugs te/_/de na bzod cing zhi la dul ba ni/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa de dag gi/_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la su mchod cing /_/rin chen mchod rten stong phrag du ma dag_/gser dang 
[\[21b.2\]]dngul dang 'on te shel gyi 'am/_/rdo yi snying po'i mchod rten gang gis byas/_/bai dUr+ya mchog de bzhin an da rnyil/_/la las mu tig ke ke ru las byas/_/de dag gis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis mchod rten rdo las byas pa dang /_/gang gis a ga ru dang 
[\[21b.3\]]tsan dan nam/_/gang gis thang shing mchod rten byas pa dang /_/la las shing mang gzhan las byas pa dang /_/sa dang so phag las ni brtsigs pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dga' zhing byas pa dang /_/de phyir sa rdul phung po dag las kyang /_/mya ngam dgon pa 
[\[21b.4\]]dag tu byas pa dang /_/byis pa rtsed mor de dang de dag tu/_/gang gis rgyal ba de phyir mchod rten dag_/bye ma las ni phung po byas pa yang /_/de rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par gyur/_/la las de bzhin rin chen gzugs byas pa/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang 
[\[21b.5\]]ldan pa'i gzugs/_/gang gis de phyir byas pa de dag kyang /_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur/_/la las der ni rin chen sna bdun dang /_/la las de bzhin zangs dang khar ba las/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas pa/_/de dag thams cad 
[\[21b.6\]]byang chub thob par gyur/_/ro nye dang ni lcags sam sa yang rung /_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas te/_/blta na sdug pa 'jim pa'i las byed bcug_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur/_/gang gis rtsig ngos gzugs kyi ri mo dag_/bsod 
[\[21b.7\]]nams brgya mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/_/bdag gis bris sam 'dri ru bcug kyang rung /_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur/_/skyes bu dag gam 'on te gzhon nu'ang rung /_/gang dag la la de ni slob pa'i tshe/_/rtsed mo dga' dang bsang bar byed pa na/_/
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rtsig ngos sen mo shing bus gzugs bris pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob gyur te/_/de dag thams cad snying rje can du gyur/_/thams cad kyang ni srog chags bye ba sgrol/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[22a.2\]]pa rnams kyi ring bsrel dang /_/'jim pa'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag la'ang rung /_/rtsig ngos bris dang rdul phung mchod rten la/_/de la me tog dang ni spos gsol te/_/der ni gang gis rab snyan cang te'u dang /_/dung dang rnga chen rol mo'i sgra byed bcug_/byang chub 
[\[22a.3\]]mchog rab mchod par bya ba'i phyir/_/gang dag rnga rnams rab tu rdung byed cing /_/pi bang dang ni pheg dang khar ba'i rnga/_/rdza rnga rgyud gcig gling bu yid 'ong dang /_/e ko na dang rab tu snyan 'byin pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs
