[\[22a.4\]]pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/_/gang dag lcags kyi sil khrol rdung bcug dang /_/chu la brdabs dang thal mo brdabs pa dang /_/yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i glu blangs dang /_/ring bsrel de dag rnam mang mchod byas pa/_/de dag thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 
[\[22a.5\]]'gyur/_/bde gshegs ring bsrel la ni cung zad dang /_/sil snyan gcig brdungs pa yi sgra phyung ngam/_/me tog gcig tsam gyis ni mchod pa dang /_/bde gshegs gzugs dag rtsig ngos bris pa la/_/'khrug bzhin pa yi sems kyis mchod na yang /_/de dag rim gyis 
[\[22a.6\]]sangs rgyas bye ba mthong /_/mchod rten dag la gang gis thal mo sbyar/_/yongs su tshang ba'am thal mo ya gcig gam/_/yang na mgo bo skad cig btud pa dang /_/de bzhin lan cig lus kyang btud pa dang /_/gang gis ring bsrel gnas pa de dag la/_/g.yengs pa'i 
[\[22a.7\]]sems kyis phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas shes/_/tshig gcig lan 'ga' brjod par byas pa yang /_/de dag kun gyis byang chub mchog 'di 'thob/_/de tshe bde bar gshegs pa de dag ni/_/mya ngan 'das sam yang na bzhugs kyang rung /_/sems can gang gis chos 'di 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ming thos pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/phyis 'byung sangs rgyas bye ba mang po rnams/_/de dag bsam gyis mi khyab tshad kyang med/_/'jig rten mgon mchog rgyal ba de dag kyang /_/thabs 'di rnams ni rab tu ston par 'gyur/_/gang gis sangs 
[\[22b.2\]]rgyas ye shes zag med pa/_/'di la srog chags bye ba 'dul mdzad pa/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa de dag gi/_/thabs la mkhas pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/_/chos 'di thos nas sangs rgyas mi 'gyur ba/_/sems can de dag nam yang gcig kyang med/_/byang 
[\[22b.3\]]chub phyir spyad nas ni spyod par gzhug_/de ni de bzhin gshegs rnams smon lam mo/_/chos sgo bye ba stong phrag du ma dag_/ma 'ongs dus na rab tu ston 'gyur te/_/theg pa gcig po 'di ni mngon ston cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du chos ston 'gyur/_/chos kyi tshul 
[\[22b.4\]]'di rtag tu gnas pa dang /_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu 'od gsal bar/_/rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas/_/nga yi theg pa gcig ces ston par 'gyur/_/chos kyi gnas nyid skyon med chos nyid ni/_/'jig rten 'di na rtag tu mi g.yo nas/_/sa yi snying 
[\[22b.5\]]por byang chub sangs rgyas te/_/thabs la mkhas pa shin tu ston par 'gyur/_/lha mi rnams kyis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/phyogs bcu bzhugs pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/'di na srog chags thams cad bde bya'i phyir/_/de dag rnams kyang theg pa mchog 'di 
[\[22b.6\]]'chad/_/zhi ba'i sa mchog 'di ni sangs rgyas nas/_/thabs la mkhas pas rab tu ston mdzad cing /_/theg pa rnam pa tha dad mngon par 'chad/_/theg pa gcig po'ang yongs su ston mdzad do/_/lus can kun gyi spyod pa rig pa dang /_/de bzhin sngan chad ci bsgoms 
[\[22b.7\]]ci bsams pa/_/de yi mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams kyang rig_/shin tu dad pa mkhyen nas rab tu ston/_/'dren pa'i ye shes stobs kyis rgyu mang dang /_/dpe dang gzhi yang mang po rab ston te/_/sems can mos pa sna tshogs rig nas ni/_/sna tshogs mngon 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]par bsgrub pa nye bar ston/_/da ltar rgyal dbang 'dren pa nga yang ni/_/sems can rnams la bde bya'i phyir byung ste/_/sna tshogs bsgrub pa bye ba phrag stong gis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yang dag bstan/_/srog chags rnams kyi mos dang bsam mkhyen 
[\[23a.2\]]nas/_/chos rnams rnam pa mang po rab bshad de/_rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyis dga' ba bskyed/_/de ni nga yi rang rig ye shes stobs/_/nga yis mthong ba sems can dbul po rnams/_/shes rab bsod nams rnams dang bral gyur cing /_/'khor bar bying la mya ngan zhugs 
[\[23a.3\]]pa rnams/_/sdug bsngal rgyud du shin du nub pa ste/_/sred pas chags pa g.yag gi rnga ma bzhin/_/'dod pas 'di dag rtag tu ldongs par byas/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen rnams kyang mi tshol zhing /_/sdug bsngal mthar 'gro ba yi chos mi tshol/_/'gro ba drug po rnams su zin 
[\[23a.4\]]pa'i sems/_/log par mthong ba'i lta la mi g.yo gnas/_/sdug bsngal ba yi sdug bsngal rab myong ba/_/de la nga yi snying rje stobs ldan te/_/byang chub snying por der ni nga sems shing /_/bdun phrag gsum du tshang bar rab gnas te/_/nga ni 'di 'dra'i don la rab sems shing /_/
[\[23a.5\]]de na sdong po de la bltas pa ni/_/shing mchog de la mig mi 'dzums par lta/_/de yi drung na phan tshun 'chag cing gnas/_/ye shes 'di ni dam pa ngo mtshar te/_/sems can 'di dag mi mkhas gti mug ldongs/_/de tshe nga la tshangs dang brgya byin dang /_/dbang phyug che dang 
[\[23a.6\]]'jig rten skyong bzhi dang /_/de bzhin dbang phyug dag kyang gsol 'debs te/_/lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang /_/thams cad thal mo sbyar nas gus par 'khod/_/don rnams ji ltar bya ba rab tu bsams/_/nga yis byang chub yon tan bsngags na ni/_/sems 
[\[23a.7\]]can 'di dag sdug bsngal gzir ba ste/_/nga yi chos la byis pa'i blo can skur/_/de ltar skur bas ngan song gnas su 'gro/_/ngas ni yod ma bshad na dgar 'gyur gyis/_/nga deng zhi bar mya ngan 'da' sla snyam/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang de dag gi/_/thabs mkhas 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ji lta ba yang rab dran te/_/ngas kyang 'di ltar sangs rgyas byang chub 'di/_/rnam pa gsum du 'dir byed rab tu bshad/_/nga yis don de de ltar bsams pa na/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gzhan gyis kyang /_/de dag rang gi lus kyang nga bstan nas/_/legs zhes bya 
[\[23b.2\]]ba'i sgra yang rab bsgrags te/_/thub pa 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog_/bla na med pa'i ye shes 'di rtogs nas/_/thabs la mkhas pa rnam par bsams pa dang /_/'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyi rjes slob legs/_/nged kyang dam pa'i gnas ni rtogs pa'i tshe/_/
[\[23b.3\]]rnam pa gsum du phye ste rab tu ston/_/mkhas pa ma yin dad pa chung ba'i mi/_/sangs rgyas rnams la dad par mi 'gyur te/_/de bas nged kyis rgyu rnams kun bsdus pas/_/thabs la mkhas pa rnams ni rab spyad cing /_/'bras bu 'dod pa yongs su brjod byas te/_/
[\[23b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag btsud/_/skyes bu khyu mchog dag gi yid 'ong sgra/_/thos nas de tshe nga ni dga' bar gyur/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis spyod pa de dag la/_/drang srong che mchog don yod gsung ba ste/_/mkhas pa 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa ltar/_/
[\[23b.5\]]bdag kyang de bzhin spyad par bgyi zhes smras/_/nga ni 'khrug dang mi bzad 'di yi tshe/_/sems can snyigs mar gyur pa'i nang du skyes/_/de ltar ngas rig nas ni shA ri'i bu/_/de yi tshe na bA rA Na sIr song /_/de na dge slong lnga po dag la yang /_/rab zhi sa yi chos ni thabs 
[\[23b.6\]]kyis bshad/_/de nas nga yis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i sgra yang 'jig rten byung /_/dgra bcom sgra dang de bzhin chos kyi sgra/_/dge 'dun sgra yang de tshe byung bar gyur/_/lo grangs mi nyung bar ni rab bshad do/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i sa yang mngon 
[\[23b.7\]]par bstan/_/'khor ba sdug bsngal mtha' ni 'di yin zhes/_/de bzhin rtag par dus su ngas smras so/_/ngas ni de yi tshe na shA ri'i bu/_/gang gnyis dam pa'i sras rnams mthong ba ni/_/gang dag byang chub dam pa mchog zhugs pa/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mtha' yas 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]pa/_/nga yi drung du de dag nyer lhags nas/_/thal mo sbyar te thams cad gus par 'khod/_/gang dag thabs la mkhas pa rnams mang po/_/rgyal ba dag la chos thos de dag mthong /_/de nas skad cig de la 'di snyam du/_/nga yis chos mchog bshad pa'i 
[\[24a.2\]]dus la bab/_/gang phyir nga ni 'jig rten 'dir skyes pa/_/byang chub mchog rab de ni 'dir bstan to/_/mtshan mar 'du shes byis pa'i blo dang ldan/_/mi mkhas lhag pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa rnams/_/de ring 'di la dad par dka' 'gyur gyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 
[\[24a.3\]]nyan snyam ste/_/de tshe nga ni 'jigs med rab tu dga'/_/yang dag nang 'jog thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi dbus su bshad/_/de dag byang chub la ni yang dag btsud/_/'di 'dra'i sangs rgyas sras rnams mthong nas ni/_/khyod kyang 
[\[24a.4\]]som nyi rnam par spang bar 'gyur/_/gang dag zag zad brgya phrag bcu gnyis po/_/'di dag thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/snga ma'i skyob pa de dag ci 'dra dang /_/ma 'ongs rgyal ba'i chos nyid ji lta bar/_/ngas kyang de la rnam par rtog spangs te/_/de bzhin du ni 
[\[24a.5\]]khyod la ngas deng bshad/_/res 'ga' gang du ci yis 'jig rten du/_/skyes bu khyu mchog dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mtha' yas mig can 'jig rten byung na yang /_/res 'ga' 'di 'dra ba yi chos 'chad de/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig snyed du yang /_/'di 'dra'i chos 
[\[24a.6\]]mchog rab tu rnyed par dka'/_/gang dag chos mchog thos nas dad 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i sems can shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog rnyed dka' bzhin/_/res 'ga' gang zhig ci yis snang gyur na/_/gzugs de 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba ste/_/lhar 
[\[24a.7\]]bcas 'jig rten rnams la ngo mtshar 'gyur/_/de bas legs bshad chos 'di sus thos nas/_/rjes su yi rang tshig gcig brjod na yang /_/shin tu ngo mtshar che bar 'dir bstan te/_/des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur/_/'di la the tshom som 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]nyi rnam par spongs/_/chos kyi rgyal po ngas ni kun bstan te/_/byang chub dam pa 'di la yang dag gzud/_/'di na nga la nyan thos gang yang med/_/shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ni gsang chen gyis/_/nga yi nyan thos gang 'di thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo 
[\[24b.2\]]'di dag gis/_/nga yi gsang chen 'di ni thub par gyis/_/ci phyir zhe na snyigs ma lnga yi tshe/_/sems can ngan pa gtum po 'byung bas na/_/byis pa'i blo can 'dod pas ldongs gyur pa/_/de dag rnams kyang byang chub sems mi skye/_/theg pa gcig po 'di ni rgyal ba des/_/sngon rabs 
[\[24b.3\]]bshad pa yin zhes thos nas su/_/ma 'ongs dus na sems can myos gyur te/_/mdo sde spangs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/sems can gang dag 'dzem zhing gtsang ba dang /_/gang dag byang chub dam pa mchog zhugs pa/_/de dag la ni 'jigs pa med gyis la/_/theg pa gcig 
[\[24b.4\]]gi bsngags pa mtha' yas shod/_/'dren pa rnams kyis bshad pa de lta bu/_/thabs la mkhas pa dam pa mchog 'di ni/_/ldem po ngag rnams rab tu mang por bshad/_/'di ni ma bslabs rnams kyis rig par dka'/_/de bas 'jig rten slob dpon sangs rgyas kyi/_/skyob pa'i ldem 
[\[24b.5\]]po gang ni shes rab kyis/_/the tshom chod la som nyi rnam spongs te/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur gyis dga' ba rab tu skyed/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe 
[\[24b.6\]]tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bcom ldan 'das kho na la rab tu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta 
[\[24b.7\]]bu'i gsung 'di bcom ldan 'das las thos nas/_/bdag ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur te dga' ba thob bo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang thos te/_'di 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]lta bu'i chos ni bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis ma thos la/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'di lta bu las nyams so snyam nas shin tu mya ngan du gyur/_shin tu yongs su gdung bar gyur pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ri dang ri sul 
[\[25a.2\]]dang nags khrod dang kun dga' ra ba dang /_chu 'gram dang shing drung dben par gdugs la gnas pa'i slad du rtag par nam mchi ba de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par mtshungs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag theg pa dman pa bas nges par bton 
[\[25a.3\]]pa snyam du gnas pa de lta bu'i mang du gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das de yang bdag cag gis nongs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nongs so zhes de'i tshe bdag de snyam du sems so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[25a.4\]]las brtsams te/_yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gsung ba bdag cag gis bsnyad na ni/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang chos 'di nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma tshogs par/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ldem por 
[\[25a.5\]]dgongs te bshad pa de bdag cag gis ma rtogs te/[ {]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa thog mar gsungs pa nyid thos nas gzung zhing bsgoms te bsams shing yid la bzung bas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid la bdag gis de ltar 'gyod pas mang du gdugs 
[\[25a.6\]]mtshan bas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra sngon ma thos pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das las thos pas/_bcom ldan 'das deng bdag mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das deng bdag bsil bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag 
[\[25a.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thu bo/_/thugs kyi sras zhal nas skyes pa chos las skyes pa/_chos kyi sprul pa/_chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa chos kyis grub pa 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ste/_deng bdag yongs su gdung ba dang bral lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/sgra 'di thos nas tshim pa rab skyes te/_/rnam 'dren chen po bdag ni ngo mtshar gyur/_/bdag la the tshom nam yang phyis mi 'byung /_/theg pa mchog 
[\[25b.2\]]'dir bdag ni yongs smin bgyis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung de ngo mtshar te/_/srog chags rnams kyi the tshom mya ngan bsal/_/zag pa zad pa bdag gi mya ngan kyang /_/gsung thos pas ni thams cad bsal bar gyur/_/gdugs la gnas shing phan tshun mchi ba dang /_/nags tshal khrod dang 
[\[25b.3\]]kun dga' shing drung dang /_/ri dang ri sul gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/bsam pa 'di dag nyid ni rjes su sems/_/zag pa med pa'i chos su mtshungs pa la/_/'di ltar khams gsum pa yi chos kyi mchog_/ma 'ongs dus na ston par mi 'gyur ba/_/kye ma bdag ni sdig pa'i sems kyis 
[\[25b.4\]]bslus/_/mtshungs pa'i chos rnams la ni bdag rmongs pas/_/bdag ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan las nyams/_/gser gyi kha dog mdog kyang rab tu ston/_/stobs dang rnam thar 'di dag kun las nyams/_/thub pa chen po dpe byad bzang po gang /_/mchog rab dam pa brgyad cu tshang ba 
[\[25b.5\]]dang /_/gang yang ma 'dres pa yi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad chos/_/de las kye ma bdag cag nyams shing bslus/_/'jig rten phan pa thugs brtse khyod mthong nas/_/gdugs la mchis nas gcig pu gnas pa'i tshe/_/ma chags ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab las/_/kye ma bdag ni bslus zhes rnam par 
[\[25b.6\]]sems/_de ltar mang du rnam par sems pa yis/_/mgon po gdugs dang mtshan yang bas par gyur/_/'di las bdag ni nyams sam ma nyams zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das la re shig zhu snyam bgyid/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po gzhan dag la/_/'jig rten 'dren pas bstod 
[\[25b.7\]]pa mthong nas su/_/rgyal ba dbang po bdag ni de sems shing /_/gdugs dang mtshan mo rtag du de bzhin pas/_/ye shes brtag med phra zhing zag med pa/_/rgyal bas byang chub snying por gsungs pas na/_/'di ni ldem por dgongs te gsungs pa zhes/_/sangs rgyas chos 'di thos nas bdag 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bzod do/_/sngon chad bdag ni lta la chags gyur pa/_/mu stegs can gyis bkur ba'i kun tu rgyu/_/de nas mgon pos bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas/_/lta ba dgrol phyir mya ngan 'da' ba gsungs/_/lta bar gyur pa de dag kun las bkrol/_/bdag gis stong pa nyid kyi chos thob ste/_/
[\[26a.2\]]de phyir bdag ni mya ngan 'das snyam bgyid/_/mya ngan 'das zhes bgyi ba de ma lags/_/gang tshe sangs rgyas sems can gtsor gyur te/_/lha mi gnod sbyin srin pos mdun du bdar/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi gzugs ldan pa/_/de tshe ma lus mya ngan 'das pa lags/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten 
[\[26a.3\]]rnams kyi mdun du yang /_/gang tshe bdag ni byang chub mchog lung bstan/_/gsung thos bdag ni de ring mya ngan 'das/_/'di ltar rlom sems kun kyang rnam par bsal/_/thog ma rnam par 'dren gyi gsung thos nas/_/sa 'dir sangs rgyas cha byad mngon sprul nas/_/'di bdud kyal ka byed pa ma yin 
[\[26a.4\]]grang /_/de ltar bdag ni bag tsha'i stobs skyes so/_/gang gi tshe na rgyu dang gzhi rnams dang /_/dpe rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog de gnas par bstan/_/de nas bdag ni chos thos the tshom bral/_/gang tshe bdag la sangs rgyas bye ba stong /_/mya ngan yongs 'das 
[\[26a.5\]]rgyal ba 'das pas brjod/_/thabs mkhas pa la rab tu gnas nas ni/_/de dag gis kyang chos 'di shin tu bshad/_/ma byon sangs rgyas mang dang 'jig rten na/_/don dam gzigs pa gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/_/thabs la mkhas pa brgya yis rang gi chos/_/shin tu ston par 'gyur 
[\[26a.6\]]zhing de ltar 'chad/_/de ltar khyod nyid spyod pa ci 'dra bar/_/khab nas byung ba tshun chad rab bstan cing /_/chos kyi 'khor lo ci 'dra khyod kyis mkhyen/_/ji ltar khyod kyis chos bshad gnas pa las/_/de bas 'di ni bdud ma lags par 'tshal/_/'jig rten mgon po yang dag spyod ston 
[\[26a.7\]]pa/_/'di la bdud kyi spyod yul ma mchis na/_/bdag nyid de ltar sems la the tshom skyes/_/gang tshe 'jam zhing zab mo snyan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas gsung gis bdag gi dga' ba bskyed/_/de na bdag gi dogs pa kun bsal gyur/_/bdag ni the tshom bral te ye shes gnas/_/lhar 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]bcas 'jig rten dag gis mdun bdar te/_/de bzhin gshegs par bdag 'gyur the tshom bral/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po kun 'dzud cing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di yang dgongs par bshad/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di 
[\[26b.2\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi bdud dang bdud du bcas tshangs par bcas dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i mdun du khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu ngas khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[26b.3\]]phrag nyi shu'i drung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya ste/_/shA ri'i bu khyod yun ring po nas nga yi rjes su slob par gyur pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa'i man ngag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen gyis/_nga'i gsung 
[\[26b.4\]]rab 'di la skyes par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sngon gyi spyod pa dang smon lam dang byang chub sems dpa'i man ngag dang byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen mi dran nas/_bdag mya ngan las 'das so snyam du sems te/_shA ri'i bu ngas khyod sngon gyi spyod pa dang 
[\[26b.5\]]smon lam dang ye shes khong du chud pa dran par bya bar 'dod de/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba 'di/_nyan thos rnams la yang dag par 
[\[26b.6\]]bstan to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dpag yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med par de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i dam pa'i chos bzung zhing /_mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di dag yongs su 
[\[26b.7\]]rdzogs par byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i 'od ces 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_mnyam pa nyams dga' ba bzang ba sdug pa yongs su dag pa 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa 
[\[27a.2\]]mi dang lha mang pos rab tu gang ba/_gzhi bai dUr+ya la gser gyi skud pas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris de kun tu rin po che'i shing skyes te/_rtag par rgyun du rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[27a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'od de yang theg pa gsum las brtsams nas chos ston te/_gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de bskal pa'i snyigs ma la mi 'byung mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis chos [(]sten [,]ston [)]par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu bskal pa de'i 
[\[27a.4\]]ming yang rin po che chen pos brgyan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir bskal pa de rin po che chen pos brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rin po che chen po zhes bya ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten 
[\[27a.5\]]gyi khams rdul med pa der/_de dag dpag tu med pa bgrang du med pa bsam gyis mi khyab bgrang ba las 'das pa mang po 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas bgrang ba ni ma gtogs so/_/de'i phyir bskal pa de rin po che chen pos brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang de'i tshe/_
[\[27a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na phal cher rin po che'i pad ma'i steng nas gom pa 'dor zhing 'gro bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba de dag ni las dang po pa ma yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po nas spyad pa/_lo brgya stong mang por tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[27a.7\]]spyad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bstod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la brtson pa mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa las skyes pa/_chos kyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa/_mnyen pa dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu phal cher ni byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od de'i tshe'i tshad ni/_gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[27b.2\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od de'i bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis 'das pa dang /_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos pa rdzogs pa 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[27b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[27b.4\]]ngo zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos pa rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rnam pa de 
[\[27b.5\]]'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bar gyi bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis su dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bar gyi bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis su dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[27b.6\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ma 'ongs dus na shA ri'i bu khyod kyang /_/rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs par 'byung 'gyur te/_/pad ma'i 'od ces bya ba kun tu spyan/_/srog chags bye ba stong dag rnam par 'dul/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bkur sti byas/_/der ni 
[\[27b.7\]]spyod pa stobs rnams rab bsgrubs nas/_/stobs bcu dag kyang mngon par bskyed byas te/_/byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab bskal pa na/_/de tshe bskal pa rin chen mang po 'byung /_/'jig rten ming yang de tshe rdul med pa/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhing 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ni rnam par dag_/bai dUr+ya yis de bzhin sa gzhi g.yogs/_/gser gyi skud pas so sor rab tu brgyan/_/me tog 'bras bus brgyan zhing blta sdug pa'i/_/rin chen shing ljon brgya dang rab tu ldan/_/dran ldan byang chub sems dpa' de na mang /_/spyod pa mngon par bsgrub 
[\[28a.2\]]la rab mkhas shing /_/gang gis sangs rgyas brgya las spyod bslabs pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas zhing der skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba de yi tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/gzhon nu'i sa las shin tu 'das gyur nas/_/'dod pa rnam par spangs nas mngon 'byung ste/_/byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 
[\[28a.3\]]'gyur/_/de na rgyal ba de'i tshe tshad ni/_/bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis tshang bar 'gyur/_/de na mi de dag gi tshe tshad ni/_/bar gyi bskal pa brgyad du thub par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/bar gyi bskal pa sum cu gnyis tshang bar/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la 
[\[28a.4\]]phan pa'i phyir/_/de yi tshe na dam pa'i chos gnas so/_/dam pa'i chos nub de yi gzugs brnyan yang /_/bar gyi bskal pa sum cu gnyis su gnas/_/skyob pa de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur te/_/lha dang mi yis rtag tu rim gro byas/_/bcom ldan 'das de de ltar 'byung 'gyur gyis/_/shA ri'i 
[\[28a.5\]]bu khyod rab tu dga' bar gyis/_/zil gyis mi non rkang gnyis gtso bo ste/_/de ltar 'gyur ba de ni khyod nyid yin/_/de nas dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi po de dag dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang 
[\[28a.6\]]mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di/_bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos nas/_tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid 
[\[28a.7\]]bde ba skyes te/_rang rang gi gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha'i bu gzhan bye ba brgya stong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lha'i na bza' dag gsol/_lha'i me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]po dag kyang mngon par gtor/_steng gi bar snang la lha'i gos dag kyang bskon/_lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dang rnga dag kyang steng gi bar snang la brdungs te/_me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par phab nas/_tshig 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yul bA rA Na sIr drang srong lhung ba 
[\[28b.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes smras nas/_lha'i bu de rnams kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bA rA Na sIr 'jig rten na/_/mtshungs med gang dag dpa' chen 
[\[28b.3\]]gyis/_/phung po'i skye 'jig ston pa yi/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/_/de ni thog mar rab tu bskor/_/'dren pas 'di dang lan gnyis te/_/yid ches dka' ba gang lags te/_/rnam 'dren khyod kyis de bshad do/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/bdag cag chos mang 
[\[28b.4\]]thos na yang /_/'di 'dra ba yi chos 'di ni/_/sngon chad nam yang ma thos so/_/drang srong chen po'i ldem ngag la/_/dpa' bo bdag cag rjes yi rang /_/ji lta 'jigs med shA ri'i bu/_/'phags pa 'di la lung bstan bzhin/_/de 'dra bdag cag 'jig rten du/_/bla med sangs rgyas 
[\[28b.5\]]grub gyur nas/_/dgongs te bshad pa sangs rgyas kyi/_/byang chub bla med ston par shog_/'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes bgyis te/_/bdag cag dge ba ci bgyis pa/_/byang chub tu yang smon par shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[28b.6\]]shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/_bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag the tshom ma mchis par gyur/_som nyi dang bral bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag 
[\[28b.7\]]dbang dang ldan par gyur pa stong nyis brgya po sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis slob pa'i sa la bkod de/_dge slong dag gang 'di skye ba dang /_rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' ba/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol ba de ni/_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]nga'i chos 'dul ba'i mthar thug pa yin no zhes de skad gtams shing de skad rjes su bstan pa 'di dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong bdag tu lta ba dang 'byung bar lta ba dang 'jig par lta ba'i lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos nyis 
[\[29a.2\]]stong po 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la gnas so snyam bgyid de/_'di dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di/_bcom ldan 'das las thos nas/_the tshom 'tshal bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das ci nas 'khor bzhi po 'di dag the tshom ma mchis/_som nyi ma mchis par 
[\[29a.3\]]gnas par 'gyur bar/_dge slong 'di dag gi dogs pa bsal ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bka' stsal du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang /_
[\[29a.4\]]bsam pa dang khams tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di ltar sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston to/_/
[\[29a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di las brtsams te/_chos bstan pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid la yang dag par 'dzud do zhes ngas khyod la bstan zin pa ma yin nam/_shA ri'i bu 'on kyang don de rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[29a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu mkhas pa la la ni smras pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam ljongs sam yul 'khor ram/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la la zhig na khyim bdag rgan po 'khogs pa gtugs pa dus 
[\[29a.7\]]yol ba dgog tu phyin pa phyug pa nor che ba longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug la/_de'i khang pa yang mtho zhing yangs la brtsigs nas ring du lon pa 'grums pa/_srog chags brgya phrag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga'i gnas sgo gcig pa zhig yod de/_rtswas g.yogs 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa khyams rnams kyang 'grums pa ka ba'i rtsa ba rul ba/_rtsig pa dang sgo'i skyang nul gogs par gyur pa'i khang pa de la glo bur du me'i phung po chen po ngos thams cad kun nas rab tu 'bar bar gyur la/_skyes bu de la yang khye'u lnga 'am bcu 'am nyi shu 'am mang zhig yod de/_skyes bu de ni khang pa 
[\[29b.2\]]de nas byung bar gyur la/_shA ri'i bu de nas skyes bu des/_bdag gi khang pa la me'i phung po chen po kun nas 'bar ba mthong ste/_sngangs skrag nas sems mi dga' bar gyur te/_'di ltar bdag ni me'i phung po chen po 'dis ma reg ma tshig cing bde bar myur du khyim 'bar ba 'di'i sgor byung 
[\[29b.3\]]ste 'gro nus mod kyi/_bdag gi bu byis pa gzhon nu 'di dag khyim 'bar ba 'di na rtsed mo dag gis rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod de/_khyim 'di tshig par ma tshor mi shes ma rig ma rtogs nas 'di ltar me'i phung po chen pos shin tu gdungs te/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen pos reg kyang mi 
[\[29b.4\]]dgar mi byed de/_sdug bsngal du yang yid la mi 'dzin/_phyir 'byung bar yang yid la bya ba mi skyed do snyam du sems so/_/shA ri'i bu skyes bu de yang stobs dang ldan zhing lag stobs che ba yin te/_de 'di ltar bdag stobs dang ldan zhing lag stobs yod na/_bdag gis khye'u 'di dag thams 
[\[29b.5\]]cad gcig tu bsdus la/_pang par blangs te khyer la khyim 'di nas byung ngo snyam du bsams pa dang /_des kyang 'di snyam du bsams te/_khang pa 'di sgo gcig pu yod la/_sgo de yang dog gzhon nu 'di dag ni g.yo zhing rgod de byis par gyur pas/_'then par 'gyur du 'ong ste/_de dag me'i 
[\[29b.6\]]phung po chen po 'dis tshul ma yin par nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/_'di dag la sbran to snyam du de ltar bsams nas/_gzhon nu de dag la smras pa/_khyim 'di la me'i phung po chen po 'bar te/_'dir thams cad me'i phung po chen po 'dis tshig nas/_tshul ma yin par nyon mongs 
[\[29b.7\]]par 'gyur du 'ong gis/_gzhon nu khyed tshur shog_/phyir byung zhes byas pa dang /_de ltar phan par 'dod pa'i skyes bu des de skad du bsgo ba/_gzhon nu de dag gis me 'bar ba 'di lta go ci zhig ces mi shes nas mi dgar mi byed/_mi 'jigs mi skrag_/'jigs par ma gyur te mi sems phyir 'byung du 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]mi btub cing ma rig mi shes te/_gzhan du na de dang de dag tu 'phyan zhing phyi phyir rgyug ste pha de la lta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag 'di ltar byis par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas yang skyes bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_khyim 'di la me'i phung po chen po 'bar te/_'dir bdag 
[\[30a.2\]]dang gzhon nu 'di dag tshul ma yin par me'i phung po chen po 'dis nyon mongs par 'gyur du 'ong gis/_'di ltar bdag gis thabs mkhas pas gzhon nu 'di dag khyim 'di nas gdon to snyam nas/_skyes bu des gzhon nu de dag gi bsam pa shes/_mos pa rig par gyur te/_gzhon nu de 
[\[30a.3\]]dag gi brtsen pa ni du ma ste/_rnam pa tha dad pa yang du ma zhig yin la/_dga' bar 'gyur ba la 'dod pa dang mdzes pa dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma yin na de dag kyang dkon par gyur te/_de nas skyes bu des gzhon nu de dag gi bsam pa shes pas 'di skad ces smras te/_
[\[30a.4\]]gzhon nu dag khyed kyi rtsed mor bya ba dga' bar 'gyur ba/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/_gang ma rnyed pa'i phyir mi dga' bar gyur pa de dag kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po de 'di lta ste/_glang gi shing rta dang /_ra'i shing rta dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi shing rta khyed kyis ji ltar bsams pa/_mdzes pa 
[\[30a.5\]]dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba de dag thams cad khyed rtser gzhug pa'i phyir/_ngas khang pa'i phyi sgor bkod kyis khang pa 'di nas khyed phyir byung la rgyugs te shog shig dang /_ngas khyed cag su ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin gyis/_de dag gis phyir myur du rgyugs te shog shig ces byas pa dang /_gzhon nu de dag 
[\[30a.6\]]'dod pa dang /_mdzes pa dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba ji lta bur 'dod pa dang ji lta bur bsams pa rnams kyi ming thos nas 'bar bar gyur pa'i khang pa [(]da [,]de [)]nas rtsed mor bya ba dang /_dga' bar bya ba'i phyir myur ba kho nar brtson 'grus brtsams nas/_mthu dang ldan pa'i bang gis gcig la gcig 
[\[30a.7\]]sdod pa med par su snga de bas kyang /_su snga zhes lus gcig la gcig bsngos shing rgyugs te/_khyim 'bar ba de nas myur du phyir 'thon to/_/de nas skyes bu des byis pa de dag bde zhing legs par 'thon pa mthong nas/_'jigs pa med par gyur par rig ste/_grong gi dpong sa bla gab med par 'dug 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]nas dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te/_mya ngan med cing sgrib pa dang bral nas/_'jigs pa med pa thob par gyur te/_de nas byis pa de dag pha de ga la 'dug pa der dong nas phyin pa dang /_'di skad du yab rtsed mor bgyi ba rnam pa mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba de dag 'di lta ste/_glang gi shing rta dang ra'i shing rta 
[\[30b.2\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi shing rta bdag cag la stsal du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_shA ri'i bu de nas skyes bu des bdag gi bu rnams la rlung ltar mgyogs shing mthu dang ldan pa'i glang gi shing rta byin te/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_logs dang ldan pa/_dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rab tu spyangs pa/_mtho zhing 
[\[30b.3\]]brtan pa/_rin po che ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/_me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/_shing bal gyi stan bting ba ras bcos bu dang dar gyis g.yogs pa/_rgyab rten dmar po gnyis su gzhag pa/_glang dkar po thal kar shin 
[\[30b.4\]]tu mgyogs pa dag dang bcas nas/_ba dan dang ldan pa skyes bu mang pos bzung ba/_glang stobs dang ldan zhing rlung bzhin du mgyogs pa/_kha dog 'thun pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i glang gi shing rta byis pa rnams la re re byin no/_/shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi de de ltar phyug la nor che ba/_bang mdzod mang 
[\[30b.5\]]bas des 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis byis pa 'di rnams la bzhon pa ngan pa byin te/_bdag la ci zhig bya snyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di dag kun kyang bdag nyid kyi bu ste/_thams cad kyang bdag la sdug cing yid du 'ong la bdag la yang bzhon pa chen po 'di lta bu dag yod 
[\[30b.6\]]na/_bdag gis gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad la snyoms par bsam gyi/_mi snyoms par mi bya'o/_/bdag kyang bang mdzod mang gis bdag gis sems can thams cad la yang bzhon pa chen po 'di 'dra bdag sbyin na/_bdag gi bu rnams la lta ci smos snyam pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshe gzhon 
[\[30b.7\]]nu de dag kyang bzhon pa chen po de dag la zhon nas/_ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba thob par gyur na shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu des gzhon nu de dag la 'di ltar sngon du bzhon pa rnam pa gsum bstan la/_phyis thams cad kyang bzhon pa chen po byin te/_bzhon pa rlabs po che byin 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras par mi 'gyur ram/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de lta ma lags so/_/skyes bu des 'di ltar thabs mkhas pas byis pa de rnams khyim 'bar ba de nas phyung ste/_srog stsal 
[\[31a.2\]]ba'i slad du de nyid kyis rgyus skyes bu de sho be mchi ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus thob pa nyid kyis/_rtsed mor bgyi ba thams cad kyang thob pa lags te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das skyes bu des gzhon nu de dag la shing rta gcig ma stsal 
[\[31a.3\]]du lags kyang /_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de sho be bar mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu des thog ma nas thabs mkhas pas gzhon nu de dag bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po las thar bar bgyi'o snyam du bsams pa'i slad du ste/_
[\[31a.4\]]rnam grangs 'dis kyang skyes bu de sho be mchi ba ma lags na/_skyes bu de bdag la bang mdzod mang po yang mchis la/_bu yang sdug par bsams nas/_legs su 'dod pas spu mdog 'thun pa'i bzhon pa/_bzhon pa chen po stsal ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[31a.5\]]'das skyes bu de sho be mchi ba ma lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/_de 
[\[31a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba/_'tshe ba dang 'khrugs pa dang gnod pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi rab rib sgrib pa dang /_yongs su dkris pa thams cad 
[\[31a.7\]]las yong ye rnam par grol ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shin tu stobs dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi pha/_thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu son 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]pa/_snying rje chen po mi skyo ba'i yid kyis phan par 'dod pa/_snying brtse ba dang ldan pa de/_khams gsum sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'bar ba gdung phyam dang steng gi g.yogs ma zhig pa'i khang pa dang 'dra bar sems can skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 
[\[31b.2\]]'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa mug nag gi rab rib sgrib pa dang yongs su dkris par zhugs pa rnams 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug las yongs su grol bar bya ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[31b.3\]]tu gzud pa'i phyir 'byung ste/_de byung ma thag tu sems can rnams skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pas sreg pa dang btso ba dang gdung ba dang yongs su gdung ba dang longs spyod kyi phyir 'dod pa'i rgyu'i gzhis 
[\[31b.4\]]sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po rab tu myong ba dang /_da ltar gyi tshe la tshol ba dang yongs su bsags pa'i phyir/_tshe phyi ma la sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po rab tu myong ba dang /_lha dang mi dbul po dang mi sdug pa dang phrad pa 
[\[31b.5\]]dang sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong ba de nyid du/_sdug bsngal gyi phung por 'khor zhing /_rtse dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/_mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur/_ma rig ma tshor skyo bar mi byed 'byung ba mi tshol bar khang pa 'bar ba dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum der 
[\[31b.6\]]mngon par dga' nas/_de dang de dag tu rgyug ste/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po de lta bus gzir kyang /_sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa yid la bya ba mi skyed par gzigs so/_/shA ri'i bu de la nga ni sems can 'di dag gi pha ste/_ngas sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[31b.7\]]phung po chen po 'di lta bu 'di las yongs su thar bar bya zhing ngas gang gi sems can 'di dag rtse ba dang dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa dang rnam par rtse bar byed par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bde ba dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_sems can 'di dag la sbyin 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]pa bya bar de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar gzigs so/_/shA ri'i bu de la nga ni ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan zhes gal te thabs ma yin pas sems can 'di dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa dang stobs dang mi 
[\[32a.2\]]'jigs pa rnams thob par byas su zin na sems can 'di dag chos 'di dag gis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag la shin tu chags pa/_sems can 'di dag ni khams gsum gyi dga' ba la shin tu chags pa/_skye ba dang 
[\[32a.3\]]rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las ma thar ba/_bsreg btso gdung yongs su gdung ba steng g.yogs dang /_gdung phyam 'bar ba'i khyim dang 'dra ba'i khams 
[\[32a.4\]]gsum nas ma byung ba ste/_de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ji ltar longs spyod par 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar gzigs so/_/de la shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu lag stobs can des lag stobs bzhag ste/_thabs mkhas pas gzhon nu de dag khyim 'bar 
[\[32a.5\]]ba de nas 'don te bton nas/_de dag phyis rlabs che ba'i bzhon pa chen po byin pa de bzhin du/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa yang /_
[\[32a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa bzhag ste/_thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis gdung phyam dang steng g.yogs 'bar ba'i khyim dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum nas sems can rnams 'don pa'i phyir theg pa gsum ston pa 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[32a.7\]]theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ste/_theg pa gsum gyis sems can rnams drangs te/_de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs te/_khyed cag khyim 'bar ba dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum gyi gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dang /_ro dang /_reg bya ngan pa la dga' bar ma byed cig_/khyed cag khams gsum 'dir mngon par dga' bas 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan dang bcas pa'i sred pas/_bsreg btso gdung yongs su gdung bar gyur gyis/_khams gsum 'di nas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_nyan thos 
[\[32b.2\]]kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ste/_theg pa gsum po dag thob par gyis shig_/nga ni gnas 'di la khyed kyi snying sdeng ba ste/_ngas khyed la theg pa 'di gsum sbyin gyis/_khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i phyir brtson par gyis 
[\[32b.3\]]shig_/kye sems can dag theg pa 'di dag ni gang 'phags pa rnams la/_'phags pa rnams kyis rab tu bstod pa/_dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_khyed cag mi phangs par rtsen zhing dga' la/_dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur gyis/_dbang po dang /_stobs 
[\[32b.4\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pas dga' ba chen po rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba dang yid bde ba chen po dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de la sems 
[\[32b.5\]]can gang mkhas par gyur pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi pha la mngon par yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par yid ches nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la brtson par byed do/_/de la sems can kha cig gzhan gyi sgra thos pa'i rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pa 
[\[32b.6\]]dag ni/_bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la brtson par byed de/_de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod cing /_khams gsum nas byung ba zhes bya ste/_dper na khyim 
[\[32b.7\]]'bar ba de nas byis pa kha cig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi shing rta 'dod de phyir byung ba lta bu'o/_/sems can gzhan yang slob dpon med pa'i ye shes dang /_dul bar gnas pa dang zhi gnas 'dod pa de dag ni/_bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_rgyu dang rkyen yongs su khong du chud 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la brtson par byed de/_de dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod cing khams gsum nas byung ba zhes bya ste/_dper na khyim 'bar ba de nas byis pa kha cig ra'i shing rta 'dod de byung ba lta bu'o/_/yang 
[\[33a.2\]]sems can kha cig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rang 'byung gi ye shes slob dpon med pa'i ye shes 'dod pa dag ni/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_skye bo 
[\[33a.3\]]phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la brtson par byed 
[\[33a.4\]]de/_de dag ni theg pa chen po 'dod cing /_khams gsum nas 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/_dper na khyim 'bar ba de nas byis pa kha cig glang gi shing rta 'dod de phyir byung ba lta bu'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper 
[\[33a.5\]]na/_mi des khyim 'bar ba de nas gzhon nu de dag 'thon par mthong nas/_bde zhing legs par thar te/_'jigs pa med par rig la/_bdag kyang nor mang bar shes nas/_byis pa de dag la bzhon pa rlabs po che gcig byin pa de bzhin du/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[33a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can bye ba du ma sdug bsngal dang /_'jigs pa dang /_bag tsha ba dang /_gtse bas yongs su gang ba'i khams gsum nas yongs su thar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i sgo nas byung nas/_
[\[33a.7\]]'jigs pa dang /_bag tsha ba dang /_gtse ba'i gnod pa dag las yongs su thar te mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par gzigs nas/_shA ri'i bu de dag la de'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag la ye shes dang 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod mang bar mkhyen te/_de dag thams cad kyang bdag nyid kyi bu yin par thugs su chud nas sems can de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad kyi/_sems can gang la yang so sor bdag gi mya ngan 
[\[33b.2\]]las 'das pa mi gsung ste/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar mya ngan las 'da' ba chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag khams gsum nas thar bar gyur pa de dag la yang de 
[\[33b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i mchog dang rtsen pa dga' bar 'gyur ba thams cad kha dog gcig pa sbyin par mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu des 'di ltar gzhon 
[\[33b.4\]]nu de dag la bzhon pa gsum bstan nas de dag thams cad la bzhon pa chen po gcig byin te/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_kha dog gcig pa/_bzhon pa rlabs po che bzhon pa'i mchog thams cad la byin pa'i phyir/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra 
[\[33b.5\]]ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang /_'di ltar thabs mkhas pas/_dang po theg pa gsum bstan nas/_phyis theg pa gcig pa nyid kyis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[33b.6\]]mdzad pa'i phyir [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i bang mdzod mang po dang ldan te/_sems can kun la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa'i mthu mnga' ba'i 
[\[33b.7\]]phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pas de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa chen po gcig pu ston par rnam grangs 'dis kyang de lta bur rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar skyes bu zhig gi khyim yod pa/_/che la rab tu 'grums te zhig la thug_/de bzhin khyams rnams zhig par gyur pa ste/_/ka ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rul bar gyur/_/pu shu dang ni skar khung phyogs rer dral/_/rtsig pa re lde skyang 
[\[34a.2\]]nul rnams kyang gogs/_/stegs bu dag kyang rnyings nas 'grums shing zhig_/rtswa yis g.yogs pa kun kyang 'dral zhing 'dzag_/brgya phrag lnga dag las ni mi nyung ba/_/de na de dag gi yang gnas su gyur/_/khang phran shin tu dog pa mang po dag_/sme bas rab tu gang 
[\[34a.3\]]zhing smad par gyur/_/de na khyams rnams dgu po thams cad 'grums/_/ra ba rtsig pa dag kyang de bzhin zhig_/bya rgod bye ba dag ni de na gnas/_/de bzhin phug ron 'ug pa bya gzhan dang /_/mi bzad gdug pa'i sbrul rnams de na yod/_/dug chen drag po rnams 
[\[34a.4\]]kyang phyogs phyogs na/_/sdig pa dang ni byi ba sna tshogs dang /_/shin tu gtum pa'i srog chags rnam mang gnas/_/mi ma yin pa'ang gnas dang gnas dag na/_/bshang gci dag gis rab tu sme bar byas/_/srin bu me khyer grog ma sbur bus gang /_/khyi rnams dang 
[\[34a.5\]]ni wa dag nga ro 'don/_/ce spyang mi bzad khro bo de na 'khod/_/mi ro rnams la 'khren cing rab tu za/_/de yi the rel sdod cing lta ba yang /_/wa dang khyi dag de na du ma 'khod/_/de dag nyam chung rtag tu bkres pas nyen/_/gnas dang gnas na rnam par 'cha' zhing za/_/thab mo 
[\[34a.6\]]byed de rab tu sgra yang 'byin/_/rnam pa de 'drar khyim de rab tu 'jigs/_/mi yi ro dag la yang rnam 'khren zhing /_/shin tu drag sems gnod sbyin de na 'khod/_/sbrul dang rkang brgya pa dang gcan gzan rnams/_/de yi gnas dang gnas na rab tu 'khod/_/de dag phyogs dang 
[\[34a.7\]]phyogs su tshang bcas te/_/phrug gu rnams kyang klog cing 'jog par byed/_/de dag gis ni bzhag cing bkod pa la/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyang de la phal cher za/_/rab tu gtum sems sems can gzhan zos pas/_/ji tsam gnod sbyin de dag 'drangs gyur te/_/sems 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]can gzhan gyi sha yis lus rgyas nas/_/de tshe de na rab tu thab mo byed/_/mi bzad gtum sems khro ba'i grul bum rnams/_/zhig pa'i khyim de rnams su gnas 'cha' ste/_/mtho gang tshad dang de bzhin khru gang tshad/_/khru do'i tshad kyi phan tshun rgyu zhing 'gro/_/de dag khyi yi rkang 
[\[34b.2\]]nas bzung nas ni/_/de bzhin sa la gan rkyal de bzhag ste/_/mgul pa rab tu bgags shing bsdigs pa yis/_/'khang du bcug pa de la dga' bar byed/_/gcer bu gnag cing de bzhin rid pa yi/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]che zhing ring ba'ang der gnas te/_/rab tu bkres pas 
[\[34b.3\]]kha zas kun tshol zhing /_/de dag de na nyam thag cho nges 'debs/_/la la glang gi mgo la khab kyi kha/_/mi tsam dang ni de bzhin khyi tsam dag_/zas la sred pas rab tu gdungs pa'i phyir/_/skra dag lhug par bshig cing sgra yang 'byin/_/gnod sbyin sha za [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[34b.4\]]de dag kyang /_/sred brkam kha zas dag ni tshol ba'i phyir/_/rtag tu mthongs dang skar khung dag nas kyang /_/de na phyogs bzhir rab tu lta bar byed/_/de ltar khyim de mi bzad 'jig gyur la/_/che zhing mtho la rab tu mi brtan te/_/rnam par 'grums shing 'jig nye 
[\[34b.5\]]'jigs pa de/_/skyes bu gcig cig yongs su dbang gyur la/_/skyes bu de yang khyim gyi phyi rol byung /_/khyim de kun kyang rab tu 'bar gyur te/_/ngos bzhi thams cad nas ni glo bur du/_/me lce stong snyeng kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur/_/'od ma dang ni shing dag mes 
[\[34b.6\]]tshig ste/_/drag po'i sgra rnams shin tu 'jigs par 'byung /_/ka ba dang ni de bzhin rtsig pa 'bar/_/gnod sbyin [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag kyang sgra dag 'byin/_/bya rgod brgya yang rag rog tshig par 'gyur/_/grul bum dag ni gdong tshig ldom zhing 'phyan/_/de na kun tu sbrul 
[\[34b.7\]]brgya mang po dag_/me yis tshig nas tser lhang sgra yang 'byin/_/bsod nams med pa me yis kun tshig cing /_/de na sha za mang po phan tshun rgyu/_/de dag gcig la gcig ni sos btab ste/_/tshig par gyur pa dag la khrag gis 'thor/_/de na ce spyang dus byas shi 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ba la/_/sems can dag ni phan tshun rnam par za/_/ngan skyugs tshig pa'i dri nga yid mi 'ong /_/'jig rten dag na phyogs bzhir rab tu 'thul/_/srin bu rkang brgya pa dag bros pa la/_/de la grul bum dag ni shin tu za/_/bkres pa dang ni skom pas rab 
[\[35a.2\]]gdungs shing /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyang sgra 'bar kun 'phyan te/_/de ltar khyim de shin tu mi bzad 'jigs/_/me lce dag ni stong snyed 'bar bar 'gyur/_/skyes bu khyim de'i bdag po de nyid ni/_/shin tu rnam par lta zhing sgo na 'dug_/de na de yis thos pa bdag gi bu/_/
[\[35a.3\]]'di ltar byis pa dag ni mi shes pas/_/rtsed mo rtsen pa dag la chags pa'i blo/_/rtsed mo dga' 'am rab tu dregs myos zhes/_/de thos bdag gi byis pa khye'u 'di kun/_/myur du tshig cing chud zos mi 'gyur bar/_/bdag gi bu rnams rab tu thar bya'i phyir/_/khyim 
[\[35a.4\]]de'i nang du myur du zhugs nas su/_/de la des ni khyim gyi nyes brjod de/_/sdug bsngal 'di dag mi bzad rigs kyi bu/_/sems can rnam pa mang zhing me 'di dang /_/sdug bsngal chen po dag kyang gcig phyi gcig_/sbrul gdug shin tu gtum sems gnod sbyin dang /_/
[\[35a.5\]]grum bum dang ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po gnas/_/ce spyang dag dang wa dang khyi yang mang /_/bya rgod dag kyang kha zas kun tu tshol/_/de 'dra ba dag 'di na mang gnas te/_/me med zin yang shin tu mi bzad 'jigs/_/'di yi kho ra yug tu me 'bar te/_/'di na de 'dra'i sdug 
[\[35a.6\]]bsngal 'ba' zhig go/_/de ltar byis pa'i blo can de sbran te/_/gzhon nu rnams ni rtsed mos rab myos pas/_/pha yis bsgo ba de la mi sems te/_/de dag gi ni yid la ci mi snyam/_/de tshe skyes bu de ni yang sems pa/_/bu phyir sems pas bdag ni sdug bsngal 
[\[35a.7\]]te/_/bdag gi bu dang rgyud dag med pa ru/_/me 'dis 'di dag tshig na mi rung zhes/_/de yi dus na de yi thabs bsams pa/_/rtsed mo dag la byis pa 'di chags te/_/'di na rtsed mo dga' ba ci yang med/_/kye ma 'di ltar byis pa glen zhing rmongs/_/de la de yis 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]smras pa gzhon nu nyon/_/bzhon pa rnam pa gsum po nga la yod/_/ra dang glang po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mchog las bcas/_/che zhing mtho la legs par brgyan pa dag_/khyim gyi phyi rol na ni de dag yod/_/phyi rol byung la de la dgos par spyod/_/khyed cag rnams kyi phyir ni 
[\[35b.2\]]ngas byas kyis/_/de la dga' bar lhan cig phyir 'thon cig_/bzhon pa de 'dra yod par shes nas su/_/de dag brtson 'grus brtsams te rangs gyur nas/_/de yi mod la thams cad phyi rol 'thon/_/sdug bsngal dag las thar te stong par 'dug_/mi des byis pa 
[\[35b.3\]]'thon pa mthong nas su/_/grong khyer dbus kyi dpong sar gnas pa ni/_/seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas de la smras/_/kye ma nga ni de ring mya ngan 'das/_/nga yis dka' bar rnyed pa nyon mongs dag_/bu sdug nyi shu 'di dag snying gi bu/_/skye bo mang pos gang zhig 'jigs pa 
[\[35b.4\]]yi/_/de dag mi bzad gdon dka'i khyim na 'khod/_/kun tu 'bar zhing me lce stong gis gang /_/de dag rtsed mo dga' la chags par gyur/_/ngas ni de ring de dag thar byas te/_/de bas nga deng mya ngan 'das par gyur/_/pha de bde bar 'dug par rig nas su/_/
[\[35b.5\]]byis pa de dag lhags nas 'di skad smra/_/bzhon pa yid du 'ong ba gsum po rnams/_/yab kyis gsungs pa bzhin du bdag cag stsol/_/bzhon pa rnam pa gsum po khyod sbyin zhes/_/yab khyod kyis ni khyim der gang gsungs pa/_/gal te de dag thams cad med na ni/_/
[\[35b.6\]]da 'dir dus la bab kyis de dag stsol/_/mi de mdzod kyi mthu dang ldan pa ste/_/gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig dang /_/bran dang 'gron bu dag ni mi nyung bas/_/bzhon pa de yang rnam pa sna gcig byin/_/glang gi shing rta rin chen dam pa ste/_/logs bcas dril 
[\[35b.7\]]bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bres/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dag gis legs par brgyan/_/mu tig dang ni nor bu'i dra bas g.yogs/_/gser gyi me tog rnams kyi phreng ba dag_/phyogs dang phyogs rnams su ni shin tu spyangs/_/rab tu che ba'i gos kyis de g.yogs 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]te/_/dkar [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcos bu'i ras rnams shin tu bting /_/de na de bzhin 'jam pa'i dar rnams dang /_/shing rta de la shing bal mchog kyang bting /_/gos rab ko tam ba mchog ngang pa'i mtshan/_/bye ba phrag stong ri ba rnams kyis g.yogs/_/
[\[36a.2\]]rin chen shing rta bcas pa de dag ni/_/glang po dkar zhing tsho la stobs dang ldan/_/blta na sdug cing shin tu bong yang che/_/skyes bu dam pa dag gis rab tu brten/_/skyes bu de ni bu rnams thams cad la/_/de lta bu yi shing rta mchog byin te/_/des ni de dag dga' zhing 
[\[36a.3\]]rangs nas su/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu rtse zhing dong /_/de bzhin drang srong nga yang shA ri'i bu/_/sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang pha yin te/_/srog chags 'di dag thams cad nga yi bu/_/byis pa dag ni khams gsum 'dod la chags/_/khams 
[\[36a.4\]]gsum dag ni khang pa de 'dra ste/_/sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad brgya yis dkrugs/_/na ba dang ni skye rga du ma rgyas/_/ma lus thams cad nas kyang rab tu 'bar/_/nga ni khams gsum dag las thar cing zhi/_/nags tshal dag na gnas shing dben par 'dug_/ngas 
[\[36a.5\]]ni khams gsum 'di dag yongs bzung ste/_/'di na gang rnams sreg pa nga yi bu/_/nga nyid de yi skyabs su rig nas su/_/de la nyes pa dag ni ngas bstan te/_/'di ltar 'dod la rnam par chags pa'i blo/_/byis pa 'di kun nga yi mi nyan to/_/thabs la mkhas pa dag ni ngas 
[\[36a.6\]]sbyar te/_/de dag la yang theg pa gsum du bshad/_/khams gsum dag gi nyes pa mang mkhyen nas/_/gdon par bya ba'i phyir ni thabs bshad do/_/bu gang nga la rten par gyur pa dag_/mngon shes drug dang gsum rig mthu chen dang /_/'di na rang rgyal rnams ni 
[\[36a.7\]]gang yod dang /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/ngas ni bu 'drar mkhas pa de dag la/_/de yi tshe na dpe mchog 'di dag gis/_/sangs rgyas theg pa gcig pu 'di bshad de/_/thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur gyis 'di zung shig_/sangs rgyas rkang 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]gnyis mchog gi ye shes de/_/khyad par 'phags shing shin tu yid du 'ong /_/'jig rten 'di dag kun na khyad par can/_/yangs pa'i dngos po de bzhin phyag byar 'os/_/stobs dang bsam gtan de bzhin rnam thar dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dag bye ba du ma brgya/_/shing rta 
[\[36b.2\]]de ni de 'dra mchog yin te/_/de la sangs rgyas sras rnams rtag tu dga'/_/de la rtsen par nyin mtshan 'das par byed/_/dus dang zla ba phyed dang zla ba dang /_/de bzhin lo dang bar gyi bskal pa dang /_/bskal pa bye ba stong yang 'das par byed/_/bde gshegs nyan 
[\[36b.3\]]thos gang rnams nyan pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnam rtsen zhing /_/'dis ni byang chub snying po der 'gro ste/_/rin chen theg pa 'di ni dam pa mchog_/skar rgyal khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par gyis/_/phyogs bcu thams cad du ni btsal byas kyang /_/skyes 
[\[36b.4\]]bu dam pa'i thabs rnams ma gtogs par/_/de la theg pa gnyis su gang na 'ang med/_/khyod kyi pha nga khyed kyang nga yi bu/_/khyed rnams khams gsum rab tu 'jig pa na/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por bsregs pa yi/_/sdug bsngal dag las ngas ni rab tu bton/_/
[\[36b.5\]]'di ltar mya ngan 'das par ngas bstan pa/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las khyed thar te/_/khyed ni da dung mya ngan yongs ma 'das/_/sangs rgyas theg pa nyid ni btsal bar bya/_/'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khod pa/_/nga yi sangs rgyas tshul 'di kun 
[\[36b.6\]]nyon cig_/'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dul/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin/_/gang tshe theg pa dman pa smad pa la/_/de la sems can dga' bar gyur pa na/_/de tshe sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dag_/gzhan mi gsung ba 'jig 
[\[36b.7\]]rten 'dren pa 'chad/_/gang rnams byis pa'i blo dag mi shes pas/_/sdug bsngal dag ni rtsa ba mi mthong ba/_/de dag la yang lam rnams bstan par bya/_/sred pa kun 'byung las ni sdug bsngal skye/_/rtag tu mi gnas srid pa 'gog pa yang /_/'di ni nga yi 'gog 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bden gsum pa yin/_/gzhan ma yin pa gang gis skyes bu thar/_/lam rnams bsgoms nas rnam par thar bar 'gyur/_/de dag ci las rnam grol shA ri'i bu/_/med par 'dzin las de rnams rnam grol te/_/kun las de dag da dung thar ma yin/_/mya ngan 
[\[37a.2\]]de ma 'das zhes 'dren pa gsungs/_/de la thar bar ci phyir bshad ma mdzad/_/byang chub dam pa mchog 'di ma thob phyir/_/'jig rten bde bya'i phyir ni nga skyes pas/_/chos kyi rgyal po nga ni de ltar 'dod/_/tha mar de ring ngas ni gang bshad pa/_/nga yi chos kyi rgya 'di shA 
[\[37a.3\]]ri'i bu/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bya'i phyir/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu bshad par gyis/_/khyod kyis bstan pa'i tshe na sems can gang /_/rjes su yi rang ngo zhes tshig smra zhing /_/mdo 'di mgo bos rab tu len pa ni/_/mi de phyir mi ldog par khyod 
[\[37a.4\]]zung shig_/mdo sde 'di la dad par gang gyur pa/_/des ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /_/de dag la yang bkur sti byas pa yin/_/rnam pa 'di lta bu yi chos kyang thos/_/nga yis bshad pa 'di la gang dad pa/_/des ni khyod dang nga yang mthong ba yin/_/nga yi 
[\[37a.5\]]dge slong dge 'dun 'di kun dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kun kyang mthong /_/mngon par shes pas rig nas ngas 'di bstan/_/mdo 'dis skye bo byis pa myos par 'gyur/_/'di la nyan thos rnams kyi yul yang med/_/'di la rang sangs rgyas kyi 'gro ba med/_/
[\[37a.6\]]shA ri'i bu khyod mos par mi byed na/_/nga yi nyan thos 'di dag gzhan ci smos/_/'di dag nga la dad phyir 'brang ba ste/_/so sor rang gis rig pa'i ye shes med/_/khyod kyis nga rgyal can dang khengs pa dang /_/mi rigs zhugs pa dag la 'di ma bshad/_/byis pa 'dod 
[\[37a.7\]]la rtag tu rab myos shing /_/mi shes pas na chos bstan spong bar byed/_/'jig rten rtag tu legs gnas sangs rgyas tshul/_/nga yi thabs mkhas 'di ni rab spangs shing /_/khro gnyer byas te theg pa spangs pa yi/_/de yi mi bzad rnam smin 'dir nyon cig_/nga ni 'dug 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gam mya ngan 'das kyang rung /_/rnam pa 'di 'dra mdo sde rab spangs shing /_/dge slong de dag la yang sdang 'dod pas/_/de yi rnam par smin pa nga las nyon/_/de dag mi las 'chi 'phos mnar med du/_/bskal pa tshang bar rab tu gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas bar gyi bskal pa 
[\[37b.2\]]du mar yang /_/byis pa shi zhing 'phos nas der yang lhung /_/sems can dmyal las nam zhig shi 'phos kyang /_/de nas dud 'gro dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur/_/shin tu rid pa'i wa dang khyir gyur cing /_/gzhan dag rtsed mo byed pa'i gzhir 'gyur te/_/de na de dag kha dog gnag 
[\[37b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/sre 'o rma can g.yan pa dag gis gang /_/spu yang byi zhing shin tu nyam chung 'gyur/_/nga yi byang chub mchog 'dir zhe sdang bas/_/srog chags nang na rtag tu smad 'gyur te/_/rdo dang bong bas phog nas shin tu 'khang /_/de dang de na dbyig pas kun bsdigs la/_/
[\[37b.4\]]bkres shing skom par gyur pas lus kyang skams/_/byis pa'i blo gang sangs rgyas tshul spong ba/_/rnga mo dang ni bong bur yang 'gyur te/_/kha zas bsam pa dag la rjes sems shing /_/khal rnams bkal nas dbyug pa brgya yis brdegs/_/phyir yang de dag der ni 
[\[37b.5\]]war gyur te/_/shin tu mi sdug zhar ba 'theng por 'gyur/_/grong gi gzhon nu dag gis rab gtses shing /_/byis pa de dag rdo dang bong bas rdeg_/de nas byis pa'i blo can shi 'phos nas/_/dpag tshad dag kyang lnga brgya mnyam pa yi/_/srog chags lus rid rnams su 
[\[37b.6\]]gyur nas su/_/shin tu blun zhing rmongs la 'gre zhing ldog_/'di 'dra ba yi mdo sde spangs pas na/_/de dag rkang pa med pa'i lto 'phyer 'gyur/_/srog chags bye ba mang pos bza' bas na/_/de dag shin tu mi bzad tshor ba myong /_/nam zhig mi lus thob par gyur pa na/_/
[\[37b.7\]]nga yi mdo sde 'di la ma dad pas/_/de na de dag lus gnag 'theng por 'gyur/_/sgur po zhar ba ldongs pa glen zhing smad/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di la ma dad pas/_/'jig rten dag na yid kyang mi ches te/_/de dag kha nas rul mnam rgyun mi 'chad/_/de yi lus la gnod 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]sbyin gdon kyang gnod/_/dbul zhing gzhan gyi mngag gzhug byed pa ste/_/nyam chung gzhan gyis rtag tu bkol bar 'gyur/_/de dag shin tu nad dang gnod pa mang /_/mgon med gyur cing 'jig rten dag na rgyu/_/de na de yis gang la nyer bsnyen 
[\[38a.2\]]kyang /_/de la de dag sbyin par dad mi 'gyur/_/byin na yang ni myur du stor 'gyur te/_/de yi sdig pa'i 'bras bu de 'dra'o/_/des na de yis sman dag rnyed pa ni/_/shin tu sbyar legs mkhas pas byin na yang /_/des kyang de dag nad ni phyir zhing skye/_/nam yang de yi nad 
[\[38a.3\]]rnams mthar mi 'byung /_/gzhan gyis rkun po byas par gyur pa dang /_/'khrug cing de bzhin dpung 'cha' 'thab pa dang /_/de bzhin gzhan gyis nor rnams 'phrogs pa yang /_/sdig pa'i las kyis de yi steng du 'bab/_/nga yi sangs rgyas tshul 'di spangs pas 
[\[38a.4\]]na/_/mi dbang rgyal po 'jig rten ston pa yi/_/'jig rten mgon po des ni yong mi mthong /_/de ni mi khom par yang gnas par 'gyur/_/byis pa des ni chos kyang mi thos te/_/de dag sems pa med cing 'on par 'gyur/_/byang chub 'di 'dra ba ni spangs pas na/_/
[\[38a.5\]]de dag nams kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/khrag khrig dag ni brgya stong mang po yang /_/lus ni ma grims yan lag ma tshang 'gyur/_/de ni mdo sde 'di spangs sdig pa'i 'bras/_/de yi skyed mos tshal ni sems can dmyal/_/ngan song 
[\[38a.6\]]dag ni de yi khyim yin te/_/phag dang bong bu wa dang sa 'dzul bar/_/de na de dag rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/_/de dag mi yi lus su gyur na yang /_/ldongs pa dang ni 'on pa glen pa ste/_/rtag tu dbul zhing gzhan gyis mngag par 'gyur/_/de tshe de yi rgyan ni de dag go/_/
[\[38a.7\]]de na de yi gos ni nad yin te/_/lus la rma ni bye ba khrag khrig 'byung /_/de bzhin shu ba g.yan pa 'brum bu dang /_/de bzhin sha bkra mdze dag bshul bar mnam/_/de yi 'jig tshogs lta ba stug por 'gyur/_/de yi khro ba'i stobs kyang shin tu che/_/de yi 'dod 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]chags dag kyang shin tu bdo/_/de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rtag tu dga'/_/gang gis nga yi mdo sde 'di spangs pa/_/de ring gal te nga yis shA ri'i bu/_/de yi nyes pa bskal par brjod na yang /_/nyes pa'i mthar ni phyin par yong mi nus/_/ngas ni de yi don rnams rab 
[\[38b.2\]]mthong bas/_/shA ri'i bu khyod yang dag bstan pa ni/_/khyod kyis skye bo byis pa'i mdun du yang /_/mdo sde 'di 'dra ma bshad cig ces bsgo/_/'di ltar gang dag gsal zhing mang thos pa/_/dran dang ldan zhing gang mkhas ye shes ldan/_/byang chub dam pa mchog la gang zhugs pa/_/de la khyod kyis don 
[\[38b.3\]]dam 'di sgrogs shig_/gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba mang po mthong /_/gang gis dpag tu med pa'i dge ba skyed/_/gang rnams lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan/_/de la khyod kyis don dam 'di sgrogs shig_/gang rnams brtson 'grus ldan zhing rtag byams sems/_/byams 
[\[38b.4\]]pa de la de dag ring du bsgoms/_/lus dang de bzhin srog kyang rab tu btang /_/de dag la ni mdo 'di mngon sum shod/_/phan tshun rtog cing rim gror bcas pa dang /_/gang rnams byis pa dag kyang mi sten zhing /_/gang dag ri sul rnams su dga' ba dag_/de la mdo sde bzang 
[\[38b.5\]]po 'di sgrogs shig_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la rab bsnyen zhing /_/sdig pa'i grogs po dag ni yongs spong ba/_/de lta bu yi sangs rgyas sras mthong na/_/de dag la yang mdo sde 'di ston cig_/tshul khrims ma nyams nor bu rin chen bzhin/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 
[\[38b.6\]]gzung bar gnas/_/de 'dra sangs rgyas sras po mthong na yang /_/de dag mdun du mdo sde 'di shod cig_/khro ba med cing rtag tu drang ba ste/_/srog chags thams cad la yang snying rjer ldan/_/bde bar gshegs pa dag la rim gror bcas/_/de yi mdun du mdo sde 'di shod cig_/
[\[38b.7\]]gang dag 'khor gyi dbus su chos ston pa/_/dpe rnams bye ba khrag khrig du ma yis/_/ma chags gyur cing nan tan yid kyis 'chad/_/de dag la yang mdo sde 'di shod cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yongs tshol zhing /_/gang dag thal mo sbyar te mgo la 'thug_/legs 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]par smra ba'i dge slong tshol ba'i phyir/_/gang dag phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'gro/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde kun 'dzin te/_/de ni nam yang gzhan la dga' mi byed/_/gzhan las tshigs bcad gcig kyang mi 'dzin pas/_/de dag la yang mdo sde mchog 'di 
[\[39a.2\]]shod/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'dzin/_/de ltar mi dag la la de tshol te/_/de bzhin du yang 'di 'dra mdo sde tshol/_/rnyed nas kyang ni de dag spyi bos len/_/mdo sde gzhan la nam yang mi sems te/_/'jig rten rgyang pan pa dang bstan bcos gzhan/_/de 'dra 
[\[39a.3\]]byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/_/de dag khyod kyis spongs la 'di shod cig_/bskal pa tshang bar yang ni shA ri'i bu/_/byang chub dam pa mchog 'dir gang zhugs pa'i/_/rnam pa bye ba phrag stong mang smra ba/_/de dag mdun du mdo sde 'di shod cig_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po 
[\[39a.4\]]las dpe'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnam pa 'di lta bu 
[\[39a.5\]]'di bcom ldan 'das las thos shing /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas/_ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du gyur/_shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_de'i tshe stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[39a.6\]]dong ste phyin pa dang /_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta zhing /_lus btud lus mngon par btud/_lus rnam par btud/_lus shin 
[\[39a.7\]]tu btud de/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgas gtugs 'khogs nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di'i nang na yang gnas brtan du 'dzin te/_rgas 'khogs shing bdag cag mya ngan las 'das pa thob snyam nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bdag cag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa ma mchis te bdag cag ni brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i rngo mi thogs pa'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das chos ston cing /_bcom ldan 'das ring du yang bzhugs par gyur te chos bshad pa de la bdag cag kyang mchis par gyur 
[\[39b.2\]]pa de'i tshe na ni/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ring du mchis shing /_bcom ldan 'das la ring du bsnyen bkur bgyis pas/_yan lag dang nying lag kyang bro 'tshal/_tshigs dang tshigs phre'u rnams kyang bro 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39b.3\]]kyis chos bstan pa na yang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa thams cad bdag cag gis brjod kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa 'di dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dag la bdag 
[\[39b.4\]]cig gis re ba ma bskyed do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag cag khams gsum nas byung ste/_mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes shing /_bdag cag ni rgas 'khogs pas/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bla na 
[\[39b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing btams mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag gis re ba'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas/_nyan thos rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[39b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar lung bstan pa thos nas/_ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng 'phral la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sngon ma thos pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/_bdag cag gis rnyed pa chen po thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[39b.7\]]cag gis rin po che chen po thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis tshad ma mchis pa'i rin po che chen po thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ma bslangs ma btsal ma bsams ma smon par rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rin po che chen po 'di thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]cag spobs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig 'di ltar pha'i gan nas logs shig tu mchis la/_de logs shig tu mchis nas yul phyogs gcig cig tu phyin te/_/de dang der dgung lo mang du nyi 
[\[40a.2\]]shu'am/_sum cu 'am bzhi bcu 'am lnga bcur gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi de chen po zhig tu lags la/_de yang dbul por gyur nas 'tsho ba tshol zhing /_'tshal ma dang rad pa'i slad du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su mchis nas/_yul phyogs gcig cig tu phyin 
[\[40a.3\]]te/_de'i pha de yang yul gzhan du mchis la/_nor dang /_'gron bu dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang por gyur te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul 
[\[40a.4\]]dgog dang ldan par gyur la/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_sug las bgyid pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi mang por gyur la/_glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang ba lang dang /_lug mang po dang ldan par gyur te/_g.yog mang zhing yul chen po'i nang na nor dang ldan pa lags 
[\[40a.5\]]la/_'du ba dang 'phel ba dang rmo ba dang tshol ba yang mang du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po de 'tshal ma dang rad pa tshol ba'i slad du/_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang du mthar gyis 'khyam pa las/_de na nor dang /_
[\[40a.6\]]'gron bu dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po mchis pa'i mi de gang na mchis pa'i grong khyer der phyin par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po de'i pha nor dang 'gron bu dang mdzod dang bang ba mang po can de grong khyer de na gnas shing /_bu lo lnga bcu'i bar du stor ba de rtag par 
[\[40a.7\]]rgyun du dran te/_dran yang bdag gcig pu nang du gdung ba ma gtogs par gzhan su la yang mi smra bar 'di snyam du yang bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te gtugs na/_bdag la 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang du yod la/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]bdag la bu ni gcig kyang med na/_bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_'di dag thams cad ma spyad par chud zos par mi 'gyur ram snyam du de'i phyir zhing bu de dran nas/_kye ma gal te bdag gi bu de nor gyi tshogs 'di la spyod par gyur na ni/_bdag mya ngan med par 'gyur 
[\[40b.2\]]bar sems la/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po de rad pa dang 'tshal ma tshol zhing mthar gyis 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang bang ba mang po can gyi mi de'i gnas ga la ba der mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po de'i pha 
[\[40b.3\]]de bdag gi mchis brang gi chab sgo na bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyi 'khor chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_seng ge'i khri chen po sug rten dang bcas pa gser dang dngul gyis shin tu brgyan pa la mchis nas/_
[\[40b.4\]]'gron bu bye ba brgya stong gis spyod pa bgyid de/_rnga yab kyis g.yob cing bla re bres pa'i sa'i phyogs/_me tog sil ma gtor cing rin po che'i phreng ba spyangs pa na 'byor cing longs spyod pa chen pos mchis la bcom ldan 'das mi dbul po des rang gi pha de rang gi mchis brang gi chab 
[\[40b.5\]]sgo na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i longs spyod mchis shing /_skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor nas khyim bdag gi sug las bgyid pa mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' nas spu zing zhes bgyid de/_rab tu yid mi bde nas 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po 'am/_
[\[40b.6\]]blon po chen po 'di dang bdag blo bur du phrad de/_'di na bdag gi bya ba ci yang med kyis bdag dbul po'i gnas ga la ba der song la/_der bdag gi zas dang gos nyon mi mongs par rnyed kyis/_bdag 'dir ring du thogs su zin na mi rung ngo /_/'dir bag tsam gzungs su zin tam/_
[\[40b.7\]]nyes pa gzhan la la dang phrad par gyur du mi 'ong ngam snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po de 'jigs pa brgyud mar yid la bgyid cing skrag nas/_de na mi gnas par rings par bros te mchis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi phyug po de/_bdag gi mchis 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]brang gi chab sgo na seng ge'i khri la mchis pas/_bdag gi bu de mthong ma thag tu ngo mtshar te/_mthong nas kyang dga' mgu rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/_'di snyam du 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_
[\[41a.2\]]'bru dang /_mdzod dang bang ba'i longs spyod chen po 'di la spyad pa 'di ltar rnyed de/_bdag ni rgas 'khogs gtugs nas bdag kyang 'di nyid phyir zhing dran na 'di yang kho bdag nyid 'dir 'ongs pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/snyam du sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das de nas mi de bu la sred pas 
[\[41a.3\]]gdungs pas/_de'i tshe skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/_mi mgyogs pa dag bkye ste/_grogs po dag deng la mi de myur du khrid de shog cig ces bsgo nas/_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi de dag thams cad kyis mgyogs par brgyugs nas/_mi dbul po de bzung ba dang /_
[\[41a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po de de'i tshe na 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' nas ba spu zing zhes bgyid cing rab tu yid mi bde ste sngangs pa'i sgra drag po phyung nas/_ku co 'don cing kho bos khyed la nyes pa cung zad kyang ma byas na zhes tshig tu smras te/_de nas mi de dag gis nan gyis 
[\[41a.5\]]mi dbul po de ku co 'don bzhin du khrid pa dang /_de nas mi dbul po de 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' nas/_spu zing zhes bgyid cing rab tu yid mi bde ste/_'di ltar bdag gsod du bcug nas ma rung bar mi bya'am snyam sems shing /_de brgyal te dog sa la 'gyel nas myos par 
[\[41a.6\]]gyur la/_de'i pha de yang nye ba zhig na mchis nas/_des mi de dag la khyed kyis mi'u ni khrid de ma 'ong bar/_'u ni chu grang mos gtor cig ces de skad smras nas gzhan mi mchis te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_khyim bdag de bdag ni mthu chen po dang ldan la/_mi dbul po 'di ni 
[\[41a.7\]]dman pa la mos par 'tshal nas/_khyim bdag gi bu lags par yang 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das de nas khyim bdag de thabs mkhas pa'i slad du/_'di bdag gi bu lags shes su la yang mi mchi ste/_bcom ldan 'das de nas khyim bdag des mi gzhan zhig la/_kye mi khyod 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]song ste mi dbul po pha bi la/_kye mi khyod btang gis gar dga' bar 'gro la rag go zhes bsgo shig ces mchi nas/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des de las mnyan nas/_mi dbul po de ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/_mi dbul po de la kye mi khyod btang gis gar dga' 
[\[41b.2\]]bar 'gro la rag go zhes bgyis nas/_de nas mi dbul po de'i tshig de thos pa dang /_ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba thob par gyur te/_sa'i phyogs de las langs nas/_de mi dbul po'i gnas ga la ba der 'tshal ma dang rad pa tshol ba'i slad du mchis te/_de nas khyim bdag des mi 
[\[41b.3\]]dbul po de dgug pa'i slad du thabs mkhas pa sbyar ba/_des de la mdog mi sdug cing mdangs ngan pa'i mi gnyis shig mngags te/_khyed gnyis deng la gang 'dir 'ongs pa'i mi de la khyed rang gi tshig gis nyi ma'i gla thang gis gla gyis la/_nga'i khyim 'dir las byed du chug cig_/
[\[41b.4\]]de gal te 'di skad du las ci bya zhes zer ba dang /_khyed gnyis kyis de la 'di skad du/_nged gnyis dang lhan cig tu phyag dar gyi phung po phyag go/_/zhes smros shig ces bgyis nas/_mi de gnyis kyis mi dbul po de btsal te sug las de bzhin du bsgrubs nas/_de nas mi de 
[\[41b.5\]]gnyis dang mi dbul po des mi nor chen po de las gla blangs te/_khyim de nyid na phyag dar gyi phung po 'phyag cing /_mi nor po che de nyid kyi khyim drung gi spyil po na gnas shing mchis nas/_mi phyug po des mthongs khung dang skar khung dag nas bdag gi bu phyag dar 'phyag pa mthong ste/_mthong nas 
[\[41b.6\]]ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag de phreng ba dang rgyan bkrol te/_rad pa bzang po 'jam po chen po phud nas/_rad pa dri ma can 'tshal te/_bdag gi gnas nas babs nas sug pa g.yon pa na skon pa thogs te/_phyag dar gyis bdag gi lus la gos par bgyis nas/_
[\[41b.7\]]rgyang ring po nas smra zhing /_bu ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/_'di skad du khyod ma 'khod par skon pa thogs la phyag dar skyos shig ces mchi zhing /_thabs 'dis bu de la smras te yang 'di skad bsgo'o/_/kye mi khyod 'di nyid na las byos la phyir gzhan du ma 'gro zhig dang 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ngas khyod gla bskyed de sbyin no/_/khyod la ci dang ci dgos pa yang na bum pa'i rin nam/_yang na ril ba'i rin nam/_yang na phru ba'i rin nam/_yang na shing gi rin nam/_yang na lan tshwa'i rin nam/_yang na zas sam/_yang na gos kyang rung ste/_de dag nga la 
[\[42a.2\]]'dzem pa med par slongs shig_/kye skyes bu nga la ras rnying pa yang yod de/_de ste de yang khyod la dgos na yang slongs shig dang /_ngas khyed la sbyin no/_/kye skyes bu yo byad kyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag khyod la ci dang ci dgos pa de dang de dag thams cad ngas khyod la sbyin gyis/_mi khyod 
[\[42a.3\]]mya ngan med par byos la/_khyod kyi pha ci lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis nga la soms shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga ni rgan khyod ni gzhon te khyod kyis nga'i phyag dar gyi phung po 'di phyags shing las mang po byas te/_kye mi khyod las 'di byed pa'i tshe/_sgyu 'am/_gya gyu'am/_g.yo 
[\[42a.4\]]'am/_nga rgyal lam/_'chab pa sngon byas pa'am/_byed pa yang med de kye skyes bu ji ltar mi 'di dag gzhan las byed pa'i tshe/_skyon de dag yod pa/_khyod la rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa de dag las gcig kyang ma mthong gis deng phan chad nga la khyod ni nga'i snying gi bu ci lta ba de dang 'dra 
[\[42a.5\]]ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das de nas khyim bdag des mi dbul po de la bu zhes ming du btags so/_/mi dbul po de yang khyim bdag de la phar 'du shes skyed de/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis khyim bdag de bu 'tshal bas skom nas/_dgung lo nyi shu'i bar du bu de phyag 
[\[42a.6\]]dar gyi phung po 'phyag tu stsal te/_de nas dgung lo nyi shu 'das pa dang /_mi dbul po de khyim bdag de'i mchis brang gi slad nang du mchi ba la 'dzem pa ma mchis par gyur te/_spyil po de nyid na gnas shing mchis pa las/_bcom ldan 'das de nas khyim bdag de bro 'tshal 
[\[42a.7\]]bar gyur te/_bdag 'gum pa'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_de mi dbul po de la 'di skad du/_kye mi khyod tshur shog_/nga'i 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba shin tu mang du yod pa 'di dag nga ni nad tshabs che na de dag su la 
[\[42b\]]
