[\[42b.1\]]sbyin pa dang /_su las blang ba dang /_gang sba bar bya ba de dag thams cad khyod kyis shes par 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar nga nor 'di'i bdag por gyur pa ltar khyod kyang de bzhin gyis nga'i 'di las khyod kyis cung zad kyang chud ma gzan cig ces mchis nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[42b.2\]]de nas mi dbul po de rnam grangs 'dis/_khyim bdag de'i 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rab tu mang ba de dag mchis par 'tshal la/_bdag nyid de la re ba ma mchis shing /_tha na phye phul gang gi rin thang tsam yang de la cung 
[\[42b.3\]]zad kyang slong ba ma mchis te/_rtswa'i spyil po de na gnas shing mchis nas/_dbul po'i bsam pa de nyid rjes su sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni khyim bdag des bu de srung nus shing yongs su smin par 'tshal/_sems btul te/_rgya chen por sems shing /_sngon 
[\[42b.4\]]dbul po bsams na nyam nga zhing ngo tsha ste smod par 'tshal nas bdag 'gum pa'i dus la bab pa dang mi dbul po de bkug ste/_nye du 'dus pa mang po dang sprad nas/_rgyal po dang blon po dang grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul mi'i mdun du mngon sum du 'di skad ces bsgrags so/_/khyod 
[\[42b.5\]]nyon cig_/'di ni kho bo'i snying gi bu kho bos bskyed pa ste/_grong khyer gyi ming 'di zhes bya ba nas 'khyams nas lo lnga bcu lon te/_'di'i ming 'di zhes bya/_kho bo'i ming ni 'di zhes bya ste/_kho bo 'di tshol ba'i phyir grong khyer de nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/'di ni kho bo'i bu/_kho bo 
[\[42b.6\]]ni 'di'i pha ste/_bdag gi spyod pa dang /_longs spyod ci yod pa thams cad ni mi 'di la byin no/_/kho bo'i nang gi nor cung zad ci yod pa de kun kyang 'di nyid shes so zhes bgyis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de nas mi dbul po des de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i sgra thos nas/_ngo mtshar dang 
[\[42b.7\]]rmad du gyur te/_'di ltar bdag gis 'phral la 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po rnyed do snyam du sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dang 'dra ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa bdag cag la khyed ni nga'i bu'o zhes bka' stsal te/_khyim bdag de ci lta ba bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sdug bsngal gsum gyis gzir to/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /_'du byed kyi sdug 
[\[43a.2\]]bsngal nyid dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid do/_/'khor ba na dman pa la mos pas bdag cag bcom ldan 'das chos ngan pa mang po phyag dar gyi phung po dang 'dra ba la sems su stsal te/_de rnams la bdag cag zhugs nas 'bad cing btsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[43a.3\]]cag mya ngan las 'da' ba tsam zhig gdugs kyi gla bzhin du tshol zhing gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni mya ngan las 'da' ba de rnyed pas na dga' bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa las chos 'di dag la zhugs te/_'bad cing btsal bas/_mang po rnyed par sems 
[\[43a.4\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dman pa la mos par mkhyen to/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag yal bar bzhag ste/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mdzod du khyed 'gyur ro zhes ma brtol ma bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das thabs mkhas 
[\[43a.5\]]pas bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mdzod la bgo skal spyod par bkod na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de la re ba ma mchis te/_'di ltar bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las mya ngan las 'da' ba gdugs kyi gla thang bzhin du bgyis pa ni/_de nyid bdag cag 
[\[43a.6\]]gis mang du bgyis par 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la brtsams nas/_chos rgya chen po bshad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'byed cing ston te/_nye bar ston 
[\[43a.7\]]du lags kyang /_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de la re ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thabs mkhas pas bdag cag gi mos pa rab tu mkhyen na de bdag cag gis ni ma 'tshal ma rtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar bdag cag la 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi sras yang dag pa zhes gsungs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi bsgo skal la spyod pa dran par mdzad do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras yang dag pa lags mod kyi/_bdag cag 
[\[43b.2\]]dman pa la mos pa'i slad du'o/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi mos pa'i stobs gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi bar bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bgyi ba rnam gnyis bgyid du stsal 
[\[43b.3\]]te/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du ni dman pa la mos pa zhes bka' stsal te de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya chen po la yang dag par btsud do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi mos pa'i stobs mkhyen nas/_de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom 
[\[43b.4\]]ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis bdag cag 'di skad ces bdag cag re ba ma mchis mi 'tshal ma bslangs ma btsal ma bsams ma gsol bar 'phral la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras 'di dag bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che thob po zhes mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen 
[\[43b.5\]]pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/de ltar 'phral la de ring bdag cag gis/_/'dren pa'i gsung sgra yid du 'ong ba thos/_/gsung thos pas na bdag cag dga' ba thob/_/bdag cag ngo mtshar de bzhin rmad du gyur/_/rin chen chen po mchog gi phung po 
[\[43b.6\]]rnams/_/bsams pa ma mchis nam yang ma gsol bar/_/de dag yud tsam gyis ni deng rnyed de/_/bdag cag thams cad deng thos ngo mtshar gyur/_/ji ltar byis par gyur pa'i mi zhig ni/_/skye bo byis pa rnams kyis bslus nas su/_/pha yi gan nas gar te mchis pa 
[\[43b.7\]]ni/_/gzhan gyi yul yang shin tu mang bar mchis/_/bdag gi bu ni 'khyams par btsal bas na/_/de tshe pha yang de yi mya ngan bgyid/_/dgung lo lnga bcu las kyang mi nyung bar/_/mya ngan de bgyid phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tshol/_/de ni de ltar bu de tshol ba na/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]grong khyer chen po gzhan du mchis pa dang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan par ni/_/khyim rnams rtsigs shing de na rab tu gnas/_/de la gser rnams dang ni 'gron bu dang /_/nor dang 'bru dang man shel byi ru dang /_/glang po che dang rta dang dpung bu chung /_/
[\[44a.2\]]de bzhin phyugs dang ba lang lug mang ste/_/'phel zhing 'du ba dang ni de bzhin shing /_/bran pho bran mo mngag pa'i tshogs mang ste/_/srog chags bye ba stong gis ri mo bgyis/_/rgyal po la yang de ni rtag tu gnang /_/grong na su gnas pa yi grong pa dang /_/grong khyer bas 
[\[44a.3\]]ni de la thal sbyar gyur/_/dgos pa mang la shin tu dbang bas na/_/tshong pa mang po de yi drung du mchi/_/de ltar mi de 'byor par ldan pa ste/_/rgas shing 'khogs la shin tu gtugs par gyur/_/de ni bu yi mya ngan bgyid sems pas/_/nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu bas par 
[\[44a.4\]]gyur/_/bdag gi bu ni de 'dra blo gros log_/de ni 'khyams nas lo yang lnga bcu lon/_/'di ltar bdag la mdzod ni mang du yod/_/bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus la nye bar gyur/_/de'i bu byis pa de ni de yi tshe/_/dbul zhing rtag tu phongs par gyur pas na/_/zas dang de bzhin 
[\[44a.5\]]gos rnams tshol ba'i phyir/_/grong dang grong rnams su yang rjes su rgyu/_/cung zad tsam ni res 'ga' tshol ba na/_/cung zad rnyed cing res 'ga' ci mi rnyed/_/byis pa de ni gzhan gyi khyim na rke/_/g.yan pa dang ni rkom pos lus kyang yog_/gang na pha mchis grong khyer der mchi 
[\[44a.6\]]zhing /_/'tshal ma dang ni rad pa tshol ba na/_/rang gi pha yi khyim de ga la bar/_/de ni mthar gyis de ru phyin par gyur/_/skyes bu de ni phyug cing nor mang ste/_/sgo na seng ge'i khri yi steng na mchis/_/srog chags brgya phrag du mas 'khor bar bskor/_/de steng bar snang la yang 
[\[44a.7\]]bla re bres/_/skye bo yid brtan de yi gam yo 'khod/_/la la dag ni nor dang 'gron bu 'grang /_/la la dag ni de la spring ba 'dri/_/la la skyed dang spogs su rab tu gtong /_/khyim bdag de khyim rab tu brgyan pa dag_/dbul po des ni khyim de mthong nas su/_/bdag ni 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]deng 'dir ga las ci ltar 'ongs/_/'di ni rgyal po'am yang na blon po yin/_/'di na nyes par gyur na mi rung zhes/_/tsham gzungs su yang bzung bar mi 'gyur grang /_/mi de de snyam sems shing 'bros bgyid la/_/dbul po rnams kyi shul srang kun tu 'dri/_/phyug po des 
[\[44b.2\]]ni bdag gi bu mthong nas/_/seng ge'i khri la mchis shing dga' bar gyur/_/des ni de yi gan du 'dzin par btang /_/skyes bu dbul po de ni khrid de shog_/de yi mod la mi de bzung ba dang /_/bzung ma thag tu de ni brgyal bar gyur/_/gor ma chag par bdag gsod nye bar 
[\[44b.3\]]lhags/_/bdag la zas dang gos kyis ci zhig bya/_/nor mang mkhas pa de yis de mthong nas/_/byis pa log yid 'di ni dman la mos/_/nga yi 'byor pa 'di la dad mi byed/_/'di ni bdag gi pha zhes yid mi ches/_/de yis sems can dman zhing gos ngan la/_/
[\[44b.4\]]yon po zhar ba theng 'grums gyur pa yi/_/de 'dra'i mi dag kha cig btang nas su/_/las byed pa yi mi de rab tshol cig_/nga yi 'di na phyag dar rul pa dang /_/gcin dang bshang bas ma rung gyur pa rnams/_/de dag 'phyag pa'i phyir ni las byos shog_/khyod ni gla yang 
[\[44b.5\]]nyis gyur sbyin par bya/_/mi des 'di lta bu yi sgra thos nas/_/'ongs te sa phyogs de dag de yis phyags/_/khyim gyi drung du rtswa yi spyil po na/_/der yang gnas bcas nas ni 'dug par byed/_/skar khung snang ba nas ni rtag par yang /_/phyug po des kyang skyes bu de 
[\[44b.6\]]bltas te/_/dman la mos pa bdag gi bu 'di ni/_/phyag dar phung po rnams ni 'phyag par byed/_/de ni babs te skon bu thogs bgyid cing /_/dri ma can gyi gos dag 'tshal nas su/_/de yi gan du nye bar mchis nas ni/_/las rnams mi byed ces ni rab tu spyos/_/
[\[44b.7\]]khyod las gla yang nyis gyur sbyin par bya/_/de bzhin rkang pa bsku ba'ang nyis gyur du/_/lan tshwa can gyi zas ni khyod la sbyin/_/ras dang tshod ma dag kyang sbyin par bya/_/de tshe de ltar de la spyos nas ni/_/mkhas pas de ni slar yang rab tu bkris/_/khyod kyis 'dir 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]ni shin tu las byos shig_/nga yi bu yin yang dag the tsom med/_/de ni bags kyis bags kyis khyim bzhag ste/_/lo grangs nyi shu bar du tshang bar yang /_/mi de las rnams legs par bgyid du stsal/_/bags kyis mi de rnam par yid phab nas/_/
[\[45a.2\]]des ni shel dang 'gron bu mu tig kyang /_/khyim de nyid du rab tu sbed par byed/_/de ni thams cad bgrang zhing rtsi bar bgyid/_/don dang nor rnams kun la'ang de sems so/_/de yi mchis brang gi ni slad rol na/_/byis pa de ni gcig pu spyil bur gnas/_/bdag la longs 
[\[45a.3\]]spyod 'di dag yod med ces/_/dbul po'i bsam pa dag ni rjes su sems/_/bu de 'du shes rgya cher gyur pa ni/_/de yi rnam pa de 'dra des 'tshal nas/_/mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po kun bsags te/_/nor 'di thams cad 'di la gtad par bya/_/de yis rgyal 
[\[45a.4\]]po'i grong dang grong khyer mi/_/tshong pa mang po dag kyang bsags nas su/_/'khor gyi dbus su 'di skad tshig smras pa/_/bdag gi bu 'di stor nas yun ring ste/_/sngar ni lo grangs lnga bcu tshang bar lon/_/gzhan yang bdag gis mthong nas nyi shu lags/_/grong khyer 'di zhes 
[\[45a.5\]]bgyi bar bdag gi stor/_/de tshol slad du bdag ni 'dir mchis so/_/bdag gi nor 'di kun gyi bdag po ste/_/'di dag thams cad ma lus 'di la gtad/_/pha yi nor gyis dgos dgur spyad par gyis/_/bran bza' 'di dag kun kyang rab tu sbyin/_/dman la mos dang 
[\[45a.6\]]pha yi yon tan dang /_/sngon gyi dbul zhing phongs pa dran nas ni/_/mi de shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur/_/bran bza' rnyed pas de ring shin tu bde/_/de bzhin bdag cag rnam par 'dren pa yis/_/dman pa la ni mos par mkhyen pas na/_/sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur zhes 
[\[45a.7\]]ma bstan te/_/khyod ni nyan thos nga yi bu yin no/_/bdag la 'jig rten mgon pos bka' stsal pa/_/mchog rab byang chub la ni su zhugs rnams/_/lam gang bsgoms pas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi/_/bla med lam ni de la 'od srung shod/_/de phyir bde bar gshegs 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]pas bka' stsal nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen mang po la/_/rgyu dang dpe yang bye ba khrag khrig gis/_/bdag cag gis kyang bla med lam bstan to/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag las thos nas ni/_/byang chub mchog lam de ni goms par bgyid/_/sangs rgyas su ni 
[\[45b.2\]]'jig rten 'di 'gyur zhes/_/de ma thag tu de dag lung yang bstan/_/chos mdzod 'di ni yang dag srung bgyid cing /_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams la ni bstan pa yang /_/ji ltar mi de'i yid brtan de bzhin du/_/rnam par 'dren pa de 'dra'i las bgyid do/_/dbul po dag gi 
[\[45b.3\]]bsam pa rnam par sems/_/sangs rgyas mdzod 'di rnams ni rab sbyin zhing /_/rgyal ba'i ye shes rab tu bshad mod kyi/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes 'di ni don mi gnyer/_/bdag nyid mya ngan las kyang 'da' bar rtog_/ye shes 'di tsam las ni gzhan mi 'byung /_/sangs 
[\[45b.4\]]rgyas rnams kyi zhing gi bkod thos nas/_/bdag cag nam yang dga' bar ma gyur to/_/chos 'di thams cad zag med zhi ba ste/_/'gog pa dang ni skye ba rnam par spangs/_/'di ni chos rnams gang yang ma mchis shes/_/de ltar bsams na dad par ma gyur to/_/sangs 
[\[45b.5\]]rgyas ye shes bla na med pa la/_/bdag cag yun ring dus nas mi re zhing /_/bdag cag nam yang 'di la ma smon te/_/rgyal bas 'di ni dam pa'i mthar gsungs so/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug lus 'di la/_/stong pa nyid du yun ring yongs su bsgoms/_/khams 
[\[45b.6\]]gsum sdug bsngal gzir las yongs su thar/_/bdag cag gis ni rgyal ba'i bstan pa bgyis/_/rgyal ba'i sras la gang tshe rab bstan te/_/byang chub mchog la yang dag su zhugs pa/_/de dag la ni chos gang ci bshad pa/_/de la bdag cag nam yang re ma mchis/_/
[\[45b.7\]]bdag cag 'jig rten slob dpon rang byung gis/_/dus la bzhes pa mdzad nas yal bar bzhag_/bdag cag rnams kyi dad pa rab brtags nas/_/yang dag ldem dgongs tshig don de ma bshad/_/de yi thabs mkhas pa ni ji lta bur/_/dus su nor mang po yi skyes 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bu ltar/_/dman par dad pa bu de legs par btul/_/btul nas de la nor yang rab tu stsal/_/thabs la mkhas pas rab tu ston mdzad de/_/dman la mos pa'i sras rnams 'dul mdzad cing /_/btul nas sangs rgyas ye shes 'di stsol ba/_/'jig 
[\[46a.2\]]rten mgon po shin tu dka' ba mdzad/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la bdag cag rnams/_/thog ma'i 'bras bu zag med dam pa thob/_/ji ltar dbul pos nor rnams rnyed pa bzhin/_/de ring 'phral la bdag cag ngo mtshar thob/_/bdag cag tshul khrims gang rnams yun ring 
[\[46a.3\]]du/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan la legs gsungs pa/_/mgon po sngon chad tshul khrims spyad pa yi/_/de yi 'bras bu de ring bdag cag thob/_/tshangs par spyod pa mchog rab rnam dag gang /_/'dren pa'i bstan la shin tu bsnyen bgyid pa/_/de yi 'bras bu zhi ba 
[\[46a.4\]]khyad par can/_/rgya chen zag pa ma mchis de ring thob/_/mgon po de ring bdag cag sgrogs gyur te/_/byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrag par bgyi/_/byang chub pa yi sgra yang rab tu brjod/_/de bas bdag cag sgrogs pa mi bzad 'dra/_/mgon po deng ni bdag cag 
[\[46a.5\]]'os gyur te/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas/_/tshangs par bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis/_/bdag cag shin tu mchod par 'os pa lags/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'di na gang dka' ba/_/dka' ba 'di 'dra bdag cag mdzad pas na/_/bskal pa 
[\[46a.6\]]bye ba mang por 'bad pas kyang /_/khyod la lan glon rngo thogs ga la mchis/_/mgo dang lag pa dang ni rkang pas kyang /_/lan du phan par bgyi ba shin tu dka'/_/gang gA'i bye snyed bskal pa rdzogs par yang /_/mgo dang phrag la gang gis khyer ba dang /_/bca' dang bza' dang skom 
[\[46a.7\]]dang gos rnams dang /_/mal cha stan dang steng g.yogs chen po phul/_/tsan dan dag las gtsug lag khang bgyis te/_/bcos bu'i ras phrugs rab tu bting ba dang /_/na ba'i gsos sman rnam pa mang po yang /_/bde bar gshegs pa mchod phyir rtag phul te/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]gang gA'i bye snyed bskal par phul yang ni/_/de la nam yang lan glon rngo mi thogs/_/mtshungs med mthu mnga' che ba'i chos ldan pa/_/bzod pa'i stobs gnas rdzu 'phrul che rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas rgyal chen zag med rgyal ba ni/_/byis pa dag gi 'di 'dra shin tu bzod/_/
[\[46b.2\]]de bzhin rtag tu rjes su 'thun 'jug cing /_/mtshan ma spyod pa rnams la chos ston te/_/chos kyi dbang phyug 'jig rten kun la dbang /_/dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten 'dren dbang po/_/sems can gnas rnams rab tu mkhyen pas na/_/so sor bsgrub pa rnam pa mang por 
[\[46b.3\]]ston/_/de dag mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen nas su/_/brgya phrag stong gis rab tu chos 'chad do/_/sems can thams cad dang ni gang zag gi/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi spyod pa rab mkhyen pas/_/byang chub dam pa 'di ni rab ston cing /_/chos rnams rnam pa mang po 
[\[46b.4\]]shin tu gsung /_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las mos pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_gzhan yang gnas brtan nyan thos chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs 
[\[46b.5\]]so legs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa ni/_'od srung khyod legs so/_/'od srung de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan no/_/de bas gzhan yang mang zhing tshad med grangs med de/_bskal pa dpag tu med par 
[\[46b.6\]]bshad kyang /_de dag gi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/_/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi rje/_chos thams cad kyi rgyal po gtso bo mnga' ba ste/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang du bzhag pa dang /_ji ltar bzhag pa de dag de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[46b.7\]]'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rig par 'jog ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis 'jog go/_/ji ltar chos de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa nyid du 'byung bar de ltar 'jog go/_/chos thams cad kyi don gyi rim pa la de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]te/_chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pa thob/_chos thams cad nges par gtan la dbab pa la thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes dam pa mchog thob ste/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[47a.2\]]ye shes ston pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jog pa'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal kha dog sna 
[\[47a.3\]]tshogs rnam pa du ma dang /_sman mang po ming tha dad du btags pa/_sa dang ri dang ri sul dag nas ji snyed skyes pa/_sprin chu chen pos rgyas pa 'dus nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas so/_/kun khebs par 
[\[47a.4\]]byas nas dus gcig tu char mnyam par phab ste/_'od srung stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal de na/_sdong bu dang yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma gzhon zhing 'jam pa ci yod pa dang sdong bu dang yal ga dang lo ma 
[\[47a.5\]]dang 'dab ma bar ma ci yod pa dang sdong bu dang yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma chen po dang rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal gyi sdong po dang sdong po chen po ci yod pa de dag thams cad/_sprin chen po las char bab pa la mthu dang yul ji lta ba bzhin du chu'i khams so sor 'thungs te/_
[\[47a.6\]]de yang sprin chen po gcig las byung ba/_ro gcig pa'i chu mang pos sa bon ji lta bar rjes su 'thun par skyes te/_'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung ste/_de dag kyang so so'i ming thob po/_/sa gcig la gnas pa'i sman mang po sa bon mang po 
[\[47a.7\]]de thams cad chu ro gcig pas bangs pa de bzhin du/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji ltar sprin chen po 'dus pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa byung nas/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do/_/de la 'di lta ste dper na sprin chen po des thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa de bzhin du/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[47b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyis/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du/_sgra 'di skad 'byin cing dbyangs kyis thos par byed de/_lha dang mi dag nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_rgal nas bsgral lo grol nas dgrol 
[\[47b.3\]]lo/_/dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung ngo /_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/_/nga ni da ltar gyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gzhan yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad 
[\[47b.4\]]gzigs so/_/lha dang mi dag chos nyan pa'i phyir nga'i drung du shog cig_/nga ni lam ston pa'o/_/lam 'chad pa'o/_/lam rig pa'o/_/lam mkhas pa'o/_/'od srung de ltar srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po/_de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan zhing nye bar 
[\[47b.5\]]lhags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi rim pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen nas/_de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs nye bar sbyor ro/_/de dag la chos kyi gtam mang po sna tshogs dga' ba tshim pa mgu bar byed pa phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i gtam 
[\[47b.6\]]gang gis/_sems can tshe 'di la bde bar 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gror skye la/_gar skyes pa der 'dod pa mang po spyod kyang chos nyan zhing /_chos de thos nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur te/_mthar gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos la stobs ji lta ba dang yul 
[\[47b.7\]]ji lta ba dang /_mthu ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa 'gyur ba gsung ngo /_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_sprin chen po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs nas char mnyam par phab ste/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal thams cad chus 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ngoms te/_stobs ji lta ba dang yul ji lta ba dang mthu ji lta ba bzhin du rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal la sogs pas chu 'thung ste/_bdag bdag gi so so'i rigs dang tshad du skye'o/_/'od srung de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[48a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos bshad pa/_chos thams cad ro gcig pa ste/_de ni rnam par grol ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar ro gcig go/_/'od srung de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[48a.3\]]pas chos bshad pa de la/_sems can gang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'jug pa de dag bdag gis bdag shes pa'am rig pa'am rtogs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar sems can de dag de bzhin du mkhyen te/_de dag su yin pa dang 
[\[48a.4\]]de dag ci lta bu yin pa dang de dag ci 'dra ba dang de dag ci la sems pa dang de dag ji ltar sems pa dang de dag cis sems pa dang de dag ci la sgom pa dang de dag ji ltar sgom pa dang de dag cis sgom pa dang de dag ci 'thob pa dang de dag ji ltar 'thob pa dang de dag cis 'thob pa de dag thams 
[\[48a.5\]]cad ni 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum ste/_mngon sum du gzigs/_ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srung 'di lta ste/_rnam par grol ba'i ro dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa dang rtag par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_sa 
[\[48a.6\]]gcig pa dang nam mkha'i spyod yul du ngas chos rnams ro gcig par rtogs kyang /_sems can rnams kyi dad pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_sa de dang de dag na gnas pa'i sems can rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal rab 'bring tha ma de dag lta bu la/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[48a.7\]]shes blo bur du mi ston to/_/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pas ldem por dgongs te bshad pa la/_khyed 'jug mi nus pas khyed ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dgongs te bshad pa ni shes par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyas par ston cing /_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos rgyal srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/_/nga ni 'jig rten byung nas su/_/mos pa rnam par mkhyen gyur 
[\[48b.2\]]nas/_/sems can rnams la chos 'chad do/_/dpa' bo chen po blo brtan pas/_/bshad pa rnams ni yun ring srung /_/gsang chen dag kyang 'dzin mdzad cing /_/srog chags rnams la mi ston to/_/ye shes de ni shes dga' ste/_/byis pa rnams kyis 'phra la thos/_/
[\[48b.3\]]mi shes pas na the tshom gyur/_/de las nyams shing de dga' 'khyam/_/de yi stobs kyang ci 'dra dang /_/yul yang ji bzhin bshad par bya/_/tha dad pa yi don rnams kyis/_/lta ba dag ni drang por bya/_/'od srung sprin ni ji lta bur/_/'dus nas 'jig rten khams 
[\[48b.4\]]rnams su/_/sa rnams rab tu yog par ni/_/thams cad du yang khebs par gyur/_/de ni rab tu chus rgyas te/_/sprin chen glog gi phreng bar bcas/_/skad kyis shin tu sgra 'byin cing /_/lus can rnams la dga' bar byed/_/nyi ma'i 'od ni bsgribs pas na/_/dkyil 
[\[48b.5\]]'khor dag kyang bsil bar byas/_/lag gis slebs par 'dug nas su/_/thams cad du ni char yang 'bebs/_/de ni snyoms par 'bebs pa yang /_/chu yi phung po mi chung bar/_/kun tu bab par gyur pas na/_/sa 'di rnams kyang ngoms par byas/_/gang dag sa 'di 
[\[48b.6\]]rnams las ni/_/skye bar gyur pa sman rnams dang /_/rtswa dang gel pa nags tshal dang /_/sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang /_/'bru yi rnam pa mang po dang /_/sngon por gyur pa dag kyang rung /_/ri dang ri sul nags rnams sam/_/sman ljongs nas ni gang 'khrungs pa/_/sprin 
[\[48b.7\]]gyis thams cad ngoms par byed/_/rtswa dang gel pa nags tshal dang /_/gdungs pa'i sa yang ngoms par byas/_/sman rnams la yang kun tu phab/_/chu de rnams kyang ro gcig ste/_/sprin las bab pa 'di na gnas/_/ji ltar stobs dang yul gzhan du/_/rtswa dang gel 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]pa de 'thung ngo /_/sdong po dang ni sdong po chen po rnams/_/chung ngu bar ma na tshod ji bzhin du/_/ji ltar stobs bzhin thams cad chu 'thung ste/_/'thungs nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye/_/sprin las char pa bab pas rtsi chen rnams/_/sdong bu sbu gu shun 
[\[49a.2\]]pa ci lta bar/_/yal ga gyes dang 'dab ma ji bzhin du/_/'bras bu me tog rnams kyang de bzhin 'phel/_/char pa ro gcig pa yang bab pas na/_/ji lta'i stobs dang yul ni ci 'dra bar/_/gang gis sa bon dag ni ci 'dra las/_/de dag rang rang las ni skye ba 'byin/_/
[\[49a.3\]]'od srung de bzhin sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dir/_/'jig rten char 'dzin sprin dang 'dra bar 'byung /_/'jig rten mgon po byung nas chad par 'gyur/_/srog chags la ni yang dag spyod par ston/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag gis mdun bdar nas/_/de ltar drang srong chen 
[\[49a.4\]]po rab sgrogs te/_/de ni rkang gnyis mchog rgyal de bzhin gshegs/_/sprin lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/_/rab tu lus skams srid pa gsum chags pa/_/sems can thams cad ngas ni ngoms par byas/_/sdug bsngal dag gis skams pa bde la dgod/_/
[\[49a.5\]]ngas ni 'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa'ang sbyin/_/lha dang mi tshogs rnams kyang nga la nyon/_/nga la lta ba'i phyir ni nye bar shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan zil mi non/_/bsgral ba'i phyir ni 'jig rten 'dir skyes te/_/rnam dag shin tu mthong bar bya ba'i chos/_/
[\[49a.6\]]srog chags bye ba stong la bshad par bya/_/de yi mnyam pa nyid dang yang dag gcig_/de ni rnam grol mya ngan 'da' ba yin/_/rtag tu byang chub phyir ni zhugs par yang /_/dbyangs gcig gis ni rab tu chos bshad de/_/de ni mnyam pa nyid de mi mnyam med/_/'dod 
[\[49a.7\]]chags med cing zhe sdang dag kyang med/_/nam yang nga la rjes su chags pa med/_/su la'ang nga ni mdza' zhing sdang ba med/_/sems can gcig bzhin 'gro ba gzhan la ste/_/lus can rnams la chos ni snyoms par 'chad/_/las gzhan mi byed rab tu chos 'chad de/_/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]'gro ba dang ni 'greng dang 'dug pa dang /_/mal du zhugs te nyal ba'i tshe na yang /_/nam yang nga la skyo bar gyur pa med/_/sprin gyis char pa mnyam par phab pa bzhin/_/'jig rten 'di rnams thams cad ngoms par bya/_/'phags pa dang ni ma rabs mtshungs pa'i blo/_/
[\[49b.2\]]tshul khrims ldan dang tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_/de bzhin mi gang spyod pa nyams pa dang /_/spyod dang cho ga rnams su ldan pa dang /_/lta la gnas shing lta ba gang nyams dang /_/yang dag gang lta lta ba rnam dag dang /_/blo gros ngan pa dang ni dam pa'ang rung /_/dbang po 
[\[49b.3\]]brtul po rnams la chos bshad de/_/skyo ba thams cad rab tu rnam spangs nas/_/ngas ni yang dag chos kyi char pa phab/_/ji lta'i spobs bzhin nga la mnyan nas ni/_/lha mi nang na yid du 'ong ba dang /_/'khor los sgyur dang brgya byin tshangs pa yi/_/rnam pa mang po'i sa la 
[\[49b.4\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/phran tshegs phran tshegs sman rnams 'di dag dang /_/'jig rten 'di na gang chung 'di dag dang /_/bar ma chen po dman rnams gzhan dag kyang /_/de dag thams cad rab tu bshad kyis nyon/_/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rab shes nas/_/mi dag mya 
[\[49b.5\]]ngan 'das thob gnas pa dang /_/drug mngon shes shing gsum rig gang 'gyur ba/_/de ni bar ma'i sman zhes bya ba yin/_/gang dag ri sul rnams na gnas pa dang /_/mi gang rang rgyal byang chub 'dod byed pa/_/de 'dra 'bring du rnam par dag pa'i blo/_/de ni bar ma'i sman 
[\[49b.6\]]zhes bya ba yin/_/brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan rnams bsten cing /_/lha dang mi mgon sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/_/skyes bu khyu mchog tu yang gang smon pa/_/de ni sman gyi mchog ces bya ba yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po gang zhugs pa/_/byams pa bsnyen 
[\[49b.7\]]cing 'di la zhi ba spyod/_/skyes bu khyu mchog tu yang the tshom med/_/de 'dra 'di na sdong po yin zhes bya/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rab skor zhing /_/rdzu 'phrul stobs la gnas pa gang dpa' ba/_/srog chags bye ba mang po rab tu 'grol/_/de ni 'di na sdong po chen po 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]yin/_/rgyal bas chos de mnyam par bshad pa ni/_/sprin gyis char pa mnyam pa phab pa bzhin/_/sna tshogs mngon shes 'di 'dra 'di dag kyang /_/sa steng sman rnams ji ltar gnas pa bzhin/_/de lta bu yi dpe dag bstan pa yis/_/de bzhin 
[\[50a.2\]]gshegs pa'i thabs rnams shes par gyis/_/ji ltar de yis chos gcig bshad pa yang /_/sna tshogs tshig ni char gyi thigs pa bzhin/_/ngas kyang chos kyi char pa phab pas na/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad ngoms par gyur/_/rab tu bshad pa ro gcig chos 
[\[50a.3\]]la yang /_/ci 'dra stobs bzhin rjes su rnam par sems/_/ji ltar rtswa dang gel pa'i shing rnams dang /_/bar ma'i sman rnams la yang ji lta bar/_/sdong po dang ni sdong po chen po de/_/char bab phyogs bcu kun na'ang mdzes pa bzhin/_/'di ni rtag tu 'jig rten phan 
[\[50a.4\]]pa'i chos/_/'jig rten 'di kun chos kyis ngoms par byed/_/'jig rten thams cad ngoms par byas nas ni/_/sman rnams las ni me tog rab tu 'byung /_/bar ma'i sman rnams rnam par skye ba ni/_/dgra bcom gang dag zag pa zad gnas dang /_/nags tshal khrod nas 
[\[50a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams la/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po dran ldan brtan/_/byang chub mchog 'di yongs su tshol ba na/_/khams gsum thams cad rtogs par khong chud pa/_/de dag rtag tu skye ba sdong po 
[\[50a.6\]]bzhin/_/rdzu 'phrul gang ldan bsam gtan bzhir zhugs pa/_/gang dag stong pa nyid thos dga' skyed cing /_/'od zer stong phrag rab tu gtong ba rnams/_/de dag sdong po chen po zhes kyang bya/_/'od srung 'di lta bu yi chos bshad pa/_/sprin gyis char pa mnyam par phab 
[\[50a.7\]]pa bzhin/_/mi yi me tog mang po mtha' yas pa/_/des ni mang po'i sman bzhin rnam par skyed/_/rang gis rig pa'i chos rnams rab tu bshad/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dag ni dus su bstan/_/de ni 'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad dang /_/nga yi thabs la mkhas pa 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]mchog yin no/_/'di ltar don dam yang dag ngas bshad pa/_/nyan thos de kun mya ngan ma 'das te/_/de dag byang chub spyod pa rab spyad nas/_/nyan thos 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'od srung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_sems can 'dul 
[\[50b.2\]]bar mtshungs te mi mtshungs pa med do/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar byed pa ni/_dge ba byed pa dang mi dge ba byed pa dang steng na gnas pa dang 'og na gnas pa dang dri zhim pa dang dri mi zhim pa thams cad la 
[\[50b.3\]]mnyam par 'od kyis phog ste/_mi mnyam pa ma yin no/_/'od srung de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyi 'od kyis 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad ji 
[\[50b.4\]]ltar mos pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams la chos bshad pa de mnyam par 'jug la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni skye ba yang med/_'bri ba yang med de/_'di ltar bsod nams dang ye shes yang 
[\[50b.5\]]dag par sdud par 'gyur ro//_//bam po lnga pa/_'od srung theg pa ni gsum du med de/_sems can spyod pa tha dad pas/_de'i phyir gyi na theg pa gsum du btags par zad do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[50b.6\]]pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa gsum du ma mchis na/_ci'i slad du da ltar byung ba'i dus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar gdags pas rab tu gdags/_de skad ces gsol nas/_
[\[50b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rdza mkhan gyis 'jim pa mtshungs pa la snod byas te/_de las kha cig ni bu ram gyi snod du gyur/_kha cig ni mar gyi snod/_kha cig ni zho dang 'o 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]ma'i snod kha cig ni ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod du gyur te/_'jim pa la tha dad pa med mod kyi/_rdzas bcug pa tsam gyis snod tha dad par snang ngo /_/'od srung de bzhin du theg pa gcig pu 'di nyid de/_'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/_theg pa gnyis sam 
[\[51a.2\]]gsum du med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can mos pa tha dad pa gang dag khams gsum nas byung ba de dag gi mya ngan las 'das pa gcig gam/_
[\[51a.3\]]'on te gnyis sam gsum/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'da' bas na/_de ni gcig ste gnyis su med gsum du yang med do/_/'od srung skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig ni 
[\[51a.4\]]dpes bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_mi dmus long zhig 'di skad du kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa'i gzugs kyang med kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa'i gzugs mthong ba yang 
[\[51a.5\]]med nyi ma dang zla ba yang med/_skar ma yang med/_gza' mthong ba yang med do zhes zer ro/_/de nas mi gzhan dag gis dmus long de'i mdun du 'di skad ces/_kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dag kyang yod/_kha dog bzang po dang kha dog 
[\[51a.6\]]ngan pa'i gzugs mthong ba yang yod/_de bzhin du nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma yang yod gza' yang yod gza' mthong ba yang yod do zhes smras na/_mi dmus long de mi de dag la yid mi ches shing smras pa bzhin mi 'dzin to/_/de nas sman pa nad thams cad shes pa la la zhig 
[\[51a.7\]]gis mi dmus long de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_mi de sngon gyi sdig pa'i las kyis nad du gyur te/_gang cung zad nad du gyur pa de thams cad rnam par zhi ste/_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]las gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/de nas sman pas de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang thabs bsams te/_gang 'di na sman yod pa rnams kyis ni nad de phyin par mi nus kyi/_gangs kyi ri'i rgyal po la sman sna bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_gcig pa kha dog dang ro thams 
[\[51b.2\]]cad kyi gnas dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang gnyis pa nad thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang gsum pa dug thams cad las thar bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_bzhi pa gnas gang na 'dug par bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhi yod do snyam mo/_/de nas dmus long de 
[\[51b.3\]]la sman pa des snying rje bskyed nas/_thabs gang gis gangs kyi ri'i rgyal po la 'gro nus pa de lta bu'i thabs bsams te/_song nas yar yang 'dzegs mar yang babs ngos la yang btsal to/_/de ltar btsal te sman de sna bzhi rnyed nas/_rnyed pa dang kha cig ni sos bcas 
[\[51b.4\]]te byin/_kha cig ni btags kha cig ni phrad gzhan dang sbyar la btsos te sbyin no kha cig ni phrad rlon pa dang sbyar te byin/_kha cig ni lus kyi gnas thur mas phug ste blugs/_kha cig ni mes bsregs te byin/_kha cig ni phrad gzhan dang sbyar te/_zas dang skom la sogs 
[\[51b.5\]]pa dang bsres te byin no de nas dmus long de thabs sbyar ba des mig thob bo/_/des mig thob nas/_phyi dang nang dang ring po dang nye ba dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od dang skar ma dang gza'i gzugs thams cad kyang mthong nas/_'di skad ces kye ma a la la blun po kho bo sngon ni bstan kyang yid mi ches 
[\[51b.6\]]shing smras pa bzhin mi 'dzin na/_da ni kho bos thams cad mthong nas dmus long las thar te kho bos mig thob pas/_kho bo lta bur khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang med do zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang 
[\[51b.7\]]sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul mngon sum du bya ba la mkhas pa dag cig yod de/_de dag gis mi de la 'di skad ces smras te/_kye mi khyod ni mig rnyed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi/_khyod gzhan ci yang mi shes na khyod kyi nga rgyal de ci las byung khyod la ni shes rab kyang med/_
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]mkhas pa yang ma yin no/_/de dag gis yang de la 'di skad ces smras te/_kye mi khyod gang gi tshe khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa na/_phyi logs kyi gzugs gzhan dag mi mthong mi shes/_khyod kyis sems can gang dag byams par sems pa dang /_gnod par sems 
[\[52a.2\]]pa de dag kyang mi shes/_dpag tshad lnga'i bar na 'dug pa'i smra ba dang rnga dang dung la sogs pa'i sgra yang mi shes mi thos/_rgyang grags gcig gi bar du gom pa mi 'dor bar 'gro yang mi nus/_ma'i lto na skye zhing 'phel ba'i byed pa de dag kyang mi dran na/_ji ltar mkhas pa yin/_
[\[52a.3\]]ji ltar na thams cad mthong zhes smra/_kye mi khyod kyis snang ba gang yin pa de ni mun par shes so/_/mun pa gang yin pa de ni snang bar shes so zhes smras pa dang /_de nas mi des drang srong de dag la 'di skad ces smras te/_thabs gang dang dge ba'i las ci byas na/_'di 'dra ba'i shes rab 
[\[52a.4\]]'thob/_khyod kyi bya dga' la yon tan de dag thob par gyis shig_/de nas drang srong de dag gis mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te 'dod na 'brog dgon par gnas par gyis/_yang na brag phug tu 'dug la chos sems shing khyod kyis nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar bya ste/_de 
[\[52a.5\]]bzhin du sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan na/_mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/de nas mi des de'i don blangs te/_rab tu byung nas dgon pa la gnas te/_sems rtse gcig pas 'jig rten gyi sred pa spangs te/_mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob 
[\[52a.6\]]nas bsams pa/_sngon bdag gis las gzhan byas pa des bdag gis yon tan gang yang ma thob bo/_/da ni gar bsams par 'gro'o/_/sngon bdag ni shes rab chung zhing rtogs pa chung ste/_bdag gi ni dmus long du gyur pa'o snyam mo/_/'od srung de ltar don de rig par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[52a.7\]]dpe 'di byas te de'i don ni 'di ltar blta'o/_/'od srung dmus long zhes bya ba de ni sems can 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gnas pa rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_gang dag dam pa'i chos mi shes shing /_nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag skyed pa de dag ma rig pas ldongs so/_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ma rig pas ldongs pas/_'du byed sogs so/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs nas/_de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa de'i bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ma rig pas ldongs te/_sems can 'khor ba na gnas pa rnams la de 
[\[52b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pas thugs rje bskyed nas/_khams gsum las 'das kyang bu gcig pa'i pha byams pa bzhin du/_thugs rje chen po bskyed nas khams gsum du gshegs te/_sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'khor lo na 'khyam zhing nyon mongs kyang de dag 'khor ba las 
[\[52b.3\]]'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes par de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang sems can 'di dag sngon dge ba byas pas zhe sdang chung la 'dod chags che ba dang /_'dod chags chung la zhe sdang che ba dang /_kha cig shes 
[\[52b.4\]]rab chung ba dang /_kha cig mkhas pa dang /_kha cig yongs su smin cing dag pa dang /_kha cig log par lta ba mkhyen nas/_sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum du bshad do/_/de la ji ltar drang srong chen po de dag mngon par shes 
[\[52b.5\]]pa lnga dang ldan zhing mig rnam par dag pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar blta'o/_/de la sman pa chen po de ci lta ba 
[\[52b.6\]]bzhin du de bzhin gshegs par blta'o/_/dmus long ji lta ba bzhin du gti mug gis ldongs pa'i sems can du blta'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis su gyur par blta'o/_/ji 
[\[52b.7\]]ltar sman sna bzhi po de ltar stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgor blta'o/_/ji lta ji lta bur sman rnams btang bas/_de lta de lta bur nad rab tu zhi ba de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa dang smon pa med pa bsgoms pas ma rig pa 'gag par byed cing /_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas/_de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa de'i bar du 'gag par gyur te/_de bzhin du de'i sems dge ba la yang mi 
[\[53a.2\]]gnas sdig pa la yang mi gnas te/_ji ltar dmus long gis mig mthong ba de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can du blta'o/_/'khor ba'i nyon mongs pas bcings pa gcod cing nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba las rnam par grol te khams gsum gyi 'gro ba drug 
[\[53a.3\]]las rab tu thar bas na/_de'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi 'di ltar shes nas/_'di skad ces mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gzhan med de bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob po zhes zer ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos ston te/_gang gis 
[\[53a.4\]]chos thams cad ma thob pa de la mya ngan las 'das pa ga la yod ces de bzhin gshegs pas de dag byang chub tu btsud de/_de byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'khor ba la yang mi gnas mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/des khams gsum rab tu rtogs nas phyogs 
[\[53a.5\]]bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa dang /_sprul pa lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_ma bcings pa dang /_ma grol ba dang /_mun pa yang ma yin/_snang ba 
[\[53a.6\]]yang ma yin par mthong ngo /_/gang gis de ltar chos zab mo mthong ba dang thos pa des khams gsum thams cad gang ba'i sems can gyi bsam pa dang mos pa tha dad pa mi mthong ba'i tshul gyis mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[53a.7\]]su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/_/yon tan ldan dang sdig can gyi/_/mi la mnyam par rab 'char te/_/de la skye zhing 'bri ba med/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi shes rab 'od/_/snyoms pa nyi ma zla ba bzhin/_/lhag cing chad pa med par ni/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]sems can thams cad rnam par 'dul/_/ji ltar kham snod rdza mkhan gyis/_/'jim pa mtshungs las byas pa dag_/de las snod du gyur pa ni/_/bu ram 'o ma mar dang chu/_/yang na la la mi gtsang dang /_/kha cig zho yi snod du gyur/_/kham pa sna gcig des blangs te/_/
[\[53b.2\]]rdza mkhan gyis ni snod du byas/_/ji ltar dngos po bcug pa bzhin/_/des ni snod kyang so sor rtogs/_/de bzhin sems can bye brag med/_/tha dad mos pas de bzhin gshegs/_/theg pa tha dad rab ston kyang /_/theg pa sangs rgyas theg par des/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo 
[\[53b.3\]]mi shes pas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang shes ma yin/_/chos rnams bdag nyid rnam spangs shing /_/stong par gang dag rnam shes pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi/_/byang chub yang dag nyid du shes/_/shes rab bar mar gdags pa ni/_/de ni rang rgyal zhes kyang 
[\[53b.4\]]bya/_/stong par shes nas rnams btul ba/_/de ni nyan thos nyid du bzhag_/chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa ni/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/_/ji ltar dmus long la las ni/_/nyi zla gza' dang skar ma rnams/_/des ma mthong bas 'di skad ces/_/gzugs 
[\[53b.5\]]ni rnams kun med ces smra/_/sman pa chen pos dmus long la/_/snying rje chen po bskyed nas su/_/gangs kyi ri la de song ste/_/gyen 'dzegs thur babs thad kar song /_/kha dog ro kun gnas ldan pa/_/de la sogs pa sna bzhi dag_/ri las sman yang kun rnyed de/_/
[\[53b.6\]]de nas de dag rab tu sbyar/_/kha cig dag ni sos kyang bcas/_/kha cig btabs te de bzhin gzhan/_/yan lag tu yang khab rtse bcug_/dmus long la ni rab tu gtong /_/de yis mig thob nyi zla dang /_/skar ma gza' rnams mthong bar gyur/_/mi shes pas na sngon 
[\[53b.7\]]smras shes/_/de ni de ltar sems par gyur/_/de bzhin sems can mi shes tshe/_/dmus long 'dra dag 'di na 'khor/_/rten 'byung 'khor lo mi shes pas/_/sdug bsngal chu bo'i lam du gyur/_/de bzhin mi shes rmongs pa yi/_/'jig rten du ni kun gyi mchog_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]sman pa chen po de bzhin gshegs/_/snying rje bdag nyid 'dir byung ste/_/ston pa thabs la mkhas pas na/_/des ni dam pa'i chos bshad de/_/bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub/_/theg pa dam par zhugs la bshad/_/'dren pas shes rab 'bring la yang /_/
[\[54a.2\]]bar ma dag gi rab tu bshad/_/'khor bas 'jigs la byang chub kyang /_/gzhan du rab tu bshad pa yin/_/khams gsum las ni byung ba yi/_/nyan thos rnams kyis 'di ltar shes/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i dri med zhi/_/bdag gis rab tu thob snyam sems/_/chos kun khong 
[\[54a.3\]]du chud gyur na/_/mi 'chi mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/drang srong che rnams de la ni/_/shin tu snying rje bskyed nas su/_/de la smras pa blun po khyod/_/ye shes can du bdag ma sems/_/gang tshe khyod ni khang pa yi/_/nang na 'dug par gyur pa na/_/phyi rol dag na gang yod pa/_/
[\[54a.4\]]shes rab chung khyod de mi shes/_/gang zhig nang na 'dug pa des/_/byas dang ma byas phyi rol gyi/_/shes bya da dung mi shes na/_/shes chung khyod kyis ga la shes/_/dpag tshad lnga tsam bar dag gi/_/sgra gang byung ba de rnams kyang /_/de yang thos par mi nus na/_/de 
[\[54a.5\]]bas ring ba gzhan ci smos/_/khyod la gang dag nyes sems dang /_/de bzhin gzhan dag byams pa yang /_/khyod kyis de dag shes mi nus/_/ci phyir khyod kyis nga rgyal bya/_/rgyang grags tsam du 'gro na yang /_/gom pa ma bor 'gro mi nus/_/ma yi mngal du ci byung ba/_/
[\[54a.6\]]de dag de ma thag tu brjed/_/su la mngon shes 'di lnga yod/_/de 'dir thams cad shes zhes bya/_/khyod ni gti mug cang mi shes/_/bdag ni thams cad shes zhes smra/_/thams cad mkhyen par khyed 'dod na/_/'di ltar mngon par shes pa sgrubs/_/mngon par 
[\[54a.7\]]shes pa de bsgrubs na/_/dgon par gnas shing rnam dag chos/_/bsam par bya ste de yis khyod/_/mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur/_/don gzung dgon par de song ste/_/shin tu mnyam bzhag rnam par sems/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob ste/_/ring por mi 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]thogs yon tan ldan/_/de bzhin nyan thos thams cad kyang /_/mya ngan 'das thob 'du shes te/_/rgyal bas bshad pa de dag la/_/mya ngan ma 'das de ngal bso/_/gang yang tshul 'di gsung ba ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs 'di ste/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs 
[\[54b.2\]]par/_/mya ngan 'da' med 'di rtsoms shig_/dus gsum ye shes mtha' yas dang /_/pha rol phyin drug dge ba dang /_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/_/smon lam rnam par spangs pa dang /_/byang chub sems dang gzhan yang gang /_/mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i chos/_/tshangs 
[\[54b.3\]]pa'i gnas pa rnam bzhi dang /_/bsdu ba rnams su gang brjod pa/_/sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/_/drang srong mchog gis rab tu brjod/_/rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang /_/snying po med pa chu shing phung /_/brag ca dang yang mtshungs par ni/_/gang gis chos rnams 
[\[54b.4\]]rab shes shing /_/khams gsum lhag ma ma lus par/_/de yi rang bzhin shes par yang /_/bcings med rnam grol med pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das pa mi shes so/_/chos kun stong zhing mnyam pa ste/_/tha dad dbyer med bdag nyid do/_/de dag la ni mi rtogs te/_/chos 
[\[54b.5\]]ni gang yang mthong med na/_/chos kyi sku ni ma lus par/_/shes rab chen po des mthong ngo /_/theg pa gsum du yong med de/_/'di na theg pa gcig pu yod/_/chos kun mnyam ste thams cad kyang /_/mnyam zhing snyoms te rtag tu mnyam/_/de ltar rig nas zhi ba yi/_/
[\[54b.6\]]mi 'chi mya ngan 'da' ba shes/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las sman gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/_kye 
[\[54b.7\]]dge slong dag khyed mos par bya/_khong du chud par bya'o/_/nga'i nyan thos dge slong 'od srung 'di/_sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag sum cu la bkur sti byed/_btsun par byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dam pa'i chos 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de lus tha ma'i tshe bskal pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba thob pa zhes bya bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[55a.2\]]pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/bar gyi bskal pa 
[\[55a.3\]]nyi shur ni dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang dag par 'gyur te/_gtsang zhing gyo mo dang gseg ma med pa ngam grog dang g.yang sa med pa 'jim ngan 
[\[55a.4\]]dang sme ba med de mnyam pa nyams dga' ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bai dUr+ya'i gzhi la rin po che'i shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan pa gser gyi skud pas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa me tog gis gang ba ste/_der byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/der 
[\[55a.5\]]nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par 'byung ngo /_/de na bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi dkyil 'khor yang mi snang ngo /_/der bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dag byung na yang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab tu snang ba de'i bstan pa la dam pa'i chos 
[\[55a.6\]]yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dge slong khyed dag sangs rgyas spyan gyis ngas/_/grangs med bskal par gnas brtan 'od srung 'dis/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa 
[\[55a.7\]]mchod byas nas/_/ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur bar mthong /_/stong phrag sum cu yongs su tshang ba yi/_/rgyal ba rnams ni 'od srung 'di yis mthong /_/sangs rgyas ye shes phyir ni dge slong 'di/_/de na tshangs par spyad pa spyod 'gyur zhing /_/rkang gnyis 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gtso bo rnams la mchod byas nas/_/bla na med kyi ye shes 'di bsgrubs te/_/de ni tha ma'i lus tshe 'jig rten mgon/_/mtshungs pa med pa drang srong chen por 'gyur/_/de yi zhing yang rnam bkra mchog 'gyur te/_/bzang zhing rnam dag nyams dga' blta na sdug_/
[\[55b.2\]]rtag tu dga' byed yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs/_/gser gyi skud pa dag gis legs par brgyan/_/de yi rin chen shing ljon sna tshogs pa/_/mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris bres de nang re re ste/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dri yang rnam par 'byung /_/de ni dge slong 'di yi zhing du 'gyur/_/me tog 
[\[55b.3\]]mang pos legs par brgyan pa ste/_/me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas/_/ngam grog g.yang sa rnams kyang de na med/_/mnyam zhing bzang la blta na sdug par 'gyur/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong /_/rdzu 'phrul che zhing shin tu dul ba'i 
[\[55b.4\]]sems/_/skyob pa'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas 'dzin pa/_/stong phrag du ma mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de tshe chos kyi rgyal po'i nyan thos ni/_/zag med tha ma'i lus 'dzin rnams 'byung 'gyur/_/bskal par lha yi shes pas bgrangs na yang /_/de dag tshad ni nams kyang 
[\[55b.5\]]mi zin to/_/de ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis gnas/_/dam pa'i chos ni nyi shu tshang bar gnas/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gzugs brnyan te/_/'od zer rab snang de bkod de 'drar 'gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[55b.6\]]pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya'i bu chen po lus 'dar nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing /_de'i tshe so so'i yid la brjod nas/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/dpa' bo chen po dgra bcom pa/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/
[\[55b.7\]]bdag cag la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas sgra ni bsgrag tu gsol/_/skabs mkhyen pas na nges par yang /_/bdag cag la ni mi mchog gis/_/bdud rtsi dag gis rab gtor te/_/rgyal bas bdag cag lung bstan 'gyur/_/mu ge byung tshe mi 'ga' 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]zhig_/kha zas bzang po rnyed nas su/_/bdag gis kha zas rnyed do zhes/_/de yang bstan nas rab tu smra/_/de bzhin bdag cag spro ba ni/_/theg pa dman par sems pa las/_/sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur te/_/dus ngan sems 
[\[56a.2\]]can zas rnyed bzhin/_/bdag cag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/thub pa chen pos lung ma bstan/_/ji ltar sug pa bcug nas ni/_/kha zas de yang ma brtsal bzhin/_/dpa' bo bdag cag spro ba yang /_/bla na med pa'i gsung thos shing /_/gang tshe lung bstan 
[\[56a.3\]]gyur pa na/_/de tshe mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/_/phan par bzhed pa thugs brtse ba/_/dpa' bo chen po lung bstan gsol/_/dbul por sems pa rnams kyang ni/_/thub pa chen po mthar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas brtan nyan thos chen po de dag 
[\[56a.4\]]gi sems kyi rtog pa de lta bu de thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos chen po gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu la bkur sti byed 
[\[56a.5\]]btsun par byed ri mo byed mchod pa byed rjed pa byed/_gsol bar byed cing de na tshangs par spyod pa spyad de byang chub sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bur lhag par bya ba byas te/_lus tha ma la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[56a.6\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 
[\[56a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/bskal pa de ni rin po che snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mnyam pa nyams dga' ba/_shel gyi gzhi la rin po che'i shing ljon pas rnam par spras pa/_ngam grog dang g.yang sa med pa/_'jim ngan dang sme ba med pa/_yid du 'ong 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ba'i me tog dag bkram par 'gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su spyod pa dag na/_mi rnams gnas par 'gyur ro/_/der nyan thos mang po tshad med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi mtha' ni bgrang bar rtogs par mi nus so/_/der byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag 
[\[56b.2\]]khrig brgya stong phrag mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ni/_bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[56b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de nam mkha' bar snang la gnas nas rtag tu chos ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po dang /_nyan thos brgya stong mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ngas deng dge slong 
[\[56b.4\]]dag ni mos par bya/_/khong du chud par bya'o nga las nyon/_/nga yi nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/_/ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe na sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bye ba khrag khrig sum cu tshang ba yi/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen rnams kyang rab tu mthong /_/ye shes 'di yi phyir yang 'di 
[\[56b.5\]]nyid ni/_/de tshe 'thun pa'i spyod pa spyad par 'gyur/_/tha ma'i lus kyi tshe na dpa' bo de/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi gzugs dang ldan/_/drang srong chen po gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra/_/'jig rten rnams la phan zhing thugs brtser 'gyur/_/srog chags bye ba khrag 
[\[56b.6\]]khrig bsgral nas ni/_/'jig rten rtsa lag de ni gnas pa yi/_/zhing de shin tu blta na sdug pa dang /_/skye bo mang po'i yid 'ong mdzes par 'gyur/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen mang /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo skor byed pa/_/rgyal ba de yi bstan la dbang po 
[\[56b.7\]]rno/_/de dag rnams kyis sangs rgyas zhing mdzes 'gyur/_/de yi nyan thos mang po grangs med de/_/de dag tshad ni nams kyang mi zin no/_/drug mngon shes shing gsum rig rdzu 'phrul che/_/rnam thar brgyad la shin tu gnas pa'o/_/byang chub mchog 'di rab tu bshad 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]pa na/_rdzu 'phrul stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi lha dang mi/_/de la rtag tu thal mo sbyor bar 'gyur/_/de ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis gnas/_/dam chos bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas/_/de bzhin rkang gnyis mchog gi 
[\[57a.2\]]gzugs brnyan yang /_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed mos par bya/_khyed khong du chud par bya'o/_/nga yi nyan thos gnas brtan kA t+yA ya'i 
[\[57a.3\]]bu chen po 'di/_sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag brgyad la bkur sti byed btsun par byed ri mor byed mchod par byed rjed par byed/_gsol ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[57a.4\]]bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_rin po che sna bdun pa spug las mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad stong /_khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya pa dag byed par 'gyur te/_mchod rten de dag la me tog dang bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng 
[\[57a.5\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu la de lta bu'i bkur sti 
[\[57a.6\]]byed/_btsun par byed ri mo byed mchod pa byed rjed pa byed gsol ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lus tha ma la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 
[\[57a.7\]]'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur te mnyam pa nyams dga' ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]shel gyi gzhi la rin po che'i shing ljon pas rnam par spras pa/_gser gyi skud pa bris pa me tog gis chal par bkram pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang lha ma yin gyi ris med de lha dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba nyan thos brgya stong 
[\[57b.2\]]mang pos mdzes par byas pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong mang pos brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'gyur/_de'i dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang bar gyi 
[\[57b.3\]]bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gzhan du mi 'gyur ba yi tshig brjod kyis/_/de ring nga las dge slong kun nyon cig_/nga yi nyan thos gnas brtan kA t+yA'i bu/_/'di ni rnam 
[\[57b.4\]]'dren rnams la mchod par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan yongs 'das nas/_/de dag rnams kyi mchod rten rnam mang byed/_/bkur sti rnam pa mang po byed 'gyur zhing /_/spos dang me tog gis kyang mchod par 'gyur/_/de yis tha ma yi ni lus thob nas/_/yongs su 
[\[57b.5\]]dag pa'i zhing du rgyal bar 'gyur/_/ye shes 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs byas te/_/srog chags bye ba stong la 'chad par byed/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag na bkur sti byas/_/'od byed gtso bo bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/_/de ming 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi 'od/_/lha mi bye ba dag 
[\[57b.6\]]kyang shin tu sgrol/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyan thos mang /_/sangs rgyas zhing der tshad med grangs med de/_/thams cad 'byung dang 'jigs pa rab spangs nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa mdzes par byed par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan 
[\[57b.7\]]pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed mos par bya khong du chud par bya'o/_/nga yi nyan thos gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di/_sangs rgyas nyi khri brgyad stong mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rnam pa mang 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pos bkur sti byed/_btsun par byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed/_rjed pa byed/_gsol bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_
[\[58a.2\]]dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug gi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad stong /_kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya pa dag byed par 'gyur te/_mchod rten de dag la me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug 
[\[58a.3\]]pa dang phye ma dang gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dag gis mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu rnams la/_de bzhin du 'di 
[\[58a.4\]]ltar bkur sti byed/_btsun par byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed pa byed/_gsol ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu lus tha ma la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar 
[\[58a.5\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ta ma la'i lo ma dang tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur 
[\[58a.6\]]ro/_/bskal pa de ni dga' bas gang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag pa ste/_mnyam pa nyams dga' ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa shel gyi gzhi la rin po che'i shing ljon pas rnam par spras pa me tog sil mas gtor ba lha dang mi 
[\[58a.7\]]mang pos rab tu gang ba ste/_'di ltar nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i drang srong brgya stong gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/_de'i dam pa'i chos ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur gnas par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gzugs brnyan yang bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/nga yi nyan thos maud gal rigs 'di ni/_/mi yi lus su gyur pa de bor nas/_/skyob pa rgyal ba stong phrag nyi shu 
[\[58b.2\]]dang /_/gzhan yang rdul dang bral ba brgyad rnams mthong /_/tshangs par spyad pa yang ni der spyad de/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'di ni tshol byed cing /_/rkang gnyis gtso bo 'dren pa de dag la/_/de tshe bkur sti rnam pa mang po byed/_/de dag gsungs pa dam chos dri med pa/_/
[\[58b.3\]]bskal pa bye ba stong du 'dzin par 'gyur/_/bde gshegs de dag mya ngan yongs 'das nas/_/mchod rten dag la de tshe mchod byed 'gyur/_/rgyal mchog de dag rnams kyi mchod rten ni/_/rin chen mchod rten ba dan bcas pa byed/_/'jig rten phan pa mdzad pa skyob 
[\[58b.4\]]rnams la/_/rol mo'i sgra dang me tog spos kyis mchod/_/de nas 'di ltar tha ma'i lus kyi tshe/_/blta sdug yid du 'ong ba'i zhing der ni/_/'jig rten phan pa thugs brtser der 'gyur te/_/ming ni ta ma la'i lo tsan dan dri/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu bzhi tshang bar/_/
[\[58b.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i tshe yi tshad du 'gyur/_/rtag tu lha rnams dang ni mi dag la/_/sangs rgyas tshul 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal ba de yi nyan thos mang /_/bye ba stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/drug mngon shes shing gsum rig rdzu 'phrul che/_/bde 
[\[58b.6\]]gshegs bstan la mngon par shes pa thob/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang /_/brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu shes bzhin can/_/bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la brtson byed pa/_/stong phrag mang po de dag de na yod/_/rgyal ba de dag mya ngan 
[\[58b.7\]]yongs 'das nas/_/bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu tshang bar ni/_/de yi tshe na dam chos gnas par 'gyur/_/gzugs brnyan tshad kyang de dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/nga yi nyan thos 'phrul chen lnga po 'di/_/ngas ni de dag byang chub mchog lung bstan/_/ma 'ongs dus na rang 'byung 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]rgyal ba yi/_/de dag gi ni spyod pa nga las nyon/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las nyan thos lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o//_//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches 
[\[59a.2\]]grangs med pa dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhal du med pa tshad med pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol du gyur pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa gzugs chen po zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba zhes bya bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[59a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa 
[\[59a.4\]]zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas ji srid lon zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_dper na/_mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa'i khams thams cad btabs te phye mar byas la/_
[\[59a.5\]]de nas mi des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig blangs te/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig bzhag_/de nas yang mi des rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig blangs te/_de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi 
[\[59a.6\]]khams stong 'das nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig bzhag la/_rnam grangs 'dis mi des shar phyogs su sa'i khams de thams cad bzhag na/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang mu bgrang bas rtogs par nus sam/_de dag gis 
[\[59a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de rngo mi thogs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de rngo mi thogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang dag tu rdul phra rab bzhag pa dang /_gang dag tu ma bzhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams ni rtsis pa'am rtsis pa 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]chen po la la zhig gis bgrang zhing rtogs par nus kyi/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed lon pa'i bskal pa ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis 
[\[59b.2\]]mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de tsam du yun ring ba ni de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab cing de ltar tshad med de/_ngas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i stobs bskyed pas/_khar sang ngam de 
[\[59b.3\]]ring yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin dran no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rjes su dran pa 'das pa'i bskal pa mang /_/de tshe thub chen rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog_/mngon shes ye shes chen pos zil gyis 
[\[59b.4\]]gnon/_/rgyal ba dam pa 'jig rten byung bar 'gyur/_/'di ltar stong gsum 'di yi 'jig rten khams/_/la las phra rab rdul gyi rdul du byas/_/de nas phra rab rdul cig khyer nas su/_/zhing stong rnams ni 'das nas de bzhag la/_/de bzhin du ni gnyis dang gsum 
[\[59b.5\]]bzhag ste/_/des ni rdul du gyur pa kun bzhag pas/_/'jig rten 'di yi khams ni stongs gyur cing /_/rdul phran de yang thams cad zad gyur la/_/'jig rten khams de dag na yod pa yi/_/rdul phran phye ma de yang tshad med pa/_/de dag ma lus gang gis rdul byas 
[\[59b.6\]]te/_/bskal pa brgya 'das mtshan mar 'jog byed pa/_/de ltar bde gshegs mya ngan de 'das nas/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po dpag tu med/_/phra rab rdul kun mtshan mar mi chog ste/_/de snyed bskal pa mang po zad par gyur/_/'dren pa mya ngan 'das ring de srid lon/_/
[\[59b.7\]]nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang /_/de 'dra de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes kyis/_/thams cad dran pa khar sang de ring bzhin/_/dge slong gang dag ye shes mtha' yas can/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes 'di 'dra'o/_/dran pa phra zhing zag pa med pa 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]yis/_/bskal pa du ma brgyas ni nga sangs rgyas/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 
[\[60a.2\]]lnga bcu rtsa bzhir gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas par/_sngar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song nas/_bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu bcom zhing pham par byas so/_/rab tu bcom zhing pham 
[\[60a.3\]]par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o snyam yang /_de srid du de la chos de dag mngon sum du ni ma gyur to/_/de byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying por bar gyi bskal pa gcig tu gnas/_bar gyi bskal pa 
[\[60a.4\]]gnyis su gnas kyang de srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas nas/_bar gyi bskal pa gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang dgu dang bcur yang byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po skyil mo krung 
[\[60a.5\]]lan cig bcas pa las/_bar du ma langs par 'dug cing sems mi g.yo lus mi 'gul zhing /_mi 'gyur bar 'dug kyang de srid du yang de la chos de dag mngon du ma gyur nas/_dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi 
[\[60a.6\]]snying po mchog dam par song ba'i bcom ldan 'das de gang la 'dug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya pa bshams te/_bcom ldan 'das de byang chub kyi snying por 'dug 
[\[60a.7\]]ma thag tu/_de nas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dag gis/_byang chub kyi snying po de'i khor yug dpag tshad bcu tshun chad du me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/_/bar snang las rlung langs pas me tog gang dag rnyis sa de dag sel to/_/de ltar me tog gi char de rab tu phab pa de 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de la/_rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu phab ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la bar gyi bskal pa bcu tshang bar mngon par phab bo/_/de ltar me tog gi char de rab tu phab ste bcom ldan 'das de de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du rab tu 
[\[60b.2\]]phab cing /_bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par 'thor ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'dug pa de la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir/_lha yul pa'i lha'i rnga rab tu brdungs te bar gyi bskal pa bcu tshang bar 
[\[60b.3\]]rab tu brdungs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i dus kyi bar du/_lha'i sil snyan dag rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu bsil to/_/dge slong dag de nas bar gyi bskal pa bcu 'das pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[60b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das de gzhon nur 
[\[60b.5\]]gyur pa'i tshe/_de la snying gi bu sha stag bcu drug yod de/_de dag gi bu thu bo ni ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu bcu drug po de dag re re la yang rtsed mor bya ba/_sna tshogs bkra ba dga' bar 'gyur ba blta na sdug pa 
[\[60b.6\]]rnam pa du ma yod la/_dge slong dag de nas rgyal bu gzhon nur gyur pa bcu drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa de/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[60b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rig nas/_rtsed mor bya ba dga' bar 'gyur ba rnam pa mang po de dag spangs te/_ma dang ma ma dag bzhin du yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'phags pa'i 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]mdzod mang po dang rgyal po'i blon po dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 
[\[61a.2\]]chen pos zil gyis gnon pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'dug pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de la bkur stir bya ba dang /_btsun par bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_gsol ba'i phyir der dong ste lhags nas/_
[\[61a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/mngon pa chen po drug ldan bla 
[\[61a.4\]]na med/_/bskal pa mtha' yas dag gis yang dag bsgrubs/_/lus can thams cad ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/_/khyod kyi brnag pa bzang de 'dir rdzogs so/_/rab tu dka' mdzad bskal pa bar ma bcur/_/gdan cig de la bzhugs te mdzad pa na/_/bar du nam 
[\[61a.5\]]yang khyod kyi sku ma g.yos/_/phyag zhabs ma g.yos de bzhin gar ma gshegs/_/khyod thugs zhi bar gyur cing shin tu gnas/_/rtag par mi g.yo gyur cing mi 'gul te/_/khyod la nam yang g.yeng ba mi mnga' la/_/khyod ni rab zhi zag pa med la gnas/_/dge ba dang 
[\[61a.6\]]ni bde ba dga' ba dang /_/gnod pa med par byang chub mchog 'di brnyes/_/de lta bu ni bdag cag rnams kyi khe/_/mi dbang seng ge bdag cag dge bar skyes/_/skye dgu 'di kun mgon med sdug bsngal te/_/mig phyung bde ba dag las rnam par nyams/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[61a.7\]]mthar mchi lam rnams mi 'tshal bas/_/thar pa'i phyir ni brtson 'grus mi skyed do/_/yun ring du ni ngan song 'phel bar bgyid/_/lha yi lus las yongs su nyams pa'i chos/_/de na rgyal ba'i sgra ni yong mi grag_/'jig rten 'di kun gti mug mun gnag go/_/
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]zag med dam pa zhi ba'i go 'phang ni/_/'jig rten rig pa khyod kyis deng brnyes pas/_/bdag cag rnams dang 'jig rten rjes su bzung /_/mgon po khyod la rab tu skyabs su mchi/_/dge slong dag de nas rgyal bu gzhon nur gyur pa byis pa bcu drug po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[61b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba 
[\[61b.3\]]dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang lha dang mi dang skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/_/bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 
[\[61b.4\]]gsol ba btab ste/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can chos bshad gsol/_/rnam par 'dren pa mtshungs med drang srong che/_/ye shes dam pa khyad par 'phags brnyes pa/_/lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten rnams la ston/_/
[\[61b.5\]]bdag cag rnams dang sems can 'di dag sgrol/_/ci nas byang chub mchog 'di bdag cag dang /_/sems can 'di rnams kyis kyang thob 'gyur bar/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes bstan du gsol/_/spyod pa dang ni ye shes kun kyang mkhyen/_/bsam pa rnams 
[\[61b.6\]]dang sngon gyi bsod nams dang /_/srog chags kun gyi mos pa rnams mkhyen pa/_/bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol//_//bam po drug pa/_/dge slong dag de nas yang de'i tshe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[61b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]bcu rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi bar mi khom par gyur cing /_mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa gang dag na/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu 
[\[62a.2\]]che ba/_'di ltar gzi brjid che ba/_de dag gi 'od kyis kyang snang bar mi nus te/_de dag gi kha dog gis kyang kha dog dang gzi brjid du byed mi nus pa de dag tu yang de'i tshe snang ba chen por byung bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar de dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag 
[\[62a.3\]]kyang /_gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_e ma kye sems can gzhan dag cig kyang 'dir skyes shing 'khod pa lta/_e ma kye sems can gzhan dag cig kyang 'dir skyes shing 'khod pa lta zhes gcig gis gcig shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na 
[\[62a.4\]]lha'i gnas dang lha'i gzhal med khang gang dag yod pa nas/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur nas/_snang ba chen pos khyab ste/_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthu las kyang 'das so/_/dge slong dag de ltar de'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams de 
[\[62a.5\]]dag tu sa cher g.yos shing snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu pa de dag na tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gang dag yod pa de dag shin tu mdzes shing lhan ne lhang nger gyur la/_dpal dang ldan 
[\[62a.6\]]zhing gzi brjid can du gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa de dag 'di snyam du/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang 'di dag shin tu mdzes shing lhan ne lhang nger gyur la/_dpal dang ldan zhing gzi brjid can du gyur pa 'di su'i snga ltas su 'gyur snyam du sems so/_/dge 
[\[62a.7\]]slong dag de nas 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu po de dag na/_tshangs pa chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad gnas dag tu phan tshun dong nas smra'o/_/dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po sems can thams cad skyob pa zhes bya bas/_
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]tshangs pa chen po'i tshogs de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag cag thams cad de ring shin tu dga'/_/gzhal med khang mchog 'di dag rab tu 'bar/_/dpal ldan lham me yid du 'ong ba ste/_/ci yi phyir na de ring 'di 'drar gyur/_/don 'di btsal bar byas na rab tu 
[\[62b.2\]]legs/_/lha yi bu zhig de ring skyes gyur te/_/'di 'dra bar ni de yi mthus gyur tam/_/sngon chad ma byung 'di ni de ring snang /_/gal te sangs rgyas mi dbang rgyal po de/_/'jig rten ga shed du ni deng byung ste/_/de ring phyogs bcu dag na dpal 'bar ba/_/'di 'dra 'di ni 
[\[62b.3\]]de yi ltas yin nam/_dge slong dag de nas 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu po de dag na/_tshangs pa chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas/_de dag rang rang gi tshangs pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang de dag tu bzhugs te/_
[\[62b.4\]]lha'i me tog gi phur ma ri rab tsam thogs nas/_phyogs bzhir rgyu zhing 'dong ba las/_nub phyogs logs su dong ba dang /_dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po de dag gis/_nub phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[62b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa/_byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gshegs shing /_byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[62b.6\]]yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis ni yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_sras rgyal bu gzhon nu bcu drug po de dag gis ni/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par mthong ngo /_/
[\[62b.7\]]mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du ma bskor ba byas nas/_me tog gi phur ma ri rab tsam de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de la 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]gtor rab tu gtor te/_byang chub kyi shing de'i dpag tshad bcu tshun chad gtor nas/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de la phul te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med 
[\[63a.2\]]khang 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang 'di dag yongs su spyad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa yongs su spyad du gsol zhes gsol to/_/dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po de dag gis 
[\[63a.3\]]rang rang gi gzhal med khang de dag bcom ldan 'das de la phul nas/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/ngo mtshar gyur pa rgyal ba tshad med pa/_/'jig rten phan pa thugs brtse 'dir byung ste/_/
[\[63a.4\]]mgon po bla ma ston pa byung gyur pas/_/deng ni phyogs bcu po dag rjes su gzung /_/'di dag nas kyang 'jig rten mkhas rnams ni/_/bye ba khrag khrig lnga bcu tshang ba nas/_/bdag cag de nas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lhags/_/gzhal med khang mchog rnam pa kun tu 
[\[63a.5\]]spangs/_/bdag cag rnams kyis sngon chad las bgyis pas/_/gzhal med khang pa ri mo bkra 'di dag_/bdag cag rnams la thugs brtse'i slad du bzhes/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa ci dgyes spyad du gsol/_/dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po de dag_/bcom ldan 
[\[63a.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos zil gyis gnon pa de'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
