[\[83a.5\]]bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa tshang bar 'gyur/_de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi nyan thos kyi tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/de dag mnyam du 
[\[83a.6\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' gang dag nga yi mdun 'khod pa/_/nyan thos nyis stong 'di dag thams 
[\[83a.7\]]cad ni/_/ma 'ongs dus na de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhes/_/ngas ni mkhas rnams de ring lung bstan to/_/dpe bstan pa ni mtha' yas rnam dag gis/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa mchog byas nas/_/tha ma'i lus de la ni gnas nas su/_/de yi byang chub 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]mchog 'di thob par 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu rnams su ming ni gcig 'gyur te/_/skad cig de bzhin yud tsam gcig la ni/_/shing mchog rnams kyi drung du 'khod nas su/_/ye shes thob ste sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur/_/de dag rnams kyi ming ni gcig gyur te/_/rin chen tog 
[\[83b.2\]]ces bya bar 'jig rten grags/_/de dag rnams kyi zhing mchog mtshungs par 'gyur/_/nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang mnyam/_/rdzu 'phrul gyur pa 'ang 'jig rten 'di kun na/_/mnyam zhing de dag phyogs bcu rnams su yang /_/chos bshad nas ni mnyam du mya ngan 
[\[83b.3\]]'da'/_/de dag dam chos mnyam du gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas slob pa dang mi slob pa'i nyan thos de dag_/bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du rang rang gi lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[83b.4\]]'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/lung bstan pa 'di thos pas na/_/'jig rten sgron ma bdag cag ngoms/_/bdud rtsi ji ltar gtor ba bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag bde/_/bdag cag mi mchog mi 'gyur zhes/_/bdag cag yid gnyis 
[\[83b.5\]]dogs ma mchis/_/lung bstan pa ni 'di thos pas/_/de ring bdag cag bde ba thob/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/_kun dga' bo dang sgra gcan zin dang dge slong nyis stong lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[83b.6\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi rgyal po 'khor 'di'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[83b.7\]]chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can mang po 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon sum du thos pa de 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi rgyal po 'di dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ste/_'khor 'di'i nang 
[\[84a.2\]]na gang dag tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pa dang /_tshig gcig thos pa dang gang dag gis tha na mdo sde 'di la sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyi rjes su yi rang ba'i 'khor bzhi po de dag thams cad ni sman gyi rgyal po ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/
[\[84a.3\]]sman gyi rgyal po gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos nas/_sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sman 
[\[84a.4\]]gyi rgyal po ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sangs 
[\[84a.5\]]rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la smon lam btab pa yin te/_sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mir skyes par rig par bya'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su 
[\[84a.6\]]bcad pa gcig tsam yang 'dzin tam klog gam/_ston tam yang dag par rjod dam yi ger 'dri'am bris nas rjes su dran par byed dam dus dus su lta'am/_glegs bam de la de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du gus pa skyed dam ston pa la bya ba bzhin du gus par bkur 
[\[84a.7\]]sti byed dam/_btsun par byed dam/_rim gror byed dam/_mchod dam/_glegs bam de la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rol mo'i 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]sgra la sogs pa dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyor bar byed pas mchod dam/_sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang 'dzin tam rjes su yi rang na sman gyi rgyal po de dag thams cad ngas bla na 
[\[84b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/sman gyi rgyal po de la skyes pa'am bud med gang la la zhig 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ci lta bu dag cig ces 
[\[84b.3\]]zer na/_sman gyi rgyal po skyes pa'am bud med de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bstan par bya ste/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang 'dzin tam thos par byed dam bshad dam chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ri mo byed 
[\[84b.4\]]na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung bar ltos shig ces bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de bzhin gshegs 
[\[84b.5\]]par rig par bya ba'i phyir te/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bzung na yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti bya ba bzhin du bya na/_gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin tam/_
[\[84b.6\]]'chang ba'am/_kun chub par byed pa'am/_rab tu ston pa'am/_yi ger 'dri'am bris nas rjes su dran par byed pa'am/_glegs bam de la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[84b.7\]]mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang thal mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal zhing rab tu 'dud pa dag gi ri mor byed pa lta ci ltos/_sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su grub par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar rig par bya'o/_/'jig rten la phan zhing snying brtse ba smon lam gyi dbang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mir skyes te/_bdag nyid rgya cher chos mngon par 'du byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[85a.2\]]rgya chen por skye ba bzhag ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di shin tu yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can rnams la phan zhing snying brtse ba'i don du skyes par rig par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_gang 
[\[85a.3\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad dam tha na gsang ste rkun bur sems can gcig la yang yang dag par bshad dam bstan na yang /_sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya yin par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[85a.4\]]mo de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas mngags par rig par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po sems can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[85a.5\]]mngon du bskal par mi snyan par smra ba bas/_gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa chos smra ba de lta bu khyim na gnas pa'am rab tu byung ba de dag la bden pa'am mi bden pa'i tshig mi snyan pa gcig bsgrags pa de sdig pa'i las shin tu mi bzad par bshad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyi 
[\[85a.6\]]rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par rig par bya ba'i phyir te/_sman gyi rgyal po gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris nas glegs bam du byas te phrag pa la thogs pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs par 
[\[85a.7\]]'gyur te/_de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der sems can rnams kyis thal mo sbyar bar bya/_bkur stir bya/_btsun par bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya'o/_/lha dang mi'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_kha zas dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mchog tu 'gyur ba'i lha'i rin po che'i phung po dag gis chos smra ba de la bkur sti bya/_chos smra ba de la lha'i rin po che'i phung po dag dbul 
[\[85b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan cig yang dag par rab tu bstan na yang 'di thos pas dpag tu med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[85b.3\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas nyid du gnas 'dod cing /_/rang 'byung ye shes 'dod pa yis/_/gang rnams tshul 'di 'dzin byed pa/_/sems can de dag bkur sti bya/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid gang 'dod de/_/ji ltar myur du thob snyam 
[\[85b.4\]]pa/_/des ni mdo sde 'di bzung ste/_/'dzin pa la yang bkur sti bya/_/sems can rnams la brtse don du/_/mdo sde 'di ni su klog pa/_/sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bkye ba yin/_/sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/_/gang zhig mdo 
[\[85b.5\]]sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/skye ba bzang po btang nas su/_/dpa' bo de ni 'dir 'ongs so/_/bla na med pa'i mdo sde 'di/_/phyi ma'i dus la rab 'chad cing /_/gang phyir de na de snang ba/_/skye ba la ni de dbang ngo /_/chos smra ba la rin chen 'thor/_/mi yi spos rab thams cad dang /_/
[\[85b.6\]]lha yi me tog dag gis mchod/_/lha yi gos kyis kun du 'gebs/_/phyi dus 'jigs pa de na yang /_/mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'dzin pa/_/ji ltar rgyal dbang rang byung bzhin/_/de la rtag tu thal sbyor 'gyur/_/lan cig mdo sde 'di smra ba/_/rgyal sras de ni mchod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[85b.7\]]bza' bca' de bzhin zas dang skom/_/gnas dang mal cha gos bye sbyin/_/gang rnams mdo 'di phyi dus na/_/yi ger 'dri 'chang nyan pa ni/_/mi yi srid par ngas btang ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed/_/gang zhig nga yi mdun 'dug nas/_/khro gnyer byas shing gnod 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]sems kyis/_/bskal pa tshang bar mi snyan bsgrags/_/mi de sdig pa mang du 'phel/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab ston pa/_/gang rnams mdo 'dzin de dag la/_/gshe zhing mi bsngags smra ba de/_/sdig pa shin tu de mang bshad/_/byang chub mchog 'di yongs tshol zhing /_/
[\[86a.2\]]bskal pa rdzogs par thal sbyar te/_/tshigs bcad du ma khrag khrig gis/_/mi gang la la mngon par bstod/_/dga' skyes nga la bstod pa ni/_/de las bsod nams ches mang rnyed/_/mi gang de yi bsngags brjod pa/_/de bas bsod nams mang du 'phel/_/bskal pa bye 
[\[86a.3\]]stong bco brgyad du/_/sgra dang gzugs dang ro rnams dang /_/lha yi reg dang lha spos kyis/_/gzugs rten de dag sus mchod de/_/bskal pa bye stong bco brgyad du/_/rten la de ltar mchod pa bas/_/lan cig mdo sde 'di thos na/_/ngo mtshar chen po des thob 'gyur/_/sman gyi rgyal 
[\[86a.4\]]po khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po ngas chos kyi rnam grangs mang po bshad do 'chad do bshad par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po chos kyi rnam grangs de dag thams cad kyi nang na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa ste/_'jig 
[\[86a.5\]]rten thams cad yid ches par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i nang gi gsang chen te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis bsrungs pa sngon ma 'phel ba'o/_/gnas 'di ni sngon ma bstan pa ste/_sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin 
[\[86a.6\]]gshegs pa bzhugs pa na yang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skye bo mang po spong na/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lta ci smos/_sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang /_
[\[86a.7\]]klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_bkur sti byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang thos par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyis g.yogs par rig par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/de dag so so rang gi dad pa'i stobs dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang smon lam gyi stobs can du 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang gnas gcig na 'dug par 
[\[86b.2\]]'gyur te/_de dag gi spyi bo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis snyugs par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi rgyal po sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad dam ston tam yi ger 'dri'am kha ton byed dam yang dag par rjod pa'i sa phyogs der/_sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[86b.3\]]mchod rten rin po che las byas pa mtho zhing che ba bya'o/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung nges par gzhag mi dgos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gcig tu 'dus pa gzhag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[86b.4\]]'di 'chad dam ston tam klog gam yang dag par rjod dam yi ger 'dri'am glegs bam du byas te gzhag pa der mchod rten bzhin du bkur sti dang /_btsun par bya ba dang /_ri mo dang /_mchod par bya'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[86b.5\]]phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan thams cad dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang gar dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po sems can gang dag de 
[\[86b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de la phyag 'tshal ba'am mthong ba rnyed pa de dag thams cad ni/_sman gyi rgyal po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang shin tu nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyi rgyal po khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba'i byang chub 
[\[86b.7\]]sems dpa' mang po dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ba'am mnyan pa'am yi ger 'dri ba'am mchod par yang mi rnyed do/_/sman gyi rgyal po ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi nyan pa de tsam du/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]dpa'i spyod pa la mkhas pa ma yin no/_/gang gi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan te thos nas mos pa dang rtogs pa dang 'jug pa dang shes pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen par 'gyur te/_nye bar gnas pa 
[\[87a.2\]]yin no/_/sman gyi rgyal po 'di lta ste dper na/[ (]ma [,]mi [)]la la zhig chu 'dod par gyur te chu tshol zhing /_des chu'i phyir skam sa'i phyogs shin tu khron pa rkor bcug ste/_de rko ba na skam zhing skya ba'i sa 'byin par mthong ste/_mthong nas 'di ltar 'di nas chu da dung thag ring ngo snyam du sems 
[\[87a.3\]]so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na/_mi des sa gsher ba dang 'dres pa 'dam rdzab dang chu'i thigs pa zag pa 'byin cing khron pa rko ba'i mi de dag lus la 'dam rdzab kyis gos par mthong ste/_de nas yang sman gyi rgyal po mi des snga ltas de mthong nas/_dogs pa dang the tshom med de 'di nas 
[\[87a.4\]]chu ni nye'o snyam mo/_/sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin du ci tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi nyan mi 'dzin khong du chud par mi byed mi 'jug mi sems pa'i bar du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ring ba yin no/_/
[\[87a.5\]]sman gyi rgyal po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang 'jug pa dang kha ton du byed pa dang sems pa dang sgom pa de'i tshe/_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te/_sman gyi rgyal po 
[\[87a.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las sems can rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ldem por dgongs te bshad pa 'grel ba'i mchog yin pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[87a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos gsang ba'i gnas bshad pa'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis skrag cing sngangs te dngangs par gyur na/_sman gyi rgyal 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya'o/_/gal te yang nyan thos kyi theg pa can zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis skrag cing sngangs te dngangs par gyur na/_sman gyi rgyal po de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag nga rgyal can du rig par 
[\[87b.2\]]bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi la yang dag par ston na/_sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[87b.3\]]des de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos bgos la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan la 'dug ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyis 'khor bzhi la yang dag par bshad par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas gang 
[\[87b.4\]]zhe na/_sman gyi rgyal po sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa ni/_sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas te sman gyi rgyal po der rigs kyi bu de 'jug par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos gang zhe na/_sman gyi rgyal po bzod pa dang 
[\[87b.5\]]des pa chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos te/_sman gyi rgyal po de yang rigs kyi bu des bgo bar bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi stan gang zhe na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'jug pa ste/_sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi stan 
[\[87b.6\]]de la rigs kyi bu des 'dug par bya'o/_/'dug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dag la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi zhan pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 
[\[87b.7\]]'khor bzhi po dag gi mdun du rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po nga 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug na yang sprul pas rigs kyi bu de'i 'khor dang 'thun par bya'o/_/sprul pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dag chos nyan du dgye'o/_/chos smra 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ba des bshad pa de la de dag phyir mi zlog cing spong bar mi byed do/_/gal te de dgon pa na 'dug par gyur na der ngas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po chos 
[\[88a.2\]]nyan du dgye'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po nga 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug na yang rigs kyi bu de la nga yi ngo bo nye bar bstan to/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig dang yi ge 'chad par gyur pa de dag kha ton byed pa na slar thon par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[88a.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/zhen pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_/'di 'dra ba yi mdo sde nyon/_/'di ni shin tu thos par dka'/_/mos pa rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/ji ltar la la chu 'dod pas/_/skam sar khron pa rkor bcug la/_/phyi phyir rab tu rko ba na/_/
[\[88a.4\]]sa skam dag ni 'byung bar mthong /_/des mthong de na sems pa ni/_/'di nas chu yang rgyang ring ste/_/sa skam rko bar byed pa yang /_/'di ni rgyang ring mtshan ma snyam/_/phyi phyir sa dag snum pa yi/_/gsher ba gang tshe mthong gyur pa/_/de na de la thug par 'gyur/_/de nas chu 
[\[88a.5\]]yang thag mi ring /_/de bzhin mdo 'di mi nyan cing /_/phyi phyir shin tu ma bsgoms pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes ni/_/'di 'dra ba las shin tu ring /_/gang tshe nyan thos rnams kyi ni/_/gtan la phab pa mdo sde'i rgyal/_/zab mo 'di ni nyan 'gyur zhing /_/lan gcig 
[\[88a.6\]]ma yin sems byed pa/_/mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi/_/ye shes la ni nye bar gyur/_/ji ltar sa ni gsher ba yis/_/chu dang nye zhes bya ba bzhin/_/rgyal ba'i gnas der rab zhugs te/_/chos gos dag kyang bgos nas su/_/nga yi stan la 'dug nas ni/_/
[\[88a.7\]]mdo sde 'di ni mi 'jigs shod/_/byams pa'i stobs ni nga yi gnas/_/bzod dang des pa chos gos te/_/stong pa nyid ni nga yi stan/_/de la 'dug nas rab tu ston/_/dbyig pa bong ba mdung thung dang /_/gshe ba sdigs par byed pa ni/_/gang du bshad pa de byung yang /_
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]da dran nas ni de bzod bya/_/bye ba phrag stong zhing du yang /_/nga yi lus kyi dngos po brtan/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan nga 'das nas/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa/_/ngas ni dpa' bo de la yang /_/sprul pa mang po 
[\[88b.2\]]dgye bar bya/_/dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma/_/de dag de la mchod pa byed/_/'khor rnams la yang ri mo byed/_/bong dbyug de bzhin gshe ba dang /_/sdigs par byed cing spyos pa dag_/de la gang rnams byed pa yang /_/sprul pa 
[\[88b.3\]]rnams kyis de dag zlog_/mi dang bral ba'i yul phyogs dang /_/dgon pa rnams dang ri dag la/_/nam zhig gcig pu gnas nas su/_/kha ton byed par 'gyur ba na/_/de na 'od gsal nga yi lus/_/ngas ni de la bstan par bya/_/de yi kha ton nor ba yang /_/phyir zhing thon 
[\[88b.4\]]par 'gyur bar bya/_/gcig pur nags na rgyu byed cing /_/de ni de na gnas pa'i tshe/_/lha dang gnod sbyin du ma dag_/de yi grogs su dgye bar bya/_/'khor bzhi la ni rab ston pa/_/de yi yon tan de 'drar 'gyur/_/nags tshal ri sul gcig gnas shing /_/kha ton byed 
[\[88b.5\]]pa des nga mthong /_/de yi spobs pa thogs med 'gyur/_/chos dang nges tshig mang po shes/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas byin brlabs pas/_/srog chags bye stong des tshim byed/_/sems can gang dag der rten pa/_/byang chub sems dpar de myur 'gro/_/de dang sten cing 'grogs 
[\[88b.6\]]pa kun/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed mthong /_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las chos smra ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o//_//bam po brgyad pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa phyogs de'i 'khor gyi dbus nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod 
[\[88b.7\]]rten byung ste/_'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/_khor yug tu ni de dang 'tsham pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa me tog bkram pa'i stegs bu lnga stong gis legs pa brgyan pa rta babs stong phrag mang pos brgyan pa/_lha'i ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan stong gis brgyan pa rin po che'i 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]phreng ba stong dpyangs pa dar dang dril bu stong rab tu dpyangs pa mngon par byung nas nam mkha' bar snang la gnas te ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang tsan dan gyi dri rab tu byung bas dri des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to/_/de yi gdugs kyi phreng ba 
[\[89a.2\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i khang pa'i bar du 'phags par gyur to/_/rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_ke ke ru'o/_/mchod rten de la sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[89a.3\]]ris kyi lha'i bu rnams lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen pos rin po che'i mchod rten de la 'thor ro/_/mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/_/rin po che'i mchod rten de las 'di 'dra ba'i sgra byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni sems pa med do/_/rtogs pa med do/_/
[\[89a.4\]]spyod lam thams cad kyang bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched las rab tu phye ba ma yin no/_/las dang nyon mongs pa dang pha ma dang /_'byung ba chen po las 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sha dang khrag dang chu ba las rnam par 'brel pa ma 
[\[89a.5\]]yin no/_/dbugs nang du rgyu ba dang /_phyi rol tu rgyu ba dang /_srog dang nye bar 'brel pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/_rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no/_/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang bskal pa bye ba khrag 
[\[89a.6\]]khrig brgya stong mang por yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/_rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad bral ba/_sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis chos nyan pa'i phyir dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[89a.7\]]pa'i sku la ni cung zad kyang rtog pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yi ge 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so/_/ji ltar 'dus pa'i sems can rnams khams so so ba dang /_mos pa so so ba rnams chos kyi gtam de bzhin gshegs pa la nyan to/_/gang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa de ni de bzhin nyid gang de bzhin nyid de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'/_yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni chos kyi dbyings/_gang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos kyi dbyings de ni dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/_/de ltar yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin 
[\[89b.2\]]gshegs pa rnams gang gi tshe gshegs pa dang /_mthong ba dang smras pa ni/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems can rnams la/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thabs mkhas pa chen po bstan to/_/yang rin po che'i mchod rten 
[\[89b.3\]]de las sgra 'di gnyis byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyod kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta'o/_/zhes bya ba'i 
[\[89b.4\]]sgra 'di 'dra ba byung ngo /_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis rin po che'i mchod rten chen po nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug pa de mthong nas/_dga' ba skyes shing mgu ba dang rangs pa dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/_de'i tshe stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/_/de 
[\[89b.5\]]nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa chen po zhes bya bas/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i mchod rten chen po 
[\[89b.6\]]'di lta bu 'di byung ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i mchod rten chen po 'di las 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byin pa su lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa chen po la 'di skad 
[\[89b.7\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/spobs pa chen po rin po che'i mchod rten chen po 'di'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig tu 'dus pa zhugs so/_/'di ni de'i mchod rten te/_des sgra 'di phyung ngo /_/spobs pa chen po shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag grangs med 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/_der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang zhes bya ba byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das des smon lam 'di skad du/_nga sngon byang chub 
[\[90a.2\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_ji srid du ngas dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa 'di ma thos pa de srid du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'byung bar mi bya'i/_gang gi tshe ngas dam pa'i 
[\[90a.3\]]chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de'i 'og tu/_nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su grub par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/spobs pa chen po yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[90a.4\]]sangs rgyas rin chen mang des yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du 'di skad ces dge slong dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus gzugs kyi rin po che'i mchod rten chen po gcig byos shig_/
[\[90a.5\]]mchod rten lhag ma rnams ni nga yi phyir gyis shig ces mos par byas so/_/spobs pa chen po yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang des/_nga yi mchod rten 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[90a.6\]]na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dang de dag tu/_nga'i lus gzugs kyi mchod rten 'di mngon par byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos 
[\[90a.7\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa la nga'i lus gzugs kyis legs so/_/zhes bya ba sbyin no zhes de ltar 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]byin gyis brlabs so/_/spobs pa chen po de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten 'di/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[90b.2\]]'di ngas bshad pa na/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i dbus nas mngon par byung ste/_steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug nas legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[90b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di blta'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spobs pa chen po bcom ldan 
[\[90b.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i smon lam lci bar gyur to/_/de'i smon lam ni 'di lta ste/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[90b.5\]]grangs 'di 'chad pa de'i tshe/_nga yi lus gzugs kyi mchod rten 'di dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po 'di mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gan du 'gro bar gyur cig_/gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'khor bzhi la nga yi lus gzugs phye ste 
[\[90b.6\]]bstan par 'dod par gyur na/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus sprul pa ming tha dad pa gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag thams cad sogs la de'i 'og tu/_de bzhin 
[\[90b.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku lus sprul pa de dag dang lhan cig tu nga yi lus gzugs kyi mchod rten 'di phye ste 'khor bzhi la bstan par bya'o/_/zhes smon lam btab bo/_/spobs pa chen po de'i phyir ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sprul pa mang po gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan stong dag na sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag thams cad 'dir bsdu bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[91a.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa de dag thams cad la bdag cag gis phyag bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer btang ste/_'od zer btang ma thag tu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[91a.3\]]brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni shel gyi gzhi la rin po che'i shing ljon pas brgyan pa/_ras bcos bu dang dar gyi lda ldis legs par brgyan pa byang 
[\[91a.4\]]chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang pos yongs su gang ba/_bla re bres pa rin po che sna bdun dang gser gyi dra bas g.yogs par snang ngo /_/de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dbyangs snyan cing 'jam pas sems can rnams la chos ston par snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag 
[\[91a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong gis yongs su gang bar snang ngo /_/de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs dang /_de bzhin du lho'i phyogs dang /_de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang gi phyogs dang /_de 
[\[91a.6\]]bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs te/_phyogs bcu thams cad kyi phyogs re re na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba 
[\[91a.7\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad snang ngo /_/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]kyi bu dag nged ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi sku gdung gi mchod rten la phyag bya ba'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i gan du 'dong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[91b.2\]]ldan 'das de dag bdag bdag gi zhabs 'bring ba dang lhan cig tu bdag dang gnyis sam bdag dang gsum 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gshegs so/_/'di ltar de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che'i shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur 
[\[91b.3\]]to/_/bai dUr+ya'i gzhi la rin po che sna bdun dang gser gyi dra ba bres pa/_rin po che chen po'i spos dang bdug pas bdug pa/_me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen pos kun tu bkram pa/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/_gser gyi skud pas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris 
[\[91b.4\]]par gyur te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang med par gyur/_ri nag po yang med par gyur/_ri btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po yang med par gyur/_ri khor yug dang khor yug chen po 
[\[91b.5\]]yang med par gyur/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang med par gyur/_ri chen po dang ri gzhan yang med par gyur/_rgya mtsho chen po yang med par gyur/_'bab chu dang 'bab chu chen po yang med par yongs su gnas par gyur to/_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyang med par gyur/_
[\[91b.6\]]sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med par gyur to/_/'di ltar de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kun 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bkod par gyur to/_/gang dag 'khor 
[\[91b.7\]]der 'dus pa de dag ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag zhabs 'bring ba dang gnyis sam zhabs 'bring ba dang gsum 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gshegs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs shing byon pa de dag rin po che'i shing ljon 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]pa'i drung na gnas shing bzhugs te/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i 'phang yang dpag tshad lnga brgya par gyur te/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang /_sboms ni ri bzhin/_me tog dang 'bras bus ni rab tu brgyan pa ste/_rin po che'i shing ljon 
[\[92a.2\]]pa re re'i drung na yang seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/_rin po che chen pos brgyan pa bshams pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par gyur to/_/rnam grangs 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na rin po 
[\[92a.3\]]che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad/_de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gang bar gyur kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[92a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa phyogs gcig nas kyang thams cad tshogs pa ni ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gshegs shing byon pa de dag gi go 
[\[92a.5\]]mngon par sprul te phyogs bcu thams cad du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing /_bye ba stong phrag nyi shu thams cad bai dUr+ya las ni byas/_rin po che sna bdun dang gser gyi dra ba ni bres dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas ni brgyan/_me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po ni kun tu bkram/_
[\[92a.6\]]lha'i bla re ni bres/_lha'i me tog gi phreng ba ni dpyangs/_lha'i spos dang bdug pas ni bdugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_
[\[92a.7\]]rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang med/_ri nag po yang med/_ri btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po yang med/_ri khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po yang med/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang med/_ri chen po dang ri gzhan yang med/_rgya mtsho chen po yang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]med par gyur cing /_'bab chu dang /_'bab chu chen po yang med par yongs su gzhag go/_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyang med par gyur/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams 
[\[92b.2\]]cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig dang mtshungs shing phyogs gcig dang 'dra bar yongs su gnas par gyur te/_mnyam zhing nyams dga' la/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dag gis brgyan par gyur te/_shing ljon pa de dag 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya pa sboms su ni ri 
[\[92b.3\]]bzhin/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang ni ldan no/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung na/_seng ge'i khri khor yug tu ni dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/_lha'i rin po che las byas pa/_bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_bshams par 
[\[92b.4\]]gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs shing byon pa rnams/_shing drung de dag na seng ge'i khri dag la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/rnam grangs 'dis gzhan yang phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag nyi shu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[92b.5\]]thub pas yongs su gang bar mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byon cing gshegs pa de dag gi go dbye ba'i phyir/_gzhan yang phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag nyi shur grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal 
[\[92b.6\]]po'i pho brang 'khor kyang med par gyur/_ri nag po yang med par gyur ri btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po yang med par gyur/_ri khor yug dang ri khor yug chen po yang med par gyur/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang med par gyur/_ri chen po gzhan yang med par gyur rgya mtsho chen po yang med par 
[\[92b.7\]]gyur 'bab chu dang 'bab chu chen po yang med par yongs su gzhag go/_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyang med par gyur/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ (]dur [,]dud [)]'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]cad 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bkod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni bai dUr+ya las grub pa rin po che sna bdun dang gser gyi dra bas bres pa/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/_me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen pos kun tu bkram pa/_
[\[93a.2\]]lha'i bla re bres pa/_lha'i me tog gi phreng ba mngon par dpyangs pa/_lha'i spos dang bdug pas bdugs pa/_rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa ste/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa de dag thams cad kyi tshad kyang dpag tshad lnga brgya pa'o/_/seng ge'i khri dpag tshad lnga 
[\[93a.3\]]brgya pa de dag kyang mngon par sprul te/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na/_so so'i seng ge'i khri la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/_gang 
[\[93a.4\]]dag shar phyogs na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na chos ston pa de dag thams cad gshegs so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu nas gshegs shing byon pa de dag ni phyogs brgyad na bzhugs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe phyogs brgyad nas 
[\[93a.5\]]gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag sum cu kun tu non par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/_rang rang gi zhabs 'bring ba dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a.6\]]shAkya thub pa'i thad du bkye ste/_rin po che'i me tog gi phur ma bskur nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la song ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[93a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshol la/_nga'i tshig gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /_nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa la/_gnod pa nyung ngam/_snyun nyung ngam/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]zhes dris la/_rin po che'i phung po 'dis gtor te 'di skad ces/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchod rten chen po 'di dbye bar dad pa dbul lo/_/zhes gsol cing /_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rang 
[\[93b.2\]]rang gi zhabs 'bring ba bkye'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de'i dus na/_bdag gis sprul pa ma lus par tshogs par mkhyen/_so sor seng ge'i khri dag la bzhugs par mkhyen/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[93b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs 'bring ba lhags par mkhyen te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis dad pa phul bar mkhyen nas/_de'i tshe rang gi chos kyi gdan las bzhengs te nam mkha' 
[\[93b.4\]]bar snang la bzhugs so/_/'khor bzhi po de dag thams cad kyang stan las langs nas/_thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i mchod rten chen po nam mkha' la 'dug pa de/_phyag g.yas pa'i sor mos 
[\[93b.5\]]dbus nas phye'o/_phye nas logs gnyis so sor gdangs so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_grong khyer chen po'i sgo 'phar chen po bcad pa'i gtan pa phyung nas/_so sor dbye ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de phyag g.yas 
[\[93b.6\]]pa'i sor mos dbus nas phye ste/_sa ler mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de phye ma thag tu/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang seng ge'i 
[\[93b.7\]]khri la bzhugs te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas sku kun bskams shing sku ma g.yos par/_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de bzhin du snang ste/_'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyod kyis/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyod kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa yang legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos 
[\[94a.2\]]pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir/_kho bo 'dir 'ongs so zhes gsung ngo /_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang bskal pa bye ba khrag 
[\[94a.3\]]khrig brgya stong phrag mang po nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de skad gsungs pa thos nas/_ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /_bcom 
[\[94a.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lha dang /_mi'i rin po che'i phung pos mngon par gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[94a.5\]]sangs rgyas rin chen mang gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la seng ge'i khri de'i phyed bdar te/_rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de'i nang nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[94a.6\]]shAkya thub pa 'dir bzhugs zhes de skad gsung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gdan de'i phyed la bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa gnyi ga rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de'i dbus na/_
[\[94a.7\]]seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/_nam mkha' bar snang la gnas par snang ngo /_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag dang thag ring na bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/_nam mkha' la 'phags par bya'o 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]snyam du sems so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_de'i dus na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag nam mkha' bar snang la bkod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[94b.2\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyi nang na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par 'chad par spro ba su yod/_de bzhin 
[\[94b.3\]]gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs te/_de'i dus 'di'o/_/de'i tshe 'di'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzhag ste/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[94b.4\]]'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dge slong gang dag 'dren pa drang srong che/_/mya ngan 'das 'di rin chen mchod rten 'dir/_/bzhugs nas chos 'di gsan cing gshegs mdzad na/_/chos kyi ched du brtson 'grus su mi skyed/_/mya ngan yongs 
[\[94b.5\]]'das bskal pa bye ba mang /_/'on kyang da dung de ni chos gsan te/_/chos kyi ched du de dang der yang gshegs/_/'di 'dra'i chos 'di shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/rnam par 'dren pa 'di yi smon lam ni/_/srid pa snga ma dag la bsnyen gyur pas/_/mya ngan 'das kyang 'jig rten 'di kun na/_
[\[94b.6\]]phyogs bcu thams cad du yang yongs su rgyu/_/bye ba stong phrag gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/'di dag thams cad nga yi lus yin te/_/mgon po mya ngan 'das pa 'di lta dang /_/chos kyi bya ba bya phyir de dag lhags/_/ci nas chos tshul yun ring gnas 
[\[94b.7\]]'gyur bar/_/thams cad dam pa'i chos 'di bsrung ba'i phyir/_/nyan thos de bzhin mi dang lha kun dang /_/so so rang rang gi ni zhing bor te/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir/_/ngas ni rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'di lta bur/_/'jig 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]rten khams mang stong phrag bye ba nas/_/sems can thams cad spos shing yongs dag byas/_/chos kyi tshul 'di ji ltar bstan bya zhes/_/de lta bur ni nga yang shin tu brtson/_/shing dbang drung na sangs rgyas tshad med pa/_/ji ltar pad ma'i phung 
[\[95a.2\]]po bzhin du bzhugs/_/bye ba phrag ni mi nyung shing drung na/_/seng ge'i khri la 'dren pa bzhugs pa ni/_/rab tu mdzes par rtag tu der bzhugs te/_/mun nag chen po'i nang na me bzhin no/_/'jig rten rnam 'dren rnams kyi yid 'ong dri/_/phyogs bcu rnams su 
[\[95a.3\]]rab tu ldang ba de/_/sems can 'di dag kun dang 'dres par gyur/_/rlung rnams 'dir ni rtag par langs pa bzhin/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das nas gang /_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir/_/tshig ni myur du smra bar 
[\[95a.4\]]gyis/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs 'das pa/_/thub pa rin chen mang po yang /_/'di la spro bar su byed pa/_/de yi seng ge'i sgra gsan to/_/gnyis pa nga dang 'dren pa bye ba phrag_/mang po gang dag lhags pa 'di dag kyang /_/gang rnams chos 'di bshad 
[\[95a.5\]]par spro ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi brtson pa nyan par byed/_/'di lta bu yi chos 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtag tu su 'gro ba/_/des ni nga dang rin chen mang ba yi/_/rgyal ba rang byung rtag tu mchod pa yin/_/mdo sde rab tu bstan pas 
[\[95a.6\]]'jig rten mgon/_/gang 'di lhags par gyur cing gang dag gis/_/sa 'di bkra mdzes byas pa de kun la/_/mchod pa rgya che mi chung byas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten nang bzhugs bcom ldan 'das 'di dang /_/nga yang stan gyi steng na 'dug pa dang /_/zhing 
[\[95a.7\]]brgya du ma dag nas gang lhags pa/_/'jig rten mgon gzhan mang po 'di mthong ba/_/sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag soms/_/shin tu bya dka' gnas 'di la/_/rnam par 'dren pas spro bar mdzad/_/mdo sde stong phrag 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]mang po dag_/gang gA'i bye ma ji bzhin pa/_/de dag gang zhig ston byed pa/_/de ni dka' ba ma yin no/_/gang gi lag gis ri rab ri/_/chang par blangs par byas nas su/_/zhing rnams bye bar 'phen byed pa/_/de ni dka' ba ma yin no/_/gang 
[\[95b.2\]]gis stong gsum 'di dag kyang /_/rkang pa'i mthe bos bskyod nas su/_/zhing rnams bye bar 'phen pa yang /_/de ni dka' ba ma yin no/_/mi gang srid pa'i rtser gnas nas/_/mdo sde gzhan dag stong rnams kyi/_/chos 'di rab tu 'chad pa yang /_/
[\[95b.3\]]de ni dka' ba ma yin no/_/'jig rten dbang po mya ngan 'das/_/phyi dus shin tu mi bzad la/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin tam/_/'chad pa de ni shin tu dka'/_/gang zhig nam mkha'i khams kun yang /_/chang pa gcig gi nang bcug cing /_/
[\[95b.4\]]rab tu bcug ste 'gro ba ni/_/de ni dka' ba ma yin no/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dra ba/_/phyi dus yi ger 'drir 'jug pa/_/de ni shin tu dka' ba yin/_/gang zhig sa yi khams rnams kun/_/sen mo'i rtse mor 'jug 
[\[95b.5\]]byed la/_/rab tu bcug nas 'gro byed cing /_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dzeg byed pa/_/'jig rten kun gyi mdun du 'dir/_/de ltar dka' ba byas pa yang /_/des ni dka' ba byas ma yin/_/brtson 'grus dag kyang de tsam min/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 
[\[95b.6\]]pa'i tshe/_/phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde 'di/_/su zhig smra bar byed pa de/_/de bas shin tu dka' bar byed/_/bskal pas bsrag par mi gang zhig_/rtswa yi khur bu thogs nas su/_/tshig bzhin du ni dbus 'gro ba/_/'jig rten na ni de mi dka'/_/nga ni mya ngan 
[\[95b.7\]]'das pa'i tshe/_/gang gis mdo 'di bzung nas kyang /_/sems can gcig la'ang thos byed pa/_/de bas shin tu dka' ba yin/_/chos kyi phung po stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'dzin byed cing /_/lung bcas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/srog chags bye 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]ba rnams la 'chad/_/de tshe gang zhig dge slong rnams/_/'dul byed nga yi nyan thos rnams/_/mngon par shes la bkod pa yang /_/de ni dka' ba ma yin no/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa'am/_/dad dam mos par byed pa 'am/_/
[\[96a.2\]]yang dang yang du 'chad byed pa/_/'di ni de bas shin tu dka'/_/stong phrag bye ba mang po rnams/_/gang gA'i bye ma ji bzhin pa/_/mngon shes drug ldan skal chen dang /_/dgra bcom nyid la dgod pa bas/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/gang 
[\[96a.3\]]zhig mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa/_/mi mchog de ni de bas kyang /_/shin tu las mang byed pa yin/_/sangs rgyas ye shes ched kyi phyir/_/'jig rten khams ni stong rnams su/_/nga yis shin tu chos mang bshad/_/da dung du yang nga 'chad do/_/'di ni mdo sde 
[\[96a.4\]]thams cad las/_/mdo sde dam pa mchog ces bya/_/mdo sde 'di ni su 'dzin pa/_/de ni rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin to/_/rigs kyi bu dag phyi dus na/_/khyed cag rnams las gang su zhig_/mdo sde 'dzin par spro ba khyed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 
[\[96a.5\]]smros/_/shin tu gzung dka' mdo 'di ni/_/gang zhig yud tsam 'dzin pa yang /_/'jig rten mgon la rnam kun tu/_/dka' ba chen po byas par gyur/_/'jig rten mgon gyis thams cad du/_/de ni shin tu bsngags pa yin/_/shin tu dpa' 
[\[96a.6\]]zhing nus pa ste/_/byang chub tu ni mngon shes myur/_/mdo sde 'di ni su 'dzin pa/_/gces pa khyer ba de yin te/_/'jig rten mgon gyi thugs kyi sras/_/dul ba'i sa yang rjes su thob/_/mi gtso mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab ston pa/_/
[\[96a.7\]]lha dang mir bcas 'jig rten na/_/de ni mig tu gyur pa yin/_/gang zhig phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/mdo sde 'di ni yud tsam zhig_/'chad pa byed pa mkhas pa de/_/sems can kun gyi phyag bya'i 'os/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]tshogs ma lus pa dang /_lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la bos te/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa tshad med grangs med par ngas dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i mdo yongs su btsal 
[\[96b.2\]]te/_skyo ma myong la ngal ba med par gyur to/_/sngon bskal pa du ma la bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar nga rgyal por gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas nga'i sems ldog par ma gyur to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs 
[\[96b.3\]]su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/_sbyin pa tshad med pa rab tu byin te/_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar 
[\[96b.4\]]po dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_bdag gi lus 
[\[96b.5\]]kyi bar du yongs su btang ste/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mgo dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad dang /_srog sbyin pa por gyur nas/_nga nam du yang kun 'dzin pa'i sems ma skyes so/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di tshe ring por gyur te/_lo 
[\[96b.6\]]brgya stong du mar 'tsho'o/_/de'i tshe ngas chos kyi phyir rgyal po byas kyi/_yul 'khor gyi phyir ni ma yin te/_bu thu bo dbang bskur nas/_nga phyogs bzhir chos kyi mchog tshol ba la brtson par gyur to/_/ngas dril bu brdungs te/_'di skad ces/_nga la 
[\[96b.7\]]sus chos kyi mchog rab tu byin pa dang /_don rnam par bshad pa de'i bran ngas bya'o zhes grags par byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe drang srong zhig yod pa nga la 'di skad ces/_rgyal po chen po dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i mdo mchog gi chos bstan pa yod de/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bran du khas len na chos de kho bos khyod kyis thos par bya'o zhes zer ba dang /_ngas drang srong de'i tshig de thos nas/_dga' mgu rangs yid rab tu dga' ste/_drang srong de ga la ba der bsnyen nas/_'di skad ces/_bran gyi las ci byed pa 
[\[97a.2\]]de bya'o zhes smras te/_de ltar nga drang srong de'i bran du khas blangs nas/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_chu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_rdog gu dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa len pa'i las byas te/_ngas sgo bsrung ba yan chad byas so/_/nyin par rnam pa de 
[\[97a.3\]]lta bu'i las byas nas/_mtshan mo mal khri'i rkang pa yang bzung ngo /_/'on kyang nga'i lus ngal bar gyur pa yang med/_sems ngal bar gyur pa yang med de/_las de ltar byas pas lo stong tshang bar 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de'i 
[\[97a.4\]]tshe don 'di yongs su bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bskal pa 'das pa yang dag rjes dran te/_/ngas sngon chos phyir chos rgyal gyur pa na/_/chos kyi phyir ni nga yis rgyal po byas/_/'dod phyir ma yin chos mchog don du'o/_/
[\[97a.5\]]gang zhig chos smra de yi bran bya zhes/_/ngas ni phyogs bzhir de skad bsgrags par byas/_/de yi tshe na drang srong mkhas yod pa/_/dam pa chos zhes bya ba mdo sde smra/_/de ni nga la gal te chos 'dod na/_/bran du khas long de nas chos bshad zer/_/
[\[97a.6\]]tshig de thos nas nga ni rab tu dga'/_/de na bran gyis bya ba'i las de byas/_/dam pa'i chos phyir bran ni byed pa na/_/lus dang sems la ngal bas ma reg go/_/de tshe nga ni sems can phyir smon gyi/_/bdag gi phyir min 'dod phyir ma yin te/_/las 
[\[97a.7\]]gzhan med par phyogs bcu rnams su rgyu/_/bskal pa stong du rdzogs par mi skyo bar/_/chos zhes bya ba mdo sde snyed kyi bar/_/rgyal po des ni de snyed brtson 'grus brtsams/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'dzin na/_de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal por gyur pa de ni nga yin no/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/_drang srong du gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du 'dzin na/_de ltar mi 
[\[97b.2\]]blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag lhas byin 'di de'i tshe/_de'i dus na drang srong du gyur te/_dge slong dag lhas byin yang nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/lhas byin la brten te/_ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/
[\[97b.3\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'od 'dom gang ba dang /_mdog gser gyi kha dog dang /_
[\[97b.4\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po dang /_phyogs bcu'i sems can bsgral ba de thams cad kyang lhas byin la brten te rdzogs 
[\[97b.5\]]par byas so/_/dge slong dag khyed mos par bya'o/_/khong du chud par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhas byin 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams lha'i them skas zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[97b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/chos kyang rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[97b.7\]]dag ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can du ma ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_dam pa'i chos bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas so/_/de'i sku 
[\[98a.2\]]gdung gi ring bsrel ni 'gyes par mi 'gyur zhing de'i sku gdung gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du bcug nas/_mchod rten de yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad drug cu/_rgyar ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu par 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dang lha thams 
[\[98a.3\]]cad kyis spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par 
[\[98a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/gang dag mchod rten de la skor ba byed pa 'am/_'dud pa de dag kyang la la ni 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/la la ni rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa dag 
[\[98a.5\]]ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dam pa'i 
[\[98a.6\]]chos pad ma dkar po'i mdo'i le'u 'di nyan pa dang /_thos nas som nyi mi za ba dang /_rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis mos pa de dag gis ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo bcad par 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[98a.7\]]rten du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes na yang tshe rabs tshe rabs su mdo sde 'di thos par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na yang des gnas khyad par can thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du skye ba der yang de bzhin 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma'i nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe 'og gi phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba 
[\[98b.2\]]'ongs pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 
[\[98b.3\]]brtsegs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu/_yud tsam zhig sdod cig_/nga yi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa 'ga' zhig gyis la/_phyis bdag gi sangs 
[\[98b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing du song shig_/de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa pad ma 'dab ma stong yod pa/_tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' du mas yongs su bskor nas/_rgyal mtsho'i nang nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i khang 
[\[98b.5\]]pa nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/_nam mkha' las bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa pad ma las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang 
[\[98b.6\]]gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang mngon sum du kun dga' zhing yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam rnam pa mang po byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[98b.7\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod rgya mtshor zhugs te/_sems can gyi khams ji snyed cig btul/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ji tsam du tshig gis 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]brjod mi nus shing sems kyis bsam mi nus pa de snyed du/_tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can du ma dag btul lo/_/rigs kyi bu skad cig sdod cig dang snga ltas kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i tshe pad 
[\[99a.2\]]ma stong phrag du ma rgya mtsho'i nang nas steng gi nam mkha' la byung ste/_pad ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag nam mkha' las/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der lhags te steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod par snang ngo /_/de dag 
[\[99a.3\]]thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btul ba sha stag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sngon theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 
[\[99a.4\]]bsngags pa brjod do/_/gang dag sngon nyan thos byed byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa nyid rjod de/_de dag thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_theg pa chen po'i yon tan yang yang dag par shes pa sha stag go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[99a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad ni kho bos rgya mtshor zhugs nas/_sems dul bar byas pa yin te de dag kyang 'di na snang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 
[\[99a.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yongs su dris pa/_bzang po chen po shes rab dper brjod pa/_/khyod kyis sems can grangs med deng btul ba/_/mi yi lha khyod la ni de 'dri yis/_/'di ni su yi mthu lags de gsungs shig_/byang chub lam bstan pa yi mdo gang dang /_/chos 
[\[99a.7\]]ni gang zhig khyod kyis rab bstan na/_/de thos 'di dag byang chub sems skyes shing /_/thams cad mkhyen nyid des te gting yang rnyed/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rgya mtsho'i nang du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i mdo bshad de/_gzhan ma yin no/_/shes rab brtsegs kyis smras pa/_
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]mdo 'di zab cing phra la mthong bar dka' ste mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs pa'i mdo sde gzhan gang yang med na/_sems can gang la la mdo sde dkon mchog 'di khong du chud pa'am/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus pa yod dam/_'jam dpal 
[\[99b.2\]]gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yod de klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo skyes nas lo brgyad lon pa shes rab che ba dbang po rno ba ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bshad pa'i tshig 'bru dang don 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa chos thams 
[\[99b.3\]]cad dang /_sems can thams cad la mnyam par gzhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong skad cig gcig gis thob pa/_byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa/_smon lam rgya che ba sems can thams cad la bdag dang 'dra bar phangs par sems pa dang ldan pa/_yon tan bskyed par nus shing 
[\[99b.4\]]de dag las yongs su mi nyams pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa snying rje'i tshig smra ba de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so/_/shes rab brtsegs kyis smras pa/_kho bos mthong ba bcom 
[\[99b.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa byang chub kyi phyir 'bad cing byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na bsod nams du ma mdzad de/_bskal pa stong phrag du mar nam yang brtson 'grus mnyams so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/_tha na yungs kar tsam gyi 
[\[99b.6\]]phyogs gang du yang sems can gyi phyir sku ma bor ba cung zad kyang med de/_phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_des yud tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus zhes bya ba de la su zhig yid ches/_de nas de'i tshe 
[\[99b.7\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo mdun na 'dug par snang ste/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bsod nams bsod nams shin tu zab/_/phyogs rnams kun tu khyab pa lags/_
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams kyis/_/phra ba'i sku ni legs par brgyan/_/dpe byad bzang po rnams dang ldan/_/sems can kun gyis phyag kyang bgyis/_/sems can thams cad 'du ba ni/_/dper na grong bar 'dra ba lags/_/bdag ni 'dod bzhin byang 
[\[100a.2\]]chub ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi dpang /_/sdug bsngal rnams las grol ba'i chos/_/rgya cher rab tu bstan par bgyi/_/de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod phyir mi ldog par byang chub tu sems 
[\[100a.3\]]skyes shing shes rab dpag tu med pa yod du zad de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni rnyed par dka'o/_/che zhe bud med brtson 'grus mi 'dor zhing bskal pa stong phrag du mar bsod nams dag byed la/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang da dung sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[100a.4\]]mi thob pa yod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bud med kyis da dung gnas lnga ma thob pa'i phyir te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dang po tshangs pa'i gnas dang /_gnyis pa brgya byin gyi gnas dang /_gsum pa rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas dang /_bzhi pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas dang /_lnga pa 
[\[100a.5\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/de nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i rin du chog pa'i nor bu gcig yod pa de/_klu'i rgyal po'i bu mo des bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.6\]]kyis kyang thugs brtse ba'i phyir de bzhes so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mos/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu phul ba de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis myur du 
[\[100a.7\]]bzhes sam/_'on te ma bzhes gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_khyod kyis kyang myur du phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang myur du bzhes so/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te bdag gi rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur na/_de bas kyang ches 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]myur du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste nor bu 'di bzhes pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten thams cad dang gnas brtan shA ri'i bu'i mngon sum du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo'i bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po byung nas/_
[\[100b.2\]]bdag nyid byang chub sems dpar gyur par yang dag par bstan te de'i tshe lho phyogs su song ngo /_/de nas lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med ces bya ba der/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing drung du 'dug nas bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par kun tu bstan te/_skyes bu 
[\[100b.3\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcur khyab par byas te chos ston par byed do/_/gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[100b.4\]]de lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis phyag byas shing de dag la chos ston par mdzad par mthong ngo /_/sems can gang dag de bzhin 
[\[100b.5\]]gshegs pa des chos bstan pa nyan pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[100b.6\]]'das/_shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang srog chags sum stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags sum stong ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[100b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab brtsegs dang gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/_mchod rten bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' nyis 'bum dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don 
[\[101a.2\]]'di la thugs las chung ngur mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[101a.3\]]ltar yang de'i tshe/_sems can dmu rgod dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gnas pa/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba la zhugs pa/_gdul dka' ba mos pa dang bral ba ma mos pa mang ba dag 'byung lags mod kyi/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[101a.4\]]cag gis bzod pa'i stobs bstan te/_de'i dus na mdo 'di bstan par bgyi gzung bar bgyi bshad par bgyi yi ger bri bar bgyi bsti stang du bgyi rim gror bgyi/_mchod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis lus dang srog kyang bor te mdo 'di bshad par bgyi yis/_
[\[101a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngur mdzad du gsol/_de nas 'khor de'i dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa dang dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu/_chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[101a.6\]]'di rab tu bstan par spro lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos slob pa dang mi slob pa ji snyed pa de dag dang gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/_dge slong brgyad stong po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[101a.7\]]ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngur mdzad du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bshad par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/_rtag tu gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/_g.yon can yon po'i rang bzhin 
[\[101b.2\]]can lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sru skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dge slong ma slob pa dang mi slob pa dge slong ma drug stong dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la lta 
[\[101b.3\]]zhing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la bka' stsal pa/_gau ta mI khyod bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su ma brjod de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan snyam du yid mi bde bar/_de 
[\[101b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa la lta zhing ma 'dug shig_/gau ta mI 'di ltar 'khor thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyang lung bstan zin to/_/gau ta mI khyod 'di nas bzung ste sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi thad na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[101b.5\]]dpa' chen po chos smra bar 'gyur ro/_/slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma drug stong 'di dag dang khyod lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thad na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su 
[\[101b.6\]]rdzogs par byas te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas 
[\[101b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gau ta mI de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/_byang chub sems dpa' drug stong 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]po de dag gcig nas gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pas lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgra gcan zin gyi ma dge slong ma grags 'dzin 'di snyam du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ming ma smos so snyam du sems so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[102a.2\]]'das kyis dge slong ma grags 'dzin ma'i sems kyi rtogs pa thugs su chud nas/_dge slong ma grags 'dzin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grags 'dzin khyod mos par bya'o/_/khong du chud par bya'o/_/khyod kyang sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag bcu'i thad na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[102a.3\]]chos smra bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rim gyis yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[102a.4\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer brgya stong yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[102a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer brgya stong yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal mtshan de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dge slong ma g.yog 'khor dge slong ma drug stong dang /_dge slong ma grags 'dzin g.yog 'khor dge slong ma bzhi 
[\[102a.6\]]stong dang /_bcom ldan 'das las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag cag lung bstan pa thob nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'dren pa rnam par 'dren pa ste/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag gi 
[\[102a.7\]]ston pa lags/_/dbugs 'byin lha dang mi yis mchod pa ste/_/mgon po bdag cag rnams kyang deng tshim bgyis/_/de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang slad 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu ston par spro lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri po de dag ga la ba de logs su 
[\[102b.2\]]gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di snyam du/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 
[\[102b.3\]]'das kyis bdag cag la bskul ba mdzad do snyam du sems so/_/de dag de snyam du bsams nas kun g.yos te phan tshun du smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bskul ba mdzad na bdag cag gis ji 
[\[102b.4\]]ltar bya/_de nas rigs kyi bu de dag bcom ldan 'das la gus pa dang bdag nyid kyi sngon gyi spyod pa dang smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar seng ge'i sgra phyung ba/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag cag phyogs bcur mchis te/_bcom 
[\[102b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi mthus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams yi ger 'drir stsal bar bgyi klog tu stsal bar bgyi sems su stsal bar bgyi 'chad du stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs te/_bdag cag la bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed par 
[\[102b.6\]]mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod thugs las chung mdzad gsol/_/khyod ni mya ngan 'das nas bdag cag rnams/_/shin tu ma rungs 
[\[102b.7\]]slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/mdo sde dam pa 'di ni bshad par bgyi/_/byis pa rnams kyis spyos pa dang /_/brdeg pa dang ni dbyug thogs te/_/gzas pa rnams ni bzod par bgyi/_/'dren pa bag la zha bar bgyi/_/ma rungs slad ma'i dus la ni/_/log pa'i blo dang yon po dang /_/
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]byis pa g.yo dang nga rgyal can/_/ma thob thob par 'du shes pa/_/dgon pa dag la rab sems shing /_/tshem bu dag kyang bgos nas ni/_/yo byad bsnyungs tshul spyod do zhes/_/blo ngan de skad smra bar 'gyur/_/ro bro chags shing zhen pa rnams/_/khyim pa dag la chos kyang 
[\[103a.2\]]'chad/_/mngon shes drug can ji bzhin du/_/bsti stang dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/_/gtum pa'i sems dang sdang sems ldan/_khyim dang nor la rnam par sems/_/dgon pa dben par rab zhugs te/_/bdag cag rnams la skur pa 'debs/_/bdag cag la ni 'di skad mchi/_/
[\[103a.3\]]rnyed dang bkur sti gnas pa ste/_/dge slong 'di dag mu stegs can/_/bdag gi rang bzo rab tu 'chad/_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti'i phyir/_/rang gis mdo sde byas nas su/_/'khor gyi dbus su 'chad byed ces/_/bdag cag rnams la shin tu 'phya/_/rgyal po dang ni 
[\[103a.4\]]rgyal bu dang /_/de bzhin rgyal po'i blon po dang /_/bram ze dang ni khyim bdag dang /_/dge slong gzhan dag drung du ni/_/bdag cag rnams la mi bsngags brjod/_/mu stegs can zhes tshig kyang brjod/_/drang srong che la gus pas na/_/thams cad bdag cag bzod 
[\[103a.5\]]par bgyi/_/de tshe ngan pa'i blo gros can/_/bdag cag rnams la smod par 'gyur/_/'di dag sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes te/_/rnam pa thams cad bzod par bgyi/_/'khrug pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa la/_/ma rungs 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe/_/gnod sbyin gzugs can 
[\[103a.6\]]dge slong mang /_/bdag cag la ni mi snyan brjod/_/'jig rten dbang la gus pa yis/_/shin tu dga' ba spro bar bgyi/_/bzod pa'i go cha bgos nas su/_/mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi/_/'dren pa bdag cag lus dang ni/_/srog kyang don du gnyer ma lags/_/bdag 
[\[103a.7\]]cag byang chub don gnyer bas/_/khyod kyis btams gtad 'dzin pa lags/_/ldem por dgongs bshad ma 'tshal ba/_/dge slong sdig can de 'dra dag_/slad ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni/_/bcom ldan nyid kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa dang /_/
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]bcing dang brdeg pa rnam mang dang /_/phyir zhing bcas pa ma lags dang /_/khro gnyer thams cad bzod par bgyi/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal pa/_/dran par bgyid pas slad dus na/_/'khor gyi dbus su mi 'jigs par/_/mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi/_/'dren pa 
[\[103b.2\]]'di ni 'di tshol ba/_/grong khyer grong du gang byung ba/_/de dag gan du mchis nas su/_/khyod kyis btams pa stsal bar bgyi/_/'jig rten dbang po thub pa che/_/khyod kyi mngag gzhug bdag cag 'tshal/_/mya ngan rab 'das zhi brnyes pa/_/thugs las chung ngur mdzad du gsol/_/
[\[103b.3\]]phyogs bcu dag nas gang gshegs pa/_/'jig rten sgron ma thams cad kyis/_/mos pa rnam par mkhyen pas na/_/bden pa'i tshig ni smra bar bgyid/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las spro bar bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//bam po dgu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam 
[\[103b.4\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la gus par spro ba ni dka' bar bgyid pa shin tu dka' bar bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[103b.5\]]'di dag gis/_slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rab tu bshad par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal chos bzhi la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[103b.6\]]dpa' chen pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag_/cho ga dang spyod yul la gnas te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[103b.7\]]'jam dpal ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag_/cho ga dang spyod yul la gnas pa yin zhe na/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa dang dul ba dang dul ba'i sa thob cing yid mi sdang la phrag dog med par 'gyur te/_'jam 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag_/chos gang la yang mi spyod cing chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du blta ste/_gang chos rnams la rnam par mi dpyod rnam par mi rtog pa de ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems
