[\[104a.2\]]dpa' chen po'i cho ga zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul gang zhe na/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal po la mi sten rgyal bu dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba la mi sten mi bsnyen/_bsnyen 
[\[104a.3\]]bkur mi byed nye bar mi 'gro/_/gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu ba pa dang 'tsho ba pa dang gcer bu pa rnams dang snyan dngags kyis bstan bcos la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang mi sten mi bsnyen/_bsnyen bkur mi byed/_/'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig 'chang ba'i 'jig rten rgyang 
[\[104a.4\]]phan pa la mi sten mi bsnyen/_bsnyen bkur mi byed/_de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/_gdol pa pa dang zol pa rnams dang ma yin/_phag 'tshong ba rnams dang ma yin/_bya gag 'tshong ba rnams dang ma yin/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rngon pa rnams dang ma yin/_nya pa rnams 
[\[104a.5\]]dang ma yin/_glu mkhan dang gar mkhan dang lcags kyi sil khrol byed pa rnams dang ma yin/_gyad rnams dang ma yin/_gzhan dag gi dga' ba dang rtse ba'i gnas rnams su mi 'gro_/de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par yang mi byed de/_drung du lhags pa la dus su chos 
[\[104a.6\]]bshad pa ni ma gtogs te/_de yang mi gnas par 'chad pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la mi sten mi bsnyen/_bsnyen bkur mi byed de dag dang 'dris par mi byed/_de 'chag sa'am gnas khang ngam gtsug lag khang 
[\[104a.7\]]na yang de dag dang 'grogs pa'i spyod yul ba ma yin no/_/drung du lhags pa la dus su chos 'chad pa ni ma gtogs te de yang mi gnas par 'chad pa'o/_/'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po bud med la rjes su chags pa gang yang rung ba mtshan mar bzung nas rtag tu chos 'chad pa ma yin/_bud med la rtag tu lta bar 'dod pa ma yin/_khyim dag tu song ste bud med dam/_bu mo'am/_khyim mi mo la rtag tu chos bshad par sems pa ma yin/_yang dag 
[\[104b.2\]]par mgu bar byed pa ma yin/_ma ning la chos mi ston de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par mi byed yang dag par mgu bar byed pa ma yin/_slong ba'i phyir gcig pu khyim du mi 'jug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa ni ma gtogs so/_/gal te bud med la chos ston na 
[\[104b.3\]]yang de tha na chos la 'dod chags pas kyang chos mi ston na de bud med la 'dod chags pas lta ci smos/_de chos ston pa na tha na so'i phreng ba yang mi ston na bzhin gyi 'gyur ba chen po lta ci smos/_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_gzhon 
[\[104b.4\]]nu dang /_gzhon nu ma dang mi sten/_de dag dang gtam yang mi byed la nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par dga' zhing nang du yang dag 'jog la rtag tu bsnyen pa yin te/_'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul dang po'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan 
[\[104b.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la stong par blta ste/_ji ltar gnas pa bzhin dang ma log par gnas pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang /_mi bskyod pa mi g.yo ba mi ldog pa mi 'gyur ba rtag tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang 
[\[104b.6\]]nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bu nges pa'i tshig dang /_tha snyad rnam par spangs pa ma skyes pa ma byung ba yang dag par ma byung ba med pa 'dus ma byas pa rgyun med pa/_med pa la tshig gis brjod pa mi chags pa'i gnas la 'dug pa 'du shes phyin ci log las byung bar/_de ltar 'jam dpal byang chub 
[\[104b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu chos thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa 'dis gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod yul la gnas pa yin te/_'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul gnyis pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/phyi dus shin tu 'jigs pa la/_/zhum pa med cing mi 'jigs par/_/mdo sde 'di ni bstan par yang /_/byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dod pa/_/cho ga spyod yul bsrung bya zhing /_/'du 
[\[105a.2\]]'dzi med la gtsang bar bya/_/rgyal po dang ni rgyal bu dang /_/'dris byed rtag tu spang bar bya/_/rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring gang yin dang /_/gdol pa dang ni zol pa dang /_/mu stegs can ni de dag dang /_rnam pa kun tu 'dris mi byed/_/dge slong 'dul dang lung gnas pa/_/dgra 
[\[105a.3\]]bcom snyam du sems byed cing /_/nga rgyal can rnams bsten mi bya/_/tshul khrims 'chal rnams rnam par spang /_/rgod cing smra ba'i spyod yul can/_/dge slong ma rnams rtag tu spang /_/mi brtan par ni mngon pa yi/_/dge bsnyen rnams kyang spang bar bya/_dge bsnyen ma gang tshe 'di la/_/
[\[105a.4\]]mya ngan 'das pa gang tshol ba/_/de dag dang ni 'dris byed spang /_/'di ni cho ga yin zhes bya/_/gang zhig de yi thad 'ongs nas/_/byang chub mchog phyir chos 'dri na/_/gnas pa med cing mi zhan par/_/dpa' bo rtag tu de la shod/_/bud med ma ning sems can gang /_/de dang 'dris byed 
[\[105a.5\]]rnam par spang /_/khyim rnams su ni mna' ma dang /_/gzhon nu ma rnams rnam par spang /_/de la nam du'ang dga' mi byed/_/mkhas dang rgod pa 'dri ba dang /_phag 'tshong ba dang shan pa dang /_/'dris par byed pa rnam par spang /_/gang dag srog chags rnam mang dag_/longs 
[\[105a.6\]]spyod phyir ni gsod pa dang /_/bza' phyir sha rnams 'tshong byed pa/_/de dag 'dris byed rnam par spang /_/gang dag bud med gso byed dang /_/gar mkhan gyad dang sil khrol ba/_/gang gzhan de dang 'dra ba yang /_/de dag rnams dang 'dris byed spang /_/res ma'i gtso bo bsten mi bya/_/ji snyed longs 
[\[105a.7\]]spyod 'tsho ba gzhan/_/shin tu dga' ba de dag kyang /_/rnam pa kun tu yongs su spang /_/mkhas pa bud med rnams la yang /_/gang gi dus na chos 'chad pa/_/de ni gcig pur mi 'gro ste/_/rgod cing 'dug par mi bya'o/_/gang tshe zas phyir yang dang yang /_/grong du 'jug par byed pa 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]na/_/dge slong gnyis pa btsal bar bya/_/yang na sangs rgyas dran par bya/_/gang gis shes rab ldan pa dag_/mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin gnas pa'i/_/cho ga dang ni spyod yul dag_/thog mar ngas bshad 'di yin no/_/gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/_/yang dag 
[\[105b.2\]]yang dag ma yin dang /_/rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rnams la/_/rnam pa kun tu spyod pa med/_/brtan pa bud med ces mi spyod/_/skyes pa zhes kyang mi rtog ste/_/chos so cog ni ma skyes phyir/_/btsal ba byas kyang mi mthong ba/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/cho gar rnam pa 
[\[105b.3\]]kun tu bstan/_/de dag spyod yul ci 'dra ba/_/de ni rnam par mnyan par gyis/_/chos 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin bstan/_/thams cad 'byung ba med cing skyes pa med/_/rtag tu mi g.yo stong pa nyid du gnas/_/de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin/_/'di dag 'du shes log 
[\[105b.4\]]par brtags pa ste/_/yang dag min la yang dag yod la med/_/ma byung ba dang ma skyes chos rnams la/_/yang dag nyid dang 'byung bar log par brtags/_/sems ni rtag tu rtse gcig mnyam gzhag ste/_/ri rab phung po ji bzhin rab tu gnas/_/de bzhin 'dug nas nam mkha' 
[\[105b.5\]]lta bur ni/_/chos rnams 'di dag kun la brtag par bya/_/rtag tu nam mkha' mtshungs par snying po med/_/mi g.yo rlom sems rnam par spangs pa ste/_/chos rnams 'di dag rtag pa'i dus gnas pa/_/'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das nas dge slong gang /_/
[\[105b.6\]]nga yi spyod yul 'di ni rab srung zhing /_/de ni nam yang zhum pa med pa yis/_/'jig rten du yang mdo 'di rab shod cig_/mkhas pa dus su sems par byed pa na/_/khang bur zhugs te de bzhin sgo bcad nas/_/chos 'di thams cad la ni tshul bzhin blta/_/langs nas zhum pa med pa'i 
[\[105b.7\]]sems kyis shod/_/rgyal po rnams dang rgyal po'i bu gang dag_/chos nyan pa rnams 'di ni de la srung /_/gzhan yang khyim bdag dag dang bram ze rnams/_/thams cad de yi g.yog tu 'khod par 'gyur/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston par 'dod pa ni bde ba la gnas pa yin no/_/de bde ba la gnas nas chos 'chad do/_/lus la yod dam glegs bam du byas sam/_
[\[106a.2\]]gzhan dag la yang ston na yang /_shin tu klan ka tshol ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin/_dge slong chos smra ba gzhan dag la skur bar mi byed/_mi snyan pa mi smra/_mi snyan pa mi rjod/_gzhan nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi dge slong dag gi ming smos te mi snyan pa mi smra/_mi snyan pa mi rjod cing de dag la 
[\[106a.3\]]phyir rgol bar 'du shes pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bde ba'i gnas la gnas pa'i phyir te/_de chos nyan du 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang phrag dog med par chos ston to/_/mi rtsod cing dri ba dris kyang nyan thos kyi theg pas lan mi ldon te/_ci nas 
[\[106a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bur lan ldon no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mkhas pa bde la rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/_/de la 'dug nas de bzhin chos kyang ston/_/gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 
[\[106a.5\]]sa phyogs su/_/yangs pa'i stan ni rab tu bshams bting ste/_/bzang po'i tshon gyis legs par kha bsgyur ba/_/chos gos gtsang ma de ni rab bgos nas/_/rngul zan nag po de bzhin bshams byas la/_/sham thabs che tshad legs par rab bgos nas/_/bcos bu'i ras 
[\[106a.6\]]rnams sna tshogs legs bting ba/_/rkang rten bcas pa'i khri la rab 'dug cing /_/rkang pa legs par bkrus te steng 'dzegs nas/_/mgo dang bzhin gyi mdangs ni rab snum zhing /_/chos kyi stan de la ni rab 'dug nas/_/sems can lhags pa rtse gcig gyur rnams la/_/
[\[106a.7\]]gtam mang rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston/_/dge slong dag dang dge slong ma rnams dang /_/dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang /_/rgyal po dag dang rgyal bu rnams la yang /_/mkhas te rtag tu phrag dog med par ni/_/sna tshogs don ldan snyan pa'i gtam yang 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]ston/_/de tshe de la de dag dri dris nas/_/de la 'thun pa'i don rnams rab tu ston/_/ci nas thos pas byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba/_/de ltar don gyi rnam pa rab tu ston/_/le lo dag kyang rnam par rab spangs nas/_/skyo ba snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed mi bya/_/mkhas pas mi dga' thams 
[\[106b.2\]]cad rnam par spang /_/byams pa'i stobs ni 'khor la bsgom par bya/_/nyin mtshan du yang chos mchog rab tu bsgom/_/mkhas pa des ni bye ba khrag khrig dpes/_/'khor rnams mgu zhing de bzhin dga' bar byed/_/de la nam yang 'dod pa cung zad med/_/zas dang skom dang bza' dang 
[\[106b.3\]]bca' ba dang /_/gos dang mal cha chos gos rnams dang ni/_/na ba'i gsos sman dag kyang mi bsam ste/_/'khor rnams la ni ci yang mi bslang ngo /_/gzhan du mkhas pa rtag tu bdag nyid dang /_/sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas grub par shog_/phan phyir 'jig rten chos gang bstan pa 
[\[106b.4\]]de/_/bdag gi bde ba'i yo byad kun snyam sems/_/dge slong gang zhig mya ngan nga 'das nas/_/phrag dog med par 'di ni rab ston pa/_/de la sdug bsngal med cing bar chad med/_/nam yang mya ngan rnams kyang 'khrug pa'ang med/_/de la su yang sngangs par mi byed de/_/rdeg pa med 
[\[106b.5\]]cing mi snyan smra ba'ang med/_/de ni nam yang bskrad par mi 'gyur te/_/'di ltar de ni bzod pa'i stobs la gnas/_/rtag tu mkhas pa bde la gnas pa de/_/ji ltar ngas bshad bzhin du gnas pa ni/_/yon tan bye ba du ma brgya 'byung ste/_/de ni bskal pa brgyar yang brjod mi 
[\[106b.6\]]nus/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_dam pa'i chos zad pa'i tha ma'i dus kyi tshe mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phrag dog dang g.yo dang sgyu med pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 
[\[106b.7\]]can gyi gang zag gzhan dag la mi snyan pa mi smra/_skur pa mi 'debs/_brnyas par mi byed do/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/_byang chub 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan dag la 'gyod pa skyed par mi byed de/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang ring ste khyed de na mi snang ngo /_/khyed ni rab tu bag med par gnas pa ste/_khyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs 
[\[107a.2\]]par 'tshang rgya ba'i mthu med pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la yang the tshom skyed par mi byed do/_/chos kyis rtsod pa la dga' ba ma yin te chos la rtsod par mi byed do/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa'i stobs mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phar 
[\[107a.3\]]'du shes skyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed do/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rnams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag la rgyun mi chad par lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos 'chad pa na 
[\[107a.4\]]lhag chad med par chos 'chad do/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu bstan pa na/_chos kyi dga' ba snyoms par byed de/_tha na 'ga' tsam la yang chos kyi dga' bas lhag par phan 'dogs par byed do/_/'jam dpal chos 'di gsum dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[107a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos zad pa'i tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par ston pa na/_bde bar reg pa la gnas shing gtse ba med par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston te/_de'i chos yang dag 
[\[107a.6\]]par 'gro ba'i grogs dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag de la chos nyan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_dad pa dang /_yid ches pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_glegs bam du 
[\[107a.7\]]byas te bsti stang du byed pa dang /_btsun par byed pa dang /_rim gror byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'chad 'dod chos smra bas/_/g.yo dang nga rgyal de bzhin 'phya ba dag_/ma lus par ni yongs su spang bar bya/_/de bzhin mkhas pas phrag dog gzhan mi bya/_/nam du'ang su la'ang mi snyan brjod mi bya/_/lta bas rtsod pa 
[\[107b.2\]]nam yang mi bya'o/_/bla med ye shes khyod thob mi 'gyur zhes/_/the tshom gnas ni nam yang mi bya'o/_/de ni rtag tu dran zhing mnyen pa ste/_/bde bar gshegs kyi sras po bzod ldan 'gyur/_/chos 'di yang dang yang du rab ston kyang /_/de 'dir skyo bar 'gyur ba cung zad med/_/
[\[107b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu yi/_/'jig rten dag na sems can snying brtses rgyu/_/de kun bdag gi ston ces de dag la/_/mkhas pa rnams ni bla mar gus pa skyed/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams dran byas la/_/rgyal ba rnams la rtag tu phar sems 
[\[107b.4\]]bskyed/_/nga rgyal 'du shes thams cad rnam spangs na/_/de tshe de la bar chad 'byung mi 'gyur/_/rnam pa 'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos nas ni/_/mkhas pas de tshe legs par bsrung bar bya/_/bde bar gnas pa'i phyir dang mnyam gzhag na/_/srog chags bye bas rab tu bsrungs par 
[\[107b.5\]]'gyur/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_dam pa'i chos spong ba'i dus kyi tshe/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'dod pa'i dge slong des/_khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams las 
[\[107b.6\]]ring ba bas kyang ring du gnas par bya'o/_/byams pa la gnas pas gnas par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs pa de dag thams cad la snying rje bskyed par bya'o/_/des 'di snyam du kye ma gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa/_ldem por 
[\[107b.7\]]dgongs te bshad pa mi nyan pa dang /_mi shes pa dang /_mi rtogs pa dang /_mi 'dri ba dang /_ma dad pa dang /_ma mos pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can dag go/_/gzhan yang sems can 'di dag ni/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mi 'jug cing khong du mi chud 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]pa dag ste/_'di ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gang la gang gnas par 'gyur ba de la de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'dun par bya'o/_/yid ches par bya'o/_/'jug par bya'o/_/yongs su smin par 
[\[108a.2\]]bya'o/_/snyam du bsam par bya'o/_/'jam dpal chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston pa na gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[108a.3\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang /_rgyal po'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bsti 
[\[108a.4\]]stang du byed/_btsun par byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dad pa dag kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu rnams kyang de bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/grong na 'dug kyang rung gtsug lag 
[\[108a.5\]]khang na 'dug kyang rung chos yongs su 'dri ba dag nyin mtshan du de'i drung du 'dong bar 'gyur/_des lan btab pas dga' mgu rangs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam 
[\[108a.6\]]dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[108a.7\]]mang por yang sgra'am dbyangs sam ming thos pa yang rnyed par dka'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni stobs kyis bdag gi rgyal srid thub ste/_de la phyir rgol ba rgyal po zla dag dang de 'thab mo byed par gyur na/_stobs kyi 'khor 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la dmag mi mang po yod de/_de dag dang dgra de dag 'thab bo/_/rgyal po des dmag mi 'thab pa de mthong nas/_dmag mi de dag la dga' zhing mgu rangs par 'gyur ro/_/de dga' zhing mgu rangs nas dmag mi de dag la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma sbyin par 
[\[108b.2\]]byed de/_'di lta ste grong dang grong gi zhing rnams sbyin no/_/grong khyer dang /_grong khyer gyi zhing dang /_gos dang /_thod dang /_lag pa'i rgyan dang /_mgul rgyan dang /_gser gyi tsong tsong dang /_rna rgyan dang /_se mo do dang /_do shal dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_
[\[108b.3\]]dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru yang sbyin par byed/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_rkang thang dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo yang sbyin par byed/_bzhon pa dang /_khyogs kyang sbyin par byed de/_
[\[108b.4\]]gtsug gi nor bu ni su la yang sbyin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po'i gtsug tu btags pa'i nor bu de ni gcig pu kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gang gi tshe rgyal pos gtsug gi nor bu de yang sbyin par byed pa na/_rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de 
[\[108b.5\]]dag thams cad ngo mtshar du 'gyur rmad du 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lag stobs kyi bsod nams las byung ba'i khams gsum na/_/chos kyi rgyal po mdzad pa'i khams gsum de dag la 
[\[108b.6\]]bdud sdig can gnon te/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phags pa'i dmag mi rnams dang bdud du thab mo byed do/_/'jam dpal des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi bdag po 'phags pa'i dmag mi thab mo 
[\[108b.7\]]byed pa de dag la mdo sde brgya stong rnam pa du ma 'chad do/_/'khor bzhi yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/_de dag la mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer dang /_chos kyi grong khyer chen po'i sbyin pa sbyin te/_mya ngan las 'das pas de dag la rjod cing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di ni mi 'chad do/_/
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]'jam dpal de la ji ltar stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dmag mi de dag 'thab pa na skyes bu'i rtsal chen pos ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyis bdog pa thams cad kyi mchog gi gtsug gi nor bu 'jig rten thams cad yid mi ches shing ngo mtshar du gyur pa de sbyin par byed do/_/'jam dpal 
[\[109a.2\]]ji ltar rgyal po de'i gtsug gi nor bu gtsug na 'dug pa de yun ring du bsrungs pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khams gsum na chos kyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi rgyal po mdzad pa gang gi tshe nyan thos dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[109a.3\]]dag phung po'i bdud dam/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab pa gzigs te/_de dag dang lhan cig tu 'thab pa na/_gang gi tshe 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug zad de/_khams gsum pa thams cad nas byung zhing bdud thams cad 'joms pa skyes bu chen po'i rtsal 
[\[109a.4\]]chen po byas par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes nas 'phags pa'i dmag mi de dag la 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/_'jig rten thams cad la yid mi ches pa/_sngon ma bshad sngon ma bstan pa'i chos kyi 
[\[109a.5\]]rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di bshad de/_kun gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa/_gtsug gi nor bu chen po dang 'dra bar/_de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu sbyin no/_/'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos bstan pa'i mchog ste/_
[\[109a.6\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab ste/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o/_/'jam dpal stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de nyid kyis ring du bsrungs pa'i gtsug gi nor 
[\[109a.7\]]bu bkrol te/_dmag mi mchog rnams la byin pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gsang ba yun ring por bsrungs pa/_chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad kyi spyi bo la 'dug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pas de ring yang dag 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]par rab tu ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byams pa'i stobs ni rab tu ston par byed/_/rtag tu sems can kun la snying yang brtse/_/bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i mdo sde'i mchog_/
[\[109b.2\]]'di 'dra'i chos 'di rab tu ston par byed/_/gang dag khyim na gnas dang rab byung dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' ma yin phyi dus der/_/chos 'di thos nas smod par 'gyur 'ong zhes/_/thams cad la yang des ni byams stobs bstan/_/bdag gis byang chub rjes su 'thob 'gyur te/_/
[\[109b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs la 'jug par nam gyur pa/_/de tshe thabs la gnas nas khyed la sbyin/_/byang chub mchog 'di kun tu bsgrags par bya/_/dper na stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyis/_/mgu nas dmag mi rnams la 'gron mang byin/_/glang chen rta dang shing rta rkang thang dang /_/
[\[109b.4\]]grong rnams dang ni grong khyer rnams kyang byin/_/dga' nas kha cig la ni lag pa'i rgyan/_/dngul dang gser gyi tsong tsong rnams kyang byin/_/mu tig nor bu byi ru man shel dang /_/sbyin par bya ba rnam pa mang po byin/_/gang tshe de ni de la gang zhig gis/_/tsham tshom med pa'i mchog 
[\[109b.5\]]gis ngo mtshar gyur/_/de yis ngo mtshar byas par shes nas su/_/cod pan las ni nor bu bkrol te byin/_/bzod pa'i stobs dang shes rab mdzod mang po/_/sangs rgyas chos rgyal ngas kyang de bzhin du/_/phan zhing snying rje'i rjes su thugs brtse'i phyir/_/chos kyis 'jig 
[\[109b.6\]]rten 'di dag thams cad bstan/_/'tshe ba'i sems can dag kyang gzigs nas su/_/mdo sde bye ba phrag stong rnams kyang bshad/_/sems can gang 'dir nyon mongs 'joms gtsang ba/_/srog chags de dag rnams kyi mthu mkhyen nas/_/de nas chos rgyal sman pa chen po yang /_/rnam grangs 
[\[109b.7\]]bye ba phrag brgya 'chad mdzad cing /_/sems can stobs dang ye shes ldan mkhyen nas/_/gtsug gi nor bu lta bu'i mdo 'di bshad/_/mdo sde kun gyi mchog gyur 'di yin te/_/'jig rten du ni mdo sde mtha' 'di bshad/_/ngas ni nam yang ma bshad rab bsrungs pa/_/de ni de ring 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]bsgrags kyis thams cad nyon/_/nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur nas/_/'di 'dra'i chos bzhi 'di dag bsten par bya/_/gang zhig byang chub dam pa mchog 'dod dang /_/de dag nga yi bya ba rnams byed pa/_/de la mya ngan med cing bar chad med/_/mdog mi sdug 
[\[110a.2\]]cing na bar mi 'gyur dang /_/de yi mdog kyang nag por mi 'gyur te/_/de ni grong khyer ngan par yongs mi gnas/_/rtag tu mthong dga' drang srong chen po de/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du mchod par 'gyur/_/lha yi bu pho gzhon nu de dag kyang /_/rtag tu de yi g.yog 
[\[110a.3\]]kyang byed par 'gyur/_/de la nam yang mtshon dang dug mi tshugs/_/lus la bong rdo dbyug pas mi phog go/_/de la gang dag kha ngan zer ba ni/_/de dag kha yang lkugs shing zums par 'gyur/_/mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di gang 'dzin pa/_/de ni srog chags rnams kyi 
[\[110a.4\]]gnyen du 'gyur/_/snang ba thob cing sa 'di'i steng na rgyu/_/srog chags bye ba mang po'i rab rib sel/_/de yis rmi lam bzang po'i dngos mthong nas/_/des ni dge slong dge slong ma yang mthong /_/de bzhin bdag lus seng ge'i khri la 'dug_/rnam pa mang po'i chos rnams 
[\[110a.5\]]ston par byed/_/de ni rmi lam na yang lha klu dang /_/gnod sbyin lha mi gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/thams cad thal mo sbyar ba de dag la/_/chos kyi dam pa rnam pa mang po 'chad/_/de ni rmi lam de bzhin gshegs mthong ste/_/srog chags bye ba mang la chos ston cing /_/'od zer 
[\[110a.6\]]stong dag rab tu 'gyed mdzad la/_/mgon po dbyangs snyan gser gyi mdog 'dra mthong /_/de yang de na thal mo sbyar 'dug nas/_/thub pa rkang gnyis mchog la mngon par bstod/_/rgyal ba sman pa chen po de yang ni/_/'khor bzhi dag la chos mchog ston pa mdzad/_/
[\[110a.7\]]de yis thos nas rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/rab tu mgu ba skyes nas mchod pa byed/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes myur reg nas/_/rmi lam du ni de yis gzungs thob po/_/'jig rten mgon pos de yis bsam mkhyen nas/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs dus na 'dir/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]ye shes bla med zhi ba reg 'gyur zhes/_/skyes bu khyu mchog nyid du de lung ston/_/khyod kyi zhing yang shin tu rgya cher 'gyur/_/'khor bzhi rnams kyang ji ltar nga yi bzhin/_/gus par gyur cing thal mo rab sbyar te/_/de dag zag med chos mang nyan par 'gyur/_/des ni bdag gi lus kyang yang 
[\[110b.2\]]mthong ba/_/ri sul dag na chos ni sgom byed cing /_/chos la goms par byas pas chos nyid reg_/de yis ting nge 'dzin rnyed rgyal ba mthong /_/gser gyi kha dog bsod nams brgya mtshan ldan/_/rmi lam dag na mthong nas chos kyang nyan/_/thos nas de yang 'khor la rab tu ston/_/
[\[110b.3\]]de yi rmi lam du ni de 'dra rmi/_/rmi lam na yang rgyal srid thams cad dang /_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang de bzhin gnyen tshogs spangs/_/'dod pa thams cad spangs te mngon par byung /_/byang chub snying po ga la yod par song /_/byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir ni shing drung der/_/de na seng ge'i 
[\[110b.4\]]khri la 'dug nas su/_/de bzhin du yang zhag bdun 'das nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes rjes su thob/_/byang chub thob ste de nas langs nas su/_/zag pa med pa'i 'khor lo rab bskor te/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bye stong du/_/'khor bzhi dag la de ni chos ston 
[\[110b.5\]]to/_/der ni zag pa med pa'i chos bstan nas/_/srog chags bye ba mang po mya ngan 'das/_/rgyu zad mar me bzhin du mya ngan 'da'/_/de ni rmi lam rnam pa de 'dra rmi/_/nga yis legs bshad nga yi chos mdo mchog_/gang zhig phyi ma'i dus na rab ston pa/_/de yi phan yon mang 
[\[110b.6\]]zhing mtha' yas te/_/'jam dbyangs de dag 'dra bar de rtag 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las bde bar gnas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[110b.7\]]dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed/_de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te de dag thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/bklag par bgyi'o/_/yi ger bri bar bgyi'o/_/mchod par bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam 
[\[111a.2\]]grangs 'di la brtson par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag la legs par bka' stsal du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'di bya ba ci dgos/_
[\[111a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na nga yi byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' re re'i g.yog kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kho na ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[111a.4\]]de dag re re'i g.yog kyang de snyed do/_/de dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin to/_/yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di kun tu gas/_
[\[111a.5\]]rnam par gas par gyur to/_/gas pa de dag gi bar nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid la brten cing /_sa chen po 'di'i 'og gi nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa 
[\[111a.6\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po 'thon te/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di lta bu 'di thos nas sa rum nas 'thon te/_de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re yang g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed yod cing /_tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang /_
[\[111a.7\]]tshogs kyi slob dpon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang /_tshogs kyi slob dpon 'di lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sa rum 'di nas 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'thon par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_/byang 
[\[111b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[111b.3\]]dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis kyi bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[111b.4\]]dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung phyed kyi bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[111b.5\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bzhi cha dang /_drug cha dang /_brgyad cha dang /_nyi shu cha dang /_lnga bcu cha dang /_brgya yi cha dang /_stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha yod pa rnams 
[\[111b.6\]]lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog bye ba yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub 
[\[111b.7\]]sems dpa' stong phrag brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog stong yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog lnga brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog bzhi 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]brgya dang sum brgya dang nyis brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' lnga bcu yod pa rnams lta ci smos/_de bzhin du sbyar 
[\[112a.2\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bcu pa dang /_sum cu pa dang /_nyi shu pa dang /_bcu pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_gnyis pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag 
[\[112a.3\]]dang gnyis pa rnams lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog med pa de gcig pu gnas pa rnams lta ci smos te/_de dag gi grangs sam bgrang ba'am dpe 'am zlar yang mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i 
[\[112a.4\]]sa rum nas 'thon to/_/de dag 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang lhan cig tu seng ge'i khri gang la bzhugs pa'i rin po che'i mchod rten chen po nam mkha' bar snang la 
[\[112a.5\]]gnas pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gnyis kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi sprul pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang dag phyogs bcu 
[\[112a.6\]]kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa'i drung dag na seng ge'i khri dag la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la btud cing phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[112a.7\]]rgyas de dag la/_lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa rnam pa du mas mngon par bstod de phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_bcom 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la mngon du phyag 'tshal lo/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sa rum nas 'thon nas/_bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu rdzogs par 'das kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 
[\[112b.2\]]phyag 'tshal zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa rnam pa du mas bstod do/_/bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag la/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag nyid la cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[112b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis de dag phyi dro gcig kho na snyam du shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di yang 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i nam mkha' tsam du 
[\[112b.4\]]gyur te/_byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po de'i gtso bo/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi gang dag byung ba 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[112b.5\]]po spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rnam par dag ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa brtan pa zhes bya ba ste/_
[\[112b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po de'i gtso bor gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po 
[\[112b.7\]]de'i mdun du 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung lags sam/_snyun nyung lags sam/_bde bar reg pa la gnas lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can rnams tshul mdzes 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]lags sam/_legs par go ba lags sam/_gdul sla ba lags sam/_rnam par sbyang sla ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das la skyo ba skyed par mi bgyid lags sam/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[113a.2\]]'di dag gsol to/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/bde bar reg la gnas lags sam/_/gnod las rnam par rab grol lam/_/sdig pa mi mnga' sku bde 'am/_/khyod kyi sems can tshul mdzes sam/_/gdul sla sbyang bar sla lags sam/_/'jig rten mgon gyis bshad pa na/_/skyo 
[\[113a.3\]]ba skyed par mi bgyid dam/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po de'i gtso bo/_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin te bde bar reg pa la gnas so/_/gnod pa chung ngo /_/
[\[113a.4\]]snyun nyung ngo /_/nga'i sems can 'di dag tshul mdzes so/_/go sla'o/_/gdul sla'o/_/rnam par sbyang sla'o/_/rnam par sbyong ba na nga la skyo ba mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag nga nyid kyis sems can 'di dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe yongs su sbyang 
[\[113a.5\]]ba byas pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu dag nga mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang mos par 'gyur la/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'bab cing 'dug ste/_gang dag nyan thos kyis la yongs su 'dris par byas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de dag kyang ngas da ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la btsud 
[\[113a.6\]]de don dam pa thos par byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/_/khyod kyi sems kyi tshul mdzes shing /_/gdul sla rnam par sbyang sla dang /_/'dren pa gang dag khyod 
[\[113a.7\]]kyi ni/_/ye shes zab mo 'di nyan cing /_/thos nas mos par 'gyur ba dang /_/'dren par 'jug par 'gyur ba la/_/bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]chen po de'i gtso bo/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag la/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[113b.2\]]byams pa dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po gang sa rum nas 'thon te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom 
[\[113b.3\]]ldan 'das la bsti stang du byed/_btsun par byed/_bcom ldan 'das la dgyes par byed pa 'di dag_/bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong sngon ma thos na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ga las lhags snyam sems so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[113b.4\]]po byams pas bdag nyid the tshom dang som nyir gyur pa yang shes/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa yang sems kyis rig nas de'i tshe thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su 
[\[113b.5\]]bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon ma byung /_/brgya stong phrag ni mang po dang /_/bye ba phrag ni mtha' yas pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog gis bstan du gsol/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag rnams/_/gang nas ji ltar lhags par gyur/_/rab 
[\[113b.6\]]tu che ba'i lus kyi gzugs/_/'di dag gang nas ji ltar lhags/_/'di dag thams cad brtan ldan zhing /_/dran dang ldan la drang srong che/_/shin tu blta na sdug pa'i gzugs/_/'di dag gang nas lhags par gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gyur pa/_/re re'i 
[\[113b.7\]]g.yog kyang dpag mi lang /_/gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/_/de snyed mchis so 'jig rten dbang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog rnams ni/_/grags ldan drug cur yongs tshang ba/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/kun kyang byang chub zhugs pa lags/_/dpa' bo 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]g.yog dang ldan gyur pa/_/rnam pa 'di 'dra'i skyob rnams kyi/_/'di dag tshad ni gang gA'i klung /_/drug cu kho na'i bye ma snyed/_/gzhan dag de bas ches mang ste/_/g.yog rnams mtha' yas ldan pa lags/_/gang gA phrag ni lnga bcu dang /_/bzhi bcu dang ni 
[\[114a.2\]]sum cu dang /_/gang gA nyi shu'i bye snyed de/_/g.yog 'khor de dag de snyed lags/_/gzhan dag de bas ches mang ste/_/de dag rnams kyi bcu dang lnga/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas sras rnams kyi/_/so so re re'i g.yog gyur pa/_/gang nas 'di 'dra'i 'khor 'di rnams/_/rnam par 'dren 
[\[114a.3\]]pa de ring lhags/_/so so re re'i g.yog gyur pa/_/rjes su slob pa'i grogs po dag_/gang gA bzhi dang gsum rnams dang /_/gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyang mchis/_/gzhan yang de bas ches mang ba/_/de yi grangs ni mtha' yas te/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du yang /_/
[\[114a.4\]]de dag dpag par nus ma lags/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo pa/_/skyob pa dag gi g.yog rnams ni/_/gang gA phyed dang sum cha dang /_/bcu dang nyi shu'i cha yang mchis/_/gzhan yang de bas ches mang ste/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya rnams su/_/re re bgrang bar bgyis na ni/_/
[\[114a.5\]]de dag rnams la tshad ma mchis/_/gzhan yang de bas ches mang ste/_/g.yog rnams nyung ba ma lags pa/_/bye ba bye phrag bye ba dang /_/de bzhin bye ba phyed pa'ang mchis/_/gzhan yang drang srong che rnams kyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/_/bgrang ba las ni 'das 
[\[114a.6\]]pa rnams/_/thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas/_/g.yog 'khor stong dang ldan pa dang /_/de bzhin brgya dang lnga bcu dang /_/bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang /_/de dag bgrang bar nus ma lags/_/dpa' bo dag gi g.yog rnams ni/_/nyi shu dag dang bcu dang lnga/_/de 
[\[114a.7\]]bzhin bzhi gsum gnyis pa yang /_/de dag la ni grangs ma mchis/_/gang dag bdag nyid gcig rgyu zhing /_/gcig pu zhi ba myong bgyid pa/_/gang dag de ring 'dir lhags pa/_/de dag la yang grangs ma mchis/_/bgrang shing lag na thogs nas su/_/gang 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyi/_/bskal par gal te mis bgrangs kyang /_/des ni mtha' ma rnyed ma lags/_/kun kyang che ba'i bdag nyid can/_/skyob pa brtson 'grus ldan pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo pa/_/'di rnams gang las byung ba lags/_/gang gis 'di dag chos rnams bstan/_/
[\[114b.2\]]byang chub la ni su yis bkod/_/'di dag su yi bstan la mos/_/gang gis bstan pa 'dzin pa lags/_/sa 'di thams cad brtol nas su/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang /_/mkhas shing rdzu 'phrul ldan pa dang /_/shes rab chen po rnams kyang 'thon/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bral ba/_/
[\[114b.3\]]de ltar 'thon pa 'di dag gis/_/thub pa 'jig rten khams 'di yang /_/kun tu sang seng bgyis lags so/_/'di dag nam yang bdag cag gis/_/sngon chad yong ye ma mthong na/_/de yi zhing gi ming rnams ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pas bstan du gsol/_/phyogs bcu dag tu bdag cag rnams/_/
[\[114b.4\]]'di ltar yang dang yang mchis na/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/_/bdag cag rnams kyis yong ma mthong /_/khyod kyi sras rnams gcig kyang ni/_/bdag cag nam yang ma mthong ba/_/'di dag de ring 'phral la mthong /_/thub pa de yi spyod pa gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag_/
[\[114b.5\]]stong gi phrag ni brgya rnams kyang /_/thams cad ngo mtshar ltad mor gyur/_/rkang gnyis mchog la de dag lta/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bral ba/_/dpa' bo 'di dag ga las mchis/_/phung po mi mnga' dpag yas pa/_/dpa' bo chen po lung bstan gsol/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[114b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sprul pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas gshegs nas/_
[\[114b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i phyogs brgyad kun na/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na/_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]zhabs 'bring ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po sa rum nas 'thon te nam mkha' la 'khod pa de dag mthong nas/_ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur/_so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[115a.2\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa 'di snyed gang nas lhags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/_rang rang gi zhabs 'bring ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[115a.3\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la don 'di 'dri ste/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[115a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i lan ldon par 'gyur gyis de las khyod nyon cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa gang khyod kyis nga la gnas rgya chen po 
[\[115a.5\]]'di dris pa ma pham pa legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las 
[\[115a.6\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu bsgyings pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gnon pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yang dag par rab tu ston gyis/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[115a.7\]]dpa'i tshogs 'di thams cad sgrims shig_/shin tu go gyon la mthu brtan par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gzhan ma yin pa'i tshig rnams ngas bshad kyis/_/rigs kyi bu dag thams cad rab tu sgrims/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes bsam mi 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]khyab/_/'di la mkhas rnams zhum par ma byed cig_/kun kyang brtan dang ldan zhing dran ldan byos/_/kun kyang mnyam par gzhag cing gnas par gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar ba/_/sngon chad ma byung chos ni mnyan par byos/_/ngas ni khyed cag legs par yongs dgod kyis/_/thams cad the tshom nam yang ma 
[\[115b.2\]]byed cig_/rnam par 'dren pa gzhan du gsung ma yin/_/nga yi ye shes nams kyang grangs yod min/_/bde bar gshegs pas chos zab thugs chud de/_/brtag mi nus shing de la tshad kyang med/_/ngas ni chos de rab tu bstan par byas/_/de dag ci 'dra ci lta nga las nyon/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[115b.3\]]de dag bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa khyod mos par bya/_khyod khong du chud par bya'o/_/ma pham pa khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/_grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med/_bgrang du med pa gang dag khyod kyis sngon 
[\[115b.4\]]ma mthong ba sa rum nas gdod 'thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag thams cad ni/_ma pham pa nga 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_nga nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de 
[\[115b.5\]]yongs su bsngos so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni ngas byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di la yongs su smin par byas pa/_rab tu bkod pa bzhag pa/_yongs su gnas par byas pa/_btsud pa khong du chud par byas pa dag go/_/ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i 'og gi 
[\[115b.6\]]nam mkha'i khams kyis yongs su zin pa na gnas te/_kha ton dang lung nod pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa la zhugs pa dag go/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi la mi dga' zhing 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' ba brtson pa mi 'dor zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag go/_/ma pham pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni dben pa 
[\[115b.7\]]la mngon par dga' zhing dben pa la mos pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni lha dang mi la brten cing mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi med pa'i spyod pa la dga' ba chos kyi kun dga' ba la mos pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la brtson pa dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag dpag med pa/_/'di dag bsam gyis mi khyab tshad kyang med/_/rdzu 'phrul shes rab thos pa rnams dang ldan/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por ye shes spyad/_/nga yis 'di dag thams cad byang chub la/_/yongs su smin byas nga 
[\[116a.2\]]yi zhing na 'khod/_/'di dag thams cad nga yis smin byas te/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nga yi bu/_/'di dag thams cad dgon dang sbyangs la mos/_/'du 'dzi sa ni rtag tu spong bar byed/_/nga yi spyod pa mchog gi rjes slob cing /_/nga bu 'di dag 'du 'dzi med par spyod/_/nam mkhas yongs su zin pa 
[\[116a.3\]]'dir gnas te/_/zhing 'di'i 'og na dpa' rnams yongs su spyad/_/byang chub dam pa 'di ni kun sgrub cing /_/nyin mtshan du ni bag yod shin tu brtson/_/thams cad brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran dang ldan/_/dpag tu med pa'i shes rab stobs la gnas/_/'di dag mi 'jigs par yang chos 'chad pa'i/_/
[\[116a.4\]]'od gsal 'di dag thams cad nga yi bu/_/byang chub dam pa 'di ni ngas thob nas/_/grong khyer ga ya de yi shing drung der/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor/_/thams cad byang chub mchog 'dir smin par byas/_/zag med yang dag nga yi tshig 'di ni/_/thos nas thams cad nga la dad par gyis/_/
[\[116a.5\]]nga yis de ltar byang chub mchog thob ring /_/ngas ni 'di dag thams cad yongs smin byas/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/_ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das skad cig bzhugs 
[\[116a.6\]]nas/_yun ring po ma lon par byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa 'di snyed 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud de yongs su smin par mdzad snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[116a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon nur gyur pa na/_ser skya'i gnas kyi shAkya'i grong khyer nas mngon par byung ste/_ga ya'i grong khyer nas shin tu mi ring ba byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gshegs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]sangs rgyas nas/_bcom ldan 'das deng du de'i dus nas lo bzhi bcu lhags tsam lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas dus 'di tsam gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dpag tu ma mchis pa 'di dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang /_
[\[116b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gnon pa mdzad cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis dus de tsam gyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btsud cing yongs su smin par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[116b.3\]]dpa'i tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phung po 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrangs kyang mtha' mi rnyed pa de tsam du/_bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa/_de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/_yun ring por tshangs par 
[\[116b.4\]]spyod pa spyad pa sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_bskal pa brgya stong mang por yongs su grub pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_mi gzhan zhig btsas nas lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho skra nag po thog ma'i tshod dang ldan 
[\[116b.5\]]pa 'ga' zhig mchis la/_des bu lo brgya lon pa dag ston cing rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni nga'i bu 'di dag ni nga'i bu'o zhes de skad smras la/_mi lo brgya lon pa de dag kyang 'di skad du/_'di ni bdag gi pha ste skyed pa yin no zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das mi de'i tshig la 'jig rten 
[\[116b.6\]]yid ches par mi 'gyur te/_yid ches par dka' ba lags so/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ring por ma lags par byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[116b.7\]]dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis pa mang po bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/_yun ring por sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nges par bgyis pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong la mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pa la mkhas pa/_mngon par shes pa 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]chen po dang yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sa la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yang dag par rjod pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten na ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur pa brtson 'grus dang stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa de dag la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 
[\[117a.2\]]skad du/_ngas 'di dag thog ma nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la yang dag par btsud de/_yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bsngos te/_de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_nga nyid kyis brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa 'di 
[\[117a.3\]]dag thams cad byas so zhes gsung ba la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan ma lags par gsung ba ste/_don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches lags mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du 
[\[117a.4\]]yang dag par zhugs pa rnams gnas 'di la the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na yid mi ches mi dad mi mos par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_de dag ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[117a.5\]]las mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ci nas bdag cag kyang chos 'di la the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag gis thos na yang /_the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bar bcom 
[\[117a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par bshad du gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/gang tshe ser skya'i gnas su bltams gyur cing /_/shAkya'i gnas nas mngon par byung nas su/_/
[\[117a.7\]]grong khyer ga yar byang chub brnyes gyur pa/_/'jig rten mgon po de nas yun mi ring /_/'jigs bral 'di dag dang ni gzhan mang ba/_/tshogs chen bskal pa bye bar spyad pa ste/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs la gnas shing mi g.yo ba/_/legs bslabs shes rab stobs kyang rtogs par rig_/
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]chu yi pad ma lta bur ma gos pa/_/de dag sa 'di brtol nas deng 'dir lhags/_/'jig rten bdag po dran ldan slob ma sras/_/thams cad thal sbyar gus dang bcas te mchis/_/khyod kyi rmad byung 'di 'dra de dag la/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yid ches 'gyur/_/
[\[117b.2\]]the tshom gzhom pa'i slad du bka' stsal te/_/don 'di ci bzhin khyod kyis 'dir bshad gsol/_/dper na 'di na skyes bu la la zhig_/btsas nas lo ni nyi shu lhag lon pa/_/gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho skra gnag des/_/btsas nas lo brgya lon la bur ston cing /_/
[\[117b.3\]]skra skya gnyer ma can dag 'di skad du/_/'di ni bdag cag lus skyed yin mchi na/_/thor bu'i bu ni 'di 'dra 'di dag la/_/'jig rten mgon po shin tu yid ches dka'/_/de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyang sku gzhon la/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa mang po 'di/_/dran 
[\[117b.4\]]dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs shes rab can/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du legs par bslabs/_/brtan dang ldan zhing shes rab mkhas gyur pa/_/thams cad byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug_/chos rnams gtan la dbab cing mi 'jigs pa/_/'jig rten 
[\[117b.5\]]rnam par 'dren pas yongs su bstong /_/rlung ltar chags pa ma mchis rgyu ba ste/_/nam mkha'i khams la rtag tu gnas ma lags/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs tshol zhing /_/bde bar gshegs kyi sras rnams brtson 'grus skyed/_/'jig rten 
[\[117b.6\]]mgon po'i mngon sum thos pas na/_/bdag cag la ni the tshom gzhar ma mchis/_/'jig rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na/_/'di la ji lta bur ni yid ches 'gyur/_/gnas 'di la ni the tshom 'tshal ba yis/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngan 'gror mchis 
[\[117b.7\]]sa re/_/bcom ldan ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/smin mdzad ji bzhin de ni lung bstan gsol/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/_byang chub sems dpa' sa rum nas 'thon pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]bam po bcu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas yang dag pa'i tshig smras pa la dad cing yid ches par gyis shig_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang 
[\[118a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas yang dag pa'i tshig smras pa la dad cing yid ches par gyis shig_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[118a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa mdun du bzhag nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa la bdag cag yid 
[\[118a.4\]]ches par bgyid do/_/lan gnyis su yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[118a.5\]]bka' stsal pa la bdag cag yid ches par bgyid do/_/lan gsum du yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad 
[\[118a.6\]]du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa la bdag cag yid ches par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[118a.7\]]dag de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu 'di nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dis ni/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i khyim nas mngon par byung ste/_grong khyer ga ya zhes bya bar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gshegs 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]nas da gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du de ltar shes mod kyi/_rigs kyi bu dag nga ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[118b.2\]]rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig byung la des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu'i sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab dag las rdul phra rab gcig khyer te/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[118b.3\]]phrag lnga bcu kho na 'das nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul de bzhag la/_mi des rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sa'i khams rnams zad par byas nas/_sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad rnam grangs 'di dang gzhag pa'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs su 
[\[118b.4\]]bzhag na/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag la la zhig gis bsam pa'am/_dpag pa'am/_bgrang ba'am/_brtag par nus sam/_de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[118b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni grangs ma mchis pa bgrang du ma mchis pa sems kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[118b.6\]]kyis kyang /_'phags pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am/_dpag pa'am/_bgrang ba'am/_brtag par mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas 'di ni/_bdag cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i spyod yul du yang mi 'gyur te/_
[\[118b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed mos par bya'o/_/khyed kyi khong du 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]chud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag las/_mi des gang dag tu rdul phra rab de dag bzhag pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dag gang dag tu ma bzhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag de dag thams cad na rdul phra rab kyi rdul 
[\[119a.2\]]yod pa de dag ni/_rigs kyi bu dag nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa de snyed du med do/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang tshun chad ngas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[119a.3\]]gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag tu sems can rnams la chos bstan pa de'i bar du/_rigs kyi bu dag ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la sogs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yongs su brjod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[119a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/_rigs kyi bu dag ngas thabs mkhas pas chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa de dag sprul to/_/rigs kyi bu dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_sems can 'ongs shing lhags 
[\[119a.5\]]pa rnams kyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa la gzigs nas/_de dang de dag tu bdag gi ming brjod cing de dang de dag tu bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par brjod do/_/chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa mang pos de lta de lta bur sems can rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad do/_/
[\[119a.6\]]rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa tha dad pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mang ba rnams la 'di skad du/_dge slong dag nga ni na gzhon te/_mngon par byung ba dang dge slong dag nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[119a.7\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon no zhes gsung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yun ring mod kyi/_nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon no zhes gsungs te/_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]smin par bya ba dang gzud pa'i don ma gtogs par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag ma bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 
[\[119b.2\]]rnams gdul ba'i phyir tshig gang gsungs pa/_bdag las smos kyang rung gzhan las smos kyang rung /_bdag la dmigs kyang rung gzhan la dmigs kyang rung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas gang ci bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de dag thams cad ni bden pa de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[119b.3\]]gsungs pa ste/_'di la de bzhin gshegs pa la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas khams gsum pa skye ba med pa dang /_'chi ba med pa dang /_'chi 'pho ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'khor ba med pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan 'da' 
[\[119b.4\]]ba med pa dang /_byung ba ma yin pa dang /_ma byung ba ma yin pa dang /_yod pa ma yin pa dang /_med pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du ma yin pa dang /_gzhan du ma yin pa dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma yin pa dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma yin pa yang ma yin par yang dag 
[\[119b.5\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs shing /_ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bos mthong ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas khams gsum pa gzigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas 'di la mngon sum gyi chos dang ldan te bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can no/_/
[\[119b.6\]]de la de bzhin gshegs pas gang ci gsungs pa de dag thams cad bden te mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/yang sems can spyod pa tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa tha dad pa dang /_'du shes dang rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/_chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa mang 
[\[119b.7\]]po dmigs pa rnam pa mang pos bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad do/_/yun ring po de srid nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med do/_/de 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste rtag tu bzhugs mod kyi/_'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ston to/_/rigs kyi bu dag ngas da dung yang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 
[\[120a.2\]]tshe'i tshad du yang ma phyin te/_rigs kyi bu dag ngas da dung yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de nyis gyur gyis nga'i tshe'i tshad tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag ngas 'di ltar yongs su mya ngan las ni mi 'da' mod kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar smras so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[120a.3\]]rigs kyi bu dag ngas rnam grangs 'dis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/_nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar ha cang yang yun ring du 'dug cing rgyun du mthong na sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa/_bsod nams dang bral ba dbul por gyur pa 'dod pa la brkam 
[\[120a.4\]]pa/_ldongs pa/_lta ba mang po'i dra bas khebs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so snyam ste/_slebs par 'dzin pa'i 'du shes can du 'gyur zhing rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag dang nye'o zhes khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i 
[\[120a.5\]]phyir brtson 'grus mi rtsom zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dkon par 'du shes mi skyed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thabs mkhas pas/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'byung ba ni shin du rnyed par dka'o zhes tshig de skad gsung 
[\[120a.6\]]ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems can de dag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur yang srid mi 'gyur yang srid de/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir ngas de dag la dmigs pa byas te/_dge slong dag de bzhin 
[\[120a.7\]]gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pas/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'byung ba rab tu rnyed par dka' bar rig nas ngo mtshar du 'du shes skyed par 'gyur/_mya ngan gyi 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong na yang /_
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bas skom par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur pa'i don du rig nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' mod kyi sems 
[\[120b.2\]]can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang 'di skad du gsung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes 
[\[120b.3\]]bu sman pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_shin du byung ba 'ga' zhig yod la/_skyes bu de la yang bu mang po bcu'am nyi shu 'am sum cu'am bzhi bcu'am lnga bcu'am brgya 'am stong yod par gyur la/_sman pa de logs shig 
[\[120b.4\]]tu song ste de'i bu de dag thams cad dbyig dug 'thungs sam/_mda' dug 'thungs nas/_de rnams dbyig dug dang mda' dug de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag gis nyon mongs shing gdungs te sa la 'gre ldog la/_de nas de dag gi pha sman pa logs shig nas 'ongs 
[\[120b.5\]]nas/_bu de rnams dbyig dug gam mda' dug de'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag ste/_kha cig ni 'du shes log par gyur/_kha cig ni 'du shes ma log ste de dag thams cad sdug bsngal de nyid kyis nyam thag la pha de mthong nas mngon par dga' ste/_de la 'di skad ces yab bde 
[\[120b.6\]]zhing gnod pa mi mnga' ste legs par byon tam/_bdag cag gi lus 'jig par byed pa dbyig dug gam mda' dug 'di las yongs su dgrol bar gsol yab kyis bdag cag la srog stsal du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sman pa des bu de dag sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag ste/_
[\[120b.7\]]na bas nyon mongs shing gdungs te sa la 'gre ldog pa mthong nas/_des sman chen po kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa ro dang ldan pa bsdus nas rdo la btags te/_bu de dag 'thung du bcug nas 'di skad ces bu khyod rnams sman chen po kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa ro dang ldan pa 'di 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]'thung cig_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed sman bzang po 'di 'thungs na/_myur du dbyig dug gam mda' dug las thar te/_bde zhing nad med par 'gyur ro zhes smras na/_de nas sman pa de'i bu gang dag 'du shes ma log pa de dag ni sman de'i kha dog mthong dri snams ro myangs nas 
[\[121a.2\]]myur du 'thungs pa dang /_de dag nad thams cad las thams cad kyi thams cad du thar bar gyur to/_/de'i bu gang dag 'du shes log par gyur pa de dag gis pha de la mngon par bstod de/_'di skad du yab bde zhing gnod pa mi mnga' ste legs par byon tam/_bdag cag gsor gsol zhes 
[\[121a.3\]]tshig de skad smras te/_sman byin pa de mi 'thung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag 'du shes log par gyur pa des sman de'i kha dog kyang mi 'dod dri yang mi 'dod ro yang mi 'dod do/_/de nas skyes bu sman pa des 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gi bu 'di dag dbyig dug gam mda' 
[\[121a.4\]]dug des 'du shes log par gyur pas sman 'di yang 'thung du ma rung ste nga la ni mngon par bstod na/_bdag gis bu 'di dag la thabs mkhas pas sman 'di blud do snyam mo/_/de nas sman pa de bu de dag la thabs mkhas pas sman blud par 'dod nas 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag nga ni rgas 'khogs 
[\[121a.5\]]gtugs te/_nga'i 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas kyis bu khyed rnams mya ngan ma byed cig_/mi bde bar ma gyur cig_/sman chen po byin pa 'di khyed 'dod na sman 'di 'thung shig ces smras te/_bu de dag la thabs mkhas pas de skad bsgo nas/_yul gzhan du song ste phyin nas bdag shi'o zhes bu 
[\[121a.6\]]nad pa de dag thos par byas pa dang /_de dag de'i tshe shin du mya ngan du gyur/_shin du smre sngags 'don par gyur te/_bdag cag gi pha mgon po skyed pa/_rjes su snying brtse ba gcig pu de yang shi bas/_de'i phyir da bdag cag mgon med par gyur to snyam mo/_/de dag bdag nyid mgon med 
[\[121a.7\]]par mthong bdag nyid skyabs med par mthong nas phyir zhing mya ngan byed pas gzir bar gyur te/_de dag phyir zhing mya ngan byed pas gzir ba des 'du shes log pa 'du shes ma log par gyur te/_sman gang kha dog dang dri dang ror ldan pa de yang kha dog dang dri dang ror ldan par shes nas de nas de'i tshe 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]de 'thungs so/_/de 'thungs nas nad de las thar bar gyur to/_/de nas sman pa des bu de dag nad sos par rig nas slar bdag nyid bstan na/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_sman pa thabs mkhas pa byed pa de la la la dag de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra'o zhes zer ram/_gsol pa bcom 
[\[121b.2\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du nga yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod 
[\[121b.3\]]kyi/_ngas skabs skabs su thabs mkhas pa 'di lta bu dag sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir bstan te/_gnas der nga la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das don gyi rnam pa 'di nyid rgyas par ston cing /_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[121b.4\]]bskal pa bye stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/de yi tshad ni nam yang med pa nas/_/byang chub mchog rab 'di ni ngas thob ste/_/nga ni rtag tu chos kyang rab 'chad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang 'di yang dag gzung /_/sangs rgyas ye shes la ni de dag dgod/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[121b.5\]]mtha' yas pa/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por smin par bya/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sa yang bstan byas te/_/sems can rnam par gdul phyir thabs brjod do/_de tshe nga ni mya ngan mi 'da' ste/_/'di nyid na ni chos rnams rab ston to/_/de na nga bdag nyid kyang byin gyis brlab/_/nga yis sems can 
[\[121b.6\]]kun kyang byin gyis brlab/_/log pa'i blo ldan blun po'i mi rnams kyis/_/'di na nga 'dug pa yang mi mthong ngo /_/nga lus yongs su mya ngan 'das mthong nas/_/ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa rnam mang byed/_/nga ma mthong bas de dag sred pa skyed/_/de nas de dag sems kyang drang por 'gyur/_/
[\[121b.7\]]nam zhig de dag 'jam zhing mnyen drang ste/_/sems can lus kyang btang bar gyur pa na/_/de na nga yi nyan thos dge 'dun byas/_/bya rgod phung por nga nyid der bstan te/_/de la nga yis phyis ni 'di skad smras/_/'di nyid na ste mya ngan nga ma 'das/_/dge slong gang dag de ni nga thabs mkhas/_/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]yang yang nga 'byung 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du/_/sems can gzhan gyi nga ni mdun du byas/_/de la byang chub mchog 'di rab tu bshad/_/'jig mgon mya ngan ma 'das ma rtogs par/_/khyod kyis nga yi sgra yang mi thos so/_/sems can rnam par 'jig par ngas mthong yang /_/
[\[122a.2\]]ngas ni bdag gi lus nyid ma bstan te/_/re shig nga mthong bar ni 'dod byos la/_/skom par gyur nas dam pa'i chos bshad do/_/rtag tu nga yi byin rlabs de 'dra ste/_/bskal pa bsam yas bye ba stong du ni/_/bya rgod phung po 'di las mi 'pho yang /_/gud na bye ba snyed kyi mal cha yod/_/gang tshe 
[\[122a.3\]]'jig rten khams 'di sems can gyis/_/bskal pas sreg par mthong zhing rtog pa na/_/de tshe nga yi sangs rgyas zhing 'di ni/_/lha dang mi yis yongs su gang bar 'gyur/_/de dag rtse zhing dga' ba sna tshogs ldan/_/skyed mos khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhal med bye ba yod/_/rin chen ri bo rnams dang 
[\[122a.4\]]de bzhin du/_/me tog 'bras ldan shing ljon rnams kyis brgyan/_/steng nas lha rnams rnga chen rab tu rdung /_/man dA ra yi char yang shin tu 'babs/_/mkhas pa gzhan gang byang chub 'dir zhugs dang /_/nga dang nyan thos rnams la mngon par 'thor/_/nga yi zhing 'di de ltar rtag gnas kyang /_/
[\[122a.5\]]gzhan dag 'di la bskal pas sreg par rtog_/mya ngan brgya yis gang zhig gtses pa dang /_/'jig rten khams ni shin du 'jig par mthong /_/lo mang bye bar de bzhin gshegs rnams dang /_/chos dang nga yi dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyis/_/ming ni nam yang thos par mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[122a.6\]]sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu de 'dra'o/_/nam zhig sems can 'jam zhing mnyen pa rnams/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'dir ni skyes gyur te/_/dge ba'i las kyis de ltar skyes ma thag_/nga ni chos rnams rab tu 'chad par mthong /_/de dag la ni nam yang nga mi 'chad/_/bya ba 'di 'dra mtha' yas 
[\[122a.7\]]'di dag ste/_/de yis yun ring nas ni nga mthong ngo /_/de la rgyal ba shin du rnyed dkar bshad/_nga yi ye shes stobs ni 'di 'dra ste/_/de ni shin du 'od gsal mtha' yong med/_/nga yi tshe ring bskal pa mtha' yas te/_/de ni sngon gyi spyod pa spyad pas bsgrubs/_/mkhas rnams 'di la som nyi ma 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]byed par/_/the tshom za ba rnams ni ma lus spongs/_/ngas ni tshig de yang dag rab smras te/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni nga las gzhar mi 'byung /_/dper na thabs bslabs pa yi sman pa des/_/'du shes log par gyur pa'i bu rnams phyir/_/bdag nyid ma shi bzhin du shi zhes brjod/_/de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra 
[\[122b.2\]]snyam du mkhas pas rig_/de bzhin nga yang rang 'byung 'jig rten pha/_/skye dgu kun gyi gso byed mgon po ste/_/byis pa gti mug log par rnam rig nas/_/mya ngan ma 'das mya ngan 'da' bar bstan/_/ci phyir zhe na rtag par nga mthong na/_/mi shes ma rig pa rnams le lor 'gyur/_/'dod pa la yang 
[\[122b.3\]]bag med yid rton te/_/bag med rgyu yis ngan 'gro rab tu ltung /_/spyod dang spyod pa rig nas rtag par yang /_/ci nas byang chub la ni dgod pa dang /_/ci nas sangs rgyas chos rnams thob bya'i phyir/_/sems can rnams la nga ni de bzhin smra/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las de bzhin gshegs 
[\[122b.4\]]pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bco lnga pa'o//_//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa bshad pa na/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 
[\[122b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de stong du bsgres pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[122b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis gzungs thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems 
[\[122b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis bye ba brgya stong du yongs su bsgyur ba'i gzungs thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis/_chos 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang stong bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos 
[\[123a.2\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba brgyad kyis thogs par gyur to/_/byang chub 
[\[123a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gling bzhi pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba bzhis thogs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[123a.4\]]gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gsum gyis thogs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gnyis 
[\[123a.5\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gnyis kyis thogs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[123a.6\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 
[\[123a.7\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la chos mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas bstan ma thag tu/_de'i mod la steng gi nam mkha' bar 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]snang las/_me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab ste/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag na/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la 'thor mngon 
[\[123b.2\]]par rab tu 'thor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang seng ge'i khri 
[\[123b.3\]]la bzhugs pa la yang 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang /_'khor bzhi po de dag la yang 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/_/bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang a ga ru'i phye ma yang rab tu bab po/_/steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang 
[\[123b.4\]]las rnga dag kyang ma brdungs par yid du 'ong ba snyan cing 'jam pa'i sgra 'byin to/_/steng nas lha'i ras bcos bu zung brgya stong dag kyang ltung ngo /_/steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rgyan phreng dang /_se mo do dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che chen po dag kyang 
[\[123b.5\]]phyogs thams cad du kun nas rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/rin thang med pa'i bdug pa'i pog phor rin po che las byas pa brgya stong dag kyang kun nas rang rgyu'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang rin po che'i gdugs kyi phreng ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa/_steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la byang
