[\[123b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dzin to/_/rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa de dag thams cad la yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rin po che'i gdugs kyi phreng ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa steng gi nam 
[\[123b.7\]]mkha' bar snang la 'dzin to/_/so so nas tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par sangs rgyas la bstod pa dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mngon par bstod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]to/_/bde bar gshegs pas ngo mtshar chos bsgrags pa/_/'dren pa rnams kyi mthu chen ci 'dra dang /_/ji ltar sku tshe'i tshad kyang mtha' yas pa/_/bdag cag rnams kyis 'di sngon yong ma thos/_/bde bar gshegs pas mngon du rnam phye ba/_/'di 
[\[124a.2\]]'dra'i chos de de ring thos pas na/_/srog chags bye ba stong rnams dga' bas khyab/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren gyi thugs sras ni/_/kha cig mi ldog byang chub mchog la 'khod/_/kha cig gzungs rnams kyi ni mchog la gnas/_/kha cig spobs pa thogs pa med la 'khod/_/
[\[124a.3\]]kha cig bye ba stong gi gzungs la gnas/_/de bzhin gzhan yang zhing rdul phra rab rnyed/_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la gnas/_/de bzhin kha cig skye ba brgyad kyis na/_/mtha' yas gzigs pa rgyal ba rnams su 'gyur/_/rnam par 'dren pa'i chos 'di thos nas 
[\[124a.4\]]su/_/kha cig skye ba bzhi las rab tu 'das/_/gzhan dag kha cig gsum dang gnyis kyis na/_/don dam gzigs pa byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/kha cig de na skye ba gcig gnas nas/_/srid pa gzhan la thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur/_/'dren pa'i sku tshe'i tshad 'di thos pas 
[\[124a.5\]]na/_/'bras bu zag med de 'dra rab tu thob/_/sems can bye ba gang rnams chos thos nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' la ni sems bskyed pa/_/zhing brgyad dag gi phra rab rdul snyed de/_/bgrangs na dpag mi lang ba de snyed do/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab bstan pas/_/mtha' 
[\[124a.6\]]yas gang la tshad kyang ma mchis pa/_/nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu ma mchis te/_/drang srong chen pos de 'dra'i phrin las mdzad/_/man dA ra ba'i char pa rab tu 'bab/_/lha yi bu dag bye stong mang po dang /_/brgya byin tshangs pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/zhing stong bye ba dag nas 
[\[124a.7\]]de dag lhags/_/tsan dan dang ni spos mchog phye ma dang /_/a ga ru yi phye mas 'thor bzhin du/_/nam mkha' la ni bya bzhin rab rgyu zhing /_/rgyal ba'i dbang po la yang tshul bzhin 'thor/_/steng gi nam mkha' las ni rnga rnams kyang /_/ma brdungs par ni sgra snyan nyid las 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]grag_/lha ras bcos bu bye ba stong rnams kyang /_/'dren pa rnams la bskor zhing 'thor bar bgyid/_/bdug pa rin thang ma mchis ri ba yi/_/rin chen pog phor bye ba stong rnams kyang /_/skyob pa 'jig rten bdag po mchod slad du/_/de na kun du bdag nyid rab tu rgyu/_/
[\[124b.2\]]gdugs rnams bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/_/rin chen dag las bgyis pa mtho zhing che/_/phal chen tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar thug pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'di dag 'dzin/_/rgyal ba'i ba dan blta sdug bcas pa yi/_/'dren pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[124b.3\]]rab tu btsugs/_/bde gshegs sras rnams rab tu sems dga' bas/_/tshigs su bcad pa stong gis mngon par bstod/_/de 'dra ngo mtshar khyad 'phags rmad byung ba/_/sna tshogs 'di dag 'dren pa de ring gda'/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni nges par bstan mdzad pas/_/sems 
[\[124b.4\]]can 'di kun rab tu dga' ba thob/_/phyogs bcu dag na de ring don rgya che/_/'dren pa rnams kyi gsung yang mngon par 'phags/_/srog chags bye ba stong rnams tshim par gyur/_/byang chub phyir ni dge ba rnams dang ldan/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[124b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_sems can gang dag gis sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig mos pa bskyed dam/_mngon par dad na rigs 
[\[124b.6\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_de dag bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur ba de bshad do/_/ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la bla na 
[\[124b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod de/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/_ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[125a.2\]]'di thos nas/_sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig mos pa bskyed dam mngon par dad na de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa 'di la/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang ldan pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad du yongs su rdzogs par bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa 
[\[125a.3\]]dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_
[\[125a.4\]]grangs su yang char yang bgrang bar yang dper yang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/ma pham pa de lta bu'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/_phyir ldog pa de ni gnas med do/_/de 
[\[125a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/_/ye shes 'di ni tshol ba'i phyir/_/gang gis pha rol phyin pa lnga/_/yi dam bcas nas der zhugs te/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag kyang /_/brgyad du [(]chang [,]tshang [)]bar 
[\[125a.6\]]rab tu sbyor/_/phyi phyir nyan thos rnams dang ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dang /_/rang sangs rgyas ni mang po la/_/bza' bca' zas dang skom rnams dang /_/gos dang mal chas mgu bar byed/_/gnas dang gtsug lag khang 
[\[125a.7\]]rnams kyang /_/tsan dan las ni 'dir byas dang /_/kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' dang /_/'chag sa mdzes par byas pa rnams/_/sbyin pa sna tshogs rnam pa mang /_/de lta bu yi sbyin 'dir byin/_/bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du/_/byin nas byang chub phyir yang bsngos/_/sangs 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]rgyas ye shes ched kyi phyir/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags dag cing /_/ma nyams yang dag bstod pa yi/_/tshul khrims phyir zhing srung bar byed/_/phyir zhing bzod pa sgom par byed/_/'dul ba'i sa la rab tu gnas/_/brtan dang ldan zhing dran dang ldan/_/kha ngan 
[\[125b.2\]]mang po bzod par byed/_/dmigs pa can gyi sems can dag_/nga rgyal dag la rab gnas pas/_/smad pa byas pa de dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes phyir bzod do/_/brtson 'grus la ni rtag tu 'bad/_/dran pa brtan zhing mngon par brtson/_/yid la gzhan du rtog pa 
[\[125b.3\]]med/_/bskal pa bye bar de bzhin gyur/_/dgon pa'i gnas na rab tu 'dug_/'chag sar mngon par song nas su/_/gnyid dang rmugs pa rab spangs te/_/bskal pa bye bar de dag spyod/_/bsam gtan bsam gtan chen po pa/_/bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam 
[\[125b.4\]]par gzhag_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad/_/de las mi nyung bsam gtan byed/_/dpa' bo de ni bsam gtan des/_/thams cad mkhyen par bdag bsgyur zhes/_/byang chub dam pa don du gnyer/_/bsam gtan dag gi pha rol song /_/bskal pa bye ba phrag 
[\[125b.5\]]stong du/_/bya ba 'di la rab gnas pa'i/_/de dag bsod nams gang yin pa/_/gang sngar yongs su bsgrags pa bas/_/skyes pa rnams sam bud med dag_/gang gis nga yi tshe thos nas/_/skad cig dad par byed pa yang /_/bsod nams de ni mtha' yas so/_/
[\[125b.6\]]g.yo ba dang ni rlom sems dang /_/the tshom dag kyang rnam spangs te/_/yud tsam shin tu mos pa yang /_/de yi 'bras bu 'di 'dra'o/_/bskal pa bye bar spyod pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa/_/nga tshe bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/'di thos de dag mi spang ngo /_/spyi 
[\[125b.7\]]bo yis kyang phyag 'tshal te/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dus na yang /_/bdag cag 'di 'drar rab gyur cig_/srog chags bye ba bsgral bar bgyi/_/ji ltar mgon po shAkya thub/_/thub chen shAkya seng ge yis/_/byang chub snying por bzhugs nas su/_/seng ge'i sgra 'di bsgrags 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]pa ltar/_/bdag kyang ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/_/lus chen kun gyis bkur sti zhing /_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/_/'di lta bu yi chos bshad do/_/mi gang thos pa 'dzin gyur zhing /_/lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs/_/ldem por dgongs te bshad 
[\[126a.2\]]zhes pa/_/de dag rnams ni the tshom med/_/ma pham pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'bab pa dang 'jug pa dang khong du chud pa de ni de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches dpag 
[\[126a.3\]]tu med pa skyed na/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam/_sgrogs sam/_'dzin tam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_glegs bam la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[126a.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me dang /_mar gyi mar me dang /_spos mar gyi mar me dag gis bsti stang byed dam bsti stang byed du 'jug pa lta ci smos te/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do/_/
[\[126a.5\]]ma pham pa gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed pa de'i tshe/_de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di yin par rig par bya ste/_'di lta ste nga bya rgod kyi 
[\[126a.6\]]phung po'i ri la 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na 'dug cing chos ston par mthong ba dang /_nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten 
[\[126a.7\]]gyi khams mi mjed 'di gzhi bai dUr+ya las grub cing mnyam par gnas la/_gser skud mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres shing rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis rnam par bkra bar mthong ba dang /_'di na yongs su spyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' dag 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]gnas par mthong ba ste/_ma pham pa 'di ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/_/ma pham pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_gang dag chos kyi rnam 
[\[126b.2\]]grangs 'di thos na mi spong ba'i steng du rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bur ngas bshad na/_gang 'dzin pa dang klog pa lta ci smos te de ni de bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs pa yin no/_/ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[126b.3\]]glegs bam du byas shing phrag pa la thogs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des nga'i mchod rten bya mi dgos/_gtsug lag khang bya mi dgos/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dag sbyin mi dgos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma pham pa rigs kyi 
[\[126b.4\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des nga'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas pa yin/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa kho ra khor yug tu ni rim bzhin du gdugs yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa lha'i ba dan dang bcas pa dril bu'i sgra gsal 
[\[126b.5\]]bar 'byung ba dag byas pa yin no/_/sku gdung gi mchod rten de dag la lha dang /_mi'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnam pa 
[\[126b.6\]]mang po dag gis bkur sti rnam pa mang po byas pa yin no/_/yid du 'ong ba snyan cing gsal ba'i sgra dang /_rnga bo che rnam pa mang po dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rnam pa tha dad pa'i glu dang /_gar dang /_bzhad gad dang /_rol mo rnam pa mang po tshad med pas/_
[\[126b.7\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa mang por bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang /_bklags pa dang /_yi ger bri ba dang /_rab tu ston pa des nga'i phyir tsan dan dmar po'i gtsug 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]lag khang rgya chen po yangs pa mthon po/_khang [{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]ma cu rtsa gnyis yod pa brgyad rtsegs/_dge slong stong gi gnas kun dga' ra ba dang /_me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/_'chag sa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa/_mal stan dang bcas pa/_bza' 
[\[127a.2\]]ba dang bca' ba dang /_zas dang skom dang /_na ba'i gsos sman gyis yongs su gang ba/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag byas par gyur to/_/de dag mang zhing dpag tu med de/_brgya'am stong ngam/_stong phrag brgya'am/_bye ba'am/_bye ba brgya'am/_bye 
[\[127a.3\]]ba stong ngam/_bye ba brgya stong ngam/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag nga'i mdun du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phul te/_de dag kyang ngas yongs su spyad par rig par bya'o/_/ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[127a.4\]]'dzin tam/_klog gam/_ston tam/_yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug kyang rung ste/_rnam grangs 'dis des nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten dag bya mi dgos so/_/dge 'dun la mchod pa bya mi dgos so zhes nga de skad 'chad na/_ma pham pa gang 
[\[127a.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_sbyin pa sgrub pa 'am/_tshul khrims sam/_bzod pa'am/_brtson 'grus sam/_bsam gtan nam/_shes rab sgrub pa lta ci smos te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches dpag tu med pa grangs med 
[\[127a.6\]]pa mtha' yas pa skyed pa lta ci smos/_ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i khams ni shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_steng dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams su yang mu med pa de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod 
[\[127a.7\]]nams mngon par 'du byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_ston tam/_yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bsti stang bya 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]ba'i phyir mngon par brtson pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi bsngags pa smra ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su brjod cing gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa yin no/_/
[\[127b.2\]]bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i chos can dang 'grogs na bde ba dang /_bzod pa can dang /_dul ba dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_khro ba yid la byed pa dang bral ba dang /_gnod sems med pa yid la byed pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang 
[\[127b.3\]]mthu dang ldan pa yin/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/_bsam gtan pa yin/_nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len pa yin/_nang du yang dag 'jog mang du byed pa dang 'dri bar rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin/_'dri ba bye ba 
[\[127b.4\]]khrag khrig brgya stong gi lan ldon pa yin no/_/ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i yon tan dag ni gang dag ngas yongs su brjod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 
[\[127b.5\]]yin no/_/ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de byang chub kyi snying por yang dag par zhugs te/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yin par 
[\[127b.6\]]rig par bya'o/_/ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gang na 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag pa der ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir mchod rten brtsig go/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten yin no zhes de la brjod par 
[\[127b.7\]]bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mi mgon mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/bsod nams phung po mu med par/_/nga yis yang dang yang du bsngags/_/des ni nga la mchod pa byas/_/ring 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]bsrel gyi ni mchod rten yang /_/rin chen byas pa sna tshogs pa/_/blta na sdug cing mdzes rnams byas/_/'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mnyam/_/gdugs phreng rnams dang rab tu ldan/_/kho ra yug ldan dpal can te/_/rnam rgyal ba dan rnams dang ldan/_/
[\[128a.2\]]dril bu gsal ba'i sgra 'byung ste/_/dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin dril bu rlung bskyod pas/_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel shin tu mdzes/_/spos dang me tog byug pa dang /_/gos dang rol mo'i sgra rnams dang /_/rnga rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang /_/de dag mchod pa rgya chen 
[\[128a.3\]]byas/_/rol mo sgra snyan cha byad rnams/_/ring bsrel de la brdungs shing gsil/_/spos dang 'bru mar mar me rnams/_/de dag la ni kun nas phul/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di bzung zhing /_/zad pa'i dus la ston pa yis/_/des ni mchod pa rnam mang po/_/de 'dra mtha' yas nga la byas/_/
[\[128a.4\]]gtsug lag khang mang bye ba dag_/tsan dan las ni byas pa yin/_/khang [{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]ma cu rtsa gnyis te/_/de dag 'phang du brgyad rtseg go/_/mal cha dag gis nye bar brtan/_/bza' bca' rnams kyang tshogs par ldan/_/yol ba bzang po rab tu bshams/_/gnas rnams kyang ni rnam 
[\[128a.5\]]par stong /_/me tog kun dgas mdzes byas pa'i/_/kun dga' dag dang 'chag sa byin/_/gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/gding g.yogs mang po de bzhin no/_/rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa des/_/nga yi mdun du dge 'dun la/_/mchod pa 
[\[128a.6\]]mang po byas pa yin/_/mos pa snying por gang gyur te/_/gang zhig mdo 'di klog pa 'am/_/yi ger 'dri bar byed pa ste/_/de bas bsod nams mang du thob/_/mi 'ga' la las glegs bam la/_/shin tu nges tshig 'drir bcug ste/_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa yis/_/glegs 
[\[128a.7\]]bam de la mchod pa byed/_/spos kyi 'bru mar bkang ba yi/_/mar me rtag tu su 'bul zhing /_/sna ma ud pal sil ma dang /_/tsam pa kas kyang rab tu gtor/_/glegs bam dag la 'di 'dra ba'i/_/mchod pa byed pa'i mi de ni/_/bsod nams mang po rab 'phel te/_/de la 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]tshad kyang yong med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad/_/phyogs bcu dag ni thams cad du/_/rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/_/bsod nams phung po 'di de 'dra/_/bzod cing dul te mnyam par gzhag_/tshul khrims ldan zhing bsam gtan pa/_/yang dag nang 'jog spyod 
[\[128b.2\]]yul can/_/de 'dra ba lta smos ci dgos/_/khro ba med cing phra ma med/_/mchod rten dag la gus par gnas/_/dge slong rnams la'ang rtag tu 'dud/_/nga rgyal med cing le lo med/_/shes rab ldan zhing bde bzhin brtan/_/dri ba dris na mi khro ste/_/snying rje blo yis srog chags 
[\[128b.3\]]la/_/rjes su 'thun par rab tu ston/_/gang zhig de 'drar gyur nas su/_/mdo 'di yang ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de yi bsod nams phung po ni/_/tshad kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo 'di 'dzin par byed pa yi/_/de lta bu yi chos smra ba/_/gal te mi 'gas mthong na yang /_/de la 
[\[128b.4\]]shin tu bkur sti bya/_/lha yi me tog rnams kyis de la gtor/_/lha yi gos rnams kyis kyang mngon par dgab/_/de yi rkang par mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/de la de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes skyed/_/de mthong nas ni de tshe 'di snyam du/_/de ni shing ljon drung du 'gror 'gyur 
[\[128b.5\]]te/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir/_/bla med byang chub zhing 'tshang rgya snyam bsam/_/mdo sde 'di las tshigs bcad gcig brjod cing /_/de 'dra'i mkhas de gang na 'chag pa 'am/_/gang na 'greng ngam 'on te 'dug pa 'am/_/dpa' bo gang du nyal bar byed pa'ang 
[\[128b.6\]]rung /_/der ni 'dren pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi/_/ched du skyes bu dam pa'i mchod rten ni/_/blta na sdug pa sna tshogs byed du gzhug_/de bzhin der ni mchod pa sna tshogs byas/_/gang na sangs rgyas bu de 'dug pa yi/_/sa phyogs de ni nga yis yongs su spyad/_/ngas ni de 
[\[128b.7\]]nyid du yang 'chag pa byas/_/de nyid du yang nga ni 'dug par gyur/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las bsod nams kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa thos nas rjes su yi rang na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed 
[\[129a.2\]]par 'gyur/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/dpa' chen mya ngan 'das nas gang /_/mdo 'di 'dra ba nyan pa dang /_/thos nas rjes su yi rang ba/_/de yi dge ba ci tsam 'gyur/_de 
[\[129a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge 
[\[129a.4\]]bsnyen ma'am skyes bu mkhas pa'am gzhon nu'am gzhon nu ma gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa nyan cing thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang la chos nyan pa de nas song ste/_gtsug lag khang na 'dug gam khyim na 'dug gam dgon pa na 'dug gam srang na 'dug gam grong na 
[\[129a.5\]]'dug gam ljongs na 'dug kyang rung ste/_rgyu de dag dang byed rgyu de dag dang chos de ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar zin pa bzhin du ci nus kyis/_pha'am ma'am nye du'am yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'am 'dris pa'am gzhan gang yang rung ste/_sems can pha rol la bstan nas 
[\[129a.6\]]des de thos te/_rjes su yi rang la rjes su yi rang nas kyang gzhan la smras te/_des kyang de thos nas rjes su yi rang la des kyang gzhan la smras te/_des kyang de thos nas rjes su yi rang la de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de lnga bcu pa la thug na/_ma pham 
[\[129a.7\]]pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa/_rjes su yi rang ba lnga bcu pa'i mir gyur pa gang yin pa/_ma pham pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de/_ngas bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhin sems can 'khod cing yod pa 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa/_sgo nga las skyes pa'am/_mngal nas skyes pa'am/_drod gsher las skyes pa'am brdzus 
[\[129b.2\]]te skyes pa'am/_gzugs can nam/_gzugs med pa'am/_'du shes can nam/_'du shes med pa'am/_'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/_rkang med dam/_rkang gnyis pa'am/_rkang bzhi pa'am/_rkang [{]mangs sam[,]mang ngam[}]/_sems can ji tsam sems can gyi 
[\[129b.3\]]khams su bsdus shing /_yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams/_mi bsod nams 'dod pa/_phan par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig byung bas/_sems can gyi tshogs [(]da [,]de [)]la 'dod pa'i rtsed mo dang dga' ba'i longs spyod sdug pa mdzes pa gces pa yid du 'ong ba dag byin la/_'dod pa'i 
[\[129b.4\]]rtsed mo la dga' ba yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir sems can re re la yang 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ba byin te/_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rta'i shing rta dang /_glang gi shing rta dang /_
[\[129b.5\]]glang po che'i shing rta dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khang pa yang byin te/_ma pham pa rnam grangs 'dis sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi des lo brgyad cu tshang bar sbyin pa byin la/_ma pham pa de nas sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[129b.6\]]sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag gis rtsen du bcug dga' bar byas bde bar gsos na/_sems can 'di dag mgo skya zhing gnyer mas gang ste/_na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas rgas te/_'chi ba'i dus byed par yang nye bar gyur na bdag gis 'di dag de bzhin 
[\[129b.7\]]gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu btsud de rjes su bstan to snyam nas/_ma pham pa de nas mi des sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag par btsud de/_yang dag par btsud nas 'dzin du bcug la/_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]sems can de dag gis kyang chos de mnyan te thos nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la 'dus te thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa nas/_zag pa zad pa bsam gtan pa bsam gtan 
[\[130a.2\]]pa chen po rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa'i bar du gyur na/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po'i mi de gzhi de las bsod nams mang po dpag tu med grangs med pa skyed dam/_de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[130a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po'i mi de sems can de snyed la bde 
[\[130a.4\]]ba'i yo byad thams cad stsal ba'i slad du rgyu des kyang bsod nams mang du skyed na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i gong du dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[130a.5\]]po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ma pham pa khyod mos par bya khong du chud par bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi gang gis/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi'i sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad 
[\[130a.6\]]thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod nas bsod nams skyed la/_gang yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa lnga bcu par gyur pa'i mi des/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/_tshig gcig tsam thos te rjes 
[\[130a.7\]]su yi rang na/_gang mi de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/_sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi de'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bas gang mi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]pa'i lnga bcu pa'i mis/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig thos nas rjes su yi rang ba ni ches mang ste/_ma pham pa rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i mdun na/_snga ma'i 
[\[130b.2\]]sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi char yang brgya stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba stong gi char yang bye ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[130b.3\]]stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_bgrang bar yang char yang grangs su yang dper yang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/ma pham pa de ltar lnga bcu pa'i mi de tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig la rjes su yi rang ba yang /_bsod nams 'di snyed 
[\[130b.4\]]skyed na ma pham pa gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan te thos nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos te/_ma pham pa de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ni [(]chas [,]ches [)]dpag tu med ches grangs med ces ngas bshad do/_/ma pham pa yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[130b.5\]]gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/_bdag gi khyim nas byung ste/_gtsug lag khang du song la/_de phyin nas der 'greng ngam 'dug ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yud tsam mnyan na/_sems can de bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de tsam byas shing bsags 
[\[130b.6\]]pas/_de tshe rjes nas lus phyi ma dang bdag gi ngo bo phyi ma thob pa la glang gi shing rta 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rta'i shing rta dang /_glang po che'i shing rta dang /_khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang /_gru'i bzhon pa dang /_khyu mchog gi bzhon pa dang /_lha'i gzhal med khang thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[130b.7\]]gal te yang mdo'i chos sgrog pa der yud tsam zhig 'dug ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam pha rol 'dug tu bcug gam sems can gzhan la stan bgos na/_bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa des/_brgya byin gyi stan dang /_tshangs pa'i stan dang /_'khor los 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]sgyur ba'i seng ge'i khri thob par 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las mi gzhan zhig la 'di skad du/_kye mi khyod tshur shog_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon cig ces smras la/_mi 
[\[131a.2\]]de yang spro ba rnyed nas gal te yud tsam zhig mnyan na sems can de spro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa des/_gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa 'thob po/_/blun por mi 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rno zhing shes 
[\[131a.3\]]rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs brgya stong du yang kha rul cing mnam par mi 'gyur/_de la lce nad med par 'gyur/_kha nad med par 'gyur/_so sngon por mi 'gyur/_so mi mnyam pa med pa dang /_so mi ser ba dang /_so gyed 'dums med pa dang /_so sngo ba med pa 
[\[131a.4\]]dang /_so byung ba med pa dang /_so yo ba med par 'gyur ro/_/mchu 'phyang du mi 'gyur/_mchu nang du song ba ma yin pa dang /_mchu log pa med pa dang /_mchu sho rer ma gyur pa dang /_mchu yo ba med pa dang /_mchu gnag pa med pa dang /_mchu mi sdug pa med par 'gyur 
[\[131a.5\]]ro/_/sna leb leb por mi 'gyur/_sna yon por mi 'gyur ro/_/gdong ring por mi 'gyur/_gdong yon por mi 'gyur/_gdong nag por mi 'gyur/_gdong blta na mi sdug par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa 'di ltar lce dang so dang /_mchu srab cing shin tu legs par 'gyur/_
[\[131a.6\]]sna che ba dang /_bzhin gyi dbyibs legs pa dang /_smin ma legs pa dang /_dpral ba'i dbyes che bar 'gyur/_dpe byad rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[131a.7\]]'das rnams dang yang myur du phrad par 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa ltos/_sems can gcig spro bar byas pas kyang /_bsod nams de tsam skyed na gang gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan tam/_bsti stang du byas te klog gam/_bsti stang du byas te ston tam/_bsti stang 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]du byas te rab tu 'chad pa lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa lnga bcu pa/_/gang gis mdo 'di'i tshigs bcad gcig mnyan te/_/thos nas sems dang rjes su yi rang ba'i/_/
[\[131b.2\]]bsod nams ji snyed 'byung ba de nyon cig_/gal te sbyin byed mi zhig byung gyur te/_/rtag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig la/_/gang sngar nga yis dpe byas de dag rnams/_/de kun lo yang brgyad cu tshim par byas/_/mgo la skra dkar gnyer ma kun byung ste/_/de dag rgal nyer 
[\[131b.3\]]gnas des mthong nas/_/kye ma sems can nyon mongs 'di dag kun/_/chos kyis 'di dag rab tu bstan par bya/_/de yis de rnams la ni phyis chos smras/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i sa yang rab tu bshad/_/srid pa thams cad dbu ba smig rgyu 'dra/_/srid pa kun la myur du yid byung 
[\[131b.4\]]byos/_/sbyin pa byed pa'i mi de'i gan nas su/_/sems can de dag kun gyis chos thos nas/_/zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin par/_/dus gcig du na dgra bcom thob gyur kyang /_/gang zhig brgyud de tshigs bcad gcig thos shing /_/rjes su yi rang bsod nams ji snyed pa/_/
[\[131b.5\]]de yi bsod nams de bas ches mang ste/_/bsod nams phung po snga mas char mi phod/_/gang gis brgyud de tshigs bcad gcig thos pa/_/de ltar de yi bsod nams mang gyur te/_/de dag mtha' yas tshad kyang yong med na/_/mngon sum thos pa de ni smos ci dgos/_/gang der 
[\[131b.6\]]sems can gcig la 'ang smras pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du mar yang /_/mdo 'di yang ni shin tu rnyed dka' yis/_/song ste chos nyon ces ni spro bar byas/_/sems can de dag de yis spro byas nas/_/mdo 'di yang ni yud tsam nyan byed pa/_/de yi las kyi 'bras bu mnyan 
[\[131b.7\]]par gyis/_/nam yang de la kha yi nad med 'gyur/_/de yi lce yang na bar gzhar mi 'gyur/_/de yi so rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sngon po ser po mi 'thun gzhar mi 'gyur/_/mchu mi sdug par yang ni yong mi 'gyur/_/de gdong yo 'am skam zhing ring ba med/_/nam yang sna 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]leb tu ni yong mi 'gyur/_/so dang mchu dang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_/de yi sna dang dpral ba'i dbyibs kyang legs/_/mi rnams kyis ni blta na sdug par 'gyur/_/de yi kha ni rul bar gzhar mi 'gyur/_/ud pal bzhin du rtag tu dri zhim pa/_/de yi kha 
[\[132a.2\]]nas dri yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dpa' bo khyim nas gtsug lag khang du song /_/mdo sde nyan pa'i phyir ni der song ste/_/song nas der ni yud tsam des chos mnyan/_/dad pa'i sems kyi 'bras bu mnyan par gyis/_/de yi lus ni shin tu dkar bar 'gyur/_/brtan pa de ni rta yi 
[\[132a.3\]]shing rtas 'gro/_/glang chen shing rta mthon por 'dug nas su/_/rin po che yis brgyan pa zhon zhing 'chag_/shin tu sbud pa'i khyogs kyang des thob nas/_/de dag du ma mi yis bteg cing bkur/_/chos nyan phyir ni song ba gyur pa de'i/_/'bras bu dge ba 'di 'drar 'gyur ba 
[\[132a.4\]]yin/_/de ni 'khor gyi nang der 'dug nas su/_/dkar po'i las rnams byas pa de dag gis/_/tshangs pa'i stan dang rgyal po'i stan rnams dang /_/brgya byin stan rnams kyang ni des thob 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams bstan 
[\[132a.5\]]pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//bam po bcu gcig pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rgyun du brtson la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am 
[\[132a.6\]]klog pa'am ston pa'am yi ger 'dri ba yang rung ste/_rigs kyi bu de mig gi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/sna'i yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/lus 
[\[132a.7\]]kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/de yon tan brgya phrag mang pos dbang po drug gi grong yongs su dag cing /_shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de'i pha dang ma las byung ba'i sha'i mig tha mal pa de ltar yongs 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]su dag pa'i/_mig gi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang dang brag dang nags stug por bcas pa dang 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po la thug pa yan chad/_steng du srid pa'i rtse mor thug pa'i bar du de dag thams cad mthong 
[\[132b.2\]]ngo /_/sha'i mig tha mal pas sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/_de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa 'ang shes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'khor gyi dbus su mi 'jigs pa/_/
[\[132b.3\]]gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chad cing /_/le lo med par rab 'chad pa/_/de yi yon tan nga las nyon/_/yon tan dag ni brgyad brgya yi/_/de yi mig ni kun du mdzes/_/des ni de mig dri ma med/_/rnyog pa med cing dag par 'gyur/_/pha dang ma las byung ba yi/_/de yi sha yi mig des 
[\[132b.4\]]ni/_/'jig rten khams 'di thams cad kyang /_/phyi nang bcas pa rab tu mthong /_/lhun po'i ri rab thams cad dang /_/kho ra yug kyang des mthong ste/_/ri gzhan gang rnams grags pa dang /_/rgya mtsho dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/'og tu mnar med dmyal bar thug_/
[\[132b.5\]]steng du srid pa'i rtser gnas pa/_/brtan pa des ni kun mthong ste/_/sha yi mig ni de 'dra'o/_/da dung de la lha yi mig_/med pas shes pa ma yin no/_/de yi sha yi mig gi yul/_/de dag de ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[132b.6\]]kyi bu mo des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bstan cing gzhan dag la yang dag par bshad na/_rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po la thug pa yan chad/_srid 
[\[132b.7\]]pa'i rtse mo la thug pa man chad na/_phyi nang gi sgra rnam pa mang po gang dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i sgra'am/_rta'i sgra'am/_rnga mo'i sgra'am/_ba lang gi sgra'am/_ra'i sgra'am/_shing rta'i sgra'am/_ngu ba'i sgra'am/_mya ngan gyi sgra'am/_'jigs pa'i sgra'am/_dung gi 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]sgra'am/_dril bu'i sgra'am/_rnga'i sgra'am/_rtsed mo'i sgra'am/_glu'i sgra'am/_rol mo'i sgra'am/_skyes pa'i sgra'am/_bud med kyi sgra'am/_khye'u'i sgra'am/_bu mo'i sgra'am/_chos kyi sgra'am/_chos ma yin pa'i sgra'am/_bde ba'i sgra'am/_sdug bsngal 
[\[133a.2\]]ba'i sgra'am/_byis pa'i sgra'am/_'phags pa'i sgra'am/_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'am/_yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra'am/_lha'i sgra'am/_klu'i sgra'am/_gnod sbyin gyi sgra'am/_dri za'i sgra'am/_lha ma yin gyi sgra'am/_nam mkha' lding gi sgra'am/_mi'am ci'i sgra'am/_lto 'phye chen 
[\[133a.3\]]po'i sgra'am/_mi'i sgra'am/_mi ma yin pa'i sgra'am/_me'i sgra'am/_chu'i sgra'am/_rlung gi sgra'am/_grong gi sgra'am/_grong khyer gyi sgra'am/_dge slong gi sgra'am/_nyan thos kyi sgra'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i sgra'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[133a.4\]]sgra'am/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na/_sgra ci byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa yongs su dag pa des thos te/_re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mi sgrub mod kyi sems can de dang de dag gi skad du rab tu rtogs so/_/sems 
[\[133a.5\]]can de dang de dag gis skad la rnam par rtog go/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa des sems can de dang de dag gis skad rnams thos kyang /_de'i rna ba'i dbang po la sgra de dag thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non to/_/rtag par rgyun du brtson byang chub sems 
[\[133a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rna ba'i dbang po 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur te/_re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mngon par mi sgrub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[133a.7\]]to/_/de yi rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa/_/rnyog pa med cing rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/'jig rten khams 'di dag na ma lus par/_/rnam pa mang po'i sgra rnams des thos te/_/rnga bo che dang rdza rnga sgra snyan dang /_/pi bang gling bu dang ni pa l+la ki_/shing rta ba lang ra dang 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]lug dag dang /_/rta dang glang chen dag gi sgra yang thos/_/'jam zhing yid 'ong glu yi dbyangs kyang thos/_/brtan pa de ni de la chags pa med/_/gang dang gang na su dang su smra ba/_/bye ba snyed kyi mi yi sgra rnams thos/_/lha yi sgra dang klu yi dbyangs rnams kyang /_/snyan cing yid du 
[\[133b.2\]]'ong ba rtag par thos/_/skyes pa bud med dag gi sgra rnams dang /_/khye'u dang bu mo'i sgra yang de bzhin thos/_/ri dang phug na gang gnas de dag dang /_/khu byug rma bya ka la ping ka dang /_/bya rnams gang dag shang shang te'u rnams dang /_/de dag rnams kyi sgra snyan 'dir thos 
[\[133b.3\]]so/_/sems dmyal dag na sdug bsngal gang myong ba/_/shin tu mi bzad pa yi sgra rnams dang /_/zas kyi sdug bsngal dag gis nyen pa yi/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi sgra phyung de bzhin thos/_/lha ma yin dang rgya mtsho'i nang gnas dang /_/sgra 'byin pa dang de bzhin gzhan dag 
[\[133b.4\]]dang /_/chos smra ba de 'di na 'dug bzhin du/_/sgra rnams thams cad thos te chod pa med/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dag na phan tshun du/_/smra bar byed pa'i sgra rnams gang yin pa/_/rnam pa tha dad sgra rnams mang po dag_/de ni 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thos/_/lha gang tshangs 
[\[133b.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa dang /_/gang dag 'og min dang ni 'od gsal lha/_/phan tshun du ni sgra skad gang 'byin pa/_/de dag ma lus thams cad des thos so/_/bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la rab byung nas/_/dge slong gang dag kha don byed pa dang /_/'khor gyi nang na 
[\[133b.6\]]chos ston gang yin pa/_/de dag sgra yang rtag tu de yis thos/_/'jig rten khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/kha don dag kyang byed cing phan tshun du/_/chos rnams yang dag rjod par gang byed pa/_/de dag sgra rnams rnam pa tha dad thos/_/byang chub sems 
[\[133b.7\]]dpa' mdo 'di gang 'dzin pas/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/_/'khor rnams la yang chos mchog gang gsung ba/_/dus gcig tu ni de yang de yis thos/_/mnar med yan chad steng du srid pa'i rtse/_/stong gsum gyi ni zhing 'di thams cad na/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]nang logs dag dang phyi logs dag nas kyang /_/sems can gang gis sgra mang phyung ba dang /_/sems can kun gyi sgra rnams thos gyur kyang /_/'on kyang de yi rna ba 'gag pa med/_/dbang po gsal zhing gnas dang gnas kyang shes/_/rna ba'i dbang po tha 
[\[134a.2\]]mal de tsam mo/_/re zhig lha yi la ni 'bad mi byed/_/tha mal rna ba de ni de ltar 'dug_/'jigs med gang gis mdo 'di bzung ba ni/_/de yi yon tan dag ni de 'drar 'gyur/_/rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[134a.3\]]'di 'dzin tam/_rab tu ston tam/_kha ton byed dam/_yi ger 'dri ba de/_sna'i yon tan brgyad brgya dang ldan zhing sna'i dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_de'i sna'i dbang po yongs su dag pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi dri rnam pa 
[\[134a.4\]]mang po yod pa 'di lta ste/_rul ba'i dri'am yid du 'ong ba'i dri'am yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri'am me tog rnam pa tha dad pa'i dri 'di lta ste/_sna ma'i me tog dang /_ma li ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_skya snar gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa mang po'i dri 
[\[134a.5\]]rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/_ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu ta dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams kyi dri dag kyang tshor ro/_/me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa mang po'i me tog dang /_'bras bu'i dri rnams kyang tshor te/_'di lta ste/_tsan dan dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang /_
[\[134a.6\]]rgya spos dang /_a ga ru'i dri zhim po rnams kyang tshor ro/_/spos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gnas gcig na 'dug pa thams cad kyang tshor ro/_/thams cad kyang shes so/_/sems can gyi dri rnam pa mang po yang tshor te 'di lta ste/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_ra lug 
[\[134a.7\]]dang /_phyugs kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnam pa mang po'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/skyes pa dang bud med kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/khye'u dang bu mo'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/rtswa dang shing gel pa dang 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]sman dang nags thag ring po na 'dug pa'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/dri yang dag par tshor te dri yang dag par shes mod kyi/_dri de dag gis mi 'phrogs/_de dag gis myos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'di na 'dug bzhin du lha dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/_yongs 'du 
[\[134b.2\]]sa brtol gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po rnams kyi lha'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/lha'i me tog rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi dri dag kyang tshor ro/_/
[\[134b.3\]]de dag gi ming rnams kyang shes so/_/lha'i bu'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lus kyi dri yang tshor ro/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa'am/_chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sa na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 
[\[134b.4\]]rnams la chos ston pa'am/_rtse dga' ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba de yang shes so/_/lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/lha'i bu mo rnams dang lha'i chung ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/lha gzhon nu rnams kyi lus kyi 
[\[134b.5\]]dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/lha gzhon nu ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te/_dri de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs shing myos par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam grangs 'dis srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/tshangs ris kyi 
[\[134b.6\]]lha'i bu rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/rnam grangs 'dis lha'i ris thams cad kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi sku'i dri 
[\[134b.7\]]rnams kyang tshor ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi gdan gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na bzhugs pa de yang rab tu shes so/_/de'i sna'i dbang po de yang dri rnam pa mang po de dang de dag 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gis mi 'phrogs te nyams pa'am gnod par 'gyur ba yang med do/_/de 'dod na dri de dang de dag gzhan dag la yang ston te/_de dran pa nyams par 'gyur ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[135a.2\]]de yi sna yi dbang po rnam dag 'gyur/_/gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di thams cad na/_/dri zhim dri mi zhim pa ci yod pa/_/des ni rnam pa mang po'i dri yang tshor/_/sna ma'i me tog dri dang ma li ka_/tsan dan ta ma la yi 'dab ma dang /_/rgya spos dag dang a ga ru yi dri/_/
[\[135a.3\]]me tog 'bras bu sna mang de dag dang /_/skyes pa bud med ring na 'dug pa dang /_/khye'u rnams dang ni bu mo de dag dang /_/sems can rnams kyi dri yang de bzhin shes/_/de yi gnas kyang des ni dri las shes/_/'khor los sgyur rgyal rnams kyang de yis shes/_/stobs kyi 
[\[135a.4\]]'khor los sgyur dang rgyal phran dang /_/de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo de dag dang /_/chung ma'i 'khor kun dri las de yis shes/_/yongs su longs spyod rin chen rnam mang dang /_/spa ba gang dag sa la 'dug rnams dang /_/bud med rin po cher gyur de dag kyang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[135a.5\]]dpa' de yis dri las shes/_/de dag rnams kyi rgyan rnams ci yod pa/_/lus la btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/_/gos dang phreng ba byug pa spos rnams kyang /_/dri las byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes/_/de bzhin 'greng dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang /_/rtsed 
[\[135a.6\]]mo dga' ba mthu stobs thams cad kyang /_/mdo sde dam pa 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/brtan pa de yi sna yi stobs kyis shes/_/spos mchog 'bru mar dri yang de bzhin te/_/me tog 'bras bu rnam pa mang po'i dri/_/dri 'di ga ge mo na yod ces kyang /_/'dug bzhin du ni cig car 
[\[135a.7\]]shes shing tshor/_/ri yi phrag ni rnam pa sna tshogs na/_/tsan dan me tog rgyas mang gang yod dang /_/sems can gang dag de na gnas pa yang /_/mkhas des de dag thams cad dri las shes/_/khor yug ngos la gang dag gnas pa dang /_/rgya mtsho'i dbus na gang dag 'khod 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa dang /_/sa yi dbus na sems can gang gnas pa/_/mkhas pa des ni thams cad dri las shes/_/lha dang lha ma yin yang de bzhin shes/_/des ni lha min bu mo dag kyang shes/_/lha ma yin gyi rtsed mo dga' ba'ang shes/_/de yi sna yi dbang po'i mthu de 'dra/_/nags khrod dag 
[\[135b.2\]]na rkang bzhi gang yod pa/_/seng ge stag dang de bzhin glang chen mchog_/de nam he ba lang ba men rnams/_/de dag gnas pa de yi sna yis shes/_/bud med gang dag sbrum mar gyur pa dang /_/khye'u 'am 'on te bu mo gang yin pa/_/rum na 'chang ba shin tu ngal ba'i lus/_/de la gang 
[\[135b.3\]]yod de yi dri las shes/_/sems can mngal du zhugs pa'ang des shes te/_/rnam par 'jig pa'i chos kyang de yis shes/_/bud med 'di ni sdug bsngal rnams dang bral/_/bsod nams ldan pa'i bu ni 'byung bar shes/_/skyes bu'i bsam pa mang po rab shes te/_/bsam 
[\[135b.4\]]pa'i dri yang de bzhin de yis tshor/_/'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin 'chab pa dang /_/nye bar zhi ba'i sems kyi dri yang tshor/_/sa la gter rnams gang dag yod gyur pa/_/nor rnams dang ni gser dngul 'gron bu yis/_/lcags kyi sgrom rnams de bzhin gang ba dag_/dri las 
[\[135b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes/_/mu tig nor bu do shal se mo do/_/rin thang med pa'i rin chen rnam mang po/_/rin thang med pa'i ming dang 'od dbyibs kyang /_/de dag thams cad de yi dri las shes/_/de bzhin steng gi lha yi me tog rnams/_/man dA ra dang many+dzu Sha ka dang /_/
[\[135b.6\]]yongs 'du'i me tog gang dag yod gyur pa/_/dpa' bo 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag tshor/_/gang gi gzhal med khang rnams ci 'dra ba/_/yangs dang 'bring dang de bzhin chung ngu dang /_/de na rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs yod pa/_/'di na 'dug bzhin sna yi stobs kyis tshor/_/skyed 
[\[135b.7\]]mos tshal gyi sa yang de bzhin shes/_/chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni rnam par rgyal ba yi/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchog na lha gang 'khod pa dag_/de na lha bu rtsen pa'ang rtag tu shes/_/gang zhig gang na las ni byed pa'am/_/'dug dang nyal dang gang du 'gro ba yang /_/'di na 'dug 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bzhin de dag dri yang tshor/_/lha yi bu rnams des ni dri las shes/_/me tog mang brgyan lha yi bu mo gang /_/phreng ba thogs shing lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan/_/gang dang gang du rtsen zhing 'dong ba dag_/byang chub sems dpa' de yis dri las shes/_/steng 
[\[136a.2\]]du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi lha/_/tshangs pa tshangs chen gzhal med khang rgyu ba/_/bsam gtan gnas sam 'on te langs pa yang /_/de dag der ni dri las rab tu shes/_/'od gsal gyi ni lha yi bu rnams kyang /_/'chi 'phos skyes pa gsar du 'ongs pa shes/_/byang chub 
[\[136a.3\]]sems dpa' mdo 'di 'dzin pa yi/_/sna yi dbang po 'di 'drar 'gyur ba yin/_/dge slong gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/_/mngon par brtson pa 'chag cing 'dug pa dang /_/lung nod kha don mos pa'i dge slong rnams/_/thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[136a.4\]]de yis shes/_/rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos gang yod pa/_/la la rtag tu shing drung gnas pa dag_/dge slong 'di zhes bya bar 'dir gnas shes/_/de dag thams cad mkhas pa des shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dran ldan bsam gtan pa/_/rtag tu lung nod kha 
[\[136a.5\]]don 'ga' gang dag_/'khor gyi nang na chos kyang rab 'chad pa/_/de dag dri las byang chub sems dpas shes/_/bde bar gshegs pa thub chen phyogs gang na/_/nyan thos dge 'dun mdun gyis bltas dbus na/_/phan zhing thugs brtse rab tu chos 'chad pa/_/
[\[136a.6\]]'jig rten mgon po de yang dri las shes/_/sems can gang rnams chos 'di nyan pa dag_/gang rnams thos nas dga' ba'i yid gyur pa/_/de na rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad kyang /_/'di na 'dug bzhin byang chub sems dpas shes/_/de yi sna yi stobs ni 
[\[136a.7\]]de 'drar 'gyur/_/de la lha yi sna ni da dung med/_/zag pa med par gyur pa lha yi sna/_/de yi sngun du 'gro bar 'di 'gyur ro/_/rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam ston tam rab tu 'chad dam yi ger 'drir 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]'jug na/_lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan pa'i lce'i dbang po thob par 'gyur te/_de lce'i dbang po de lta bus ro gang dag myangs pa dang ro gang dag tshor ba dang ro gang dag lce'i dbang po la reg pa de thams cad lha'i ro bro ba dam par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yid du mi 'ong 
[\[136b.2\]]ba'i ro gang dag yang mi myong ba de lta bu myong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro gang yin pa de dag kyang /_de'i lce'i dbang po'i steng du reg na lha'i ro bro bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor gyi nang du song nas chos gang bshad pa des sems can de dag dbang po tshim par 'gyur ro/_/mgu 
[\[136b.3\]]ba dang yongs su mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skye'o/_/de'i sgra yang zab cing yid du 'ong la mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur te/_snying la 'bab pa dang dga' bar 'gyur ba des sems can de dag dga' mgu yi rangs pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/gang dag la chos bshad pa de dag 
[\[136b.4\]]gis kyang de'i dbyangs 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos nas/_lha rnams kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i drung du 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[136b.5\]]bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/_/klu dang klu'i bu mo rnams 
[\[136b.6\]]kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/_/lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/_/
[\[136b.7\]]nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/_/mi'am ci dang mi'am ci'i bu mo dang gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang sha za dang sha za'i bu mo rnams kyang 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan par bya ba'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems te/_de dag kyang de la bkur stir byed bsti stang du byed btsun par byed mchod pa dang /_gsol bar byed dbul bar byed do/_/dge slong dang /_dge 
[\[137a.2\]]slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang /_rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyang lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/_
[\[137a.3\]]bu dang bcas pa/_blon po dang bcas pa/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa yang bkur stir bya ba'i phyir lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/chos smra ba de de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyan pa'i chos 
[\[137a.4\]]'chad do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dang /_yul gyi mi gzhan dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tshe'i mtha' mar phyin gyi bar du/_chos smra ba de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang de la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs 
[\[137a.5\]]rgyas rnams kyang de la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de la gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de phyogs gang na 'dug pa de'i phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs te chos 'chad do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[137a.6\]]kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/_de ltar de zab cing yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnams kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/de yi lce yi dbang po mchog tu 'gyur/_/nam yang ngan pa'i ro ni yong 
[\[137a.7\]]mi myong /_/reg ma thag tu lha yi ro bror 'gyur/_/lha yi ro bro shin tu ldan pa yin/_/rna bar snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang /_/'jam zhing mnyen pa'i sgra skad rab tu smra/_/'khor gyi dbus der dga' bar 'gyur ba yi/_/zab mo'i dbyangs ni rtag par rab tu smra/_/bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]du ma'i dpe rnams kyis/_/des bshad pa la chos rnams gang nyan pa/_/de na de la mchog tu dga' ba skyed/_/de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byed/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin lha min dang /_/gsang ba pa dag rtag tu de lta 'dod/_/chos 'di shin tu gus par nyan pa de/_/yon tan 
[\[137b.2\]]'di dag thams cad de yir 'gyur/_/'dod par gyur na 'jig rten khams 'di dag_/dbyangs kyis thams cad du yang go bar byed/_/de yi dbyangs ni mnyen zhing 'jam pa ste/_/zab cing snyan la shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba rnams/_/mchod 
[\[137b.3\]]pa'i phyir ni de yi drung du 'dong /_/bu dang chung mar bcas te thal mo sbyar/_/rtag tu de la chos ni nyan par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur sti byed/_/klu dang dri za dag gi tshogs rnams dang /_/sha za pho dang sha za mo rnams kyis/_/bsti stang ri mo mchod pa rnams 
[\[137b.4\]]kyang byas/_/tshangs pa rnams la de ni dbang byed 'gyur/_/lha bu dbang phyug che dang dbang phyug dang /_/brgya byin de bzhin lha yi bu gzhan dang /_/lha yi bu mo mang po drung du 'gro/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse gang /_/nyan thos bcas pas de yi dbyangs thos 
[\[137b.5\]]nas/_/zhal ston pa dang bsrung ba dag kyang mdzad/_/chos 'di 'chad pa la ni dgyes par 'gyur/_/rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam klog gam rab tu 'chad dam ston tam yi ger bris na/_de'i 
[\[137b.6\]]lus kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus yongs su dag ste pags pa'i mdog bai dUr+ya ltar dag cing sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus yongs su dag pa de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[137b.7\]]snang ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang dag 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bzang po dang /_mdog bzang po dang /_mdog ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_ri khor yug dang /_khor yug 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]chen po dang /_lhun po dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams dang /_'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la thug pa dang /_steng du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag 
[\[138a.2\]]gi lus la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang la la dag bzhugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag chos gang ston 
[\[138a.3\]]pa dang /_sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_sems can de dag thams cad kyi lus so sor thob pa yang /_bdag gi lus la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i 
[\[138a.4\]]tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig rgya che mdo 'di 'dzin byed pa/_/de yi lus ni yongs su dag par 'gyur/_/rnam dag bai dUr+ya ltar grub pa ste/_/rtag tu sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga'/_/me long phyis par gzugs 
[\[138a.5\]]brnyan snang ba bzhin/_/lus la 'jig rten 'di dag de bzhin snang /_/sems can gzhan min rang byung de yis mthong /_/yongs su dag pa'i lus ni de 'dra'o/_/'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can ci yod pa/_/lha mi lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa/_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[138a.6\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams/_/lus de la ni gzugs brnyan so sor snang /_/srid pa'i rtse bar gzhal med khang gi lha/_/brag rnams dang ni ri dang kho ra yug_/gangs ri ri rab lhun po chen po rnams/_/de yi lus las rnam pa thams cad snang /_/de yi lus la nyan thos 
[\[138a.7\]]bcas pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras gzhan yang /_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gang gnas dang /_/tshogs la gang dag chos ston rnams kyang snang /_/de yi rnam dag lus ni de 'dra ste/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad de la snang /_/
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]de ni da dung lha yis ma thob ste/_/de yi rang bzhin lus ni de 'dra'o/_/rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam ston tam rab tu 'chad dam 
[\[138b.2\]]yi ger 'dri 'am klog na/_yid kyi las kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan zhing yid kyi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de yid kyi dbang po yongs su dag pa des/_tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas kyang de'i don mang por shes so/_/des de dag 
[\[138b.3\]]khong du chud nas de'i phyir zla ba gcig tu chos ston to/_/zla ba bzhi 'am lor yang chos ston to/_/chos gang bshad pa de la de brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad gang dag skad dam sngags ci yod pa de dag thams cad chos kyi tshul dang sbyor 
[\[138b.4\]]ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can 'gro ba drug tu skyes shing 'khor ba'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i g.yo ba rnams kyang shes so/_/g.yos pa dang bsam pa dang spros pa rnams kyang shes shing 
[\[138b.5\]]rab tu rtogs so/_/re zhig 'phags pa'i ye shes ma thob kyang de'i yid kyi dbang po 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gang dang gang rjes su bsams te/_gtam ston pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[138b.6\]]pas gsungs pa thams cad ston to/_/sngon gyi rgyal bas mdo sde'i rnam grangs bstan pa thams cad 'chad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/de yi yid kyi dbang po rnam dag 'gyur/_/gsal zhing 'od gsal 
[\[138b.7\]]rnyog pa med pa ste/_/ngan pa bzang po de bzhin bar ma dang /_/des ni rnam pa mang po'i chos rab shes/_/brtan pa des ni tshigs bcad gcig thos kyang /_/de don rnam pa mang po de yis shes/_/zla ba bzhi 'am de bzhin lo yi bar/_/rtag tu yang dag 'brel par rab tu 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]smra/_/sems can gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di yi/_/phyi rol dag dang nang na gang gnas pa/_/lha mi lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa/_/klu dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas gar song dang /_/'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/de dag rnams kyis 
[\[139a.2\]]rnam par ci bsams pa/_/skad cig tu ni thams cad mkhas pas shes/_/mdo 'dzin pa yi phan yon 'di dag go_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan ldan sangs rgyas kyis/_/'jig rten kun la chos gang rab bshad pa/_/de yi rnam par dag pa'i sgra yang thos/_/de yis 
[\[139a.3\]]ci bstan pa yang des bzung ste/_/chos kyi mchog kyang mang du rnam par sems/_/de ni rtag tu mang po ston par 'gyur/_/de ni rmongs par nam yang mi 'gyur te/_/mdo 'dzin pa yi phan yon 'di dag go/_/des ni mtshams dang tshig kyang rab tu shes/_/chos rnams kun 
[\[139a.4\]]gyi mtshan nyid mi 'thun dang /_/don dang nges pa'i tshig kyang rab tu shes/_/ji ltar de dag shes pa bzhin du 'chad/_/sngon gyi 'jig rten dag gi slob dpon gyis/_/yun ring 'dir ni mdo sde gang bshad pa/_/de yi chos rnams 'khor gyi dbus su yang /_/'jigs pa med 
[\[139a.5\]]par rtag tu de 'chad do/_/mdo 'di bzung ba dang ni bklags pa yis/_/de yi yid kyi dbang po de 'drar 'gyur/_/da dung ma chags ye shes ma thob ste/_/'di ni de yi sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa yang /_/slob dpon gyi ni sa la 'jug 
[\[139a.6\]]pa yin/_/sems can thams cad la yang chos smra ste/_/nges tshig bye ba snyed la mkhas par 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'i phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 
[\[139a.7\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/_mthu chen thob rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gang dag kha cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di spong ba dang /_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang /_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la gshe zhing mi snyan par smra ba dang /_tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub po zer ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa 'dod pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_de ni tshig gis brjod du yang mi nus so/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin 
[\[139b.2\]]pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'dod par 'gyur te/_ji ltar ngas sngar brjod pa de lta bur mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid 
[\[139b.3\]]yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/mthu chen thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag gi yang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na tha dad du gnas pa'i bskal 
[\[139b.4\]]pa la/_'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi 
[\[139b.5\]]rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi 
[\[139b.6\]]rgyal po de 'jig rten gyi khams cher byung ba de na/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na chos ston te/_'di lta ste nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[139b.7\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i chos ston to/_/mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[140a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed du gyur to/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab 
[\[140a.3\]]snyed du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur to/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed du dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par gyur to/_/mthu chen thob 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung ba de na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[140a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos dang dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang med par gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[140a.5\]]rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po gzhan yang 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/mthu chen thob de lta bu gcig nas gcig tu cher 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs 
[\[140a.6\]]kyi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung ngo /_/mthu chen thob tha dad du gnas pa'i bskal pa la/_'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung ba der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[140a.7\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thog mar gang byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/_dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang nub par gyur pa'i tshe/_de'i bstan pa la nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gis shin tu non par gyur te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong 
[\[140b.2\]]zhig byung ngo /_/mthu chen thob ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya zhe na/_mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma su mthong yang rung ste/_
[\[140b.3\]]de dag gi drung du song nas 'di skad du/_kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi byed de khyed ni ma brnyas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyed thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang /_khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[140b.4\]]sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/zhes smra'o/_/mthu chen thob rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge slong du gyur pa de/_sems can rgyang ring po na 'dug pa su mthong yang rung ste/_de'i drung du song zhing de skad du yang dag par sgrogs pa ma gtogs 
[\[140b.5\]]par/_lung yang mi nod/_kha don yang mi byed de/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma de dang de dag gi drung du song nas/_'di skad du kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi byed de khyed ni ma brnyas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyed thams 
[\[140b.6\]]cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang /_khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/_/mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des de'i tshe dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_
[\[140b.7\]]dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am su dang su la de skad bsgrags pa de dag thams cad las phal cher de la khro zhing gnod par sems la ma dad pa skyed de/_de la gshe zhing spyos te/_ci'i phyir dge slong 'di ma dris par brnyas pa'i sems med do/_/zhes bdag cag 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]la ston te/_bdag nyid la brnyas par byed cing 'di ltar ma bsams mi 'dod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag cag la lung ston ces smra'o/_/mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de lta bur gshe zhing spyo bas lo 
[\[141a.2\]]mang po 'das te/_su la yang mi khro zhing gnod sems mi bskyed do/_/de ltar de yang dag par sgrogs pa la bong ba dang dbyug pa 'phen kyang /_des de dag la thag ring po nas sgra chen por byas te/_kho bo khyed la brnyas par mi byed do zhes yang dag par sgrog go/_/des nga rgyal can gyi 
[\[141a.3\]]dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par bsgrags pas de dag gis de la ming rtag tu brnyas pa zhes btags so/_/mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de 'chi ba'i 
[\[141a.4\]]dus byed pa nye bar gnas te/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po des chos kyi 
[\[141a.5\]]rnam grangs 'di tshigs su bcad pa dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu bshad pa de yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de/_'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe bar snang gi sgra las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/sus kyang ma 
[\[141a.6\]]smras par des bar snang las sgra thos te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung nas mig rnam par dag pa dang /_rna ba rnam par dag pa dang /_sna rnam par dag pa dang /_lce rnam par dag pa dang /_lus rnam par dag pa dang /_yid rnam par dag pa de lta bu thob bo/_/rnam par dag pa 
[\[141a.7\]]de dag thob ma thag tu phyir yang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shur bdag gi srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags so/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma nga rgyal can gang dag la 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]sngon khyed la kho bos brnyas par mi byed do/_/zhes bsgrags pa gang dag gis/_de'i ming rtag tu brnyas par btags pa de dag gis/_de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthu dang /_dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang /_spobs pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang /_shes rab kyi mthu rgya chen po 
[\[141b.2\]]mthong nas/_thams cad kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyi na 'khod par gyur to/_/des gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud do/_/mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[141b.3\]]dpa' chen po de/_de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/_thams cad du yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan 
[\[141b.4\]]to/_/de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mthar gyis mnyes par byas nas de thams cad du yang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos 
[\[141b.5\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/_'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sgra rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas 
[\[141b.6\]]nas/_thams cad du yang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid bzung ste/_'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/thams cad na yang mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/rna ba yongs su dag pa dang /_sna yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[141b.7\]]lce yongs su dag pa dang /_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/_/mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed la bsti stang byas bla 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]mar byas ri mo dang mchod pa dang gsol ba dang dbul ba byas te gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsti stang du bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mo dang mchod pa dang gsol ba byas nas/_de dag thams cad du yang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i 
[\[142a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid yongs su smin pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mthu chen thob de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[142a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la/_'khor bzhi rnams kyis rtag tu brnyas par grags shing /_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed mnyes par byas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[142a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de/_gzhan zhig yin snyam du som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za bar gyur na/_mthu chen thob khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa 
[\[142a.5\]]zhes bya bar gyur to/_/mthu chen thob gal te ngas sngon chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma blangs ma bzung bar gyur na/_nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/_mthu chen thob de ltar ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[142a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gan nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/_bklags pa dang bstan pas de'i phyir nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mthu chen thob byang 
[\[142a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma brgya phrag mang po dag la/_bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags shing /_kho bo khyed la brnyas par mi byed do/_/
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]khyed cag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang /_khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de la gnod sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag gis bskal pa 
[\[142b.2\]]bye ba brgya phrag nyi shur nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong chos kyi sgra yang ma thos/_dge 'dun gyi sgra yang ma thos so bskal pa stong phrag bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ngo /_/de dag thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa de las 
[\[142b.3\]]yongs su thar nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/mthu chen thob de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsting 
[\[142b.4\]]ba dang /_'phya ba byas pa de dag gang yin snyam du som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/_mthu chen thob 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang na bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang seng ge'i zla ba la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya dang bde gshegs sems 
[\[142b.5\]]pa la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgya ste/_thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas so/_/mthu chen thob chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ltar don che ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[142b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mthu chen thob de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos 
[\[142b.7\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gzung bar bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/bshad par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni/_/'jigs 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bsgrags dbyangs rgyal rgyal ba gang byung ba/_/lha mi gnod sbyin srin po'i 'dren pa ste/_/mthu chen de la lha dang mi yis mchod/_/rgyal ba de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas/_/dam chos 'khrugs par gyur pa tha ma la/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' dge 
[\[143a.2\]]slong byung /_/de yi ming ni rtag tu brnyas zhes bya/_/de na dge slong gzhan dang de bzhin du/_/dmigs par lta ba'i dge slong de gan song /_/kho bos khyed la nam yang brnyas pa med/_/khyed kyis byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod/_/de bzhin rtag tu yang dag bsgrags pa na/_/
[\[143a.3\]]gshe zhing brgyad pa de dag bzod par byed/_/'chi ba'i dus byed nye bar gnas pa dang /_/de yis mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/_/de tshe mkhas pas 'chi ba'i dus ma byas/_/tshe yang shin tu ring por byin brlabs te/_/rnam par 'dren pa de yi bstan pa la/_/de tshe mdo 'di yang ni rab 
[\[143a.4\]]tu bshad/_/dmigs can mang po de dag thams cad kyang /_/de yis byang chub tu ni yongs smin byas/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos nas/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes byas te/_/mthar gyis bsod nams byas pa de dag gis/_/mdo 'di yang ni rtag par 
[\[143a.5\]]rab tu bshad/_/rgyal ba'i sras des byang chub yang dag thob/_/shAkya thub pa nga nyid de yin no/_/de tshe gang dag dmigs can dge slong dang /_/dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen gang rnams dang /_/de na dge bsnyen ma rnams gang byung ba/_/mkhas pas de tshe byang chub bsgrags gyur pa/_/
[\[143a.6\]]de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas bye mang mthong /_/de dag lnga brgya mi nyung 'di rnams dang /_/de bzhin dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/_/nga yi mngon sum dge bsnyen 'di dag ste/_/thams cad nga yis chos mchog thos byas nas/_/ngas ni 'di dag thams cad yongs smin byas/_/mya ngan 
[\[143a.7\]]nga 'das dpa' bo 'di kun ni/_/'di na mdo sde mchog 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_/bskal pa mtha' yas bye ba mang por yang /_/'di 'dra'i chos ni nam yang mi thos te/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya 'byung na yang /_/de dag kyang ni mdo 'di mi 'chad do/_/de phyir rang byung nyid kyis 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]brjod pa'i chos/_/'di lta bu yi rnam pa thos nas su/_/yang dang yang ni rab tu 'di bzung la/_/mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di rab shod cig_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las rtag tu brnyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems 
[\[143b.2\]]dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed gang dag sa rum nas 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs 
[\[143b.3\]]su mya ngan las 'das nas/_bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag lags pa gang du/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de dang der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[143b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po 'di lta bu bzung ba dang /_klag pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_rab tu bshad pa dang /_yi ger bri bar 'tshal ba lags so/_/de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gang 
[\[143b.5\]]dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa dag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_
[\[143b.6\]]mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[143b.7\]]'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lus mi gda' bar bar snang la gnas te dbyangs kyis yang dag par bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/snga ma tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang tshogs kyi slob dpon de dag gi gtso bo gcig po/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba/_tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang 
[\[144a.2\]]tshogs kyi slob dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spyod pa khyad par can legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir khyed de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su smin par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[144a.3\]]pa shAkya thub pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de mchod rten gyi dbus na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnyi ga 'dzum pa mdzad nas/_gnyi ga'i zhal gyi sgo 
[\[144a.4\]]nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_ljags kyi dbang po de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du phyin nas/_ljags kyi dbang po de gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po byung ngo /_/'od zer de dag las 'od zer re re las kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
