[\[144a.5\]]khrig brgya stong mang po lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod pa dag byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong 
[\[144a.6\]]dag tu dong ste/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de dag thams cad na bar snang la 'khod nas chos ston to/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[144a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ljags kyi dbang pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mdzad pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan dag nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag gshegs pa'i 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na/_seng ge'i khri la so sor bzhugs pa de dag kyang ljags kyi dbang pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa 
[\[144b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis lo 'bum tshang gi bar du rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do/_/de nas lo 'bum 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ljags kyi dbang po de dag bsdus te/_dus gcig 
[\[144b.3\]]tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/_thams cad kyi mgur bsal ba'i sgra chen po phyung ste se gol gtogs pa'i sgra gcig mdzad do/_/mgur bsal ba'i sgra chen po de dang se gol gtogs pa'i sgra chen po des/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[144b.4\]]ji snyed pa de dag thams cad g.yos par gyur te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg [(]ga [,]go [)]/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[144b.5\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag de na 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[144b.6\]]rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri so so la bzhugs pa de dag dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[144b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de'i dbus na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa dang /_'khor bzhi po de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur te bar snang las sgra 'di skad ces thos te/_kye grogs po dag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 
[\[145a.2\]]de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de/_da ltar dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/_sangs 
[\[145a.3\]]rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang dag par rab tu 'chad kyis/_de la khyed kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[145a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshol cig_/mchod pa gyis shig ces thos so/_/de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis bar snang las de lta bu'i sgra thos nas de na 'khod bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[145a.5\]]zhes tshig de skad smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thal mo sbyar te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na 
[\[145a.6\]]bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan mang po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba de logs su 'thor ro/_/phyang phrul dang bgo ba dang /_se mo do dang /_do shal dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che rnam pa mang po yang gtor to/_/
[\[145a.7\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /_se mo do dang /_do shal dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che gtor ba de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnam pa mang po dang /_se mo do dang /_do shal dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che de 
[\[145b.2\]]dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khebs par gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag dang lhan cig tu khebs par gyur nas gcig tu gyur te/_gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[145b.3\]]khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag thams cad kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la me tog gi bla re chen pos kun tu khebs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa khyad par can la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[145b.4\]]rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/_mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad pa'i phyir/_ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por chos kyi sgo rnam pa tha 
[\[145b.5\]]dad pa dag gis phan yon gyi rnam grangs mang po bshad mod kyi/_ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan bshad kyang yon tan gyi pha rol du mi phyin to/_/rigs kyi bu dag mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad dang /_
[\[145b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi gsang chen thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zab mo'i gnas thams cad ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 
[\[145b.7\]]gus par gzung bar bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/yi ger bri bar bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/rab tu bshad par bya'o/_/bsgom par bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog gam ston tam rab tu 'chad dam yi 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]ger 'dri'am sems sam 'don tam kha ton byed dam glegs bam du byas pa/_kun dga'i ra ba'am gtsug lag khang ngam khyim mam gnas sam shing drung ngam khang pa'am gnas khang ngam phug na 'dug kyang rung ste/_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs 
[\[146a.2\]]pa'i phyir mchod rten bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por rig par bya ba dang /_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[146a.3\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rig par bya ba dang /_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /_sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig par bya ba yin pa'i 
[\[146a.4\]]phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mngon shes ye shes rab tu gnas rnams kyi/_/'jig rten phan pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/lus can 'di kun mchog tu dga' ba'i phyir/_/mtha' yas spyan gyis rdzu 
[\[146a.5\]]'phrul rab tu bstan/_/'od zer stong rnams rab tu kun 'gyed cing /_/ljags kyi dbang pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten phyin/_/byang chub mchog la zhugs pa de dag phyir/_/ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de dag bstan/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mgur sel sgra mdzad cing /_/
[\[146a.6\]]se gol gcig gi sgra dag gang phyung ba/_/de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ji tsam pa/_/'jig rten khams de thams cad go bar byas/_/ci nas de dag dga' nas phyi dus na/_/bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas mdo 'dzin par/_/de dag dang ni cho 'phrul gzhan rnams dang /_/
[\[146a.7\]]yon tan rnams ni phan zhing thugs brtse bstan/_/'jig rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mdo sde mchog 'di gang dag 'dzin pa yi/_/bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi bsngags pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang brjod kyang /_/de dag gi ni yon tan mtha' yas te/_/
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]ji ltar phyogs rnams su ni nam mkha' bzhin/_/gang dag rtag tu mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/de dag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan 'das 'di dang /_/nga dang 'dren pa 'di dag thams cad mthong /_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'di kun dang /_/
[\[146b.2\]]'khor bzhi rnams kyang de yis mthong ba yin/_/de yis deng 'dir nga ni mnyes par byas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po mya ngan 'das 'di dang /_/phyogs bcu rnams na gang dag gzhan bzhugs pa/_/'dren pa de dag thams cad mnyes par byas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 
[\[146b.3\]]byed pa/_/'das dang da ltar ma byon sangs rgyas dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na gang dag bzhugs pa yang /_/de kun mthong zhing shin tu mchod par 'gyur/_/mdo sde yang dag chos 'di gang 'dzin pas/_/byang chub snying po rnam par gang dgongs pa/_/skyes mchog rnams kyi gsang chen 
[\[146b.4\]]shes par 'gyur/_/de ni de yang myur du rjes su sems/_/gang zhig mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dzin pa/_/de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/_/ji ltar rlung ni gang du'ang thogs med bzhin/_/chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig kyang shes/_/'dren pa rnams kyis dgongs te gang 
[\[146b.5\]]gsungs pa/_/mdo sde rnams kyi mtshams sbyar rtag tu shes/_/rnam par 'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/mdo sde rnams kyi yang dag don de shes/_/zla ba nyi ma 'dra bar de 'gyur te/_/de ni shin tu snang zhing gsal byed 'gyur/_/de ni sa la rgyu zhing de dang der/_/byang chub sems 
[\[146b.6\]]dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud/_/de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gang dag_/'di 'dra ba yi phan yon 'di thos nas/_/mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di zung shig dang /_/de dag the tshom med par byang chub 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las de bzhin gshegs 
[\[146b.7\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/_lus la thogs sam glegs bam 
[\[147a.2\]]du bgyis te 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sman gyi rgyal po rigs 
[\[147a.3\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bsti stang du byed/_btsun par byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed na/_sman gyi rgyal po 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi 
[\[147a.4\]]de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi rgyal po khyod mos par bya'o/_/khong du chud par bya'o/_/sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[147a.5\]]kyi bu mo gang la la/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las/_tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_nan tan gyis bsgrub na/_sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[147a.6\]]kyi bu mo de gzhi de las de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la thogs sam glegs 
[\[147a.7\]]bam du bgyis te/_'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag gis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_an+ye/_man+ye/_ma ne ma ma ne/_tsit+te tsa ri te/_sha me sha ma yi tA bi/_shAn+te/_muk+te/_muk+ta 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]ta me/_sa me a bi/_sha me sa ma sa me/_dza ye/_k+Sha ye/_a k+Sha ye/_ak+Shi Ni/_shAn+te/_sha mi te d+hA ra Ni/_A lo ka b+hA se/_pra t+ya bek+Sha Ni/_bi bi ru a b+h+yan+ta ra Ni/_biSh+Te/_a t+yan+ta/_pa ri shud d+hi/_ud ku lo/_mud ku le/_ar De/_pa ra De/_shu kA k+Shi/_a sa ma sa me/_bud d+ha 
[\[147b.2\]]bi lo ki te/_d+harma pa rI k+Shi te/_sang g+ha ni ra g+ho Sha Ni/_ni ra g+ho Sha Ni/_b+ha yA b+ha ya/_sho d+ha ni man+t+re man+t+rA/_k+Sha ya tre/_ru dra kau sha l+ye/_a k+Sha ye/_a k+ShA/_ba na tA yA pa lo/_a man+ya na tA ya/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[147b.3\]]gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyis bshad pa ste/_gang gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag dang 'gal bar bgyis na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la de 'khus pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[147b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sman gyi rgyal po khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams smras pas/_sems can mang po'i don byas shing sman gyi rgyal po sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba byas pa legs 
[\[147b.5\]]so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang /_chos smra ba 'di lta bu dag gi ched du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/_
[\[147b.6\]]des chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag la glags lta ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed pa 'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po 'am/_srul po'am/_gshed byed dam/_grul bum mam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[147b.7\]]dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pas de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_dz+wa le/_ma hA dz+wa le/_uk+ke/_muk+ke/_a De a Da ba ti/_nr-i T+ye nr-i T+yA ba ti/_iT+Ti ni/_biT+Ti/_tsiT+Ti ni/_nr-i Ta Ti ni/_nr-i Ta TU ba ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/_gang gis chos smra ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dang 'gal bar bgyis na/_de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'khus pa lags so/_/de 
[\[148a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag la glo ba brtse bas sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/
[\[148a.3\]]tad+ya thA/_aT Ta/_naT Te/_ta naT Te/_a na te nA ti/_ku na Ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis chos smra ba de dag la dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin cing /_chos smra ba de dag la 
[\[148a.4\]]yang bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur/_bde legs su bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_'khor der 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa 
[\[148a.5\]]gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa/_chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung 
[\[148a.6\]]ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a ga Ne ga Ne/_gau ri/_gan d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_ma tang gi/_puka ka si/_sang ku le/_bru Sha lI swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni sangs 
[\[148a.7\]]rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/_gang zhig chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag dang 'gal bar bgyid na/_de dag thams cad la 'khus pa lags so/_/de nas srin mo 'phyang ma zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo rnam par 'phyang ma zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo so brtsegs zhes 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]bya ba dang /_srin mo me tog so zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo cod pan so zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo skra can zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo me zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo phreng ba 'chang zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo mdung can zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo sems can thams cad kyi mdangs 'phrog ces bya ba 
[\[148b.2\]]dang /_'phrog ma bu dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_srin mo de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_srin mo de dag thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde 'di 'dzin 
[\[148b.3\]]pa chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/ci nas chos smra ba de dag la glags lta ba dang skabs tshol bdag gis kyang glags mi rnyed par bgyi'o/_/de nas srin mo de dag thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu tshig 
[\[148b.4\]]'thun par bcom ldan 'das la gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag phul lo/_/tad+ya thA/_i ti me/_i ti me/_i ti me/_i ti me/_i ti me/_ni me/_ni me/_ni me/_ni me/_ni me/_ru he/_ru he/_ru he/_ru he/_ru he/_ha ste/_ha ste/_ha ste/_ha ste/_ha ste swA hA/_'di spyi bor bzhag nas chos smra ba 
[\[148b.5\]]rnams la su yang 'khu bar ma gyur cig_/gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha za'am/_srul po'am/_gshed byed dam/_ro langs sam/_rengs pa'am/_gnon po'am/_brjed byed kyi gzugs sam/_gnod sbyin gyis byas pa'am/_mis byas pa'am/_mi ma 
[\[148b.6\]]yin pas byas pa'am/_rims nad nyin gcig pa'am/_nyin gnyis pa'am/_nyin gsum pa'am/_nyin bzhi pa'am/_rtag pa'i rims sam/_tha na rmi lam na yang bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes pa'i gzugs sam/_khye'u'i gzugs sam/_bu mo'i gzugs 
[\[148b.7\]]kyis tho 'tshams par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/de nas srin mo de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/gang gis gsang sngags 'di thos nas/_/chos smra ba dang 'gal bgyid pa/_/de'i mgo tshal 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]pa bdun du 'gas/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa/_/ma bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang /_/pha bsad 'gro ba gang lags pa'i/_/'gro ba de ni der mchi'o/_/gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa/_/til 'tshir dag gi 'gro gang dang /_/
[\[149a.2\]]til rdung 'gro ba gang lags pa'i/_/'gro ba der ni de mchi'o/_/gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa/_/srang la g.yo bgyid 'gro gang dang /_/bre 'chos 'gro ba gang lags pa'i/_/'gro ba der ni de mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_mdung can la sogs pa srin mo de dag gis 
[\[149a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa spang ba dang dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo de 
[\[149a.4\]]dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye srin mo dag legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis chos smra ba de dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bgyis shig_/gang dag tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pa de dag la yang /_mdung can khyod 'khor dang bcas pas 
[\[149a.5\]]bsrung bar bya na/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin pa dang glegs bam du byas te/_rim gro byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_
[\[149a.6\]]'bru mar gyi mar me'am/_mar gyi mar me'am/_spos mar gyi mar me'am/_tsam pa ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/_par sha ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/_ud pa la'i mar gyi mar me'am/_sna ma'i mar gyi mar me'am/_de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po brgya stong gis rim 
[\[149a.7\]]gro byed pa lta ci smos te/_mdung can khyod g.yog dang bcas pas bsrung bar bya'o/_/gzungs sngags kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las gzungs sngags kyi le'u 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[149b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na rgyu ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 'di dka' ba bgyid pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag gda'/_bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[149b.3\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis thos nas thams cad dga' mgu rangs shing 
[\[149b.4\]]yid bde bar 'gyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po'i spyod pa gang ci lags pa'i phyogs tsam zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[149b.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[149b.6\]]stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes 
[\[149b.7\]]bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgyad cu'i 'dus pa chen po byung ngo /_/gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa byung ngo /_/de'i bstan pa la bud med med par gyur to/_/
[\[150a.2\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang lag mthil ltar mnyam la nyams dga' bar gyur to/_/lha'i bai dUr+ya las grub pa'i sa phyogs rin po che dang tsan dan gyi shing ljon pas brgyan zhing /_rin 
[\[150a.3\]]po che'i dra bas bres pa dar gyi lda ldi mngon par rab tu spyangs pa rin po che'i pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung thams cad na rin po che'i mkha' rten mda' rgyang gang gi tshad tsam byas pa yod pa/_rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad kyi steng na lha'i bu bye ba 
[\[150a.4\]]brgya dag_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_sil snyan byed cing pheg rdob pa dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems 
[\[150a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba las brtsams te/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/_nyan thos chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rgyas par rab tu ston to/_/skar ma'i 
[\[150a.6\]]rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri nyis stong du gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[150a.7\]]dang nyan thos chen po de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de yang /_bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la dka' ba byed pa la brtson par gyur te/_de lo khri nyis stong du 'chag pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]la zhugs shing brtson 'grus chen po brtsams pas rnal 'byor la brtson par gyur to/_/de lo khri nyis stong 'das nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can 
[\[150b.2\]]thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas gzungs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[150b.3\]]bdag gis thob po snyam mo/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba yang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal 
[\[150b.4\]]dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o snyam nas/_de'i tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma 
[\[150b.5\]]thag tu/_de'i mod la steng gi bar snang las me tog man dA ra dang /_man dA ra chen po'i lha'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab po/_/dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyis sprin byas te/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char chen po mngon par bab ste/_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu 
[\[150b.6\]]rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de lta bu'i spos kyi rnam pa zho gnyis kyi rin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dis mi chog go/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na 
[\[150b.7\]]dga' ba dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/_/langs nas 'di snyam du sems te ci ltar lus yongs su btang ba ltar ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de de'i tshe/_a ga ru dang /_du ru ka dang /_pog gi khu ba za zhing tsam pa ka'i mar yang 'thung ngo /_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa 
[\[151a.2\]]mngon par shes pa/_rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/_rtag tu spos za zhing tsam pa ka'i mar 'thung bas lo bcu gnyis 'das par gyur to/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_
[\[151a.3\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/_lo bcu gnyis po de 'das nas rang gi lus lha'i ras kyis kun tu dkris nas 'bru mar gyis zhen par byas te bdag gi byin gyis brlabs byas so/_/bdag gis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[151a.4\]]byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gi lus la me 'bar bar byas so/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[151a.5\]]chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus kyi mar me 'bar ba de'i 'od kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed khyab par gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed thams 
[\[151a.6\]]cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa yang dag pa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pa yang dag pa ste/_me tog dang /_bdug 
[\[151a.7\]]pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang /_zang zing gis mchod pa dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos mchod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'di ni mchog 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]ste/_rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/bu dang chung ma phangs pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa yang de lta ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi lus gtong ba'i chos kyi mchod pa 'di ni mchod pa khyad par can no/_/dam pa'o/_/mchog go/_/phul lo/_/gya nom 
[\[151b.2\]]pa'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis tshig de skad ces gsungs nas de nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[151b.3\]]sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus la 'bar ba lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi bar ma song ngo /_/de phyis lo bcu gnyis 'das nas zhi bar gyur to/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can 
[\[151b.4\]]thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa dang chos kyi mchod pa byas te/_de nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyi gsung rab la 
[\[151b.5\]]rgyal po dri ma med pas byin pa'i khyim du skyes te/_skyil mo krung bcas bzhin du pang par rdzus te skyes par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba skyes ma thag tu/_de'i tshe rang gi pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[151b.6\]]rgyal mchog 'di na bdag 'chag cing /_/der gnas bdag gis ting 'dzin thob/_/bdag gi lus phangs yongs btang ste/_/brtson 'grus sra brtsams brtul zhugs che/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[151b.7\]]dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/_rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces yab yum bcom ldan 'das gang la bdag gis mchod nas/_sgra thams cad la mkhas pa'i gzungs thob cing /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di yang tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gtams pa dang /_dkrigs pa dang mi 'khrugs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cus/_bcom ldan 'das de las thos par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[152a.2\]]sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du mchis na legs so/_/der mchis nas yang bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas 
[\[152a.3\]]pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i tshe/_nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par skyil mo krung bcas nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[152a.4\]]de'i drung du song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis 
[\[152a.5\]]mngon par bstod do/_/dpa' bo mi dbang shin tu dri med zhal/_/phyogs bcu 'dir ni khyod kyi 'od zer mdzes/_/bde gshegs khyod la bdag gis mchod mchog bgyis/_/mgon po lta ba'i slad du bdag 'dir mchis/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_
[\[152a.6\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[152a.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod da dung bzhugs sam/_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste/_rigs kyi bu nga tshe zad pa'i dus la bab kyis rigs kyi bu khyod song la/_nga'i khri shoms shig dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/
[\[152b.2\]]skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na 
[\[152b.3\]]dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu bstan pa 'di ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dang /_nyan thos chen po 'di dag dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag dang /_rin po 
[\[152b.4\]]che'i mkha' rten 'di dag dang /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'di dag dang nga'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yongs su gtad do/_/rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gang yin pa de dag kyang yongs su gtad do/_/rigs kyi bu nga'i ring bsrel la 
[\[152b.5\]]khyod kyis kyang mchod pa rgya cher gyis shig_/ring bsrel de dag kyang rgyas par gyis shig_/mchod rten stong phrag mang po gyis shig_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[152b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de la de ltar rjes su bstan nas/_de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs 
[\[152b.7\]]su mya ngan las 'das so/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de yongs su 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das par rig ste/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po spungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsregs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshig pa zhi bar rig nas ring bsrel bsdus te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don to/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas 
[\[153a.2\]]pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba ngus te cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug nas/_de dag gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[153a.3\]]ring bsrel bcug ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa gdugs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan pa dar dang dril bu legs par spyangs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/_des mchod rten de dag byas nas 'di snyam du bsams te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[153a.4\]]nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa ni byas na de bas kyang lhag pa ches khyad par du 'phags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[153a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[153a.6\]]'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de'i ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa bya bar soms shig_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[153a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdun du/_rang gi lag pa bsod nams brgyas brgyan pa 'bar bar byas te/_'bar bar byas pas lo bdun khri nyis stong gi bar du de bzhin 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la mchod pa byas so/_/des mchod pa de byas pas 'khor de las nyan thos grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong btul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/
[\[153b.2\]]skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de yan lag ma tshang bar mthong 
[\[153b.3\]]nas ngus te cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don cing gcig la gcig 'di skad du smras te bdag cag gi slob dpon rjes su ston pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 'di da ltar yan lag ma tshang zhing lag pa med par gyur to zhes zer ro/_/skar 
[\[153b.4\]]ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang lha'i bu de dag la smras pa rigs kyi bu 
[\[153b.5\]]dag kho bo'i yan lag nyams par mthong bas ma ngu shig_/cho nges ma 'debs shig_/smre sngags ma 'don cig_/rigs kyi bu dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i 
[\[153b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kho bos dpang du bzhag ste/_de dag gi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lag pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir yongs su btang bas/_bdag gi lus gser 
[\[153b.7\]]gyi kha dog tu 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/_bdag gi lag pa 'di sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig_/sa chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos par gyur cig_/bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog gi char chen po phob shig ces byas so/_/skar ma'i rgyal po 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/_bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs de byas ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[154a.2\]]rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i lag pa de yang /_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi bsod 
[\[154a.3\]]nams kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa des sngon gyi bzhin du gyur to/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur 
[\[154a.4\]]pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/_khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[154a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi 
[\[154a.6\]]rgyal po bya dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed byed do/_/lus yongs su gtong ba yang byed do/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[154a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la rkang pa'i mthe bong 'bar bar bya'o/_/lag pa'i sor mo'am rkang pa'i sor mo gcig gam yan lag gcig gam lag pa 'bar bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do/_/rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no/_/chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo phangs pa yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nags tshal dang 
[\[154b.2\]]bcas pa rgya mtsho dang bcas pa ri dang bcas pa 'bab chu'i dngo dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dang khron pa dang kun dga'i ra ba dang bcas pa yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems 
[\[154b.3\]]dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin na/_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog 
[\[154b.4\]]kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las/_tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[154b.5\]]gcig tsam 'dzin pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed pa de snyed du mi skyed de/_de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni de bas ches mang bar bshad kyi/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[154b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na 'bab chu'i dngo dang mtsho dang mtshe'u thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho ni mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/skar 
[\[154b.7\]]ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bshad pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa/_'di lta ste dper na ri nag po dang khor yug dang khor yug chen po thams cad kyi nang na ri rab ni ri'i rgyal po ste mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams 
[\[155a.2\]]cad kyi nang na/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyal po ste mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_'di lta ste dper na skar ma thams cad kyi nang na zla ba ni 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal 
[\[155a.3\]]po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zla ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag par 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/skar ma'i 
[\[155a.4\]]rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 
[\[155a.5\]]mi dge ba'i mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_'di lta ste dper na/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na brgya byin ni lha rnams kyi dbang po yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par 
[\[155a.6\]]shes pa/_de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dbang po yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni 
[\[155a.7\]]tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad kyi rgyal po ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na pha'i bya ba byed do/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang byang chub 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la pha'i bya ba byed do/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_'di lta ste dper na/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[155b.2\]]thams cad las 'das pa'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad las 'das shing mngon par 'phags te/_mchog tu gyur par 
[\[155b.3\]]rig par bya'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur par rig par bya'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_'di lta ste dper na/_nyan thos dang 
[\[155b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' ni mchog ces bya'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na mchog 
[\[155b.5\]]ces bya'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_'di lta ste dper na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi rgyal por thabs gsol ba yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu 
[\[155b.6\]]rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_dam pa'i 
[\[155b.7\]]chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/_sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed pa ste/_skom pa rnams la mtshe'u dang 'dra'o/_/grang bas nyen pa rnams la me dang 'dra'o/_/gcer bu rnams la gos 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]dang 'dra'o/_/tshong pa rnams la ded dpon dang 'dra'o/_/bu rnams la ma dang 'dra'o/_/pha rol du 'gro ba rnams la gru dang 'dra'o/_/nad pa rnams la sman pa dang 'dra'o/_/mun pa mun gnag gis bsgribs pa rnams la mar me dang 'dra'o/_/nor 'dod pa rnams la rin po 
[\[156a.2\]]che dang 'dra'o/_/khams kyi rgyal po thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'dra'o/_/'bab chu rnams la rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/_/mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel ba'i phyir sgron ma dang 'dra'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de bzhin du dam pa'i 
[\[156a.3\]]chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o/_/nad thams cad gcod pa'o/_/'khor ba'i bcing ba nyam nga ba thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_gang gis dam 
[\[156a.4\]]pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang gang yi ger 'dri ba dang gang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam bstan tam/_thos sam/_yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 
[\[156a.5\]]'drir 'jug gam/_glegs bam du byas te/_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_btsun par byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_
[\[156a.6\]]rol mo'i sgra dang /_na bza' dang /_thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang /_mar gyi mar me'am/_'bru mar gyi mar me'am/_spos mar gyi mar me'am/_tsam pa ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/_sna ma dang skya snar dang /_bar sha ka dang /_na pa ma li ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/_mchod pa rnam pa mang 
[\[156a.7\]]po dag gis bsti stang du byed/_btsun par byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de dag gi mtha' ni/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/_/skar 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_gang zhig sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang nyan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[156b.2\]]bud med gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin na/_de nyid bud med kyi lus kyi mtha' mar 'gyur ro/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_bud med gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di lnga brgya pa tha ma la thos nas nan tan 
[\[156b.3\]]byed pa de/_'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bzhugs te 
[\[156b.4\]]'tsho zhing gzhes pa der/_de pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur te/_zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis ma yin nga rgyal gyis ma yin ser snas ma yin khro bas ma yin gnod sems kyis ma yin te/_de skyes 
[\[156b.5\]]ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/_de bzhin 
[\[156b.6\]]gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gi dbang po yongs su dag pa gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar de'i mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[156b.7\]]de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te/_gang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i gsung rab la lung 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]mnos pa dang kha don byas pa dang bsgoms pa dang bsams pa dang yid la byas pa dang sems can gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mes tshig pa'am chus khyer bar 
[\[157a.2\]]mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas brgya stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mo/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal to/_/dgra'i tsher ma dkrugs so/_/sangs rgyas brgya stong gis byin 
[\[157a.3\]]gyis brlabs so/_/rigs kyi bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod 'dra ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang /_khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang rung /_ye shes kyis kyang 
[\[157a.4\]]rung /_shes rab kyis kyang rung /_ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang rung ste/_zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/skar ma'i 
[\[157a.5\]]rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa thos nas/_legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur/_de'i lus las kyang tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[157a.6\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi phan yon de dag ni/_ngas da ltar gang dag bshad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[157a.7\]]dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di ci nas/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod cing nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang klu dang gnod 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]sbyin dang dri za dang grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can nad pa nad kyis btab pa rnams la sman lta 
[\[157b.2\]]bur 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par byas te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lus la nad kyis mi zug go/_/rga bas ma yin dus ma yin par 'chi bas ma yin no/_/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang 
[\[157b.3\]]dag par zhugs pa gang la las/_mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu de mthong na/_de la tsan dan gyi phye ma dang ud pal sngon pos mngon par gtor bar bya'o/_/mngon par gtor nas kyang 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/_'di ni rtswa len par 
[\[157b.4\]]'gyur/_'di ni byang chub kyi snying por rtswa 'ding bar 'gyur/_'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur/_'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur/_'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung bar 'gyur/_'di ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/skar ma'i 
[\[157b.5\]]rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong nas de ltar sems bskyed par byas te/_de ltar na de'i yon tan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[157b.6\]]ci 'dra ba dag bshad pa de 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/_sgra thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[157b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang des kyang /_skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/_de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe/_
[\[158a.2\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ste/_'od des shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag khyab par byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[158a.3\]]kyi bye ma snyed de dag 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[158a.4\]]zhing gzhes la/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des mdzod spu nas 'od gang 
[\[158a.5\]]btang ba des/_de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dge 
[\[158a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mthong zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin mang po thob pa 'di lta ste/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung 
[\[158a.7\]]rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_dri ma med pas byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_skar ma'i rgyal po rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_rlung lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_zla ba sgron ma'i ting 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]nge 'dzin thob/_sgra thams cad la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_bsod nams thams cad kun las bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_dad pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_ye shes ta la la'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_bkod pa'i 
[\[158b.2\]]rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thob/_dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_zad par chub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_nyi ma'i 'khor ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 
[\[158b.3\]]kyis/_ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du thob par 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs de'i lus la 'od des phog par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[158b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[158b.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po de yang blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin pa de yang 
[\[158b.6\]]blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de yang blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa khyad par can de yang blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de yang blta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b.7\]]sman yang dag 'phags de yang blta ba'i slad du/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas/_byang 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song ste phyin nas/_ngan pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de ni mthon dman 
[\[159a.2\]]can dang /_sa las grub pa dang /_ri nag pos gang ba dang /_'jim ngan gyis yongs su gang ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang sku thung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang 
[\[159a.3\]]lus thung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lus thob pa ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong ngo /_rigs kyi bu nga'i lus ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod do/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gzugs bzang ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_bsod nams 
[\[159a.4\]]brgya stong bas shin tu lhag pa'i dpal dang ldan pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la ngan pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub 
[\[159a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[159a.6\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 
[\[159a.7\]]mchi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma g.yos shing /_stan de las ma langs par 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dbyangs de ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gdan gyi drung du/_pad ma chu ba ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad ma dang ne tso'am ci las grub pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[159b.2\]]brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_pad ma bkod pa byung ba de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[159b.3\]]'das 'di ltar chu ba ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad ma dang ne tso'am ci las grub pa'i pad ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[159b.4\]]bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal 'di ni shar phyogs logs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun 
[\[159b.5\]]tu rgyas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar 
[\[159b.6\]]po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs ci bgyis na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[159b.7\]]tshogs bsags pa des 'di lta bu'i khyad par 'di thob/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin gang la spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mnyan par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de la spyad par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po de ci 'dra ba dang kha dog ci 'dra ba dang gzugs ci 'dra ba dang rtags ci 'dra ba dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba dang de'i spyod pa ci lags pa/_bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das brda ltas gang gis 
[\[160a.2\]]bskul ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brda ltas shig de bzhin gshegs pas legs par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[160a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/ci nas brda ltas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'jig 
[\[160a.4\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi ba de lta bu'i brda ltas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang gis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[160a.5\]]dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs bskul ba'i phyir/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthu mthong bar dga' bas rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir shog cig ces de lta bu'i brda mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[160a.6\]]sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_byang chub sems 
[\[160a.7\]]dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_zhing dag ni rab tu 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]g.yo bar byed/_pad ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len cing /_mig ni ud pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/_bzhin ni zla ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag_/lus kyi mdog ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra la/_lus bsod nams brgya stong gis 
[\[160b.2\]]ni brgyan/_dpal gyi sa ni rab tu 'bar/_gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu lhang nger gyur/_lus ni mtshan rnams kyis rnam par spras/_lus sred med kyi bu'i lus ltar ni mkhregs pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/_nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam nas byang chub 
[\[160b.3\]]sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'ongs te/_de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba dang bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/_khang pa brtsegs pa de nas babs te/_brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing /_bcom ldan 
[\[160b.4\]]'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mu tig gi phreng ba phul lo/_/phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[160b.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar gnas sam zhes snyun gsol 
[\[160b.6\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad ces kyang gsung ste/_bcom ldan 'das khyod bzod dam/_gzhes sam/_khams rnams 'thun nam/_khyod kyi sems can rnams go sla'am/_gdul sla'am/_gso sla'am/_gtsang ma 'dod dam/_ha cang 'dod chags mi spyod dam/_
[\[160b.7\]]ha cang zhe sdang mi spyod dam/_ha cang gti mug mi spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can dag shin tu phrag dog can ma yin nam/_ser sna can ma yin nam/_mar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/_phar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/_dge slong du mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/_bram zer mi 'dzin 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa ma yin nam/_log par lta ba ma yin nam/_sems ma dul ba ma yin nam/_dbang po ma bsrungs pa ma yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can de dag gis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mam/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[161a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang de/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs pa chos gsan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gshegs sam/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la 
[\[161a.3\]]yang bcom ldan 'das de 'dri ba/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang de bzod dam/_gzhes sam/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang ring du gzhes sam zhes gsung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[161a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[161a.5\]]pas legs par bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[161a.6\]]rin chen mang de la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang mthong 
[\[161a.7\]]bar 'tshal nas mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod nga dang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa legs so 
[\[161b.2\]]legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drung du sngon dge 
[\[161b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bskrun/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[161b.4\]]dus na bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams gzugs thams cad shin tu ston par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[161b.5\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di 'jig rten du byung ste/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra 
[\[161b.6\]]rgyal po de la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis sil snyan brgya stong rab tu blangs te/_lo khri nyis stong du mchod pa byas so/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi snod brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal 
[\[161b.7\]]po'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis de lta bu'i dad pa thob po/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po la mchod pa byas shing 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]snod brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phul ba de/_gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[162a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la mchod pa byas pa dang /_snod de dag kyang phul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di nyid yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang 
[\[162a.3\]]po'i dbyangs de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'dis sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[162a.4\]]bye ma snyed mthong ngo /_/pad ma'i dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di mthong ngam/_pad ma'i dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[162a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ni/_gzugs mang pos dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te/_'di lta ste/_la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni brgya 
[\[162a.6\]]byin gyi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni mchog gi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni 
[\[162a.7\]]khams kyi rgyal po'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni tshong dpon gyi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni grong mi'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]la lar ni dge slong gi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni dge slong ma'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni dge bsnyen gyi gzugs kyis/_la lar ni dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni tshong dpon gyi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/_
[\[162b.2\]]la lar ni grong mi'i chung ma'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni khye'u'i gzugs kyis/_la lar ni bu mo'i gzugs kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/_rigs 
[\[162b.3\]]kyi bu gzugs 'di snyed cig kun tu ston pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to/_/kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi bar gyis/_byang chub sems 
[\[162b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to/_/kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi gzugs kyis/_kha cig la ni nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis/_kha cig la ni mi'am ci'i 
[\[162b.5\]]gzugs kyis/_kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to/_/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[162b.6\]]dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang mi khom par skyes pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs skyob par 'gyur ro/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang byang chub sems 
[\[162b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/pad ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la skyob pa ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di de snyed kyi gzugs su 
[\[163a.2\]]sprul pas/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/_skyes bu dam pa 'di rdzu 'phrul yang nyams pa med/_shes rab kyang nyams pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye 
[\[163a.3\]]shes kyi snang ba 'di snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na yang /_byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'di byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/nyan thos 
[\[163a.4\]]kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin 
[\[163a.5\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ston to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdag yongs su mya 
[\[163a.6\]]ngan las 'das par ston to/_/pad ma'i dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[163a.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'di/_bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/_sems can 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]'di snyed btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[163b.2\]]stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di ltar sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byas pa ni/_gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yin no/_/sang sang po'i 
[\[163b.3\]]dbyangs kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang lhan cig tu/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[163b.4\]]gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa de dag gis kyang /_gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 
[\[163b.5\]]'dzin thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[163b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten la yangs shing rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/_zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/_pad ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_sil snyan 
[\[163b.7\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len cing /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/_lhan cig tu slar rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bdag gis sems can gyi don byas so/_/
[\[164a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten yang mthong ngo /_/phyag kyang bgyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang mthong ste phyag bgyis so/_/'jam 
[\[164a.3\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi shugs thob pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pa de yang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[164a.4\]]brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad kyis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri 
[\[164a.5\]]nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis kyang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/_sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi 
[\[164a.6\]]le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/_
[\[164a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ci'i slad du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi/_de skad ces 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gang dag myong bar gyur pa de dag gis/_/gal te byang
