[\[164b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming thos na/_de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[164b.3\]]gi ming 'dzin pa de dag_/gal te me'i phung po chen por lhung na yang /_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/_me'i phung po chen po de las rab tu 'bar ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[164b.4\]]gal te chu klung dag gis khyer la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/_chu klung de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag thams cad gting tshugs par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[164b.5\]]stong rgya mtsho'i nang du grur zhugs te/_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_byi ru dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po la sogs pa'i phyir dong ba de rnams/_rlung nag pos srin mo'i gling du 
[\[164b.6\]]'phangs par gyur la/_de na sems can gcig 'ga' zhig gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/_de dag thams cad srin mo'i gling de nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras 
[\[164b.7\]]gzigs dbang phyug ces btags so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te bsad par bkri ba las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/_gshed ma de dag gi mtshon de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing grugs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]'di gnod sbyin dang srin pos gang bar gyur kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa la/_de dag thams cad kyi sdang ba'i sems kyis lta yang mi phod do/_/rigs kyi bu sems can la la lcags sgrog dang /_
[\[165a.2\]]shing sgrog tu bcug par gyur na nyes yod kyang rung nyes med kyang rung na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming nas phyung bas/_lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog tu bcug pa de dag gi bu ga bye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[165a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yon can dang chom rkun dang dgra lag na mtshon thogs pas sa gang bar gyur te/_der ded dpon gcig gis 
[\[165a.4\]]'dron po mang po phal po che rin po ches phyug pa ded de dong ba las/_'dong ba de dag gis g.yon can chom rkun dang dgra lag na mtshon thogs pa de dag mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste bdag cag skyabs med par shes pa las ded dpon des 'dron po 
[\[165a.5\]]mang po la 'di skad ces ma 'jigs shig_/rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sgra skad gcig tu bos shig dang /_des khyod chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang dgra'i 
[\[165a.6\]]'jigs pa 'di las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo la/_de nas 'dron po mang po thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos te/_'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[165a.7\]]dbang phyug de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ming nas phyung ma thag tu/_'dron po phal po che de dag thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag 'dod chags spyod pa de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag zhe sdang spyod pa de dag gis/_
[\[165b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag gti mug spyod pa de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na gti 
[\[165b.3\]]mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu/_bud med bu pho 'dod pa gang la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 
[\[165b.4\]]phyag 'tshal na de las bu pho 'byung ste/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa khye'u'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'byung ngo /_/gang bu mo 'dod pa de yang bu mo 'byung ste/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na 
[\[165b.5\]]sdug pa bu mo'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/_/gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[165b.6\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal ba de dag don yod pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin la/_gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[165b.7\]]gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang /_yang gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyis mchod pa byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de tsam zhig skyed/_de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub 
[\[166a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de las bsod nams bskyed pa ni bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/
[\[166a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la bkur sti byas pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_gang gis tha na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 
[\[166a.4\]]phyag lan gcig byas pa dang /_ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gnyi ga mnyam ste lhag pa yang med 'phags pa yang med do/_/gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin 
[\[166a.5\]]pa dang /_gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyi ga bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang zad par bya ba sla ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[166a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams de ltar dpag tu med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[166a.7\]]ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na rnam par rgyu/_ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]phyug gi thabs mkhas pa'i yul ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[166b.2\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag yod do/_/gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[166b.3\]]po'i gzugs kyis chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang yod do/_/sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/kha cig la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis/_
[\[166b.4\]]kha cig la tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/_kha cig la brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/_sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dri za'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 
[\[166b.5\]]la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/dbang phyug gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/'khor los 
[\[166b.6\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/sha zas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni sha za'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/mchog gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni mchog gi gzugs 
[\[166b.7\]]kyis chos ston to/_/dmag dpon gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/bram zes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni lag 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]na rdo rje'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan 
[\[167a.2\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod cig_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ste/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na mi 'jigs pa sbyin 
[\[167a.3\]]pa zhes kun gyis shes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[167a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na byin cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas bdag gi mgul nas brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi do shal bkrol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[167a.5\]]dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab par byin te/_skyes bu dam pa bdag las chos kyi dgab pa 'di longs shig_/des ma blangs nas de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[167a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mu tig gi do shal 'di bdag la snying brtse ba'i phyir longs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/_
[\[167a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la snying brtse ba dang /_'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]yin pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa las mu tig gi do shal blangs so/_/blangs nas cha gnyis su bgos te bgos nas cha gcig ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phul lo/_/cha gcig ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[167b.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi rin po che'i mchod rten la phul lo/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pas rnam par 
[\[167b.3\]]rgyu'o/_/de la de'i chos nyid ni 'di skad ces bya'o/_/rgyal mtshan khra bos blo gros mi zad la/_/de yi don gyi rgyu ni kun dris pa/_/rgyal ba'i sras po 'di ltar ci yi phyir/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes 'di bgyi/_/de nas de yis phyogs rnams kun bltas te/_/smon 
[\[167b.4\]]lam rgya mtsho blo gros mi zad pas/_/rgyal mtshan khra bo de la 'di skad smras/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyod pa nyon/_/bskal pa bsam yas bye ba du ma brgyar/_/sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mang po la/_/smon lam ji ltar rab tu rnam par sbyangs/_/de dag kho 
[\[167b.5\]]bos rab tu bshad kyis nyon/_/mnyan par byed cing lta bar byed pa dang /_/rim gyis de ltar rjes su dran pa yang /_/srog chags rnams ni 'bras bu yod par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan thams cad sol/_/gal te gsod pas me yi dong du yang /_/gsad 
[\[167b.6\]]par bya ba'i phyir ni bor ba'i mis/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/chus btab bzhin du me dag zhi bar 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho dang ni mya ngam rgal na yang /_/klu dang 'byung po lha ma yin gnas su/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/chu yi nang du nam 
[\[167b.7\]]yang mi nub bo/_/rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis gsad pa'i phyir/_/ri rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/nyi ma lta bur nam mkha' gnas par 'gyur/_/gal te rdo rje yi ni ri dag kyang /_/gsad pa'i phyir ni spyi bor 'ongs na yang /_/
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/ba spu'i khung tsam gtses par mi nus so/_/gsad pa'i sems kyis lag na mtshon thogs te/_/dgra tshogs mang pos kun tu bskor na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/de ma thag 
[\[168a.2\]]tu byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/_/gal te gsod pa nye bar 'ongs nas su/_/gshed ma mi yi dbang du gyur na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/de yi mtshon cha dum bu dum bur 'gyur/_/de ste shing ngam lcags las byas pa yi/_/khong sgril dang 
[\[168a.3\]]ni gdos kyis bcings na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/bcings pa myur du rnam par bcad par 'gyur/_/sngags dang stobs dang sman dang rig sngags dang /_/ro langs pa dang 'byung po lus 'jigs pa/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 
[\[168a.4\]]dran na ni/_/gang nas rab tu btang ba de slar 'gro/_/gnod sbyin lha min 'byung po klu 'bar ba/_/mdangs 'phrog pa yis yongs su bskor na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/ba spu'i khung tsam gtses par yong mi nus/_/mche ba sen rnon rab tu 
[\[168a.5\]]'jigs pa yi/_/gcan gzan ma rungs pa yis bskor na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/myur bar phyogs kun tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mig 'jigs me lce lta bur 'od 'phro ba/_/mig dug can gyis yongs su bskor na yang /_/spyan 
[\[168a.6\]]ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/shin tu myur bar gdug pa med par 'gyur/_/bzang po'i glog kyang 'byung zhing stug pa yi/_/sprin las lce dang ser ba char 'bab pa/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/de ma thag tu myur bar rab tu zhi/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[168a.7\]]mang po brgya yis gtses pa dang /_/sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba'i sems can mthong /_/ye shes dge ba'i stobs kyis spyan ras gzigs/_/de bas lhar bcas 'gro ba skyob pa po/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis pha rol song ba ste/_/thabs dang ye shes yangs 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]pa bslabs pas na/_/phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba mang po thams cad dang /_/ma lus zhing kun du yang rab tu snang /_/srog chags rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa dang /_/mi khom pa dang sems can dmyal ba dang /_/byol song dang ni gshin rjes bskor ba yang /_/skye rga na 
[\[168b.2\]]bas gzir ba mthar zhi byed/_/shin tu dge ba'i spyan de byams pa'i spyan/_/thabs dang shes rab khyad par yod pa'i spyan/_/snying rje'i spyan dang byams pa'i spyan dang ldan/_/zhal bzang spyan bzang shin tu lta 'dod pa/_/dri ma med pa dri ma [(]bal [,]bral [)]ba'i 'od/_/rab rib med pa 
[\[168b.3\]]ye shes nyi ma'i 'od/_/sprin gyis chod par gyur pa med pa'i 'od/_/'jig rten dag na lhag ge lhang nger mdzes/_/snying rje las byung tshul khrims grags pa ste/_/dge ba'i yon tan byams yid sprin chen po/_/srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs me zhi byed/_/chos kyi char pa 
[\[168b.4\]]bdud rtsi rab tu 'bebs/_/thab mo dang ni rtsod cing 'gyed pa yi/_/'jigs chen g.yul ngor skyes bu song na yang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/_/de ma thag tu dgra rnams rab tu zhi/_/sprin gyi sgra dang rnga bo che yi sgra/_/'brug gi sgra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan pa/_/
[\[168b.5\]]dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor pha rol phyin pa ste/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran par bya/_/dag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang po/_/the tshom ma za dran byos dran par gyis/_/'chi ba'i tshe dang nyon mongs gtses pa'i tshe/_/mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 
[\[168b.6\]]yang 'gyur/_/yon tan thams cad kyi ni pha rol phyin/_/sems can kun la snying rje byams pa'i spyan/_/yang dag yon tan yon tan rgya mtsho che/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang por phyag byar 'os/_/'di ltar 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse ba/_/phyi ma'i dus na sangs rgyas 
[\[168b.7\]]su yang 'gyur/_/'jigs dang mya ngan thams cad 'jig byed pa/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang de ni dran par bya/_/'jig rten dbang gi rgyal po gtso bo ste/_/dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten mchod/_/bskal pa brgya phrag mang po spyad nas su/_/rdul bral bla 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]na med pa'i byang chub 'thob/_/'dren pa snang ba mtha' yas g.yas g.yon nas/_/bsil yab thogs te de bzhin g.yob cing 'dug_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang /_/zhing rnams kun tu song nas rgyal ba mchod/_/nub kyi phyogs na bde ba'i 
[\[169a.2\]]'byung gnas te/_/rdul bral 'jig rten khams 'di bde ba can/_/de na sems can kha lo sgyur ba yi/_/'dren pa tshe mtha' yas pa'ang da ltar bzhugs/_/der ni bud med rnams kyang mi 'byung ste/_/rnam pa kun tu g.yem pa'i chos med do/_/rgyal ba'i sras po de dag rdzus te 
[\[169a.3\]]skye/_/dri ma med pa'i pad ma'i snying por 'dug_/'dren pa tshe mtha' yas pa de nyid kyang /_/pad ma'i snying po dri med dga' ba la/_/seng ge'i khri la rab tu bzhugs pa yang /_/sA la'i rgyal po lta bur rnam par mdzes/_/'jig rten 'dren pa 'di yang de bzhin te/_/srid pa 
[\[169a.4\]]gsum na de 'dra yong med do/_/gang gis spyan ras gzigs dbang ming thos pa/_/de yi bsod nams dag ni zad mi 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga 
[\[169a.5\]]sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das su dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi le'u/_byang 
[\[169a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags 
[\[169a.7\]]so/_/kun nas sgo'i le'u bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/_'khor de las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]dkar po las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[169b.2\]]kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[169b.3\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 
[\[169b.4\]]byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la/_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/rigs 
[\[169b.5\]]kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la bu gnyis shig yod de gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i snying po/_gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i mig ste/_khye'u de gnyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan shes rab dang ldan bsod nams dang ldan ye shes dang ldan te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 
[\[169b.6\]]brtson par gyur to/_/'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs 
[\[169b.7\]]mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la brtson par gyur te/_thams cad kyi pha rol tu son par gyur to/_/dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]song ngo /_/rgyu skar dang skar ma dang nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo /_/dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo /_/dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo /_/dpa' rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo /_/gzi 
[\[170a.2\]]brjid chen po'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de yang de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba dang /_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/_/
[\[170a.3\]]rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig_/bdag cag skyed pa'i ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/_bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yum tshur spyon/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[170a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[170a.5\]]rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud de/_ci'i slad du zhe na yum bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de/_lha 
[\[170a.6\]]dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad kyis de mnyan pa'i phyir bzhud do/_/rigs kyi bu dag la de skad ces smras nas/_rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas/_khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang dri 
[\[170a.7\]]ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di bram ze la dad pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba'i phyir 'gror mi ster ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas/_khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas/_bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes te/_bdag cag chos kyi rgyal po'i bu ma lags pa ste/_rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas/_khye'u de 
[\[170b.2\]]dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis bdag cag gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_cho 'phrul cung zad cig legs par ston cig dang khyed la dad par 'gyur yang srid kyis/_sems dad par gyur na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[170b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gan du 'dong bar gnang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis/_de'i tshe ta la bdun tsam du 
[\[170b.4\]]nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i cho 'phrul zung du byed de/_de dag nam mkha' bar snang de la dong nas nyal bar byed do/_/bar snang de la 'chag go/_/bar snang de la rdul sprug go/_/bar snang 
[\[170b.5\]]de nyid la lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing /_lus kyi stod nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do/_/lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing /_lus kyi smad nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do/_/de dag nam mkha' de nyid la chen por gyur nas chung ngur gyur/_
[\[170b.6\]]chung ngur gyur nas chen por gyur to/_/bar snang de nyid la mi snang bar gyur te sa las byung ngo /_/sa las byung nas nam mkha' la 'phags so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de snyed kyis/_rang gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa btul lo/_/rigs 
[\[170b.7\]]kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas/_khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag mthong nas/_de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/_khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces/_rigs kyi 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]bu dag khyed kyi ston pa su/_khyed su'i slob ma zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[171a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la rin po che'i shing byang chub kyi shing drung na chos kyi gdan la bzhugs te/_lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na dam pa'i 
[\[171a.3\]]chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag cag gi ston pa ste/_rgyal po chen po bdag cag ni de'i slob ma'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs 
[\[171a.4\]]kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa lta zhing bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du bdag kyang 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis bar snang de las babs nas/_bdag cag skyed pa'i ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/_bdag cag skyed pa'i ma 
[\[171a.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yum bdag cag gi yab 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btul lags so/_/bdag cag gis yab kyi ston pa'i bgyi ba bgyis so/_/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de las rab tu 'byung na yum da ni bdag cag gtang ba'i 
[\[171a.6\]]rigs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis/_de'i tshe bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/khyim med rab tu 'byung bar ni/_/yum gyis bdag cag gnang bar mdzod/_/de 
[\[171a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dka'/_/bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bgyi/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/_/rgyal ba shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/dal ba 'byor pa'ang rnyed dka' bas/_/rab tu 'byung gis gtang du gsol/_/rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]pas smras pa/_de ring khyed gnyis gtang bar bya/_/byis pa dag go legs par deng /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed dka' bas/_/bdag kyang rab tu byung bar bya/_/rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/_bdag 
[\[171b.2\]]gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum legs so tshur spyon/_khyed dang thams cad lhan cig bzhud do/_/bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[171b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yab yum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/_u dum bA ra'i me tog dang 'dra zhing gnya' shing gi bu gar ru sbal gyi 
[\[171b.4\]]mgrin pa chud pa dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o/_/yab yum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/_de bas na yab yum bdag cag bsod nams mchog gis brtan pas gsung rab 'di lta bu la skyes te/_yab yum bdag cag btang na legs te 
[\[171b.5\]]bdag cag mchi zhing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yab yum de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[171b.6\]]mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba dang /_da ltar gyi dus na 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi rgyal po rnyed par dka' ba dang /_'di lta bu'i dal ba 'byor pa shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i slad du'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe na/_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor las slas 
[\[171b.7\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod du gyur to/_/khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang dri ma med pa'i mig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la spyad de/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ngan song thams cad ji ltar bsal snyam 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]nas/_sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la spyad par gyur to/_/khye'u de dag gi ma dri ma med pas byin pa rgyal po'i chung ma de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun bstan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gsang 
[\[172a.2\]]ba'i gnas shes so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la btul te zhugs par byas nas yongs su smin par byas te/_gnyen 'dab dang rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de dang gnyen 'dab dang 
[\[172a.3\]]rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i khye'u de gnyis kyang /_srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas te thams cad 'grogs nas lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[172a.4\]]rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de ga la ba der dong ste/_lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de 
[\[172a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa des/_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas te lhags par mkhyen nas/_chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu 
[\[172a.6\]]legs par yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la/_chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang 
[\[172a.7\]]dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pas/_de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_nu bo cod pan gyis bcings te/_rgyal por bcug nas 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bu dang gnyen 'dab dang 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de yang /_bud med kyi tshogs thams cad dang 'khor dang khye'u de gnyis dang lhan cig tu/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'grogs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[172b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_rab tu byung nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas/_lo brgyad 
[\[172b.3\]]khri bzhi stong du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam pa dang bsgom pa dang kun chub par bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/_yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad 
[\[172b.4\]]bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu de'i tshe nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[172b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu 'di gnyis ston pa lags te/_gang 'di dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis lta bar gyur pa chen po de las 
[\[172b.6\]]bzlog ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu bzhag go/_/yongs su smin par bgyis/_zhugs par bgyis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba'i slad du yang bskul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi dge ba'i bshes 
[\[172b.7\]]gnyen te/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bu'i gzugs kyis bdag gi khyim du skyes so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]me tog kun tu rgyas pas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni srid pa'i 'gro ba dang 'chi 'pho'i gnas thams 
[\[173a.2\]]cad du skyes pa na yang /_gang dag ston pa'i byed pas nye bar gnas pa dang /_gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang /_'dzud pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par sla bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po 
[\[173a.3\]]chen po 'di lta ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ltar 'dzud pa gnas 'di ni rgya che ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[173a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed la mchod pa byed do/_/sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_log par lta 
[\[173a.5\]]ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/_sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar 
[\[173a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/_bcom 
[\[173a.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi slad du/_dbu'i gtsug tor rnam par mdzes spyan dri ma ma mchis pa lags/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes shing /_zla ba dang dung ltar dkar la mdzes/_mnyam zhing thags 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pa'i tshems kyi phreng ba zhal gyi nang nas mdzes/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgros me tog bim pa ltar dmar ba dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan mdzes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/_rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba 
[\[173b.2\]]bkod pas yon tan de snyed kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la mngon par bstod nas/_yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan 
[\[173b.3\]]dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de la bstod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji 
[\[173b.4\]]tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di don che zhing /_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dul ba gsungs te/_ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa legs par bcas pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag slar 
[\[173b.5\]]sems kyi dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o/_/slar log par lta ba'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o/_/slar khro ba'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o/_/slar sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mi dge ba'i chos 'di snyed dang ldan na/_
[\[173b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du mchi bar mi 'tshal lo zhes smras te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bar 
[\[173b.7\]]snang la song ste 'chag go/_/de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang /_rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa des/_brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi bar snang la gtor to/_/mu tig gi rgyan phreng de gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]steng na/_mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa ngos mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba blta na sdug pa gnas par gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa der ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba'i khri byung ngo /_/khri de dag la de 
[\[174a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di ni mthu che zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[174a.3\]]pa'i sku khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na mdzes shing blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par gda'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas 'khor bzhi po de dag la bka' 
[\[174a.4\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pas nga'i bstan pa la dge slong gi tshul du byas 
[\[174a.5\]]nas/_bskal pa mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i 
[\[174a.6\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i 
[\[174a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan yang /_lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]sangs rgyas de yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de/_gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar 
[\[174b.2\]]mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya bar 
[\[174b.3\]]gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/_rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 
[\[174b.4\]]'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i chung mar khas blangs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u 
[\[174b.5\]]de gnyis su gyur pa de gzhan dag zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyi rgyal po dang sman yang dag 'phags 'di gnyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po dge 
[\[174b.6\]]ba bkod pa'i bur gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang /_sman yang dag 'phags gnyis yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan te/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[174b.7\]]pa'o/_/skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyi ga yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyis yang dag par 'phags so/_/gang dag skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi ming 'dzin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi sbyor 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/_rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//
[\[175a.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar/_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am 
[\[175a.3\]]ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu shar phyogs nas zhing dag ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/_pad ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/_sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu len cing /_byang chub 
[\[175a.4\]]sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i che ba nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid chen po 'bar ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[175a.5\]]theg pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 
[\[175a.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin nas/_de ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[175a.7\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog gzi brjid mngon 'phags rgyal po'i 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dir mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de mnyan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du bdag 
[\[175b.2\]]mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong 'di snyed 'di dag kyang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i slad du mchis so/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[175b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnams la rgya cher legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[175b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mgo smos pa tsam gyis khong du chud pa sha stag go/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[175b.5\]]de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so/_/de nas 'khor der dge slong dang /_dge slong ma 
[\[175b.6\]]dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma 'dus pa de dag_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[175b.7\]]kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i bud med kyis/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_nges pa'i phung po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i bud 
[\[176a.2\]]med kyis/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis slad ma'i tshe slad 
[\[176a.3\]]ma'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la/_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/chad pa spang bar bgyi'o/_/dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/_/ci nas chos smra ba de dag la glags lta ba dang /_skabs tshol ba gang 
[\[176a.4\]]gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi bu rnams dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang bdud kyi 'khor glags lta ba dang /_skabs tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur bas na/_bdud kyi kun 
[\[176a.5\]]nas ldang ba'i bar du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang lha'i bu dang gnod sbyin dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang srul po dang gshed byed dang ro langs dag las chos smra ba de la glags lta ba dang skabs tshol ba na yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur bar/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba de la 
[\[176a.6\]]rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bskyab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe chos smra ba de/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems shing /_rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /_'chag pa la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung 
[\[176a.7\]]ba'i slad du bdag glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/_chos smra ba de'i 'chag pa'i gnas su chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe chos smra ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]sems shing rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa des/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig dang yi ge gcig tsam yang lan 'ga' nor bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdag glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal nas/_chos smra ba de la bdag gi ngo bstan te/_chos kyi 
[\[176b.2\]]rnam grangs 'di ma nyams par zlos su stsal to/_/chos smra ba des bdag gi lus mthong zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma nyams par bdag la thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson 
[\[176b.3\]]'grus rtsom mo/_/bdag mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'khyil pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/bye ba brgya stong du 'khyil pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/sgra thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 
[\[176b.4\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba dang mdo sde 'di lta bu tshol ba dang mdo sde 'di lta 
[\[176b.5\]]bu klog pa dang gang dag slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched du gdugs bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'chag cing brtson par gyur na/_de dag la bdag gis sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus bstan 
[\[176b.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/_gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la chos smra ba de dag 'chag pa'i thad du mchi'o/_/mchis nas chos smra ba de dag la yang 
[\[176b.7\]]dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o/_/yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o/_/de dag la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/ci nas chos smra ba de dag la sus kyang mi tshugs par 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_de dag la mi'am mi ma lags pas glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_bud med kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur bar de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/chad pa spang bar bgyi'o/_/dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[177a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag la bdag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsan du gsol/_tad+ya thA/_su daN De/_daN Da ba ti daN DA brta ni/_daN Da ku sha le/_daN Da su d+hA ri/_
[\[177a.3\]]su d+hA ra pa ti/_bud d+ha pa sh+ya ni/_d+ha ra Ni/_A brta ni/_A brta ni/_sang g+ha pa rI k+Shi te/_sang g+ha ni ra g+ha sa te/_d+ha rma pa rI k+Shi te/_sarba satwa ru he/_kau sha l+ye/_kau sha l+yA nu ga te/_sing ha bi krI Di te/_/a nu brte/_brta ni/_brta li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di 
[\[177a.4\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rna ba'i dbang po la grags pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 'dzam 
[\[177a.5\]]bu'i gling 'di na spyod pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lag tu thob par gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gzi brjid kyis/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[177a.6\]]pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gi lag tu thob bo snyam du de ltar rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[177a.7\]]can de dag gis sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag kyang dga' bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_gang dag 'di'i don khong du chud par bgyid pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di yi ger bris pa de dag_/'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_skyes ma thag tu 
[\[177b.2\]]de'i drung du lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mchi bar 'gyur/_lha'i bu mo de dag rnga bo che tsam gyi cod pan can lha'i bu mo de dag gi nang na gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang 'di 'dra lags na/_gang dag 
[\[177b.3\]]lung nod pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang sems pa dang yid la bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems kyis kun bsams te yi ger bri bar bgyi'o/_/gang mi g.yeng bar yid la 
[\[177b.4\]]bgyid pas yi ger bris na/_de la sangs rgyas brgya stong phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i tshe yang sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba 
[\[177b.5\]]mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mdun gyis bltas te 
[\[177b.6\]]chos 'chad pa der skye'o/_/de lta lags pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pas/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gus par yi ger bri bar bgyi'o/_/gus par lung nod par bgyi'o/_/gus par kha ton du bgyi'o/_/gus par yid la 
[\[177b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris pa dang lung mnos pa dang kha ton bgyis pa dang bsgoms pa dang yid la bgyis pa ni/_de ltar yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pas/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyis te/_de dag gi yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/_ci nas bdag gi byin gyi 
[\[178a.2\]]brlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod par 'gyur bar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_
[\[178a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/_kun tu bzang po khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_bsam gyis mi 
[\[178a.4\]]khyab pas zin pa'i sems bskyed pas/_khyod kyis chos smra ba de dag la byin gyis rlob pa byed pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i ming 'dzin pa de dag gis/_
[\[178a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong ba dang /_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan nas thos pa dang /_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[178a.6\]]pa shAkya thub pa mchod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos bstan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi spyi bor phyag bzhag pa 
[\[178a.7\]]dang /_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa chos gos kyis g.yogs par rig par bya'o/_/kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin par rig par bya'o/_/de dag 'jig rten rgyang 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]pan pa la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag snyan dang gsal zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag gar byed pa dang rol mo byed pa dang /_gyad dang sha 'tshong ba dang shan pa dang bya gag 'tshong ba dang phag 'tshong ba dang bud med 
[\[178b.2\]]dag gso ba'i sems can rnams la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pa dang yi ger bris pa dang /_'dzin pa dang bklags pa de dag gzhan la sred par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 
[\[178b.3\]]so so'i bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag 'dod chags kyis 
[\[178b.4\]]gzir bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa dang ser sna med pa dang 'chab pa med pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang che ba'i nga rgyal med pa dang log pa'i nga rgyal med par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu bzang po chos smra ba de dag bdag gi rnyed pas chog 
[\[178b.5\]]shes par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu bzang po gang gis phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong na/_'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[178b.6\]]ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni bdud kyi thab mo'i tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni chos kyi char rab 
[\[178b.7\]]tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gang dag phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag brkam par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos gos 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]la chags pa dang /_lhung bzed la chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos smra ba de dag drang por 'gyur ro/_/chos smra ba de dag rnam par thar pa gsum thob par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi tshe 'di pa bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa 
[\[179a.2\]]chos smra ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed pa'i sems can de dag dmus long du 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la mi snyan pa bsgrags na/_de dag tshe 'di nyid la lus la sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mdo sde 
[\[179a.3\]]'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba rnams la 'phya ba dang bsting ba de dag so chag par 'gyur ro/_/so thags ngan par 'gyur ro/_/mchu mi sdug par 'gyur ro/_/sna leb par 'gyur ro/_/lag pa dang rkang pa log par 'gyur ro/_/mig log par 'gyur ro/_/lus dri mi 
[\[179a.4\]]zhim par 'gyur ro/_/lus la 'bras dang 'brum bu phra mo dang rkang shu dang shu ba dang g.yan pas gang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang /_mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba dang /_mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chad pa rnams 
[\[179a.5\]]la mi snyan pa'i tshig bden pa'am/_mi bden pa bsgrags na sdig pa'i las shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o/_/kun tu bzang po de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong la rgyang ma nas kyang ldang bar bya'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par bya 
[\[179a.6\]]ba de bzhin du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la yang gus par bya'o kun tu bzang po spro bar bya ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bye ba brgya stong du 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob 
[\[179a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las kun tu bzang pos spro bar bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa chos 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]kyi gdan de las bzhengs te thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdus nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa yongs su grub pa'i phyag g.yas pas/_de dag gi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas de'i tshe 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[179b.2\]]kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/_/yongs su gtad do rjes su gtad do/_/bzhag go/_/gtams so/_/rigs kyi bu dag 
[\[179b.3\]]khyed kyis ci nas kyang rgya cher rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[179b.4\]]kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/_/yongs su gtad do/_/rjes su gtad do/_/bzhag go/_/gtams so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed 
[\[179b.5\]]kyis blangs la bzung ngo /_/bklag go/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/bshad par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la bsgrags par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag nga la ser sna med do/_/'dzin pa'i sems med do/_/'jigs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi ye 
[\[179b.6\]]shes sbyin pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang rang byung gi ye shes sbyin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag nga ni sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po ste/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang nga'i rjes su slobs shig ser sna med par gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba thabs 
[\[179b.7\]]mkhas pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ongs shing lhags pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang dag par sgrogs shig_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dad pa dang /_sems can gang dag ma dad pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]gzud par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag [(]byed [,]khyed [)]kyis de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pa la lan lon par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[180a.2\]]dpa' chen po de dag dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bas khyab par byas par gyur nas/_rjes cher bskyed de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la ba de logs su lus btud lus rab tu btud nas lus 
[\[180a.3\]]bcums te mgo smad nas thal mo sbyar te/_thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[180a.4\]]kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngur ci bder bzhugs su gsol/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des sgra skad gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngur ci 
[\[180a.5\]]bder bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[180a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad slar gshegs su gsol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[180a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la ci bder gnas par mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la ci bder gnas par mdzod cig ces bya bar gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i mchod rten 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]yang gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la yang ci bder bzhugs shig ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[180b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byon te/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag gi drung na/_seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /_
[\[180b.3\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang /_spyod pa khyad par can la sogs pas rum nas 'thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_dri 
[\[180b.4\]]zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thugs yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//gang na mdo sde 'di yod par/_/me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing /_/spu 
[\[180b.5\]]gri gtams las 'dzegs nas kyang /_/rigs kyi bu dag 'gro bar bya/_/'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[180b.6\]]gsang chen/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sba ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gcig tu 
[\[180b.7\]]'dus pa/_thabs mkhas pa chen po theg pa gcig tu bstan pa/_don dam pa bsgrub pa bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de sna nam ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]{D114}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba d+harma gu Na byU ha rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[181a.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_chags pa 
[\[181a.3\]]med pa'i ye shes mthong ba/_spyod yul chags pa med pa/_thabs mkhas pa/_khams gsum thams cad la sems snyoms pa/_phan pa dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam 'dri ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/_
[\[181a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g.yo ba dang /_byang 
[\[181a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnon blo gros dang /_byang 
[\[181a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnams dang /_srin po'i bdag po thams cad 
[\[181a.7\]]dang /_gnod sbyin mo sum brgya dang /_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa drug stong dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bdun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas/_de bzhin 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/_/tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang mngon par phab bo/_/lha'i sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir bsgrags so/_/gang dag de bzhin 
[\[181b.2\]]gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ste legs so 
[\[181b.3\]]legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar byas te/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun 
[\[181b.4\]]tu rab tu 'gul/_g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun 
[\[181b.5\]]tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab bo/_/lha'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/lha'i 'od kyi snang ba yang byung ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gang su dag ngan song du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song 
[\[181b.6\]]rnams las yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_srin po'i dbang po dang /_mi'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyi gnas rnams kyang snang bar gyur to/_/lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag kyang grag go/_/lha'i 'od dag kyang snang bar 
[\[181b.7\]]gyur to/_/lha'i spos kyi ngad kyang ldang bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te 'di snyam du sems so/_/gnas 'di dag snang bar gyur pa 'di dang /_cho 'phrul chen po snang bar gyur pa 'di dang /_sa chen po g.yos pa 'di dang /_
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]me tog gi char chen po bab pa 'di su'i mthu yin/_su'i byin gyis brlabs yin zhig gu snyam nas/_de dag thang cig cang mi zer sems nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 
[\[182a.2\]]'phrul pa yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang 
[\[182a.3\]]po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_srin po'i dbang po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag thams cad kyis lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_dri mchog dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag khyer nas 'od 
[\[182a.4\]]ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod de phyag byas so/_/me tog gi char chen po des kyang sa chen po 'di pus mo nub tsam du khyab par 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[182a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du mas bskor cing /_lha 
[\[182a.6\]]bye ba phrag du mas bskor te/_rig sngags 'chang brgya phrag du mas mdun du bdar bas rdzu 'phrul dang mthu chen po dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_bdug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa chen pos de bzhin 
[\[182a.7\]]gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la mngon par mchod do/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos lha'i bkod pa dang /_bkod pa'i mthu dang /_me tog gi char chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]mchod pa chen po byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/_chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_byang chub 
[\[182b.2\]]sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu song la sa chen po 'di ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos sa chen po bltas so/_/bltas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[182b.3\]]bdag gis sa chen po bltas lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'dus pa chen po mdzad pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bkod pa'i rgyal po srog chags drug khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang 
[\[182b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu deng kho na lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_
[\[182b.5\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu mang po 'dus lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa sems can mang po 'dus lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos mnyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa chos mnyan pa'i dus 
[\[182b.6\]]ni 'di lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bstan du 
[\[182b.7\]]gsol/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'gyod pa bsal ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad zad 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]par bgyid pa/_bdud thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa/_sdig pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_sems can ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyid pa/_mu ge'i gnod pa zhi bar bgyid pa/_nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/_dus ma lags par 'chi ba 
[\[183a.2\]]thams cad zlog pa/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa glog snang ba las thos nas/_thos pa'i mod la chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur cing /_ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad de/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa gang lags pa de bstan par gsol/_
[\[183a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sems can nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dag la mngon par ma dad cing yid mi ches la/_tshig 'di skad 
[\[183a.4\]]du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde ma yin no/_/'di la ni legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ci yang med do zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni chags pas zil gyis non nas/_mchod pa yang mngon 
[\[183a.5\]]par 'du byed par mi 'gyur la/_chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/_de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yang 'khrug pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur la/_phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams su btso bar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[183a.6\]]yab yum dang 'dra la/_las thams cad zad par byed pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po mnyan pa'i dus ma yin te/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu de dag dang /_sems can mang po gzhan dag kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'ong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni mdo sde'i rgyal 
[\[183a.7\]]po 'di la dad par mi 'gyur te/_'dod pas ldongs pa'i yid kyis khyim yongs su skyong bar byed cing /_rmo rko dang /_tshong dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_'thab pa la sred par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu btso bar 'gyur 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]ro/_/de nas de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dad par bgyid lags so/_/mngon par mchod par bgyid lags so/_/rgyas par yang bgyid lags so/_/
[\[183b.2\]]'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_nyan du stsal ba dang /_'don pa la spro bar bgyid lags so/_/slad kyis chos ma lags pa'i dus de la bab na/_spyo ba dang /_brgyad bkag pa dang /_bsdigs pa bzod par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bka' drin gzo bar bgyid kyi/_
[\[183b.3\]]bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid de/_bdag cag slad kyis 'gyod par 'gyur bar mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo bstan du gsol/_'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las 
[\[183b.4\]]bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji ltar yongs su btsal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[183b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lta bar 'dod pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_chos 'dod par byas te/_chos bzhi po de dag dang 
[\[183b.6\]]ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa na gnas pas ji ltar bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[183b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_khyim na gnas pa yongs su spang ba dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du 'dzi yongs su spang ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba de ma mthong ste/_de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[184a.2\]]'di nyan pa dang /_'di la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de la yang gos 
[\[184a.3\]]dang /_rgyan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan pa kho na lags so/_/chos smra ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[184a.4\]]dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin te/_legs so legs so/_/chos smra ba de la ni ngas kyang mchod par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yang lung bstan par bya'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[184a.5\]]pa la bla ma'i sri zhu byed cing me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[184a.6\]]pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa yang med/_mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yang med/_bu las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba yang med/_chung ma las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba yang med la/_bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de 
[\[184a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang /_mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pa ni dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_khyim 'am/_dgon pa'i gnas gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas yongs 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]su bzung ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang 
[\[184b.2\]]gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad la lta bar byed/_rtog par byed/_tshim par byed/_yongs su skyong bar byed/_yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed cing /_snying rje'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan la/_
[\[184b.3\]]bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog pa gang lags pa de yang bsam pa thams 
[\[184b.4\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par mchod pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par dad pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gyi mchod pa chen 
[\[184b.5\]]po dag gis mchod par bgyid pa dang /_rgyan gyis brgyan nas yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[184b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthu che ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_de ni nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[184b.7\]]pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te/_thob pa'i mod la yang sa bcu thob par gyur la/_srog chags stong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]bstan par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dang gdangs sgrogs pas gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/_tad ya thA/_dza ya dza ya/_dza ya ba ha/_dza ya ba ha/_kha ba ha/_hu lu hu lu/_pad ma pe/_a ba ma ba 
[\[185a.2\]]me/_sa ra sa ra Ne/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_de ba tA a nu pA lA ni/_yud d+ha ut+tA ra Ne/_pa ra tsakra ni pa ra Ni/_pU ra ya b+ha ga bAn sarba A shA na/_ma ma sarba karma k+ShA pa ya/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/_sdig pa thams 
[\[185a.3\]]cad zad par byed pa/_nor dang /_'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par byed pa/_mu ge'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_tshe nur bar byed pa ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/rigs 
[\[185a.4\]]kyi bu la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bsam pa yongs su dag pas mchod par byed de/_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_mchod pa chen pos chos smra ba de la mchod pa de ni 
[\[185a.5\]]las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_tshe 'di nyid la yang bde ba myong bar 'gyur te/_bus yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_chung mas yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_khyim gyis yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal srid 
[\[185a.6\]]kyis yid bde bar 'gyur la/_bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos smra ba 
[\[185a.7\]]de dag dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang /_'chang ba rnams dang /_klog pa rnams la yang mchod par 'tshal lo/_/gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gdugs 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]dang /_bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa de dag gis ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa bgyid pa lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[185b.2\]]srid thams cad la yang bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/rgyal srid thams cad la yang mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos nyan pa de dag gi don du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig
