[\[185b.3\]]rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal lo/_/bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/snying blas su yang bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na 
[\[185b.4\]]rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_na maHsarba ma hA ra d+hi ke b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_hu hu he he/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_badzra ma ti/_dr-i D+ha badzra ma ti/_ta thA ga ta a nu pa ri 
[\[185b.5\]]pA li te/_sa ra sa ra/_a yo mu khi b+h+r-i ku Ti/_b+h+r-i ku Ta mu khi/_kri pe kri pA mu khi/_sa t+ya ba tsa na/_ma nu sma ra/_b+ha ga bAn badzra pA Ni/_sarba karma A ba ra NA ni k+ShA pa ya/_sarba A sha ya pa ri pU ra ya/_de hi me ba ra ma/_bud d+ha sat+ye na/_bo d+hi satwA sat+ye na swA hA/_btsun 
[\[185b.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i sa btsal 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /_rgyal srid dang /_longs spyod 'tshal ba dang /_yul gru 'tshal ba dang /_nor 'tshal ba dang /_'bru 'tshal ba des 
[\[185b.7\]]ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_chos smra ba de la mchod pa chen pos mchod par bgyi'o/_/gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa de la yang spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gdugs 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dang /_bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal srid thams cad la yang ches mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du sems dang /_yid bde bar bgyi'o/_/bu 
[\[186a.2\]]gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang /_stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_khams rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang /_lus 
[\[186a.3\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_nam mkha' las mchi bar 'tshal ba des ni zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la nyin mtshan du smyung ba bgyis la gzugs bgyid du stsal te/_rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_zhi ba'i tshul 
[\[186a.4\]]can sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o/_dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs par bgyi'o/_g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_sku gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go/_/
[\[186a.5\]]g.yas g.yon dag tu ni rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod pa bgyid pa gzhag go/_/sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sbra bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la yang byams pa'i sems su 
[\[186a.6\]]bgyi'o/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/_zla ba phyi ma nya ba tshes bco lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing /_dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bdug pa ni a ga ru dang /_tsan dan dang /_ce pog dang /_gu gul dbul lo/_/lan sum 
[\[186a.7\]]'bum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_de ni sngar bsnyen pa bgyi ba lags so/_/sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/_dgon pa'i gnas su spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o/_/dkar 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]bag gi lha bshos dag kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yi ger 'drir stsal cing /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_gdugs dang /_bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyi'o/_/de nas zla ba nya ba tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems 
[\[186b.2\]]can thams cad la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi ste/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ba lang gi lci bas bskus la me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs par bgyi ste/_bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang /_mar 
[\[186b.3\]]me bcu drug kyang gzhag par bgyi'o/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan par bgyi'o/_/ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chen po phab la spos chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/_nam sku gzugs dang /_
[\[186b.4\]]sa gzhi 'gul ba dang /_bdag nyid kyang dga' bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas des 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis rmi lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i gtam bgyi'o/_/
[\[186b.5\]]bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma dad cing spong bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[186b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa legs so legs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[186b.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/_'chang ba'am/_klog par mi nus te/_de dag la bdud 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]kyis bar chad byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_nyan du 'jug pa'i bdud kyi las yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_le lo dang /_ma dad pa dang /_bla ma la sri 
[\[187a.2\]]zhu med pa dang /_chos smra ba'i sems mi brtan pa ste/_rigs kyi bu des de la 'di ni bdud kyi las yin no/_/snyam du shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'dun pa med pa dang /_yid la 
[\[187a.3\]]mi byed pa dang /_khengs pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_'jig rten 'di la sems pa ste/_'di snyam du 'jig rten 'di la yang 'jigs pa med do/_/'jig rten pha rol la yang 'jigs pa med do/_/sdig pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang med do/_/bdag 
[\[187a.4\]]la tshig mi gsal ba yang med do/_/yid rtul ba yang med do/_/bdag ni mdzes pa yin no/_/bdag ni dbang phyug dang ldan no snyam du sems shing /_khyim dang bu smad rnams la zhen to/_/de dag ni bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_bzhi po de dag 
[\[187a.5\]]ni de dag gi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nor la brkam pa ste/_de dag bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 
[\[187a.6\]]dgod cing smra ba dang /_chung mas yid bde ba dang /_chos nyan pa de dag gi 'dun pa zlog par byed pa ste/_'di lta ste/_blon po dang /_'khor rnams 'dus pa de dag gi thad du lhags nas 'di skad du sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med do/_/chos smra ba 'di ni sdig pa byed pa 
[\[187a.7\]]dbang phyug gi rgyags pas myos pa 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa/_phra ma la dga' ba yin te/_'di ni khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byed par 'dod la/_khyod ni chos la gnas pa ste khyod kyis chos mang du byas so/_/khyod ni mdo sde klog pa dang /_'drir 'jug pa 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]yin no zhes 'dzer te/_de dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drir 'jug par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed de/_de dag la ni tshe 'di nyid la yang bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur la phyi ma la yang sems can dmyal bar btso bar 'gyur te/_de yang rigs kyi bu des bdud kyi 
[\[187b.2\]]las yin par rig par byas la de'i dbang du 'gyur bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag ngas lan gnyis lan gsum du tshig gis bsgo ste/_bag yod par gyis shig_/phyis sems can dmyal ba dag tu btso ba na 'gyod 
[\[187b.3\]]par gyur ta re/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ngas ni mdo sde'i rgyal po mang po bstan/_/byang chub la ni sems can du ma bkod/_/sangs rgyas tshul yang nga yis bstan par gyur/_/de thos nas ni bag kyang yod 
[\[187b.4\]]par gyis/_/khyod rnams phyi dus rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe/_/log par ltung bar 'gro bar gyur ta re/_/mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang dad pa/_/de ni nges par nga yi bu yang yin/_/mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang mchod pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas zhing du'ang skye bar 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[187b.5\]]phyogs mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa/_/der ni 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]grul bum lto 'phye chen po dang /_/gshed byed byad stems rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/_/de ni bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_de ni bde bar byang 
[\[187b.6\]]chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/_chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/_lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[187b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis chos smra ba de la mchod par bgyi'o/_/chos nyan pa de dag la yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ge 'drir stsol ba dang /_gzungs 'chang 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_chos smra ba de la yang gos dang /_rgyan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa de la yang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de'i yul yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/nor dang 'bru thams cad kyang 
[\[188a.2\]]stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du yang mdun du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal srid thams cad du yang ches bkur stir bgyid par 'gyur bar bgyi ste/_bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[188a.3\]]bka' drin gzo bar bgyid kyi bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mchod par mi bgyid pa dang /_/chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod par mi bgyid pa de la ni bdag cag gis sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[188a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/_/rgyal po chen po dag khyod legs kyis rtag tu khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig_/de nas dri za'i bdag po chen po yul 'khor srung 
[\[188a.5\]]gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe sems can mi dge ba spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad cing glo bar ma chud pa dag kyang 'byung 
[\[188a.6\]]bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin par mi bgyid/_klog par mi bgyid/_yi ger 'drir stsol bar mi bgyid/_sbyin pa sbyin par mi bgyid/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches shing /_'jig rten 'di'i bde ba la 
[\[188a.7\]]lta bar bgyid de/_sems can de lta bu de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed de/_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]gnyis gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang ste/_rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos 'di bzhis ni bde 'gror 'gro bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[188b.2\]]sems snyoms pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rgyal chen sbyin pa 'di ni rdzu 
[\[188b.3\]]'phrul che/_/ngan song ngan 'gro kun las rab grol byed/_/rmongs pa'i sems can rtag tu 'dod la chags/_/chags pa sna tshogs brgya yis de dag myos/_/mdo sde 'di la dad par mi byed cing /_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/_/sems 
[\[188b.4\]]can de 'dra ba dag ngan song sar/_/skyes nas tshor ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur/_/sems can de dag la ni phan pa'i phyir/_/de ltar mdo sde mthu chen rab tu bstan/_/mdo sde 'di la rtag tu dad pa gang /_/de la gshed byed med cing sdig byed med/_/'byung po 
[\[188b.5\]]grul bum lto 'phye chen po med/_/rgyal po de la sdig pa byed pa med/_/legs 'dri nyan du 'jug dang mchod pa dang /_/legs par 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni bsngags pa de/_/sems can kun gyis bskal mang brjod 
[\[188b.6\]]mi nus/_/gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub rnams/_/brjed cing mchod pa byed pa de dag dang /_/la la gzhan 'gas mdo sde 'di nyid las/_/yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang legs bris na/_/de la bsod nams snga ma de yis ni/_/de yi brgya stong char 
[\[188b.7\]]yang mi phod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]la dad de/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa dang chos smra ba de dag dang /_'dri ba rnams dang /_'dzin pa rnams 
[\[189a.2\]]la mchod pa chen pos mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yon tan dang phan yon mang po thob par 'gyur te/_de'i lus la mig nad dang /_rna nad dang /_sna nad dang /_lce nad dang /_rims nad dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_mes mi tshugs lags so/_/
[\[189a.3\]]de dag la pha mas yid bde ba dang /_bu dang chung mas yid bde ba dang /_khyim gyis yid bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/'gum pa'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas yang 
[\[189a.4\]]dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_kye mi khyod tshur shog_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig_/skyes bu chen po khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba dang ldan te/_gang du 'dod pa'i gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/
[\[189a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las 
[\[189a.6\]]bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'di ni las thams cad rnam par dag par bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur 
[\[189a.7\]]ro/_/sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gis thos par mi 'gyur lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus gang gi lag tu 'ongs sam/_de bzhin gshegs pas nyan du bcug na/_des thos pa'i mod kho na la bri bar bya/_yi ger 'drir 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]gzhug par bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam thos na yang ngan 'gros 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las yig 'bru gcig tsam mam/_ming 
[\[189b.2\]]tsam nyan du bcug gam/_phyogs sam/_yul 'ga' zhig tu lung 'bogs par byed na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod par bya'o/_/de ni pha ma dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[189b.3\]]rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po rnams kyis gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ngo /_/yongs su bskyangs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[189b.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha ma lta bu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thams cad 
[\[189b.5\]]rdzogs par gang du spyod par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su thams cad rdzogs par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[189b.6\]]lho phyogs su yang spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling du ni cung zad tsam gnas par 'gyur te/_gnas kha cig tu ni spyod kha cig tu ni mi spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[189b.7\]]to/_/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya ba dang /_bklag par bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_nyan du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par gyur ta re/_'di ni 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba dang /_bklag par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[190a.2\]]mchod par bgyi ba dang /_nyan du gzhug par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so/_/chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod par bgyi/_rjed par bgyi'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_chos smra ba de dag la mchod par bgyid pa de ni bdag la yang 
[\[190a.3\]]mchod par bgyid pa lags te/_de ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes 
[\[190a.4\]]bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[190a.5\]]'di la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos nyan pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang /_'dzin pa rnams dang /_klog pa rnams dang /_nyan du 'jug pa rnams la yang mngon par mchod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag 
[\[190a.6\]]gi yul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ngam gal te rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa'i yul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ste spyod pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgyal po de mchod par mi bgyid/_dad par mi bgyid la/_chos smra ba de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba 
[\[190a.7\]]rnams dang /_'dzin pa rnams dang /_klog pa rnams dang /_nyan du 'jug pa rnams dang /_lung 'bogs pa rnams la yang mchod par mi bgyid/_bla ma'i 'du shes skyed par mi bgyid na/_des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par 'gyur lags so/_/de'i yul 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]du sdig pa'i chos mang po dang /_yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des na rgyal rigs rgyal po des bdag gi yul du chos nub par gyur to snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi ste/_des chos spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[190b.2\]]bu legs so legs so/_/de ni de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu dper na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lo brgya 'am/_lo stong gi 
[\[190b.3\]]bar du bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byed la/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang /_bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang 
[\[190b.4\]]bu mo yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa dang /_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa'am yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/_klog pa'am/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir 
[\[190b.5\]]zho'i brgyad cha cig tsam sbyin pa byin na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma shos de ni brgya'i char yang mi phod na/_gang bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed de/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[190b.6\]]rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing /_chos smra ba de dag la yang gos sam/_rgyan nam/_gdugs sam/_bzhon pa'am/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_sa gzhi ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir sbyin pa byed la/_lus 'di ni snying po 
[\[190b.7\]]med pa'o snyam du shes shing rmi lam lta bu'o/_/sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/chu'i chu bur lta bu'o snyam du shes te/_lus 'di la ni snying po med do/_/chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam du shes na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa kho na yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gshegs pas dbugs phyung ba kho na yin no/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa yin no/_/phyis kyang mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i 
[\[191a.2\]]tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis tshig 'thun par 
[\[191a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gcig tu 'thun par bgyis te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 
[\[191a.4\]]mchod par bgyi'o/_/yul de yang bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de la yang mchod par bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi/_lung bstan par bgyi/_dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la chos smra ba dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa de 
[\[191a.5\]]la bla ma'i 'du shes skyed pa dang /_pha'i 'du shes dang /_bu'i 'du shes skyed pa de la ni bdag cag gis kyang pha'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/gal te chos kyi rnam grangs de ma rungs par bgyid na ni de'i yul thams cad du bu dang mchis brang dang pha ma yid mi bde bar 
[\[191a.6\]]'gyur la/_de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha'i dbang po nas mi'i dbang po'i bar de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/
[\[191a.7\]]grogs po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan du gzhug pa dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par gyur ta re/_la la zhig gis spangs te/_sems 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]can dmyal bar lhung nga re/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba'o/_/khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/_sa chen po 'di g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos so/_/
[\[191b.2\]]srog chags drug stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[191b.3\]]'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[191b.4\]]phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/_gang du ni skye bar 'gyur lags/_de nas 
[\[191b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di zhus pa ni legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab 
[\[191b.6\]]tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[191b.7\]]yang dag par ston pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sa yongs su gang bar byas te/_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[192a.2\]]'di 'dzin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa la sogs pas mchod pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[192a.3\]]bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_/rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/_bu dang /_bu 
[\[192a.4\]]mo dang /_chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_mgo bo yongs su gtong ba bas ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_klog gam/_dad par byed pa 'di bsod 
[\[192a.5\]]nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no/_/chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod pa mngon par 'du bya 
[\[192a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[192a.7\]]rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/chos smra ba de la yang phyag bgyi ba dang mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags te/_de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gyis chos kyi 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]rnam grangs 'di la gus par bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o/_/gus par bgyis te yid la bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/sa phyogs de ni 
[\[192b.2\]]mchod rten du gyur par blta bar bgyi'o/_/sa phyogs de ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[192b.3\]]sa phyogs de ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[192b.4\]]gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang mchod pa bgyid la 'di'i slad du mchod pa dang bkur sti la brtson pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yungs 'bru tsam stsal na/_de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur la/_bskal pa dgu khri'i bar du 
[\[192b.5\]]longs spyod che ba'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan song du skye 
[\[192b.6\]]bar mi 'gyur/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das 
[\[192b.7\]]pa'i dus bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa chags pa med cing rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i tog ces bya ba byung ste/_der ngas bram ze'i gzugs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/thos nas 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]kyang sems can rnams la bshad do/_/der ngas rnyed pa'i mod la chos la bzod pa thob ste/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/sems can gang dag gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol 
[\[193a.2\]]te/_nam yang ngan song du mi 'gro bar 'gyur la/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag ste/_sems can de dag thams cad mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[193a.3\]]rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu ngas kyang lo mang po/_/lo brgya phrag mang po/_/lo stong phrag mang po/_/lo 'bum phrag mang por sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis dkris pa rnams kyi phyir nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_
[\[193a.4\]]gser yongs su gtong ba byas nas/_mthar gyis lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_mgo bo dang /_sdug pa'i bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bu mo'i bar du yongs su gtong bar byas so/_/rkang dang /_rus pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_khyim dang /_
[\[193a.5\]]grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang yongs su gtong ba byas so/_/lo 'bum phrag du mar tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad do/_/khyim pa dang 'dris par ma byas/_rgyal srid la dga' ba dang /_nor la dga' ba 
[\[193a.6\]]dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor la dga' ba dang /_bu dang bu mo la dga' ba dang /_chung ma la dga' bar ma byas so/_/gcig tu nges par tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa brten to/_/gcig tu nges par sbyin pa byin no/_/gcig tu nges par 
[\[193a.7\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas so/_/gcig tu nges par ngas chos smra ba rnams la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po yang /_ngas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de yang ngas 'khor ba la skyo ba'i lugs kyis lus rnams byin 
[\[193b.2\]]la/_mig rnams dang /_rang gi sha rnams dang /_rkang dang /_rus pa rnams dang /_rang gi pags pa rnams kyang byin na/_phyi rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/_nga 'gyod par gyur pa yang med do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha'i 
[\[193b.3\]]dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_mi'i dbang po rnams dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi tshul 'di thos nas/_
[\[193b.4\]]chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/_de dag thams cad kyis chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/'di ni sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[193b.5\]]bya ba byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog 
[\[193b.6\]]pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni dkon lags so/_/gang dag gi sug par mchis pa de dag ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs 
[\[193b.7\]]kyi bu de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de dag ni dkon te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[194a.2\]]sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa mi byed pa dang /_'dzin par mi byed pa dang /_klog par mi byed pa dang /_sbyin pa mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni bskal pa du ma dang /_bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba na 
[\[194a.3\]]'khor bar 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal ba mang po sdug bsngal brgya dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na bud med sbrum ma zhig yod la/_bud med sbrum ma de'i lto na bu chags pa de yang khye'u 'am/_bu mo zhig tu gyur na/_bud med de'i bu de gang gi tshe zla 
[\[194a.4\]]ba gcig lon nam/_zla ba gnyis lon nam/_zla ba gsum lon nam/_zla ba lnga lon nam/_zla ba tshang ba'i bar du gyur pa de tsam du bud med de'i lus non par 'gyur te/_tshigs kyang 'bye bar 'gyur/_lto yang chung bar 'gyur/_skad kyi gcom yang chung bar 
[\[194a.5\]]'gyur te/_tshor ba de dag gis yongs su gzir ba'i lus kyis de tsam du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bzhin du lus 'dzin par byed de/_bu btsa' ba'i dus kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi tshe bdag 
[\[194a.6\]]gi bu btsa' bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdag bde bar btsas par gyur na de'i tshe tshangs par spyad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de phyis yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags par gyur pa na sdug bsngal de dag phyis mi dran te/_bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[194a.7\]]du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_klog par mi byed de/_de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang 'dod chags kyis myos nas/_tshor ba de dag bzod par gyur te/_bdag cag gis khyim dang /_bu smad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo yongs su bskyang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[194b.2\]]yang sems can dmyal bar skyes pa de'i tshe ni 'gyod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe phyir thar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni 'dod chags kyis chags nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal brjed par 'gyur te/_sbyin pa yang sbyin par mi byed/_tshul khrims kyang srung bar mi byed do/_/'di 
[\[194b.3\]]lta ste dper na mi chang gis ra ro zhing myos te/_tshabs cher ra ro zhing myos la gtu lum par gyur na/_mi des sems kyis kyang khyim tshol mi nus lam yang mi tshol/_pha ma dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo'i 'du shes kyang med/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 
[\[194b.4\]]'dun yang mi dran te/_de chang gis myos pa'i mthus dur khrod na 'dug na yang 'jigs pa med la/_'di snyam du sems te/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nga skrag par byed nus pa su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de bong ba dang /_shing dang /_rtswa dang /_tsher ma'i mal 
[\[194b.5\]]gzhan dag la bde ba'i 'du shes skyed pa las/_lus sor chud cing ra ro ba de sangs nas gang gi tshe dran pa rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod par byed de/_bdag ni srog la thug kyang bla/_bdag gis chang 'di btung bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/de bzhin du sems can 'dod 
[\[194b.6\]]chags kyis rgyags pas myos shing /_khyim na gnas pas rnam par 'khrul pa nor gyis sems myos pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed/_sbyin pa yang mi dran/_mtho ris su skye ba dang /_rgyal por 'gyur 
[\[194b.7\]]ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed de/_'khor ba de nyid na 'khor zhing sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/_'di snyam du 'dzin te/_bdag 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]gi lus ni bde ste/_sdug bsngal ba med do snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas thar te/_brgya la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur pa de'i tshe mngal na gnas pas lus

[\[195a.6\]]sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na nams kyang bag med par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom 
[\[195a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad kyi skyabs byed pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/byang chub sems dpas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_

[\[195b.3\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas 
[\[195b.4\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/[ {D115}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su kha ba ti [(]byu+A[,]byU[)] hanA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

[\[195b.6\]]chen po dgra bcom pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_ka pi na chen po dang /_gsus po che dang /_nam gru dang /_lam phran bstan dang /_dga' bo dang /_kun dga' 
[\[195b.7\]]bo dang /_sgra gcan zin dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_b+ha ra d+h+wa dzi dang /_'char byed nag po dang /_ba ku la dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po la 'di lta ste/_'jam dpal 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[196a.3\]]bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de

[\[196a.6\]]bdun dang /_shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/_bkra ba blta na sdug pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rin po che sna bzhi la 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel 
[\[196a.7\]]dang /_rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/_rin po che'i pad mas khebs 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]pa/_bya rog gis btung du rung bar kha da chad du gyur pa gser gyi bye ma bdal ba dag yod de/_rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun na them skas bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa bzhi bzhi

[\[196b.3\]]ma skyes pa 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_gser gyi kha dog_/gser gyi 'od 'byung ba/_gser lta bur ston pa/_sngon po kha dog sngon po/_'od sngon po 'byung ba/_sngon po lta bur ston pa/_ser po kha dog ser po/_'od ser po 'byung ba/_ser po lta bur ston pa/_dmar po kha dog dmar

[\[196b.6\]]bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum du lha'i me tog man dA ra ba'i lha'i me tog gi char 'bab bo/_/der sems 
[\[196b.7\]]can gang dag skyes pa de dag kyang snga dro gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du dong ste sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang me tog skon bu bye ba phrag 'bum mngon par 'thor te/_gtor nas nyin mo gnas 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]pa'i phyir slar 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du 'dong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na ngang pa dang /_

[\[197a.3\]]can gang dag der skyes pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs rgyas yid la byed pa skye/_chos yid la byed pa skye/_dge 'dun yid la byed par skye'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa yin snyam du sems pa lta na

[\[197a.5\]]kyi sgra dbyung ba'i phyir sprul pa dag go/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ta la'i phreng ba de dag dang /_dril bu g.yer 
[\[197a.6\]]ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis phog cing rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba/_nyams dga' ba 'byung ste/_'di lta ste dper na/_rol mo mkhan gyis yan lag bye ba 'bum dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil snyan blangs pa bzhin no/_/der mi de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs

[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med ces bya zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i tshe'i tshad dpag tu med de/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od dpag

[\[197b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bcu lon no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag pa dgra bcom pa sha stag tshad med de/_de dag gi tshad brjod par sla ba ma yin no/_/shA ri'i 
[\[197b.4\]]bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can dag ni phyir mi ldog pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag pa sha stag go/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshad ni brjod par sla ba ma yin te/_gzhan du na tshad med grangs 
[\[197b.5\]]med ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o/_shA ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir dge 
[\[197b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnams gus par yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag dang phrad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i zhing du skye bar 
[\[197b.7\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan thos la thos nas kyang yid la byed cing nub gcig gam/_nub gnyis sam/_nub gsum mam/_nub bzhi 'am/_nub 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]lnga'am/_nub drug gam/_nub bdun du g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis yid la byed na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyin ci log med pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de de bzhin gshegs 
[\[198a.2\]]pa 'od dpag med nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa'i mdun na bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye 
[\[198a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na don gyi dbang de mthong nas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gus par smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes de skad brjod do/_/shA ri'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas da ltar yongs su brjod pa de bzhin 
[\[198a.4\]]du shA ri'i bu shar phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po zhes bya ba 
[\[198a.5\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam sgra zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung 
[\[198a.6\]]gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/_khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces 
[\[198a.7\]]gsung ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro phung po zhes bya ba 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 
[\[198b.2\]]ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/_khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin du nub phyogs na de 
[\[198b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dpag med ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dpag med ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 
[\[198b.4\]]snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dag pa zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[198b.5\]]rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/_khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin du byang phyogs na 
[\[198b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sgrol ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu thul dka' zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byung zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[198b.7\]]gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]par mdzad de/_khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin 
[\[199a.2\]]gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa grags 'od ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa chos zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[199a.3\]]pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/_khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs 
[\[199a.4\]]su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa skar 
[\[199a.5\]]ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi phung po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rigs zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[199a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa steng 
[\[199a.7\]]gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/_khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba zhes bya zhe na/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam 
[\[199b.2\]]grangs 'di dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan thos par gyur pa dang /_thos pa dang thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[199b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du sems kyis smon par byed pa'am/_byas pa'am/_byed pa'am/_byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/
[\[199b.4\]]phyir ma log go phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu ji ltar da lta rang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang nga'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[199b.5\]]pa yongs su brjod do/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal pos bskal pa'i snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_tshe'i snyigs ma'i tshe 'jig rten gyi 
[\[199b.6\]]khams mi mjed du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu snyigs ma lnga'i tshe 
[\[199b.7\]]'jig rten du ngas gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos bstan pa de ni mchog tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[200a.2\]]mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[200a.3\]{D116}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ka raN+Da byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa za ma tog bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze 
[\[200a.4\]]ta'i tshal mgon med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag byed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po rnams dang yang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[200a.5\]]dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang sben dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[200a.6\]]chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[200a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[200b.2\]]po rgya mtsho mching rnam blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po chos 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i spyan mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbugs phyin pa'i lag pa dang /_byang 
[\[200b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba rnams kyang tshogs so/_/gzhan yang dbang phyug dang /_mthu bo che la sogs pa lha'i sde sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i sras po rnams kyang tshogs 
[\[200b.4\]]so/_/gzhan yang lha'i sde sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams tshogs te/_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_chu'i lha la sogs pa/_lha'i bu de dag tshogs pa dang lhan cig tu/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_tshangs 
[\[200b.5\]]pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dag kyang tshogs so/_/'khor de na klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma tshogs pa rnams 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po ud pa la dang /_klu'i rgyal po shing e la'i lo ma can dang /_klu'i rgyal po nya zan dang /_klu'i rgyal po ba lang gi bdag po dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[200b.6\]]po mgo brgya pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po hu lu ta dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_klu'i rgyal po glang mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po bad sa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 
[\[200b.7\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mching rnam dang /_de lta bu dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dag kyang tshogs so/_/dri za'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dag kyang tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_dri za'i rgyal po rnga'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /_dri za'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang /_
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dri za'i rgyal po lag pa stong pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po blo gros chen po dang /_dri za'i rgyal po lus sim par byed pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po sil snyan sgra bsgrags dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po gzhon nur snang ba dang /_
[\[201a.2\]]dri za'i rgyal po lag pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po chos dga' dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dag tshogs so/_/'khor der mi'am ci brgya stong du ma tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_mi'am 
[\[201a.3\]]ci'i rgyal po cod pan can dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal pos ri'i bzhin dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po rab tu dga' byas dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor lo bkod pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po me tog gtor ba dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po nor bu dang /_mi'am ci'i 
[\[201a.4\]]rgyal po gsus shol dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po shin tu 'thad pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po bzhin brgya pa dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po shing rlon dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po brgya stong du 
[\[201a.5\]]ma dag tshogs so/_/lha'i bu mo brgya stong phrag du ma dag tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_lha'i bu mo ti la mchog ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo shin tu bkod pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo gser gyi ska rags zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo rgyan pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo gdos 
[\[201a.6\]]'dzin ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo lus yongs su mdzes pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo gtsug phud can zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo lha'i bzhin ston pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo 
[\[201a.7\]]sil snyan lnga mngon pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo me tog ud pal sngon po zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo chos mngon pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo shin tu rol pa zhes 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo ma lus 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo shin tu bkod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo dpung rgyan 'dzin pa zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo sbyin pa sbyin byed ces bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mo zla ba can dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa lha'i 
[\[201b.2\]]bu mo brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs so/_/klu'i bu mo brgya phrag du ma dag kyang tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_klu'i bu mo rgyan 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo pu lin da zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo ral pa gsum pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo sa ri'i bzhin zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i 
[\[201b.3\]]bu mo rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo glog gi mig ces bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo glog gi 'od ces bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo sa ri zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo g.yog brgya pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo sman chen po zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo thigs 
[\[201b.4\]]pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo mgo gcig ma zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo bzhon pa brgya pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo za byed ces bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo ma lus 'ongs zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo shin tu rgyan ma zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo thig le zhes bya ba 
[\[201b.5\]]dang /_klu'i bu mo sprin dkar mo zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo de bzhin du chags pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo gtong ldan ma zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo 'khor mi phyed pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo pu lin da zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo rgya mtsho mching 
[\[201b.6\]]rnam mngal zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo gdugs kyi bzhin zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo chos la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo bde byed ces bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo brtson 'grus zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i bu mo rgya mtsho mching rnam ltar zab pa zhes bya ba 
[\[201b.7\]]dang /_klu'i bu mo ri rab lhun po'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_de lta bu la sogs te klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma dag tshogs so/_/dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma dag kyang tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_dri za'i bu mo dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo dga' ba'i sbyin 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]byed ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo mi ston pa zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rdo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo phreng ba bzang po can zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo nags tshal bdag mo zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i 
[\[202a.2\]]bu mo me tog brgya pa zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo me tog 'bus pa zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo dus pa'i me tog ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo mngal bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rgyal po'i dpal zhes bya ba 
[\[202a.3\]]dang /_dri za'i bu mo rnga zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo phreng ba bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo mngon par btud pa zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo chos 'dod ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo chos sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i 
[\[202a.4\]]bu mo me tog u dum bA ra'i lto ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rnam pa brgya pa zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo me tog pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo me tog pad ma'i dmigs zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo lus yongs su mdzes pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[202a.5\]]dri za'i bu mo cha bas dbang po bzhin du 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo sa sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo 'bras bu sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo seng ge'i 'gros zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo me tog ku mu da zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo yid dga' zhes 
[\[202a.6\]]bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo sbyin byed ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo lha'i tshig ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo bzod dga' zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo mya ngan 'das dga' zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rin chen myu gu zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo dbang po'i dpal 
[\[202a.7\]]zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo skye dgu'i bdag mo'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po can zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo dpal 'dab zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo 'bar ba'i rtse mo zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo 'dod chags las yongs su grol 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo zhe sdang las yongs su grol zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo gti mug las yongs su grol zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo 'khor ba srungs ma zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo rin po che'i khri'u zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo 
[\[202b.2\]]'ong ba dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo me'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo zla ba'i gzugs kyi 'od ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo nyi ma'i mig ces bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo gser ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes 
[\[202b.3\]]bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo mchog dga' zhes bya ba dang /_dri za'i bu mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa dri za'i bu mo brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs so/_/'khor der mi'am ci'i bu mo brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid ces 
[\[202b.4\]]bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid las byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rlung gi shugs zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo chu'i shugs zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo nam mkha'i gzings zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo mgyogs pa'i shugs zhes bya 
[\[202b.5\]]ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo dpal sbyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo mche ba bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo mi g.yo ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo khams la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo 'bar ba la dga' ba zhes bya 
[\[202b.6\]]ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo shin tu dpal zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo spyan ras gzigs kyi dpal zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo stan can zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rdo rje'i khu tshur zhes bya 
[\[202b.7\]]ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo ser skya zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rgyan rab brgyan pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo dpral ba dbyes chen zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo nges pa yongs su bsten pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo blo gros chen mo zhes bya ba 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo nam mkha' srung zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo bkod pa rgyal po'i dbang zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo nor bu 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo 
[\[203a.2\]]nor bu 'bar ma zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo skye bo mkhas pas bsten ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo bdog ma zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo tshe sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod yongs su skyong ma zhes bya ba 
[\[203a.3\]]dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo chos kyi dbyings yongs su srung ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rkang pa'i gdu bu'i rnga zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo skad cig sgrol zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rtag tu chos len par 'dod ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu 
[\[203a.4\]]mo rtag tu dus dus su ston ma zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo dbugs 'byin ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rnam par thar byed ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo yod pa mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo skyo 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu 
[\[203a.5\]]mo ral gri 'bar zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo sa la 'gro zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo lha dbang phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo lha ma yin gyi dbang mo zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo nor bu'i dbang mo zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo 
[\[203a.6\]]rus bzod ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo sbyin ldan zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo mang po'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo lag cha brgya pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa ces bya ba dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog 
[\[203a.7\]]ces bya ba dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs so/_/dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs so/_/mur 'dug spyod pa dang /_kun tu rgyu ba dang /_gcer bu pa brgya phrag du ma dag kyang tshogs te/_
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]gang gi tshe na 'dus pa cher gyur pa de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par 'od zer byung ngo /_/byung nas dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_de dag gis gtsug lag khang de yongs su mdzes par snang ste/_ka ba ni lha'i nor bu rin po ches 
[\[203b.2\]]brgyan par snang ngo /_rtsig pa brgya dag kyang gser gyis mdzes par byas par snang ngo /_/gnas khang so so dag na ni gser dang dngul las byas pa'i sgo dag snang ngo /_/gnas khang so so na skas gser dang /_dngul las byas pa dag kyang snang ngo /_/dngul gyi khang 
[\[203b.3\]]pa dag na ni gser gyi ka ba rin po ches brgyan/_gser gyi khang pa dag na ni dngul kyi ka ba rin po ches brgyan pa dang /_dze ta'i tshal gyi phyi rol na shing dpag bsam rnam pa sna tshogs dag snang ste/_gser gyi sdong po dang /_dngul gyi lo ma dang /_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[203b.4\]]rab tu 'phyang ba dag dang /_yul ka shi ka nas byung ba'i gos rab tu 'phyang ba dag dang /_rgya'i gos brgya stong rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_cod pan dang /_rna cha dang /_phreng ba'i lda ldi dang /_dpung 
[\[203b.5\]]rgyan dang /_rkang pa'i gdu bu brgya stong rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_phyi rol na rin po che'i gdu bu steng rin po che las byas pa/_de la 'phyang ba'i shing dpag bsam gyi shing de lta bu brgya dag kyang byung ngo /_/dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang de nyid na skas dag kyang 
[\[203b.6\]]rdo rje las byas par snang ngo /_/sgo rgyab na mu tig dang /_dar gyi tshogs rab tu dpyangs so/_/rdzing bu du ma dag kyang byung ste/_/la la ni chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas yongs su gang /_la la ni me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dag 'di lta ste/_
[\[203b.7\]]me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_u dum bA ra dag gis yongs su gang ngo /_/gzhan yang shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba 'di lta ste/_me tog tsam pa ka dang /_ka 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]ra bI ra dang /_pa Ta la dang /_a te mug ta ka dang /_dbyar gyi dri dang /_gzhan yang shing gi me tog yid dga' ba dag byung ste/_dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang de yongs su mdzes par byas pa nyid du snang ngo /_/de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas 
[\[204a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[204a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od zer chen po 'di dag ga las mchis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi mthu 'di su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[204a.4\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'di ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_yongs su smin par byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du 'dug go/_/de nas bcom 
[\[204a.5\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mnar ma mchis pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na mnar mi gda' na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[204a.6\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'jug par bgyid/_sems can dmyal ba chen po lcags kyi rtsig pas bskor la/_lcags kyi dog sa la shin tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu 'dus pa/_rnam par g.yo ba de na 'bod grogs pa dag gnas pa'i snod 
[\[204a.7\]]za ma tog 'dra ba mchis te/_snod der sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma stsal to/_/nam chu mang po mchis pa'i snod na sran chung ka ru'am/_na gu gyen du mchi na yang brel ba dang smin par 'gyur/_thur du mchi na yang brel ba dang smin par 'gyur ba de bzhin 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]du sems can de dag kyang mnar ma mchis pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po der lus kyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mnar ma mchis pa'i sems can dmyal 
[\[204b.2\]]ba chen por 'jug par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha'i nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'jug pa de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras 
[\[204b.3\]]gzigs kyi dbang po yang /_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por 'jug mod kyi/_de'i lus la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/nam mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang nye bar 'gro ba de'i tshe mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po 
[\[204b.4\]]de bsil bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe gshin rje'i mi de dag mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ci mi dge ba'i ltas shig byung na/_nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'ongs pa de'i tshe/_me tog pad ma shing rta'i 'khor 
[\[204b.5\]]lo tsam byung zhing /_snod de yang gsal me de'i 'obs de nyid du yang rdzing bu byung bar gyur ces skyo bar gyur to/_/de nas gshin rje'i skyes bu de dag ral gri dang /_gtun dang mtshon cha b+hiN+Di pA la dang /_to ma ra dang /_'ga' dA dang /_'khor lo dang /_
[\[204b.6\]]rtse gsum pa la sogs pa thogs nas gshin rje'i rgyal po ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag cag gi sug las kyi dog sa de yongs su bas par mkhyen par mdzod cig_/ci'i phyir khyed kyi las kyis yongs su zad dam/_lha 
[\[204b.7\]]ci lags mi mkhyen tam/_mnar ma mchis pa'i sems can dmyal ba der thog ma kho nar mi dge ba'i ltas byung ste/_skyes bu ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can ral pa'i cod pan can lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyin pa dang bsil bar gyur to/_/gang gi 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]tshe de phyin pa de'i tshe/_me tog pad ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam yang byung /_snod de yang gas/_zhugs kyi 'obs der yang rdzing bu byung bar gyur to/_/de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po sems par gyur te/_mthu 'di lha gang gi yin/_yang na 
[\[205a.2\]]lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_mthu bo che las dam pa thob pa zhig sa 'dir 'ongs sam/_yang na srin po mthu bo che lha'i bal glang gi stobs dang 'gran pa nyid skyes sam zhes des lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas na/_lha'i sde'i nang na dam pa de lta bu ma mthong 
[\[205a.3\]]ngo /_/de nas slar yang mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bltas so/_/des bltas pa dang /_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po de na/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bzhugs pa nyid mthong 
[\[205a.4\]]ngo /_/de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bstod pa'i khyad par byed par brtson pa/_spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po/_/
[\[205a.5\]]pad ma la dgyes pa/_dam pa stsol ba/_dbang du mdzad pa/_sa'i spyan dam pa mdzad pa/_dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/_phyag brgya stong pa/_spyan bye ba brgya stong pa/_dbu bcu gcig pa/_rgod ma'i bzhin lta bu'i mthar phyin pa/_chos la 
[\[205a.6\]]dgyes pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/_ru sbal dang /_chu srin dang /_nya rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/_ye shes kyi phung po dam pa mdzad pa/_dga' ba stsol ba/_rin po che'i dpal dam pa/_mnar med pa 
[\[205a.7\]]kun skems par mdzad pa/_ye shes kyi dpal gyis brgyan pa/_ye shes la dgyes pa/_lha thams cad kyis mchod pa/_phyag 'tshal ba/_bkur sti bgyis pa/_mi 'jigs pa stsol ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston par mdzad pa/_nyi ma 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]lta bu'i spyan mchog mdzad pa/_chos kyi sgron ma mdzad pa/_ji ltar dgyes pa'i gzugs kyi gzugs mchog_/dri za'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_gser gyi ri'i gzugs dang mtshungs pa/_rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi glong bzhin du zab pa/_don dam pa'i rnal 
[\[205b.2\]]'byor rjes su thob pa/_bdag gi zhal ston par mdzad pa/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/_mngon par dgyes par mdzad pa/_sku brgyan pa skyes bu'i khyu mchog_/khu sgo dang /_khong sgril dang /_'khrul 'khor gyi lam las yongs su thar bar 
[\[205b.3\]]mdzad pa/_srid pa thams cad dang ma 'brel ba/_'khor mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba nye bar bsags pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che mdzad pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston par mdzad pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer skems par mdzad pa/_skye bo la 
[\[205b.4\]]gdugs su gyur par mdzad pa/_nad las yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i mchod phyir thogs pa/_don yod par 'gyur ba'i zhags pa ston par mdzad pa/_sngags brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa/_lag na rdo rje skrag par 
[\[205b.5\]]mdzad pa/_'jig rten gsum po skrag par mdzad pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_phra men pha dang /_phra men ma dang /_ro langs dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_grul bum dang /_rjed byed rnams skrag par mdzad 
[\[205b.6\]]pa/_spyan ud pa la sngon po lta bu/_zab cing brtan par mdzad pa/_rig pa'i bdag po nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar mdzad pa/_byang chub kyi lam sna tshogs bsags pa/_thar pa'i dam pa la zhugs pa/_sku la byang chub kyi 
[\[205b.7\]]lam bsags pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/_ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab lta bu brgya stong dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes de ltar gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyad par dam pa'i bstod pas bstod nas/_slar yang gshin rje'i rgyal pos lan 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]gsum bskor te de nyid nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[206a.2\]]kyi dbang po mchi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po nas byung ste/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du song nas mgal shing lta bu dang /_keng rus bsgreng ba dang /_bdag gi skra dang spus 
[\[206a.3\]]g.yogs pa dang /_lto ri dang 'dra ba dang /_kha khab kyi mig lta bu'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]brgya stong du ma mdun nas rgyug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nam [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du song ba de'i tshe [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer de 
[\[206a.4\]]bsil bar 'gyur/_rdo rje'i ser ba de yang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sgo ba de yang byin pa thag thug can la mig dmar zhing lag na khar ba thogs pa las kyis 'di 'dra ba ni bdag gi bya ba ma yin no zhes byams pa'i sems bskyed do/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[206a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i phyag gi sor mo bcu las chu bo chen po bcu byung /_zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las chu bo chen po bcu byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po/_shin tu thugs brtse ba'i 
[\[206a.6\]]zil gyis non nas/_ba spu'i khung bu nas chu bo byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe na de dag gis chu myong ba de'i tshe de dag mgrin pa yangs par gyur/_lus kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur/_lha'i zas ro'i nang na ro mchog tu byung ba dang ldan pas tshim par gyur nas 
[\[206a.7\]]de'i tshe 'khor ba'i bsam pa la sems te/_kye ma'o 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni grib ma bsil ba la yongs su bsten to/_/yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni rtag tu pha ma la yongs su 'dzin cing bsnyen bkur byed de bde ba dang ldan pa'o/_/gang rtag tu 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang sten cing skyong ba'i skyes bu de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa'o/_/gang rtag tu theg pa chen po rtag tu khong du chud par byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bsam pa dang ldan pa'o/_/gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byed pa de dag ni 
[\[206b.2\]]skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang chos kyi gaN DI rdung ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang gtsug lag khang gas pa dang gogs pa rnams slar 'chos pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang sngon gyi mchod rten gyi gzugs gas pa dang /_gogs pa rnams slar 'chos pa de 
[\[206b.3\]]dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang chos smra ba dang rten pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag pa mthong ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang rang sangs rgyas 'chag pa mthong ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[206b.4\]]'chag pa mthong ba de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'o zhes de ltar lus kyi rjes su sems pa dang /_de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i mdo za ma tog bkod pa dkon mchog gi rgyal po'i sgra byung ngo /_/de'i tshe de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom 
[\[206b.5\]]nas de dag thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bzhin zhes bya bar skyes nas gang gi tshe des sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de'i tshe slar yang song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[206b.6\]]rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyi ma re re zhing sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[206b.7\]]du ma yongs su smin par byed de/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa de 'dra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la med do/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]ci'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhag mthong zhes bya ba rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[207a.2\]]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nga ni spos kyi bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshong pa'i bur gyur te/_de'i tshe ngas 
[\[207a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lhag mthong las spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[207a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa ji skad du gsan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mig las ni nyi ma dang zla ba byung /_dpral ba las ni dbang phyug chen po/_phrag pa las ni tshangs pa/_snying las ni mthu 
[\[207a.5\]]bo che/_mche ba gnyis las ni lha mo dbyangs can/_kha nas ni rlung rnams byung /_rkang pa las ni sa/_lto ba las ni chu'i lha byung ste/_gang gi tshe spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i lus las lha de dag byung ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po 
[\[207a.6\]]la 'di skad ces gsungs te/_dbang phyug chen po khyod dus ngan pa'i tshe sems can gyi khams ma rungs pa dag byung ba na khyod thog mar byed pa po dang /_gtong ba po'i lhar grags par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su spangs par 'gyur 
[\[207a.7\]]ro/_/so so'i skye bo'i nang du gtam byed par 'gyur te/_nam mkha' ni de'i rtags so/_/sa ni de'i khri'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi ni gnas so/_zhu bar 'gyur bas na rtags so/_/zhes zer bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pa lhag mthong las de skad thos so/_/de 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug ldan zhes bya ba rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha 
[\[207b.2\]]lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nga ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin la dpa' ba zhes bya bar gyur te/_de las kyang ngas byang chub 
[\[207b.3\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[207b.4\]]gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa ji skad du gsan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi thams 
[\[207b.5\]]cad 'dus par gyur te/_gang gi tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa chen po gzigs nas 'khor de'i nang du chos kyi gtam bya bar brtsams pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs byung ba sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_
[\[207b.6\]]dkar po dang /_ja hong dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog rnams byung ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas slar 'ongs te bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor song ngo /_/de nas 'khor der/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[207b.7\]]lag na rin po che stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]'das ci'i slad du ltas 'di lta bu bstan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'ong ste/_de 'ong ba'i 
[\[208a.2\]]tshe ltas 'di 'dra ba ston to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'ong ba de'i tshe shing dpag bsam rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/_shing tsu ta ka yang 'phel bar 'gyur/_shing kun da'i me tog kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_
