[\[208a.3\]]shing tsam pa ka yang 'phyong bar 'gyur/_rdzing bu me tog gis shin tu gang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_de las rin po che'i shing rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_char sna tshogs kyang 'bab par 'gyur te/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_bai dUr+ya 
[\[208a.4\]]dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru rin po che'i char yang 'bab/_lha'i gos kyi char yang 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/lha gang de dang nye ba nyid du rin po che bdun yang 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_bal glang rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor 
[\[208a.5\]]bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che bdun rnams so/_/de dag byung nas sa gser du snang ngo /_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams bde 
[\[208a.6\]]ba can nas byung ba de'i tshe/_sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[208a.7\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 'ongs te/_de'i ltas 'di 'dra ba dag byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe na bskyod pa de'i tshe/_yid dga' ba'i me tog pad ma'i char rab tu bab ste/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos me tog pad ma 'dab ma stong pa sdong bu gser du snang ba thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas me tog 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' 
[\[208b.2\]]yas kyis bskur to zhes pad ma phul te bsnyung ba ma mchis sam/_'o ma brgyal tam/_bzhengs pa yang ngam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang gsung ngo /_/des pad ma de blangs te g.yon phyogs su bzhag nas/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[208b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan rjod pa mdzad do/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i las kyis ji lta bur bsgrubs pa yin/_sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag dang /_bstir med par skyes pa dag dang /_thig nag po can dag dang /_'o dod 'bod pa dag dang /_ha ha 
[\[208b.4\]]zhes 'bod pa thams cad dag dang /_gdung ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_sdong dum lta bu'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_me'i bum pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po sham ba la dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po 
[\[208b.5\]]chu grang ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa dag ni bdag gi las kyi sa ste/_bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/bgyis nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o/_/de nas 
[\[208b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos dris pa'i lan btab nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu song ngo /_/song nas me'i phung po 'bar ba bzhin du sa dang nam mkha' la mi snang bar song 
[\[208b.7\]]ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zhu ba lung bstan pa bshad pa bdag zhu na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bsod nams kyi tshogs ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lha'i bskal par na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_mal stan 
[\[209a.2\]]dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bsod nams 'phel bar gyur pa'i bsod nams de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ba spu gcig gi rtse la 
[\[209a.3\]]gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang mnyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gling chen po bzhir zla ba bcu gnyis kyi lor nyin mtshan du char pa bab kyang thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[209a.4\]]kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/_zheng du dpag tu med la/_rta rgod ma'i kha lta bu'i mthar thug pa'i thigs pa re re nas ngas 
[\[209a.5\]]bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gling chen po bzhi na seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dred dang /_ta rak+Sha_
[\[209a.6\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_phyugs dang /_bal glang dang /_rta dang /_ma he dang /_byi la la sogs pa rkang pa bzhi pa de dag gi spu re re nas ni ngas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan 
[\[209a.7\]]ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs lha'i gser rin po che las byas 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]nas nyin gcig bzhin du ring bsrel bcug na/_rigs kyi bu de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi 
[\[209b.2\]]bu 'di lta ste dper na/_shing shri sha pa'i tshal gyi lo ma ni ngas bgrang nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gling chen po 
[\[209b.3\]]bzhi na gnas pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bkod na/_
[\[209b.4\]]gang de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni snga ma bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ba spu'i rtse mo'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang mnyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin 
[\[209b.5\]]po ches/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci 'dra ba de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang gang la yang ma mthong ma thos 
[\[209b.6\]]na byang chub sems dpar gyur pa lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang nga 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams su gyur la/_de dag kyang gnas gcig tu gzhog cing 
[\[209b.7\]]na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bskal par gzhog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi phung po bgrang mi nus na/_rigs kyi bu nga gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pas lta ci smos/_gang 'jig rten na/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang 
[\[210a.2\]]po'i ming dran pa de dag ni/_bde ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/de dag ni rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_na ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba las yongs su thar ba yin no/_/de dag ni 'khor ba'i tha ma gzhan med pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni gos 
[\[210a.3\]]dkar po dang skya bo bzhin du bya ngang pa'i rgyal po mgyogs pa dang rlung gi shugs 'ong ba bzhin du bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas las chos mngon du nyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o thos nas kyang de dag gi lus la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[210a.4\]]mi 'byung /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug mi 'byung rga ba dang /_shi bar mi 'gyur/_de dag gi lus la bkres par mi 'gyur/_mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal ba shes par mi 'gyur te/_chos kyi ros bskyod nas de nyid du pad ma'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[210a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yid dam brtan po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad thar pa la gzhog gi bar du/_'jig rten gyi khams de na rtag tu 'dzin cing gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[210a.6\]]la/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi dus na yid dam brtan pa de yongs su rdzogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can mang po 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can de dag 
[\[210a.7\]]yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam ston par byed cing /_gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni de bzhin 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/_rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_dgra bcom pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dgra bcom pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_byang chub 
[\[210b.2\]]sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_mthu bo ches 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni mthu 
[\[210b.3\]]bo che'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_dbang pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/_dbang po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_nyi mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 
[\[210b.4\]]la ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_zla bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni zla ba'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_me lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni me lha'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_chu lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni 
[\[210b.5\]]chu lha'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_rlung gi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni rlung lha'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_klus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni klu'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_bgegs med pa'i bdag pos 'dul ba'i 
[\[210b.6\]]sems can rnams la ni/_bgegs med pa'i bdag po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad ngal bso po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni ngal bso po'i gzugs kyis chos 
[\[210b.7\]]'chad/_rgyal po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni rgyal po'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_mkhas pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/_mkhas pa'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_rgyal po'i mis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/_rgyal 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]po'i mi'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad/_pha dang mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni pha dang ma'i gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/_sems can dag ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba/_de lta de ltar chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[211a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni de ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[211a.3\]]'das bdag ni shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/_bdag ni nam yang 'di 'dra ba'i yul mthong ba'am/_thos par ma gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yul ji lta ba de 'dra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang 
[\[211a.4\]]ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na rdo rje'i mngal zhes bya ba'i phug yod pa de na lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma gnas te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi 
[\[211a.5\]]dbang po lha ma yin rnams la lha ma yin gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/_theg pa chen po'i mdo rin po che'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di nyid 'chad do/_/khyed cag nyon cig_/gang lha ma yin gzhan pa de dag kyang byams pa'i sems dang zhi ba'i sems su byas shing /_
[\[211a.6\]]lag pa'i thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid nyan to/_/gang 'jig rten na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di lta bu mngon du byed pa de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/thos nas kyang mtshams 
[\[211a.7\]]med pa lnga dag zad par byed do/_/'chi ba'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa bcu gnyis gshegs nas rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig_/khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa thos so/_/bde ba can du 'gro ba'i phyir lam sna tshogs 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]kyang /_sta gon byas so/_/gdugs sna tshogs dang /_cod pan dang /_rna cha dang /_se mo do rnams kyang sta gon byas so zhes dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/_/ltas de lta bu 'byung zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_bar chad med par bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lag 
[\[211b.2\]]na rin po che/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de ni lha ma yin rnams la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos ston par byed/_sgo ston par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[211b.3\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid nas song ngo /_/de yang 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[211b.4\]]ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba sngon byung bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nga ni mi mi rgyu ba'i sa'i phyogs ri khrod kyi bar ri brags shig na gnas shing bzod 
[\[211b.5\]]pa smra bar gyur te/_de'i tshe de'i dus su ngas de bzhin gshegs pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa thos te/_'di lta ste/_gser gyi sa la song nas sems can spyi'u tshugs su 'dug pa rnams la 
[\[211b.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i lam mya ngan las 'da' ba ston par byed pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/_/de nas gser gyi sa las byung ste/_dngul gyi sa la song nas/_de na skyes bu gang zag rkang pa bzhi yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[211b.7\]]po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyed cag bsam pa dam pa rab kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyags kyi rjes su sems shing mngon du phyogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyon cig ces chos 'chad do/_/de nas skyes bu de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can long ba rnams la ni lam ston cig mgon ma mchis pa rnams la ni mgon dang skyabs mdzod cig_/pha dang ma ma mchis pa rnams la ni pha dang mar mdzod cig_/
[\[212a.2\]]ngan song gsum gyi mun pa la ni sgron me mdzod cig_/tshor bar bgyid pa'i thar pa'i lam ston cig_/sems can gang dag rtag tu khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran zhing yongs su len pa de dag ni bde bar ldan pa lags so/_/bdag cag myong ba lta bu sdug bsngal las kyang thar bar 
[\[212a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas sems can de dag gi rna ba'i bu gar/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde za ma tog bkod pa'i sgra byung ba dang /_skyes bu de dag gis de thos nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsgrubs shing shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//_//bam 
[\[212a.4\]]po gnyis pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byung nas sa gzhan lcags las byas par song ste/_gang du lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gtor ma zhes bya ba mchis pa der song ba dang /_de nas lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gtor 
[\[212a.5\]]mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas slas dang /_'khor dang /_lha ma yin sgur po dang /_thung ngu la sogs pa du ma dang 'grogs shing 'khor dang bcas te dong nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[212a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ring du ni bdag gi tshe'i 'bras bu mchis so/_/de ring du ni bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs so/_/de ring du ni bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te/_gang 
[\[212a.7\]]bdag gis khyod yang dag par mthong bas de'i tshe lus thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la rin po che'i khri phul te bcom ldan 'das sdig pa la dga' ba/_gzhan gyi chung ma la 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]chags pa/_srog gcod pa la brtson pa/_pha rol gyi srog gcod pa/_rga ba dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa rnams la thugs rjes gzigs shig_/'khor bas skyo ba rnams la skyabs mdzod cig_/mgon po khyod ni pha dang mar gyur pa lags kyis bdag cag 
[\[212b.2\]]bcing bas bcings pa rnams la lam ston cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms 'bul ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po 'di bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di 
[\[212b.3\]]lta ste/_dper na nga dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bcu gnyis yod par gyur la/_de dag kyang gnas gcig tu bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis lha'i bskal par gnas su bcug na de dag gis kyang bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar 
[\[212b.4\]]mi nus na/_nga gcig pu lha ma yin gyi gnas na gnas pas lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni ngas bgrang bar nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[212b.5\]]dper na rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po'i thigs pa ni ngas re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gling chen po bzhi pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo 
[\[212b.6\]]de dag thams cad rnams kyi las la brtson par gyur la/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i mi de dag rnams gzhan ni mi byed kyi yungs kar 'ba' zhig byed la dus dus su klu'i rgyal pos kyang char pa'i rgyun phab ste/_yungs kar de dag kyang legs par grub nas g.yul gcig tu 
[\[212b.7\]]byas te skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag thams cad kyis khur shing rta dang /_bam po dang /_skon pa dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_ba lang dang /_de dag thams cad la bkal te g.yul chen po der spungs nas bong bu dag dang /_ba lang 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]dag gis bcags te phung po chen por byas kyang /_rigs kyi bu de ni ngas 'bru re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ri rab lhun po dpag tshad 
[\[213a.2\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong 'og tu nub pa dang /_'phang gi srid du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa de ni rigs kyi bu gro ga'i phung por gyur la/_rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni snag tshas yongs su gang bar gyur/_gling bzhi na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u 
[\[213a.3\]]dang /_bu mo de dag thams cad ni yi ge bar gyur te/_ri rab lhun po dang mnyam pa mtha' yas mu med pa de yi ger bris kyang rigs kyi bu yi ge de re re nas ngas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de ni bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs 
[\[213a.4\]]kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na yi ge ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas par gyur na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de yang de tsam mo/_/
[\[213a.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi bye ma ni bye ma re re nas ngas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu bsod snyoms kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/de nas lha ma yin gtor ma mchi ma dang bcas/_ngom zung gnag/_dbugs kyis brnangs shing 
[\[213a.6\]]skad ra ra por gyur la/_shugs 'byin cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gtor ma slas dang /_'khor dang bcas pas sbyin pa ji lta bu zhig bgyis nas/_tshe 'di nyid la bcings pa thob par 
[\[213a.7\]]gyur te/_bdag gis zhing ngan pa la sbyin pa byin te/_las de'i 'bras bu myong ba 'di lags pa lta/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhing la ni thal ba spar ba gang gtor kyang bdud rtsi 'grub par 'gyur na/_bdag gis ma 'tshal bas mchod sbyin mchod pa'i tshe mi'u thung gi 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gzugs kyis slong ba mchis nas bdag gis bal glang dang /_rta'i theg pa cod pan dang rna cha dang /_se mo do mang po dang ldan pa ni bshams/_g.yag rnga'i rdul yab rin po ches spras pa ni dpyangs mu tig gi se mo do dag dang mu tig las bgyis pa'i mjug ma dag ni mu tig gi 
[\[213b.2\]]dra ba dag gis g.yogs/_/gser gyi dril bu dag ni dngul gyis brgyus te sgra sil sil mchi zhing /_gzhan yang glang ser skya stong dag rmig pa ni dngul las bgyis/_rwa ni gser las bgyis shing mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs te mchi ba de 'dra ba'i glang ser skya dag dang /_gzhan 
[\[213b.3\]]yang bud med gzhon nu shin tu kha dog bzang zhing sha rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_shin tu sdug pa lha'i bu mo dang 'dra zhing 'gran pa/_lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_cod pan dang /_rna cha dang /_se mo do mang po thogs pa/_dpung rgyan dang /_gdu bu dang /_rkang pa'i gdu bu dang /_rked pa'i 
[\[213b.4\]]ska rags kyi rgyan dang /_sor gdub dang /_se ral gyi rgyan dang /_mthe bo g.yon pa sor gdub dang ldan pa/_sgra sil sil mchi ba dang ldan pa/_gos tshon sna tshogs su bcos pa gyon pa stong dag dang /_gzhan yang rin po che'i khri'u brgya stong dag dang /_gser 
[\[213b.5\]]gyi phung po dang /_dngul gyi phung po dang /_rin po che'i phung po du ma dag ni bzhag_/gos dang rgyan gyi phung po du ma dag ni bzhag_/ba lang gi rigs brgya stong du ma rdzi dang ldan pa dag ni sta gon bgyis/_zas dang skom mang po dag ni bzhag_/lha'i zas ro'i ro mchog 
[\[213b.6\]]dang ldan pa dag ni sta gon bgyis/_gser dang dngul gyi dril bu rin po ches spras pa dag ni rtag tu bzhag_/gser dang dngul gyi seng ge'i khri'u du ma dag ni rin po ches spras/_lha'i g.yag rnga'i rdul yab kyi rtsa ba dang /_gdugs dang /_lha ma dag ni gser gyis brgyan/_
[\[213b.7\]]gser gyi cod pan stong phrag du ma dag ni rin po ches brgyan cing bzhag pa dang /_de'i tshe rgyal po ni stong tshogs/_bram ze ni 'bum tshogs/_rgyal rigs ni 'bum phrag du ma tshogs te/_de'i tshe bdag gis sa'i gdugs gcig tu bgyis pa bdag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]de bas na thog ma'i sdig pa mthol lo bshags so/_/rgyal rigs kyi chung ma rnams ni snying gar dral te/_khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu dag srog bcad/_rgyal rigs chen po dag thams cad ni khu sgo dang /_lcags kyis bcings nas zangs kyi brag phug 
[\[214a.2\]]tu khrid de/_rgyal rigs 'bum phrag du ma ni zangs kyi brag phug der stsal/_kha sha dang pan da pa la sogs pa'i rgyal rigs de dag ni lcags thag lcags kyi phur pa dang ldan pas rkang lag bcings nas phug der bzhag ste/_de'i tshe bdag gis chab sgo thams cad kyang bkum mo/_/
[\[214a.3\]]dang po ni shing gi sgo'o/_/gnyis pa ni seng ldeng gi sgo'o/_/gsum pa ni 'khar ba'i sgo'o/_/bzhi pa ni zangs kyi sgo'o/_/lnga pa ni lcags kyi sgo'o/_/drug pa ni dngul gyi sgo'o/_/bdun pa ni gser gyi sgo ste/_gser gyi sgo der ri bdun gcig gi steng du gcig 
[\[214a.4\]]brtsegs te bzhag go/_/de nas bdag gis shing rta bcu pa'i bu tshol zhing gdugs la la la ni sbrang bu'i gzugs kyis/_gdugs la la la ni bung ba'i gzugs kyis/_gdugs la la la ni phag gi gzugs kyis/_gdugs la la la ni mi'i gzugs kyis de ltar bsgyur 
[\[214a.5\]]te/_gdugs re re zhing gzhan dang gzhan gyi gzugs kyis mchi yang mngon du ma mthong nas/_de'i tshe bdag gis rjes su bsams te mchod sbyin bgyi bar brtsams pa dang /_de'i tshe shing rta bcu pa'i bu glags tshol ba mchis te/_des ri bdun dral cing gshegs nas myur 
[\[214a.6\]]du phyogs gzhan du bor te rgyal rigs de dag la skad cher smras pa dang /_rgyal po de dag gis sgra de thos so/_/thos nas dbugs phyin par gyur te gnas pa dang /_khyed cag gson nam shi zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gson no 
[\[214a.7\]]zhes smras so/_/de nas skyes bu dpa' bo chen po des sgo de dag thams cad bcom nas zangs kyi phug de dag mthong ba dang /_rgyal po bcings pa de dag thams cad kyis mthu bo che mthong nas yang na ni lha ma yin gtor ma shi'o/_/'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/yang na ni bdag 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]cag bsad pa'i dus la bab pa lta zhig ces phan tshun du sems pa las/_de nas de dag gis bdag cag ni g.yul gyi sar shi na legs kyi bcing bas bcings bzhin du shi na ma legs te/_bdag cag ni bcing bas bcings bzhin du shi ba'i dus byas par gyur na rgyal 
[\[214b.2\]]rigs kyi chos kyang med par 'gyur gyi/_g.yul gyi sar shi ba'i dus byas na ni bdag cag mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gcig la gcig de skad smra'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po de dag thams cad bdag bdag gi khab tu dong ste shing rta 'dren pa'i rta du ma sta gon 
[\[214b.3\]]bgyis so/_/gang gi tshe na de dag gis shing rta dang mtshon cha rin po che chen po dag sta gon bgyis pa de'i tshe shing rta bcu pa'i bu mi'u thung gi gzugs su sprul nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa se ral du thogs/_smyig ma'i 'khar ba thogs/_khri'u 'tshal te bdag gi drung du mchis 
[\[214b.4\]]nas chab sgor phyin pa dang /_sgo bas bram ze mi'u thung ma 'gro shig ces bsgrags nas/_des bdag ni shul ring po nas mchis so zhes smras so/_/de nas sgo bas de la bram ze sa gang nas 'ongs zhes de skad smras pa dang /_bdag ni zla ba'i gling nas rgyal po drang srong gi drung 
[\[214b.5\]]du mchis so/_/de nas skyes bu sgo ba de song ste/_gtor ma la lha khyod kyi zhal sngar bram ze mi'u thung zhig mchis so zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor mas ci'i dngos po zhig slong zhes de skad smras pa dang /_lha ma 'tshal te zhes smras so/_/de 
[\[214b.6\]]nas rgyal po gtor mas khyod song la bram ze de khrid de shog shig ces de skad smras pa dang /_sgo ba des de bos te bram ze chen po bzhud cig ces smras nas de nang du song ba dang rin po che'i khri'u la bzhag ste/_pa ba sangs kyang de'i tshe na de na gnas so/_/de yang de'i 
[\[214b.7\]]mkhan por grags nas des gtor ma la 'di ni dus kyi skyes bu 'dra ba zhig phyin te khyod la nges par bar chad byed do zhes de skad smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mkhyen/_ngas ni ltas dang mtshan ma las shes so/_/bdag cag gi thabs ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_de 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]nas mthu bo ches nges par sbyin pa la 'gyod par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas des de'i khar sa ra swa ti bcug pa dang /_de'i tshe des smras pa/_bram ze tshur shog_/khyod ji lta bur sems/_bram ze des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gom pa gnyis 
[\[215a.2\]]shig gsol to/_/bram ze chen po khyod kyis ji ltar gom pa gnyis blangs na ngas ni gom pa gsum sbyin no/_/de nas blang ba blangs nas bkra shis so zhes smras te/_des chu dang til dang gser du bcas pa blangs so/_/de nas mi'u thung de'i gzugs mi snang bar byas so/_/
[\[215a.3\]]de nas pa ba sangs des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i drang srong kho bos dus kyi skyes bu 'ongs so zhes byas na khyod kyis nga'i tshig ma mnyan te/_las de'i 'bras bu myong bar gyis shig_/des bdag gi lus chen por bsgyur ba dang nyi ma dang zla ba ni de'i phrag pa la gnas/_lag na 
[\[215a.4\]]ni ral gri dang /_gzhu dang /_'khor lo dang /_mtshon cha dag thogs so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma kha bub tu 'gyel nas dran pa nyams te 'dar 'dar por byas nas bdag gis ci bgyis rang gi lag nas dug 'tshal ba lta zhes smras so/_/gom pa gnyis ni 
[\[215a.5\]]tshang na gsum pa byin cig ces smras pa dang /_gsum pa ma mchis so zhes des smras so/_/kho bos blang ba yang blangs so/_/bdag gis thabs ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_ngas gar bzhag pa der khyod kyis 'dug par gyis shig_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor mas 'di 
[\[215a.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni bka' ci stsal pa de bzhin du bgyid do/_/mad do med do zhes bgyis des smras pa/_mad do mad par bgyid do/_/des bden pa'i zhags pas bcings nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas de yang bshig go/_/snod de dag kyang lhag ma can du bgyis 
[\[215a.7\]]so/_/bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang pan da pa dang /_ko'u ra ba dag gis mnol bar bgyis so/_/seng ge'i khri de dag dang /_lha'i gdugs de dag dang /_lha ma rin po ches brgyan pa de dag dang /_gos dang rgyan de dag dang /_gser gyi dpung rgyan rin po ches spras 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]pa de dag dang /_glang ser skya de dag kyang pan da pa dang ko'u ra ba de dag gis 'tshal to/_/bdag gi sa gzhi de dag kyang bcom mo/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma lus la sems shing gtor ma ni mchod sbyin rgya cher bgyid na/_thabs ma 'tshal bas dus ma lags 
[\[215b.2\]]par sbyin pa byin pas bcings pa nyid thob par gyur te/_lha la phyag 'tshal lo snyam mo/_/de khrid nas byed pa po bzhin du slas dang 'khor dang bcas te sa'i 'og tu bzhag go/_/bdag gis sngon zhing ngan pa la sbyin pa bgyis so zhes gsol ba lags te/_phyag na me tog 
[\[215b.3\]]pad ma bzang po thogs pas skyabs mdzod cig_/pad ma'i dpal gyis brgyan pa/_skra'i cod pan thogs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa dbu na bzhugs pa/_sems can mang po dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/_dman pa dang phongs pa la thugs rje ba/_gdugs 
[\[215b.4\]]bzhin du spyan bzang ba/_sa'i spyan dam pa/_sman gyi rgyal po'i mchog_/sems can shin tu dag pa/_rnal 'byor rab tu thob pa/_thar pa rab mchog can/_thar pa la dgyes pa/_nor bu yid bzhin dang 'dra ba chos kyi mdzod yongs su skyong bar mdzad pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[215b.5\]]drug ston par mdzad pa/_bsam pa legs par mdzad pa la bdag gis bstod pa 'di bgyis so/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa lags so/_/thig nag 
[\[215b.6\]]po can dang /_'o dod 'bod pa dang /_sems can dmyal bar skyes pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du skyes pa gang dag khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa de dag ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal chen po las thar ba lags so/_/gang khyod kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa'i sems can de dag 
[\[215b.7\]]ni bsam pa legs pa dang ldan pa lags te/_de dag ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mchis nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas las chos nyan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lha ma yin 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]gyi dbang po gtor ma la lung bstan pa/_khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[216a.2\]]ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_lha ma yin thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dod chags kyi sgra med/_zhe sdang gi sgra med/_gti mug gi sgra med par 
[\[216a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig pa chen po 'thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/des de la chos kyi sbyin pa/_mu tig gi se mo do 'dom stong pa rin brgya stong ri ba dang /_cod pan rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phul lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[216a.4\]]gzigs kyi dbang po chos 'chad par rtsom ste/_rgyal po chen po nyon cig_/mi mi rtag pa'i nang na gang rtag tu yongs su len par sems pa dang /_longs spyod chen po'i rjes su sems pa dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_gang yang nor dang /_
[\[216a.5\]]'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rin po che dag dang /_gang bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma dang /_pha dang ma la sems pa'i sems can de dag ni mi shes pa yin te/_gang dngos po de dag la chags pa'i sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bur snang ste/_'chi ba'i dus 
[\[216a.6\]]kyi tshe yang skyabs byed pa su yang med par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe na srog dang bral ba de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling la log par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/chu bo chen po la yang khrag dang rnag gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang shing chen po de dag kyang 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_yang 
[\[216a.7\]]dag par shin tu 'bar bar mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mthong nas kyang skrag par 'gyur zhing de nas gzhan gyis zhags pas bcings te khrid par 'gyur ro/_/spu gri'i so'i lam chen por rkang pa yang 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa bteg pa dang rkang pa gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bya rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_bya ku ra ra dang /_khyi du ma dag gis kyang zos shing sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas spu gri'i so'i lam chen po las babs nas rkang pa re re la yang tsher ma sor bcu drug tsam yod pa lnga brgya lnga 
[\[216b.2\]]brgya zug par 'gyur te/_bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas zhes 'khong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag 'di skad ces zer te/_grogs po khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms ma phul lo/_/khyed kyis gaN Di rdung ba yang ma thos so/_/
[\[216b.3\]]khyod kyis sa phyogs gang du yang mchod rten gyi gzugs la ma bskor to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag ni ma dad pa sdig pa can sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyis spangs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_las de'i 'bras bu 'di myong bar gyis 
[\[216b.4\]]shig ces de dag gshin rje'i skyong bas/_gshin rje'i rgyal po'i drung du khrid do/_/khrid nas phul lo/_/de nas gshin rje'i rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed deng la las kyis 'di ston cig_/de nas gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bu de dag gis de rnams khrid nas thig nag po can gyi 
[\[216b.5\]]sems can dmyal ba chen por bcug go/_/bcug nas lus la mtshon shag ti brgyas btab kyang mi 'chi'o/_/lus la mtshon shag ti brgya pa gnyis pas btab kyang mi 'chi'o/_/lus la mtshon shag ti brgya pa gsum pas btab kyang mi 'chi'o/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus mi byed 
[\[216b.6\]]pa de'i tshe me'i 'obs su 'jug ste/_'on kyang 'chi ba'i dus mi byed pa dang /_de dag kha phyi nas lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa 'jug ste/_mchu yang tshig so yang lhags/_rkan yang gas/_gre ba dang /_lkog ma dang /_snying dang /_gzhang dag kyang sgra 'ur 'ur zer zhing 
[\[216b.7\]]lus thams cad kyang tshig par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gzhan na skyabs byed pa su yang med kyis rgyal po chen po da nan tan du bsod nams gyis shig ces de ltar 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gzigs kyi dbang pos de la rgyal po chen po de ring dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'dir phal cher 'du bar 'gyur gyis nga ni 'gro'o zhes de skad smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'od zer kha dog sngon po 
[\[217a.2\]]dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog rnam pa du ma btang ba dang /_de dag song ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de'i tshe lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dag 
[\[217a.3\]]kyang 'dus so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nang nas/_nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[217a.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od zer 'di dag ga las mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'di lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma'i khang pa na 
[\[217a.5\]]gnas te de la 'od zer 'di dag byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po blta ba'i thabs gang zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[217a.6\]]rigs kyi bu de ni 'di nyid du 'ong ngo /_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po lha ma yin gtor ma'i gnas nas byung ba de'i tshe dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du lha'i me tog dag lhags so/_/lha'i shing dpag bsam shin tu mdzes pa rgyan brgya 
[\[217a.7\]]stong du ma dpyangs pa/_mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong du ma dpyangs pa/_yul ka shi ka'i gos dang /_rgya'i gos dang phreng ba'i chun po rab tu dpyangs pa/_sdong po ni dmar po/_lo ma ni gser dang dngul las byas pa dag dang /_byi ru'i shing du ma dag dang /_me tog gi shing du ma dag dang /_rdzing bu me 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]tog gis yongs su gang ba brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi mchi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[217b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma'i khang pa nas byung ste/_mi mi rgyu ba'i sa phyogs mun pa mun nag ces bya ba'i sar 'gro ste/_rigs kyi bu de na nyi ma dang zla ba mi snang ste/_nor bu yid bzhin rin po che dam pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba de snang bar byed do/_/gling de na gnod 
[\[217b.3\]]sbyin dang /_srin po brgya stong du ma dag gnas so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po song ba de'i tshe de dag dga' mgu zhing snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mdun du 
[\[217b.4\]]rgyug go/_/brgyugs nas kyang rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_khyod ni mnyel to/_/dub bo/_khyod ni yun ring po zhig nas mun pa mun nag gis 'dir gshegs so/_/zhes de skad smra'o/_/des kyang ngas sems can du ma yongs su smin par byas so zhes smras nas gnod sbyin dang srin po 
[\[217b.5\]]de dag gis de khrid nas lha'i gser dang /_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la bzhag ste/_ngal bsos nas gnod sbyin dang /_srin po de dag la chos 'chad pa khyed cag nyon cig_/gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po 'phags pa za ma tog bkod pa 'di'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su 
[\[217b.6\]]bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po la skul bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni ngas gzung nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi 
[\[217b.7\]]rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni ngas thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]bcad pa gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus te/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag brgya bcu gnyis snyed gnas gcig tu bskal pa bcu gnyis 
[\[218a.2\]]su na bza' dang /_bshos dang mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang /_yo byad kyis bkur sti byas pa de dag gis kyang de ltar mi nus na nga gcig pu mun pa mun nag gi nang du 'dug pas lta ci smos so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gling chen po bzhir khyim re re zhing yang lha'i 
[\[218a.3\]]gser dang rin po che'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/_gtsug lag khang der mchod rten stong byas la nyin gcig bzhin du de dag gi nang du ring bsrel bcug na/_gang de dag tu ring bsrel bcug pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bas theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 
[\[218a.4\]]'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu bo chen po lnga rgya mtsho mching rnam chen por 'bab pa de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur 
[\[218a.5\]]ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la gnod sbyin dang /_srin po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can gang dag theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di 'dra ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung 
[\[218a.6\]]po ji lta bu lags/_rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[218a.7\]]rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang ba/_bu dpa' ba/_mthu che ba/_gzugs kyi yan lag mchog dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde 'joms par byed pa stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa rtag tu 'dzin cing ming gi rjes su dran par byed pa de dag ni 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la lar skye ba de dang de dag tu tshe rabs 
[\[218b.2\]]dran par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi lus la ba lang gi spos kyi tsan dan snom par 'gyur ro/_/kha nas me tog ud pa la sngon po'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/stobs po che'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de dag la 'thun pa'i chos bstan 
[\[218b.3\]]pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po de dag las kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/_kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na bzhugs shig_/gnas gzhan gang du yang ma bzhud cig_/mun pa mun nag gi 
[\[218b.4\]]sa 'di nyid du bdag cag gis lha'i gser gyi mchod rten bgyi'o/_/lha'i gser gyi 'chag sa bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ngas sems can du ma dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod dgos 
[\[218b.5\]]so/_/de nas gnod sbyin dang srin po de dag lag pa la 'gram pa brten te sems shing 'khod nas gcig la gcig 'di skad smra'o/_/bdag cag gi spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gshegs par 'gyur bas chos kyi gtam spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras 
[\[218b.6\]]gzigs kyi dbang po song ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po de dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed shin tu ring du 'ongs kyis slar log shig_/de nas gnod sbyin dang srin po de 
[\[218b.7\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te de nyid nas slar log go/_/de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po me'i phung po 'bar ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i gzugs su sprul te gnas gtsang 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag gi drung du song ste phyin nas/_lha'i ris de na lha'i bu rna cha'i mchog ces bya ba dbul po sdug bsngal ba zhig 'dug go/_/de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bram ze de'i gzugs kyis lha'i bu de'i drung du song ste/_phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni 
[\[219a.2\]]bkres so/_/skom mo/_/de nas lha'i bu des bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze chen po bdag la ni cung zad kyang ma mchis so/_/bdag la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig ni nges par stsal 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha'i bu gzhal med khang du song ste snod dag bltas pa dang /_snod rnams lha'i nor bu rin 
[\[219a.3\]]po che rin thang med pas yongs su gang ba dang /_snod gzhan dag kyang ro'i ro mchog gi zas dag gis yongs su gang ba dang /_g.yon phyogs kyi gzhal med khang na yang gos dang rgyan gyis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu de sems par gyur nas 'di 'dra ba'i dpal thob pa las 
[\[219a.4\]]na bdag gi sgo na nges par snod bzang po zhig 'dug go snyam mo/_/de nas des bram ze de bos te gzhal med khang gi nang du song nas lha'i rin po ches kyang bstabs/_lha'i ro'i ro mchog gi zas kyang byin te zos nas bkra shis pa byas so/_/de nas lha'i bu des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram 
[\[219a.5\]]ze chen po khyod sa ga las 'ongs/_bdag ni dze ta'i tshal zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang nas mchis so/_/de nas lha'i bu des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sa de ji lta bu zhig_/de nas bram ze des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sa de ni dga' bar byed pa/_lha'i nor bu rin po ches 
[\[219a.6\]]yongs su brgyan pa/_lha'i shing dpag bsam gyis yongs su mdzes par byas pa/_me tog yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba/_rdzing bu rnam pa du ma gda' ba/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas sna tshogs dag gda' ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob kyi cho 'phrul 
[\[219a.7\]]dag gda' ba ste/_lha'i bu sa de ni de ltar dga' bar bgyid pa'o/_/de nas lha'i bu des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze khyod kyis nges par bden par smros shig_/ci khyod lha yin nam 'on te mi/_mi la ni ji ltar khyod la ltas snang ba de 'dra ba'i ltas med do/_/de nas des de la 'di skad ces 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]smras so/_/nga ni lha yang ma yin/_mi yang ma yin te/_phongs pa dang /_brel ba la thugs rje bar byed pa byang chub kyi lam ston par byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'o/_/de nas lha'i bus cod pan dang rna cha phul nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma'o yon tan dag gi zhing /_/
[\[219b.2\]]nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/de ring nyid du sa bon btab/_/de ring nyid du 'bras bu grub/_/de nas lha'i bu des tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas de nyid du song ngo /_/de nas bram ze chen po de lha'i ris de nas babs te sing g+ha la'i gling du song ngo /_/song nas 'dod pa'i gzugs su sprul te 
[\[219b.3\]]srin mo rnams kyi mdun du 'dug pa dang /_gzugs bzang po mthong nas de'i tshe 'dod pa'i sems skyes so/_/gang gi tshe na 'dod pa'i sems skyes pa de'i tshe de'i drung du song ste phyin nas bdag cag dang sten cig_/bdag cag ni bud med gzhon nu'o/_/bdag cag la ni khyim thab ma mchis 
[\[219b.4\]]so/_/bdag po ma mchis pa'i ni bdag por gyur cig_/mgon ma mchis pa'i ni mgon du gyur cig_/rten ma mchis pa'i ni rten du gyur cig_/'di ni khyod kyis zas kyi khab bo/_/na bza'i khab bo/_/skyed mos tshal dga' bar bgyid pa dag lags so/_/rdzing bu dga' bar 
[\[219b.5\]]bgyid pa dag lags so/_/des smras pa/_gal te bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byed na'o/_/bdag cag bgyid do/_/des de dag la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i lam yang bstan/_zhal nas gsungs pa bzhi yang kha ton byed du bcug nas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[219b.6\]]bu yang thob/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang thob nas srin mo de dag la 'dod chags kyi sdug bsngal mi ldang sems zhe sdang bar yang mi byed/_su la yang srog gi bar chad byed par mi 'dod/_chos la mngon par dga' zhing gnas la sdom pa blangs te slan chad bdag cag srog gcod par mi 
[\[219b.7\]]bgyid do/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ji ltar zas dang skom gyis 'tsho ba bdag cag kyang de bzhin du 'tsho'o/_/slan chad srin mo'i tshul du mi bgyid do zhes de 'dra ba'i bslab tshig gi sdom pa blangs te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po sing 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]g+ha la'i gling nas byung nas yul khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen po na bshang ba dang /_gci ba'i gnas de na srin bu'i rigs brgya stong du ma gnas nas/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bung ba'i gzugs su sprul nas sgra bung bung du phyung 
[\[220a.2\]]ste/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la rjes su dran nas 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kha na spos kyi dri zhes bya bar gyur te 'jig rten 
[\[220a.3\]]gyi khams bde ba can du skyes so/_/de'i tshe sems can yongs su smin par byas te/_khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen po nas song nas yul ma ga d+hAr mngon du phyogs te song ba dang /_yul ma ga d+hAr phyin nas lo nyi shur dgon pa na gnas pa'i sems can gcig la gcig sha za ba dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[220a.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bdag gis thabs gang gis sems can 'di dag tshim par bya snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lha'i char pa dbab par brtsams te/_
[\[220a.5\]]thog mar ni chu'i char pa'o gang gi tshe na chus ngoms par gyur pa de'i 'og tu lha'i zhal zas ro mchog dang ldan pas skon pa yongs su gang ba dag bab bo/_/gang gi tshe na zas kyis yongs su tshim par gyur pa de'i tshe 'bras kyi char bab bo/_/gzhan yang til dang /_'bras rme'u dang /_ku lad ta'i 'bru dang /_
[\[220a.6\]]'bras so ba dag bab bo/_/gang dang gang gi tshe na sems can de dag gi dgos pa sems par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa grub par gyur to/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sems can de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas de thams cad gnas gcig tu ngal bsos so/_/ngal bsos nas gcig la gcig 'di lha 
[\[220a.7\]]gang gi mthu zhig ces smras pa dang /_de nas skyes bu de dag gi nang na rnyis pa/_rgan pa/_rgas pa/_sgur ba/_ba lang gi sna ltar gug pa/_lo brgya stong du ma lon pa zhig yod pa des de dag la smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ma gtogs 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]par lha gzhan gang gi yang mthu 'di 'dra bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mtshan ma ji lta bu zhes dris so/_/de nas skyes bu des yon tan bshad par brtsams pa mun par gyur pa rnams kyi ni sgron mar 
[\[220b.2\]]gyur pa'o/_/nyi mas gdungs shing tshig pa rnams kyi ni gdugs su gyur pa'o/_/skom gyis gdungs pa rnams kyi ni chu bor gyur pa'o/_/'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa rnams la ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa'o/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams la ni sman par gyur pa'o/_/
[\[220b.3\]]sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi ni pha dang mar gyur pa'o/_/sems can bstir med par skyes pa rnams la ni mya ngan las 'das pa ston par byed pa ste/_de'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu'o/_/gang de'i mtshan gyi rjes su dran pa de dag ni 'jig rten na bde ba dang ldan pa yin 
[\[220b.4\]]no/_/de dag ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tha ma yongs su spong ba'o/_/gang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la rtag tu me tog dang /_pog bsdus shing 'bul ba'i skyes bu gang zag de dag ni sems dpa' ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[220b.5\]]spyan ras gzigs kyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi byed pa de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_bal glang rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim 
[\[220b.6\]]bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang bdun te/_rin po che de bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la me tog 'bul ba de dag ni lus dri zhim zhing /_gang la lar skyes par lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[220b.7\]]ro/_/zhes skyes bu des de ltar yon tan gyi khyad par bshad nas 'khor de dag bdag bdag gi khang par dong ngo /_/de nas skyes bu rnyis pa des 'thun pa'i chos bshad nas de yang bdag gi khang par song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dbang po de nyid du nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas de nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob ma mthong nas yun ring ngo snyam du bsams nas de mthar gyis dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /_'ong ba bcom 
[\[221a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gzigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du phyin nas lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi 
[\[221a.3\]]ma yin pa dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma dag tshogs pa yang mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de gang zhig mchi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[221a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 'ong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor nas g.yon phyogs su ngal bsos 
[\[221a.5\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ngal lam/_'chad dam/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis las kyis ji lta bu zhig bsgrubs/_des sngon ji ltar gyur pa gsol to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[221a.6\]]yul 'di lta bu ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dag la yang yul 'di lta bu ma mchis na byang chub sems dpar gyur pa la lta ci smos snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung 
[\[221a.7\]]du song ste/_mdun du 'dug go/_/'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ngal lam/_'chad dam/_bdag ni mi ngal lo nyon ma mongs so zhes phan tshun du gtam byas nas kha rog ste 'khod do/_/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bshad par brtsams pas rigs kyi bu dag nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[221b.2\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/zhes chos de bshad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas 'khor de dag bdag bdag gi gnas su dong ngo /_/byang chub 
[\[221b.3\]]sems dpa' de dag kyang bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo /_/'di ni theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i le'u dang po ste rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 
[\[221b.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos sngon ting nge 'dzin gang dag la mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta 
[\[221b.5\]]ste/_rnam par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje gyen du 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje 
[\[221b.6\]]rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyogs bcur rnam par lta zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu spyan mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi rgyal 
[\[221b.7\]]po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ma lus par 'ongs 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par 'dud ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyi bor 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba ltar spyan mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_g.yog skye bo mang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[222a.2\]]dang /_bskal pa'i gling zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_cho 'phrul ston ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_pad mo'i bla zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bstir med pa skems zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[222a.3\]]dang /_lha'i rna cha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgya mtshor 'jug ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzhal med khang gi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ka la ping ka'i sgra 
[\[222a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ud pa la sngon po'i dri zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zhon zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bal glang dga' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par rol ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bla na med 
[\[222a.5\]]ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i bla zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang bar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer brgya pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bskus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[222a.6\]]dang /_rnam pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lha ma yin la skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gling chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshor ba rnam par grol zhes 
[\[222a.7\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnal 'byor byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_don dam pa ston ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_klu bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge glal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sa ri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dang /_'ong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dran pa'i dbang po 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal ba'i theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lam ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[222b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan te/_de'i ba spu'i khung bu re re na yang ting nge 'dzin brgya stong dag gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni 
[\[222b.3\]]dpag tu med do/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs de 'dra ba dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag la yang med na byang chub sems dpa' dag la lta ci smos//_//bam po gsum pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de'i tshe/_nga tshong pa lnga brgya dang 'grogs 
[\[222b.4\]]nas sing g+ha la'i gling du song ste/_shing rta dang /_khur dang /_bam po dang /_skon pa dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu la sogs pas zong mang du bskyas te sing g+ha la'i gling du song ba las/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 'dab dang /_grong ye'u dang /_tshong dus dag tu song ba 
[\[222b.5\]]las sing g+ha la'i gling du ma phyin par gru bo che bzang po zhig rnyed nas/_ngas gdos 'dzin pa la gling gang logs su rlung langs/_ci rin po che'i gling du rlung langs sam/_yang na ni nas kyi gling du rlung langs sam/_'on te srin mo'i gling du rlung langs zhes smras pa dang /_gdos 'dzin 
[\[222b.6\]]pa 'di skad ces zer te/_bser ma ni sing g+ha la'i gling du langs kyis lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas gru bo che btang ste sing g+ha la'i gling du song ba las sing g+ha la'i gling na gnas pa'i srin mo dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rlung btang ba dang gru bo che de dum bu dum bur lhags nas 
[\[222b.7\]]tshong pa de dag chu'i nang du lhung ba dang /_brkyal nas chu'i 'gram du nye bar phyin to/_/de nas srin mo lnga brgya gzhon nu'i gzugs su bsgyur te sgra ca co zer zhing byung nas chu 'gram de dang nye ba zhig tu 'ongs te bla gos kyi ras byin nas bslang ba dang /_de dag bdag bdag gi gos 'tshir 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]ro/_/btsir nas de dag gnas de nas gnas gzhan du shing tsam pa ka chen po yod pa de'i drung du ngal bsos so/_/ngal bsos nas bdag cag la thabs ci yod ces gtam byas pa dang /_de dag gis bdag cag la thabs ma mchis so zhes de skad smras nas kha rog 
[\[223a.2\]]ste 'khod do/_/de nas srin mo de dag de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas khyo ma mchis pa'i ni khyo mdzod cig_/gnas ma mchis pa'i ni gnas mdzod cig_/rten ma mchis pa'i ni rten mdzod cig_/'di dag ni khyod kyi zas kyi khyim mo/_/skom gyi khyim mo/_/skyed mos tshal dga' bar bgyid 
[\[223a.3\]]pa'o/_/rdzing bu dga' bar bgyid pa'o/_/zhes de skad smras nas srin mo de dag gis skyes pa re re khrid de bdag bdag gi khyim du song ngo /_/gang srin mo de dag gi nang na shin tu rgan pa des bdag gi khyim du nga khrid nas lha'i ro'i ro mchog dang ldan pas tshim par byas so/_/tshim 
[\[223a.4\]]par byas nas rtse bar rtsom ste/_de la des mi'i bde bas tshim par byas nas de bzhin du nyi ma gnyis gsum nas bdun 'das so/_/re zhig na mo nyal te gnyid kyis log pa dang gad mo snyan par dgod pa ngas mthong nas nga ngo mtshar du gyur te/_gnyid log bzhin du gad mo snyan 
[\[223a.5\]]par dgod pa ngas nam yang ma mthong /_ma thos so/_/snyam nas de'i tshe ngas de la khyod ci'i phyir/_dgod ces smras pa dang /_mo na re 'di dag ni sing g+ha la'i gling na gnas pa'i srin mo lags te/_khyed kyi srog bcad da re zhes zer nas de'i tshe ngas de la 'di dag srin mo yin par kho 
[\[223a.6\]]bos ji ltar shes par bya zhes dris pa dang /_de ste yid mi ches na g.yas phyogs kyi lam srang zung ste bzhud cig dang /_de na lcags kyi grong khyer mtho ba skar khung dang rta babs med pa zhig mchis te/_de na tshong pa brgya phrag du ma 'tshal cing bor nas la la ni gson/_la la ni gum ste/_
[\[223a.7\]]khyod de ltar thugs mi ches na lam der bzhud cig_/lam der bzhud nas rtogs shig dang /_de'i tshe nga la yid ches par 'gyur ro zhes zer nas/_de'i tshe des glen pa'i dra ba zhes bya ba'i gnyid kyis non par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de nub mo'i dus kyi tshe song nas ral gri zla ba 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ltar snang ba bdag 'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya/_thogs nas g.yas phyogs kyi lam srang bzung ste/_song ba las rim gyis lcags kyi grong khyer du phyin nas kho ra khor yug tu bskor kyang des sgo ma mthong ngo /_/de nas lcags kyi grong khyer chen po de na shing tsam pa ka zhig 'dug pa de 
[\[223b.2\]]la 'dzegs te/_de nas ngas lud pa'i sgra byas pa dang /_skyes bu tshong pa de dag na re tshong dpon chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag cag ni lcags kyi grong khyer du stsal to/_/zhes smras nas de'i tshe nyi ma re re zhing yang mi brgya brgya khrid de za'o/_/zos nas rus pa rnams lcags kyi 
[\[223b.3\]]grong khyer de nyid du 'dor ba yang de dag gis nga la sngon byung ba bzhin du smras nas ngas de'i tshe shing tsam pa ka las babs te g.yas phyogs kyi lam srang de bzung nas myur du myur bar song ba ste/_de nas slar phyin to/_/de nas snyan par byed pa de na re ded dpon chen po khyod kyis 
[\[223b.4\]]gzigs sam zhes zer nas ngas mthong ngo /_/zhes smras so/_/khyod la bdag gis gtam bgyis pa khyod kyis rtags la bab bam/_de'i tshe ngas de la thabs ci yod ces dris na/_de nas snyan par byed pa des 'di skad ces smras te/_lha thabs gang gis bde ba dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[223b.5\]]pa med par sing g+ha la'i gling nas 'byung zhing slar 'dzam bu'i gling mthong bar 'gyur ba'i thabs mchis so/_/ngas de la lam gang gis sing g+ha la'i gling nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lam de ston cig ces byas pa dang /_snyan par byed pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha rta'i rgyal 
[\[223b.6\]]po ba la ha zhes bgyi ba dman pa dang phongs pa la sman pa zhig mchis te/_rta'i rgyal po ba la ha de sman sbed thams cad ces bgyi ba 'tshal te/_gser gyi bye ma'i thang bu la phar 'gre tshur 'gre bar bgyid do/_/phar 'gres tshur 'gres nas lus sprug go/_/sprugs nas pha rol du su 'gro/_
[\[223b.7\]]pha rol du su 'gro zhes smra'o/_/khyod kyis lha bdag pha rol du mchi'o zhes bgyis shig ces de skad bsgo ba thos nas de srin mo'i drung du nye bar song nas lhan cig tu nyal ba dang /_de sad nas 'phags pa'i sras lus re grang ba zhig ces zer nas ngas de la grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bshang gci byed du song 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bas/_de'i phyir lus grang mo grang bar gyur to/_/zhes smras so/_/mos kyang smras nas slar de gnyid kyis log ste nyi ma shar ba'i tshe langs so/_/de nas skyes bu tshong pa rnams la khyed tshur shog shig_/grong khyer gyi phyi rol du 'dong ngo zhes bsgo ba dang /_de 
[\[224a.2\]]dag thams cad grong khyer gyi phyi rol du 'dong ngo /_/de dag grong khyer gyi phyi rol du dong nas ngal bsos so/_/ngal bsos nas su'i chung ma dag ji lta bus mdza' bar gyur ces dris pa dang /_kha cig gis ni bdag la shin tu mdza' bar byed do zhes smras so/_/kha cig gis ni bdag la lha'i 
[\[224a.3\]]ro'i ro mchog dang ldan pa'i zas kyis 'dzin par bgyid do zhes smras so/_/kha cig gis ni gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dzin to zhes smras so/_/kha cig gis ni bdag la cod pan dang /_rna cha dang se mo do'i chun pos 'dzin to zhes smras so/_/kha cig gis ni bdag gi lus la brel 
[\[224a.4\]]ba ma mchis so zhes smras so/_/kha cig gis ni bdag la tsan dan dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga pur gyis 'dzin to zhes smras te/_de ltar de dag gis gtam byas nas ngas de'i tshe skyes bu tshong pa de dag la gang bdag cag srin mo la chags par bya ba'i ni mi rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_de 
[\[224a.5\]]dag myos nas tshong dpon chen po sing g+ha la'i gling na gnas pa'i srin mo lags mad mad ces zer nas/_de'i tshe ngas de dag la sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun bden no bden no/_/'di ni mi ma yin te srin mo'o zhes smras so/_/de nas skyes bu tshong pa de dag gis bdag cag 
[\[224a.6\]]la skyabs ci yod/_rten ci yod ces smras pa dang /_ngas de dag la sing g+ha la'i gling na rta'i rgyal po ba la ha zhes bya ba dman pa dang phongs pa la snying rje bar byed pa zhig yod de/_sman sbed thams cad ces bya ba zos nas gser gyi bye ma'i thang bu la phar 'gre tshur 'gre byas te lus sprug go/_/
[\[224a.7\]]lus sprugs nas de'i tshe su pha rol du 'gro/_su pha rol du 'gro zhes tshig lan gsum smras pa dang /_bdag cag der 'dong ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas skyes bu tshong pa de dag nga la bdag cag nam bzhud ces zer nas/_ngas de dag la nyi ma gsum na nges par 'dong gis skyes bu so so nas 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]rgyags dang chos shig ces de dag dang dam bcas nas slar grong khyer du dong ste bdag bdag gi khyim du phyin pa dang /_de dag la srin mo rnams kyis ngal lam/_chad dam/_khyed kyis skyed mos tshal dga' bar byed pa mthong ngam zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis nged kyis [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma 
[\[224b.2\]]mthong ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas srin mo de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa'i sras sing g+ha la'i gling 'di na skyed mos tshal dga' bar byed pa me tog gis yongs su gang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rdzing bu brgya phrag du ma mchis so zhes smras nas/_des nyi ma gsum na 
[\[224b.3\]]skyed mos tshal gyis de dag dang rdzing bu me tog gis yongs su gang ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag ltar 'gro'o/_/de'i tshe me tog bzang po dag kyang khyer te 'ong gis rgyags bzang du gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa'i sras de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas des 
[\[224b.4\]]lus la bsams te/_srin mo 'di dag gis rgyus shes par gyur na ni bdag cag gi srog gcod do snyam du de ltar lus kyi rjes su bsams nas kha rog ste 'dug pa dang /_mos zas bzang po byin nas zos te shugs phyung nas/_srin mo des 'phags pa'i sras ci'i slad du 
[\[224b.5\]]shugs 'byin ces smras so/_/de nas ngas mo la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni bdag gi yul la dga' 'o zhes smras pa dang /_'phags pa'i sras bdag gi yul gyis ci zhig bgyi/_sing g+ha la'i gling 'di nyid na khyod kyi zas kyi khang pa dang /_skom gyi khang pa dang /_gos kyi 
[\[224b.6\]]khang pa sna tshogs dang /_khyed kyi skyed mos tshal dga' bar bgyid pa sna tshogs mchis kyis lha'i bde ba myong bar mdzod cig_/'dzam bu'i gling la mya ngan bgyir ci mchis zhes zer nas de'i tshe nga kha rog ste 'dug go/_/de'i nyin mo 'das nas phyi de nyin zas bzang po rgyags dang 
[\[224b.7\]]ldan pa/_de dag thams cad sta gon byas nas nyi ma gsum pa la nang par sngar de dag thams cad dong nas grong khyer gyi sgor byung ngo /_/byung nas slar sus kyang sing g+ha la'i gling du mi blta bar dam bcas so/_/de 'dra ba'i dam bcas nas myur ba myur bar skyen pa skyen par dong ba dang /_rim 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]gyis rta'i rgyal po ba la ha ga la ba der phyin nas/_rta'i rgyal po ba la ha sman sbed thams cad ces bya ba la myangs so/_/sman myangs nas gser gyi bye ma'i thang bu la phar 'gre tshur 'gre bar byed do/_/byas nas lus sprug go/_/gang gi tshe na lus sprugs pa de'i tshe 
[\[225a.2\]]sing g+ha la'i gling yang 'gul lo/_/[(]das [,]des [)]pha rol du su 'gro/_pha rol du su 'gro zhes tshig lan gsum smras pa dang /_de nas skyes bu tshong pa de dag gis bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas rta'i rgyal po ba la ha des khyod las sus kyang sing g+ha la'i gling la mi 
[\[225a.3\]]blta bar bya'o/_/sus kyang mig gis mi blta bar bya'o/_/zhes de skad smras te de 'dra ba'i dam bcas nas de'i tshe thog ma kho nar bzhon no/_/de'i 'og tu tshong pa lnga brgya zhon no/_/gang gi tshe de dag zhon pa de'i tshe sing g+ha la'i gling na gnas pa'i srin mo dag sgra ca co zer 
[\[225a.4\]]zhing phyi bzhin du snyeg go/_/ngu zhing snying rje rje ltar smra ba dang /_de nas de dag gis ngo slar log ste bltas so/_/gang gi tshe de dag gis bltas pa de'i tshe de dag kha bub tu lhung ngo /_/gang gi tshe na de dag chu'i nang du lhung ba de'i tshe srin mo dag gis drangs shing drangs shing zos so/_/
[\[225a.5\]]de'i tshe nga gcig pus 'dzam bu gling du phyin te/_de'i tshe 'gram du nye ba dang rta'i rgyal po ba la has nga la lan gsum bskor te/_phyag byas nas de nyid du song ngo /_/de nas nga yang song nas rim gyis bdag gi khyim du phyin te/_de'i tshe pha dang mas nga'i mgul nas 'jus nas ngus pa dang /_
[\[225a.6\]]rlangs pas de gnyis kyi mig ru gas nas mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas pha ma dang lhan cig tu ngal bsos nas des de dag la sngon ji ltar byung ba thams cad bzlas pa dang /_pha mas de la smras pa/_bu khyod gson bzhin du rnyed de/_nged la nor ni mi dgos so/_/rgas pa'i tshe khar bar 
[\[225a.7\]]gyur pa'o/_/rgas pa'i tshe lam ston pa'o/_/'chi ba'i tshe zas sbyin par byed pa'o/_/shi nas mgon yod par byed pa'o/_/bu ni rlung bsil bar byed pa'o/_/zhes pha dang mas smras te/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nga ded dpon du gyur pa'i tshe 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ba myong ngo /_/'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rta ba la har gyur pas nga 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa de 'dra ba las yongs su thar bar byas so/_/'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang 
[\[225b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang mi nus te/_ba spu'i khung bu re re'i gtam [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig bshad do/_/'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gser zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na dri za bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[225b.3\]]brgya stong dag gnas te/_de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing bde ba dam pa dang ldan pa yin te/_lha'i dngos po dag 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/_'dod chags can du mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang can du mi 'gyur/_khong khro ba'i sems mi skyed/_de dag las gang la yang gnod 
[\[225b.4\]]pa'i sems mi skyed de/_de dag dus thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la gnas pa yin te/_dus thams cad du chos 'dod pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gser zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu na snang ba zhes bya ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu 
[\[225b.5\]]rin po che yod de/_gang dang gang gi tshe dri za de dag bsam pa sems pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe gser zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu las 'das nas nag po zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma yod de/_la la ni 
[\[225b.6\]]mngon par shes pa gcig pa/_la la ni mngon par shes pa gnyis pa/_la la ni mngon par shes pa gsum pa/_la la ni mngon par shes pa bzhi pa/_la la ni mngon par shes pa lnga pa/_la la ni mngon par shes pa drug pa'o/_/ba spu'i khung bu de na dngul gyis gzhi la gser 
[\[225b.7\]]gyi ri dngul gyi rtse mo pad mo dmar pos brgyan pa de 'dra ba'i ri bdun cu rtsa bdun yod de/_ri re re zhing yang drang srong brgyad khri gnas so/_/drang srong de dag gi shing dpag bsam ni 'di 'dra ste/_sdong po ni dmar po/_'dab ma ni gser dang /_dngul las byas pa rin po cher snang 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]ba'o/_/shing dpag bsam re re dang /_nye ba na ni rdzing bu bzhi yod de/_la la ni chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas yongs su gang ba/_la la ni lha'i me tog gis yongs su gang ba'o/_/phyogs de dang nye ba na lha'i byi ru'i shing gis yongs su mdzes par byas pa'i 
[\[226a.2\]]dpag bsam gyi shing dag snang ste/_lha'i rgyan dag ni 'phyang cod pan dang /_rna cha dag kyang rab tu 'phyang /_se mo do dang /_se mo do'i phyed pa dag kyang rab tu 'phyang /_gdu bu dag kyang rab tu 'phyang ste/_lo ma ni rin po che dang /_gser las byas pa'o/_/de na shing dpag bsam 
[\[226a.3\]]re re zhing yang dri za brgya brgya gnas te/_gang gi tshe de dag gis sil snyan dkrol ba de'i tshe [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dag kyang sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal te/_'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag myong bar gyur/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/
[\[226a.4\]]sdug cing mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba las 'du ba dang bral bar yang mthong ngo /_/mi dag kyang sdug bsngal mang du myong ngo zhes skyo bar byed do/_/de ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dag stong pa'i rjes su bsams pa dang /_de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog 
[\[226a.5\]]bkod pa 'di rjes su dran nas de dag la lha'i ro'i ro mchog gi zas dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_lha'i rdzas dri zhim po dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_lha'i gos dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe na de dag bsam pa sems pa de'i tshe bsam pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[226a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir ngo mtshar bar gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226a.7\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i ming gi rjes su dran na/_de'i ming tsam gyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzas dag 'byung bar 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]'gyur na gang theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa lags so/_/gang theg pa chen po'i mdo za ma 
[\[226b.2\]]tog bkod pa las yi ge gcig kyang 'drir 'jug pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa lags te/_de dag ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'di dag mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni phyag dar pa dang /_sme sha can gyi rigs su mi skye/_dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur/_theng po 
[\[226b.3\]]dang /_sgur po dang /_gug pa dang /_pus mo'i nang 'thab pa dang /_lus po che dang /_mdze can du mi 'gyur/_de dag gi lus la nad dag gis btab par mi 'gyur te/_nad med pa dang /_mthu che ba dang /_dbang po gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 
[\[226b.4\]]so zhes bya ba byin nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba khyod 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge 
[\[226b.5\]]bsnyen ma 'dus pa la khyod kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi gtam rgya chen po byas pa legs so legs so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe na bdag gi zhu ba 'di 
[\[226b.6\]]bstan pa de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams mi phyed pa'i dad pa skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod phyi phyir zhing gsol ba legs so legs so 'di lta ste/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ba spu'i khung bu nag po 'das 
[\[226b.7\]]nas ba spu'i khung bu rin po che'i rna cha zhes bya ba de na dri za'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gnas te/_dri za'i bu mo de dag kyang byad gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog shin tu bzang zhing rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_lus lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_lha'i bu mo 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'gran par byed pa dang 'dra ba de lta bur shin tu bzang yang 'dod chags kyi sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang gi sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar mi 'gyur/_gti mug gi sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar mi 'gyur/_de dag gi lus la mi'i sdug 
[\[227a.2\]]bsngal yang med de dri za'i bu mo de dag dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i mtshan gyi rjes su dran par byed de/_de'i tshe rdzas de dag thams cad 'byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 
[\[227a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ba spu'i khung bu de blta bar 'tshal gyis bdag der mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de ni gzung du mi rung ste/_ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gzung du mi rung /_reg par mi rung 
[\[227a.4\]]ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de yang gzung du mi rung /_reg par mi rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ba spu'i khung bu der lo bcu gnyis su kun du song yang ba spu'i khung bu de ma mthong ste/_gang ba spu'i khung bu re re na gnas pa des kyang 
[\[227a.5\]]ma mthong na byang chub sems dpar gyur pa gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos kyang ma mthong na ci bdag mchi bar bgyi 
[\[227a.6\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu nga ni g.yo med pa/_sgyu med pa/_phra ba nyid du snang ste/_bltar med pa/_gzugs med pa/_gzugs che ba/_lag pa brgya stong pa/_mig bye ba brgya stong pa/_mgo bcu gcig pa/_rnal 'byor chen po/_rnal 'byor dam pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la 
[\[227a.7\]]gnas pa/_sems pa med pa/_shes rab che ba/_srid pa las sgrol bar byed pa/_rigs kyi dbang po/_bltar mi snang ba ston pa la shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_chos thams cad la grib mar gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]gzigs kyi dbang po yang sus kyang mi mthong ste/_de'i rang bzhin gyi lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis kyang mi gzigs na kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni cho 'phrul bsam 
[\[227b.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa dag ston te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/de dag thams cad byang chub kyi lam la 'jog go/_/bzhag nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas pa la chos 
[\[227b.3\]]nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis na bdag gis mthong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[227b.4\]]bkur ba'i phyir mi mjed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du 'ong na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchi bar gnang 
[\[227b.5\]]bar mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe na sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe thog ma kho nar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'ong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[227b.6\]]chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag sdig pa dang ldan zhing yun ring du gson la/_spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mthong ba dang 'bral zhing long bar gyur/_lam gsum du 'gro bar gyur pa lta ci rung snyam du sems shing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang byang chub 
[\[227b.7\]]sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang gi tshe na mchi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhad nas rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'ong ba'i dus ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de nas babs nas bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma gnas te/_kha cig ni sa gcig pa/_kha cig ni sa gnyis 
[\[228a.2\]]pa/_kha cig ni sa gsum pa/_kha cig ni sa bzhi pa/_kha cig ni sa lnga pa/_kha cig ni sa drug pa/_kha cig ni sa bdun pa/_kha cig ni sa brgyad pa/_kha cig ni sa dgu pa/_kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[228a.3\]]sel ba bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu de na gser dang dngul gyi ri drug cu yod de/_ri re re zhing yang 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri yod do/_/ri re re zhing yang rtse mo gser gyis brgyan pa dgu khri yod do/_/ngos ngos dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dag 
[\[228a.4\]]gnas so/_/ri'i rgyal po de dag la dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gnas te/_de dag ba spu'i khung bu de na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sil snyan gyi sgra grag par 'dzin to/_/'di lta ste/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu de 
[\[228a.5\]]na gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag du ma lha'i nor bu dang mu tig gis yongs su brgyan pa/_shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_mu tig gi se mo do brgya stong gis brgyan pa dag yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gzhal med khang der ngal bsos nas 
[\[228a.6\]]chos kyi gtam byed do/_/de nas gzhal med khang nas byung nas bdag bdag gi 'chag sar 'gro ste/_'chag sa re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun cu bdun cu yod pa/_la la ni chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas yongs su gang ngo /_/la la ni me tog gis yongs su gang ste/_me tog ud
