[\[228a.7\]]pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_dri zhim pa dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag gis yongs su gang ngo /_/'chag sa de de dag na shing dpag bsam yid du 'ong ba sdong po ni dmar po/_lo ma ni gser dang dngul las byas pa lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa/_cod pan dang rna cha dang /_phreng ba'i chun po rab tu 'phyang ba/_se mo do dang /_se mo do phyed pa rab tu 'phyang ba/_dpung rgyan rab tu 'phyang ba/_gzhan yang rgyan sna tshogs dag rab tu 'phyang ba yod do/_/'chag sa de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag nub mo 'chag cing theg pa chen po rnam 
[\[228b.2\]]pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su dran par byed/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sa'i rjes su dran par byed/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun la sems par byed do/_/bsams nas byams pa la sgom ste/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ltar ba spu'i khung bu de na de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[228b.3\]]dag yod do/_/de las babs nas rdo rje'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na mi'am ci brgya stong phrag du ma gnas pa/_mgul rgyan dang /_rna cha dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_byug pa shin tu bzang ba dag snang ngo /_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_
[\[228b.4\]]dge 'dun la mngon par dad/_chos la sems rtse gcig par byed pa/_byams pa la gnas par byed pa/_bzod pa sgom par byed pa/_mya ngan las 'da' ba sems par byed la/_mi dag gis skyo bar byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba'i mi'am ci mngon par dga' ba dag 
[\[228b.5\]]gnas so/_/ba spu'i khung bu de nyid na ri brgya phrag du ma yod de kha cig ni rdo rje'i'o/_/kha cig ni dngul gyi'o/_/kha cig ni gser gyi'o/_/kha cig ni shel gyi'o/_/kha cig ni me tog pad ma dmar po'i'o/_/kha cig ni rin po che in dra nI la'i'o/_/kha cig rin po che sna bdun gyi 
[\[228b.6\]]ste/_rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de na mtshan ma de 'dra ba dag snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de na shing dpag bsam du ma dang /_byi ru'i shing dang /_tsan dan gyi shing dang /_spos kyi shing du ma dag dang /_rdzing bu brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang /_lha'i gzhal med khang shel 
[\[228b.7\]]dang dngul dang ldan pa/_shin tu bzang ba yid du 'ong ba mdzes pa/_de 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang dag kyang byung ste/_gzhal med khang de dag tu mi 'am ci rnams ngal bso'o/_/ngal bsos nas chos kyi gtam byed de/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam byed/_tshul 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam byed/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam byed/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam byed/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam byed/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam byed de/_de ltar pha rol tu phyin 
[\[229a.2\]]pa drug gi gtam byas nas/_bdag bdag gi 'chag sar 'chag ste/_'chag sa kha cig ni gser gyi ri'o/_/'chag sa kha cig ni dngul gyi ri'o/_/'chag sa de dag gi kho ra khor yug na dpag bsam gyi shing sdong po ni dmar po/_lo ma ni gser dang dngul las byas pa/_lha'i 
[\[229a.3\]]rgyan rab tu 'phyang ba/_cod pan dang /_rna cha dang /_phreng ba'i chun po rab tu 'phyang ba/_dpung rgyan rab tu 'phyang ba/_rkang pa'i gdu bu rab tu 'phyang ba/_se mo do dang se mo do phyed pa rab tu 'phyang ba/_rin po che'i se mo do rab tu 'phyang ba dag yod de 'chag sa de na shing dpag bsam de 
[\[229a.4\]]dag khang pa brtseg ma lta bur 'dug ste/_'chag sa de na mi'am ci dag 'chag go/_/'chag pa'i tshe 'khor ba la skyo ba la rjes su sems te/_kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/'chi ba sdug bsngal lo/_/kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/dbul ba de yang sdug 
[\[229a.5\]]bsngal lo/_/kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/'dod cing mdza' ba dang bral ba dang /_mi 'dod cing mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa de shin tu mi bzad par sdug bsngal lo/_/thig nag po gdab par skyes pa dang /_'o dod 'bod par skyes pa dang /_ha ha zhes zer ba'i sems can dmyal ba 
[\[229a.6\]]chen por skyes pa dang /_me'i rdza mar skyes pa dang /_rdo rje'i ri la skyes pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du skyes pa'i sems can de dag shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/zhes de ltar mi'am ci de dag lus la sems so/_/bsams nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings la sems te/_rigs kyi 
[\[229a.7\]]bu de ltar mi'am ci chos la mngon par dga' ba dag rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ming gi rjes su dran par byed de/_de'i tshe de dag la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni dkon pa'o/_/sems can rnams kyi pha dang mar gyur pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la lam ston par byed pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 
[\[229b.2\]]gyur pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni de lta bu'o/_/de'i ming 'dzin pa yang dkon te/_de dag de'i yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi ming gi rjes su dran na de'i tshe ba spu'i khung bu de dag tu skye'o/_/slar 'khor bar mi 
[\[229b.3\]]'khor ro/_/ba spu'i khung bu nas ba spu'i khung bur 'gro'o/_/ba spu'i khung bu de dag na yang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sa tshol ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yi 
[\[229b.4\]]ge drug pa'i rig sngags ga las btsal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang mi mkhyen na byang chub sems dpas lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam 
[\[229b.5\]]par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang mi mkhyen tam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[229b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po dam pa'o/_/gang dag snying po dam pa shes pa de dag ni thar pa shes pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can 'ga' la yang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 
[\[229b.7\]]'tshal ba ma mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo ni sus kyang mi shes te/_'di ni rnal 'byor dpag tu med pa'i phyir bsgrub dka' ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis kyang mi mkhyen na byang chub 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]sems dpar gyur pas lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'di'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bskal pa bcu drug tu kun du gshegs na byang chub sems dpar gyur pas lta ci smos te ga la zhig shes/_'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[230a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i snying po dam pa'o/_/'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor na yongs su 'khyam yang sus kyang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo sus kyang mi shes so/_/gang yang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di rtag tu 'dzin cing zlos 
[\[230a.3\]]pa la brtson pa'i sems can de dag ni bsod nams dang ldan pa yin no/_/de dag zlos par byed pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/pha 
[\[230a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa drug sgo na gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang lha'i sde sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang phyogs bzhi srung bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mching rnam dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[230a.5\]]'jog po la sogs te/_klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su srung bar byed do/_/gzhan yang sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag ni bla gab med par srung bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de'i ba spu'i khung bu re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas 
[\[230a.6\]]rigs kyi bu khyod 'di 'dra ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnyed par bya ba thob par gyur cing khyod kyis rus kyi rigs bdun brgyud du thob par byas pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lto na srog chags gnas pa de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog par 'gyur 
[\[230a.7\]]te legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di la la zhig gi lus la 'chang na rigs kyi bu de'i lus ni rdo rje'i lus su rig par bya'o/_/ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bye bar rig par bya'o/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di zlos par byed na de ni spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur ro/_/ye shes kyi phung po rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nyi ma re re zhing yang pha 
[\[230b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang thob par 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig la dbugs phyir 'byung ba dang nang du rngub par byed na byams pas kyang rung zhe sdang bas kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[230b.3\]]phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig lag gis reg pas kyang reg par byed na de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par 'gyur ro/_/bud 
[\[230b.4\]]med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dag gis mthong ba tsam dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu la sogs pas kyang mthong na de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_
[\[230b.5\]]mdza' ba dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal med par 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di zlos par byed na skul bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 
[\[230b.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo rnal 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bsam gtan dpag tu ma mchis pa zil gyis gnon par bgyid pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mya ngan las 'da' ba ston par 
[\[230b.7\]]bgyid pa thar bar 'jug par bgyid pa/_chos kyi mdzod yongs su gang bar bgyid pa/_'khor ba rtsa ba nas 'byin par bgyid pa/_'gro ba lnga skems par bgyid pa sems can dmyal ba dang nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par bgyid pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gtogs pa rnams sgrol bar bgyid pa/_chos kyi ro myong bar bgyid pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bshad pa bas ma 'tshal ba bdag gis ji ltar thob par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das gang bdag la yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags stsol ba de la 'dzam bu'i 
[\[231a.2\]]gling rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_dbul bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te brir gro ga dang smyug gu ma mchis na/_bdag gi khrag las snag tshar bgyis/_pags pa bshus te gro gar bgyis/_rus pa bcom ste smyug gur bgyis kyang /_
[\[231a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus la skyo ba ma mchis te de ni pha ma dang /_bla ma'i yang bla mar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'di'i phyir 'jig 
[\[231a.4\]]rten gyi khams rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song bar nga dran te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byas pas kyang ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las ma thob ma thos nas/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[231a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dmar po'i mchog ces bya ba de'i spyan sngar ngas 
[\[231a.6\]]mchi ma phyung ba dang /_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rigs kyi bu de ltar snying rje rje ltar mchi ma ma 'byin par rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa zhes bya ba 
[\[231a.7\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di mkhyen gyis song zhig ces bka' stsal nas rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pa'i drung du song ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo de'i ming gi rjes su dran pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnyed par dka' ba thob par 'gyur ba thob par 'tshal lo/_/
[\[231b.2\]]de'i slad du bdag 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa can du mar phyin te 'dir mchis kyang don ma mchis pa'i tshegs su gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mchog yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di'i yon tan bsngags pa gsung ba rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper 
[\[231b.3\]]na ngas rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni gzung nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi bye ma ni re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen 
[\[231b.4\]]mo lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig gis khyim dpag tshad brgya tham par byas te/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgyar byas la/_de til gyi 'bras bus yongs su gang bar byed de de na khab tsam gyi bu ga yang med 
[\[231b.5\]]la/_de'i sgor skyes bu mi rga mi 'chi ba zhig bzhag ste/_des bskal pa brgya 'das shing til gyi 'bras bu gcig phyir 'dor te/_rnam grangs des khyim gyi rmang dang gzhi yan chad zad cing med par 'gyur gyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig zlos pa'i 
[\[231b.6\]]bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gling bzhir mi rnams kyi las nas dang /_gro dang 'bras dang /_rgya sran dang bal sran la sogs pa dang /_rgya shug dang /_sran chung la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa byas te/_klu'i rgyal pos kyang der dus 
[\[231b.7\]]dus su char pa'i rgyun phab nas 'bru de dag grub pa dang smin cing smin cing brngas nas 'dzam bu'i gling du g.yul gcig byas la/_shing rta dang khur dang bam po dang skon pas bskyas te g.yul de'i nang du bcug nas ba lang dang bong bu dag gis bcags te phung po chen por byas kyang /_rigs 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]kyi bu ngas 'bru re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu bo chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du nyin mtshan du 'bab pa 'di lta ste/_si 
[\[232a.2\]]ta dang gang gA dang /_ya mu na dang /_sin d+hu dang /_pa k+Shu dang /_sha ta dru dang tsan dra b+ha ga dang /_ai ra ba ti dang /_su ma ga da dang /_hi ma ka la dang /_ko da pa ri rnams chu bo re re zhing 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod pa nyin mtshan du rgya mtsho mching rnam du 'bab bo/_/rigs kyi bu yi ge drug 
[\[232a.3\]]pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang de bzhin du 'phel lo/_/de bas na chu bo chen po de dag ni ngas thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang bar 
[\[232a.4\]]mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rkang pa bzhi pa'i rigs ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_ma he dang /_rta dang /_bal glang dang /_khyi dang /_wa dang /_ra dang /_phyugs de dag dang /_de bzhin du seng ge dang /_stag dang /_ta rak+Sha dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_spre'u dang /_ri bong 
[\[232a.5\]]dang phag la sogs pa dang /_byi ba dang /_byi la la sogs pa de dag gi spu ni ngas re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i 
[\[232a.6\]]ri'i rgyal po 'phang du dpag tshad dgu khri dgu stong /_'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/_ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i lcags kyu de'i ngos re re zhing dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la ri'i rgyal po de'i ngos la skyes bu mi rga mi 'chi ba zhig yod nas des bskal pa gcig 'das 
[\[232a.7\]]shing yul ka shi ka nas byung ba'i gos kyis lan cig phyis te/_de ltar byas kyang de zad cing dengs par 'gyur gyi/_yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig zlos pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho mching rnam chen 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]po zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong zheng du rta rgod ma'i gdong gi mtha'i bar du dpag tu med pa ngas skra'i rtse mo'i brgya'i chas thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig bzlas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/
[\[232b.2\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na shing shir Sha'i tshal gyi lo ma ni re re nas ngas bgrang nus kyi yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i bsod nams kyi phung po ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gling chen po bzhi na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang bud med dang /_khye'u dang bu mo 
[\[232b.3\]]de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas par gyur na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po de bas yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig bzlas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni shin tu che'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[232b.4\]]zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i lo'am/_zla ba lhag pa dang bgrangs pas zla ba bcu gsum gyis lo tshang bar gyur par nyin mtshan du char pa bab na rigs kyi bu ngas thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo lan cig bzlas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[232b.5\]]ni ngas bgrang mi nus so/_/'di lta ste rigs kyi bu mang du brjod mi dgos kyi nga dang 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba gnas gcig tu lha'i bskal par na bza' dang /_bshos dang mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi sman gyi yo byad kyis gnas par byas te/_bsnyen bkur 
[\[232b.6\]]thams cad byas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i bsod nams kyi phung po bgrang mi nus na/_nga gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pas lta ci smos/_bsam gtan gyi gnas su ldang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_
[\[232b.7\]]rigs kyi bu nga ni sgom pa'i brtson pa la brtson par gyur pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos de yang [(]bra [,]phra [)]ba/_mi gsal ba'i chos ma 'ongs pa/_shin tu snying por gyur pa'i chos te de dge ba la gnas pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo yang thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar 'khyam zhing song nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 
[\[233a.2\]]byung ba de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen te/_des kyang rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus bya bar 'dod dam zhes bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[233a.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa bdag 'tshal te/_ji ltar skom gyis gdungs nas chab tshol ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo tshol du 'jig rten gyi khams su mchis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma la bsnyen bkur 
[\[233a.4\]]bgyis kyang gang las kyang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo ma thob kyis/_bcom ldan 'das khyod ni mgon no/_/khyod ni skyabs so/_/rten no/_/dbang po nyams pa'i ni mig tu gyur cig_/lam stor ba'i ni lam du gyur cig_/nyi ma tsha bas tshig pa rnams kyi ni gdugs 
[\[233a.5\]]su gyur cig_/shul gyi bzhi mdo chen por ni shing sA la chen po bzhin du gyur cig_/chos kyis yongs su skom pa la ni mtha' yas pa ston par gyur cig_/sems shin tu brtan pa'i ni go char gyur cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[233a.6\]]sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la bya ka la ping ka'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ltos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i mchog yi 
[\[233a.7\]]ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du mar gshegs kyis rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo gsol cig_/de bzhin gshegs par gyur bzhin du kun du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis stsal bar bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na me tog pad ma lta bu'i phyag rgya 'dzin/_ji ltar na nor bu 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya rtogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar na rgyal po'i dbang

[\[233b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku la nor bu rin po che in dra nI la'i phye ma dang /_mar gad kyi phye ma dang /_pad ma rA ga'i phye ma dang /_shel gyi phye ma dang /_gser dang dngul gyi phye ma gtor bar bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 
[\[233b.4\]]rin po che 'dzin par bgyi'o/_/g.yon phyogs su ni yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo bgyi ste/_phyag bzhi pa kha dog 'dam bu'i mda' rgyu bzhin du dkar ba/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phyag g.yon par pad ma bgyi'o/_/pad ma'i steng du nor bu bgyi'o/_/
[\[233b.5\]]phyag g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bgyi'o/_/phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba rgyal po'i dbang po thams cad ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo de'i zhabs kyi 'og tu rig 'dzin bgyi ste/_lag pa g.yas pa na pog phor thogs shing bdug 
[\[233b.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa na rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i skon bu thogs par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor de'i grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/_lag cha sna tshogs thogs par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor de'i grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba nor bu rin po che sna tshogs stsal ba 
[\[233b.7\]]gzhag go/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na des rus chags kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ming bris la thog ma kho nar dkyil 'khor der ming de dag stsal bar bgyi ste/_de dag thams cad mi'i sdug bsngal thams cad spangs shing 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la slob dpon gyis gnas ma lags pa la stsal bar mi bgyi ste/_yang na ni dad pas mos

[\[234a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gal te nor bu rin po che in dra nI la'i phye ma dang /_ma ra ka ta dang /_gser dang dngul gyi phye ma dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dbul po la med do/_/bcom 
[\[234a.4\]]ldan 'das phye ma de dag tshon sna tshogs las sbyar zhing /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs su bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te yul gzhan du song ngam/_gnas dang thabs las babs pa dag la med do/_/de'i tshe slob dpon gyis yid la dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/_
[\[234a.5\]]slob dpon gyis phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[234a.6\]]rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo nga la byin cig_/ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag des 'khor ba las yongs su thar cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/[(]da [,]de [)]nas

[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gang gi tshe na yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di byin pa de'i tshe gling bzhi dang lha'i gnas dang bcas te/_shing chu skyes kyi 'dab ma bzhin du 'gul lo/_/rgya mtsho mching rnam bzhi yang 'khrugs so/_/bgegs dang bar chad byed pa thams cad kyang skrag go/_/gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[234b.2\]]srin po dang /_nag po chen po bud med mang po dang bcas pa yang bros so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mchog gis bal glang gi sna dang 'dra ba'i dpung pa phyung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mu tig gi se mo do rin brgya 
[\[234b.3\]]stong ri ba phul lo/_/des kyang blangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phul lo/_/des kyang blangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i mchog la phul

[\[234b.7\]]'di 'dzab tu bgyid pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_sems pa dang /_bsam pa lhag pas 'dzin pa de dag ni bsod nams dang ldan pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di 'drir 'jug pa des ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa lha'i gser rin po che las byed cing byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du ring bsrel 'jug pa de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yi 
[\[235a.2\]]ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i yi ge 'bru gcig gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa tsam ste/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/thar par shin tu gnas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di zlos par byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di dag 
[\[235a.3\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_nor bu rin po che 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang byol song skems [(]zhas [,]zhes [)]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rkang pa shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thabs mkhas 
[\[235a.4\]]pa thams cad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bsam gtan gyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi shing rta la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'dod chags dang 
[\[235a.5\]]zhe sdang las yongs su thar bar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtha' yas be'u zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'chang ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ri rab chen po 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can srid pa las sgrol zhes bya ba'i 
[\[235a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te/_rigs kyi bu gang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rgyal 
[\[235a.7\]]mo 'dzin pa ni de lta bu la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya rtsa brgyad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gang du mchi bar bgyi/_yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo gang du 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'thob par 'gyur/_rigs kyi bu yul khor mor 'jig pa'i grong khyer chen po na gang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'dzin par byed/_klog par byed/_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i chos smra ba yod do/_/bcom ldan 'das yul khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen por 
[\[235b.2\]]chos smra ba de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag mchi'o/_/legs so/_/legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar gyis shig_/gang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dzin pa'i chos smra ba de dag ni dkon pa'o/_/chos smra ba 
[\[235b.3\]]de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam par blta bar bya'o/_/'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi 'gram dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/phung po bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/phyin ci ma log par gsung ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/rin po che'i phung po bzhin du blta bar 
[\[235b.4\]]bya'o/_/dam pa sbyin par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/chos kyi mdzod bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/'gro ba sgrol bar byed pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos smra ba de'i byed pa mthong nas the tsom mi skye bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[235b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas 'phos shing ngan song du skyes sa re/_chos smra ba de ni tshul khrims nyams pa/_spyod pa nyams pa/_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mos yongs su bskor ba/_ngur smrig kyang bshang ba dang gci bas yongs su gang ba/_spyod lam ma bsdams pa 
[\[235b.6\]]yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang 
[\[235b.7\]]chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo brgya phrag stong du mas yongs su bskor te song nas chos smra ba de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i gdugs dang /_lha'i lham dang /_cod pan dang /_rna cha dang /_phreng ba'i chun po dang /_dpung 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]rgyan dang /_se mo do dang /_se mo do phyed pa phrag pa nas 'phyang ba dang /_snyan gyi gong rgyan dang /_sor gdub kyi rnam pa dang /_gzhan yang gos rnam pa sna tshogs pa rgya'i yul nas byung ba dang /_rig 'dzin gyis bskul ba dang /_yul ka shi ka nas byung ba'i 
[\[236a.2\]]gos dang /_mas bgru ba'i gos dang /_gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_me tog ud pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_man dzu Sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_u dum ba ra dang /_gzhan 
[\[236a.3\]]yang shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tsam pa ka dang /_ka ra bI ra dang /_bad ta la dang /_a ti muk+ta dang /_bA ra shi kA dang /_kun da d+h+ya Shi ta dang /_su ma na dang /_bi mA na ka la sogs pa dang /_'dab ma brgya pa ngur pas mdzes par byas pa/_bya sha ri ka dag mos par byas 
[\[236a.4\]]pa/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_gzhan yang 'bras bu dang /_me tog gi rnam pa sna tshogs dag khyer nas yul khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/_mthar gyis khor mor 'jig gi grong 
[\[236a.5\]]khyer chen por phyin pa dang /_chos smra ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_des de tshul khrims nyams pa/_spyod pa nyams pa/_spyod lam ma bsdams pa mthong nas gdugs dang /_lham de dag dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_dri dang /_
[\[236a.6\]]byug pa dag gis mchod pa chen po byas nas chos smra ba de'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te/_kye ma'o chos kyi gter myong bar mdzad pa/_bdud rtsi'i gter bsags pa lta bu rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa khyod la dpag mi nus so/_/mir gyur pa thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa'o/_/
[\[236a.7\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dag khyod las chos nyan te/_khyod la chos nyan pa'i tshe thams cad 'du bar bgyid do/_/khyod ni rdo rje chen po dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad par mdzad do/_/sems can 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa mang po dag yongs su thar bar mdzad do/_/sems can gang khor mor 'jig gi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing rtag tu yongs su sdud par mthong ba de dag ni bsod nams dang ldan 
[\[236b.2\]]pa lags so/_/de mthong ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par mdzad pa/_dper na mes nags kyi 'dab ma myur du 'tshig par bgyid pa de bzhin du khyod mthong ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[236b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mkhyen to/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jug sred dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_me'i lha dang /_
[\[236b.4\]]chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mchi'o/_/de nas chos smra ba des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'gyod pa ma skyed cig_/grogs po nyon mongs pa ni chags pa'o/_/spyad pa'o/_/'khor 
[\[236b.5\]]ba'i mtshan ma'o/_/skye dgu'i 'khor lo skyed par byed pa'o/_/gang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo shes pa de ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis mi gos te/_dper na 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser dri mas mi gos pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang gi lus 
[\[236b.6\]]la yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo thogs pa de'i lus la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis mi gos so/_/de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas rkang pa la dam du bzung ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dbang po nyams pa'i mig tu 
[\[236b.7\]]gyur cig_/lam stor ba la lam ston par mdzod cig_/bdag chos kyis skom pa la chos kyi ros ngoms par mdzod cig_/bdag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon stsol cig_/chos kyi skabs dang /_shin tu gnas pa'i tshul gyi gnas 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]yongs su dag pa stsol cig_/mi phyed pa'i dge ba thob pa'i zhes 'gro ba thams cad mchi'o/_/tshig snyan pa bla mas bdag la yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo stsol cig_/des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur du 
[\[237a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis bskor bar bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/_/sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par bgyi'o/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig 
[\[237a.3\]]sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo 'thob pa thob par bgyi'o/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo bdag la stsol cig_/mgon dang /_skyabs dang /_rten du gyur cig_/gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur cig_/de nas chos smra ba des de la 'di 
[\[237a.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo ni dkon pa'i tshig ste/_'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go/_/'di ni rdo rje mi phyed pa'i tshig go/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi tshig go/_/mi zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig go/_/ltag na med pa'i tshig go/_/thar par 
[\[237a.5\]]'jug par byed pa'i tshig go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i tshig go/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su spong ba'i tshig go/_/thabs mkhas pa thams cad kyi tshig go/_/bsam gtan 
[\[237a.6\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par gzhog pa'i tshig go/_/chos thams cad la 'jug par byed pa'i tshig go/_/rtag tu lha rnams 'dod par byed pa'i tshig go/_/rigs kyi bu gang thar bar 'dod pa gnas sna tshogs su rab tu byung ba/_bgo ba sna tshogs 
[\[237a.7\]]su rab tu 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_dbang po'i bgo ba dang /_dkar po'i bgo ba dang /_bsten pa'i bgo ba ste/_nyi ma brtags nas dbang phyug chen po la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/'jug sred dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_ri mi dang /_gnas de dag tu rab tu 'byung ste 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]de dag la yang thar pa med do/_/mgon yang ma yin/_/brtul zhugs can yang ma yin no/_/lha mang po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jug sred dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_me'i 
[\[237b.2\]]lha dang /_chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag rtag tu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo slong ngo /_/de dag yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo ji ltar bslang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 
[\[237b.3\]]kyi rgyal mo chen mo bdag cag gis thob par 'gyur/_thar pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/_dper na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par grags pa ste/_de yang thal mo sbyar nas yi ge drug pa'i 
[\[237b.4\]]rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang bcas pa lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'bras lta bur snying por gyur pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'di la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[237b.5\]]bzlas pas kyang theg pa chen po'i rnam pa mang po mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_'di lta bu 'das pa dang skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa 
[\[237b.6\]]dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_gtan la phab ba bstan pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_thar pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/mang du bshad ci dgos te gzhan ma byed cig_/sa'i nang du gtogs pa la snying por 'dzin pa ci yin zhe na/_de ltar 'bras ni snying por 'dzin te/_khyer 
[\[237b.7\]]nas bdag gi khyim du snod rnams yongs su bkang ste 'jog go/_/bzhag nas nyi ma'i tshul bzhin du nyi ma tsha ba la skems so/_/bskams nas gtun la brdungs shing phub ma rnams sel to/_/de'i snying po ni 'bras rme'u yin no zhes de ltar 'jog ste/_de bzhin 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]du rnal 'byor gzhan dag phub ma dang 'dra'o/_/rnal 'byor thams cad kyi nang na yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di ni 'bras rme'ur gyur pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir/_
[\[238a.2\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir tshogs 'byin to/_/rigs kyi bu bzlas pa gcig byas pas 
[\[238a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig gis lag pas reg pas reg na de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di yang de lta bu ste/_de'i ming 'dzin pa yang dkon no/_/
[\[238a.4\]]ming lan cig bzung na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi sman gyi yo byad dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas chos smra ba de la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal bas 'di 
[\[238a.5\]]skad ces smras so/_/yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bdag la stsol cig_/de nas chos kyi mkhan po de sems shing 'dug pa las de la nam mkha' las yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo byin cig ces sgra byung ngo /_/de nas chos smra ba de sgra ga las 
[\[238a.6\]]byung zhes bsams pa dang /_de nas yang nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa' 'dis dka' ba spyod pa du ma la brtson par byas kyis yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo byin cig ces sgra byung ngo /_/de nas chos smra ba des nam mkha' la bltas pa dang /_'dam 
[\[238a.7\]]bu'i mda' bzhin du kha dog dkar ba/_ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa mgo la bzhag pa/_lag pa na me tog pad ma bzang po thogs pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyis brgyan pa de 'dra ba'i gzugs mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]rnam par sel ba la rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo khyod la sbyin par gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_gus shing thal mo sbyar te len par rtsom mo/_/oM ma Ni pad me hUM/_
[\[238b.2\]]'di byin ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di dag kyang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas thob ste/_mi zad pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnal 'byor spyod 
[\[238b.3\]]ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thar pa la 'jug par 'jog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thams cad snang bar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[238b.4\]]dag thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas blangs ma thag tu mkhan po la yon du gling bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang ba 'bul bar rtsom pa dang /_de nas chos kyi mkhan po des de la 'di 
[\[238b.5\]]skad ces smras so/_/yi ge gcig gi yon du yang med na yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo'i lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu nga ni khyod las len pa yang med do/_/khyod kyang byang chub sems dpar gyur pa ste/_khyod ni 'phags pa yin gyi ma 'phags pa ma yin/_rigs 
[\[238b.6\]]kyi bu khyod ni ngas 'dul ba yin no/_/des de la mu tig gi phreng ba rin brgya stong ri ba phul ba dang /_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phul cig_/de nas sgrib 
[\[238b.7\]]pa thams cad rnam par sel bas chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/rnyed par bya ba rnyed cing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnyed pa rnyed dam/_bcom 
[\[239a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa bzhin no/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun tshogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsab tA nAM/_saM myag saM 
[\[239a.3\]]bud d+ha ko TAM nAM/_tad ya thA/_o tsa le tsu le tsu na de swAhA/_gzungs sngags 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs so/_/ba spu'i khung bu de 'das nas nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 
[\[239a.4\]]khrag khrig brgya stong du ma gnas te/_nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na gser gyi ri khri yod de/_ri re re zhing yang rtse mo nyi khri nyis stong yod la/_ri de re re'i ngos ni rin po che pad ma rA gas brgyan/_ngos re re zhing yang lha'i nor bu rin po che'i skyed mos tshal shin 
[\[239a.5\]]tu mdzes pa/_shin tu dga' bar byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang lha'i rdzing bus brgyan pa/_khang pa brtsegs ma brgya phrag stong du ma ni lha'i gser dang rin po che las byas shing mu tig dang dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/_mu tig gi se mo do brgya dag ni 'phyang ngo /_/khang pa 
[\[239a.6\]]brtsegs ma de'i nang na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sha ri da ka yod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag khang pa brtsegs ma der 'gro'o/_/der song nas kyang yi ge drug pa'i 
[\[239a.7\]]rig sngags kyang rjes su dran no/_/gang gi tshe na rjes su dran pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'da' ba rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sa de la de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sems dad pa skyed do/_/bskyed nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag khang pa brtsegs ma de nas 'byung ngo /_/byung nas kha cig ni 'chag sar 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i skyed mos tshal du 'gro'o/_/
[\[239b.2\]]kha cig ni rdzing bu dag tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni nor bu rin po che pad ma rA ga'i ri'i ngos la 'gro'o/_/dong nas skyil mo krung bcas/_lus drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon par bzhag nas 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu 
[\[239b.3\]]dag gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de 'das nas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa brgya phrag stong du ma gnas te/_dbang po'i rgyal po'i ba spu'i khung bu de na lha'i gser gyi ri brgyad khri yod do/_/ri de dag gi dbus na nor 
[\[239b.4\]]bu rin po che me tog pad ma ltar snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ri'i rgyal po de la gnas shing zas dang skom gyi dran pa mi sgom 
[\[239b.5\]]mo/_/de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/dus thams cad du mya ngan las 'das pa la sems shing gnas kyi/_de dag gi lus la gzhan sems pa med 
[\[239b.6\]]do/_/rigs kyi bu de 'das nas sman chen po zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' sems thog ma bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu ba spu'i khung bu de na ri dgu khri yod de/_la la ni rdo rje'i ri/_la la ni dngul gyi'o/_/
[\[239b.7\]]la la ni gser gyi'o/_/la la ni nor bu rin po che in dra nI la'i'o/_/la la ni pad ma rA ga'i'o/_/la la ni ma ra ka ta'i'o/_/la la ni shel gyi'o/_/ri'i rgyal po de lta bu dag yod do/_/ri re re zhing yang rtse mo brgyad khri yod de/_rin po che sna 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_shin tu mdzes par byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa yid du 'ong ba dag go/_/rtse mo de dag la dri za dag gnas te/_de dag dus thams cad du ba spu'i khung bu nas sil snyan 'byung ba 'dzin to/_/gang sems thog ma bskyed 
[\[240a.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la sems te/_kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba sdug bsngal lo/_/sdug cing mdza' ba dang bral zhing mi sdug cing mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa ni sdug bsngal 
[\[240a.3\]]lo/_/bstir med par skyes pa ni sdug bsngal lo/_/thig nag po 'debs par skyes pa ni sdug bsngal lo/_/sems can [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du skyes pa rnams ni sdug bsngal lo zhes de lta bu'i lus la skyo ba dag bsams nas de'i tshe skyil mo krung bcas te/_
[\[240a.4\]]lus drang por bsrangs nas dran pa mngon par bzhag ste ri de dag la gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de 'das nas sna tshogs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma gnas te de dag ni 'bar ba dang /_gdung ba dang /_char 
[\[240a.5\]]'bebs pa dang /_glog gtong ba'i cho 'phrul dag byed de/_ba spu'i khung bu de na ri'i rgyal po brgya phrag stong dag yod do/_/ri'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po de dag la shing dpag bsam rnam pa sna 
[\[240a.6\]]tshogs par yod de/_sdong po ni mu tig dmar po dang /_lo ma ni gser dang /_dngul las byas pa'o/_/rin po che rnam pa du ma dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag ni 'phyang ngo /_/cod pan dang /_rna cha dang /_phreng ba'i chun po dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_se 
[\[240a.7\]]mo do dang /_se mo do phyed pa dag kyang rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/yul ka shi ka nas byung ba'i gos dag kyang rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/gser dang dngul gyi dril bu dag kyang sgra sil sil grag ste/_de 'dra ba'i ri'i rgyal po de dag la rang sangs rgyas de dag gnas te/_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_de lta bu 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_
[\[240b.2\]]chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i gtam rnam pa du ma dag phan tshun du smra ste/_de'i tshe sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ba spu'i khung bu de 'das nas thams cad kyi tha ma na ba spu'i khung bu rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_ba spu'i khung bu de na yang dpag 
[\[240b.3\]]tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/ba spu'i khung bu de na ri brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po de la shing dpag bsam brgya phrag stong du ma yod do/_/tsan dan gyi shing brgya phrag stong du 
[\[240b.4\]]ma yod do/_/byi ru'i shing brgya phrag stong du ma dag yod do/_/ba spu'i khung bu de nas ni rdo rje las byas pa'o/_/ba spu'i khung bu de na gser dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma dgu khri dgu stong yod de/_mu tig dang dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/_mu tig 
[\[240b.5\]]gi se mo do ni dpyangs/_dril bu'i phreng ba ni dpyangs/_zla ba bzhin du bzang ba'i rin po che sa ni snang bar byas te/_khang pa brtsegs ma de na gser gyi skas rin po che sa yongs su spras pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dga' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/khang pa brtsegs 
[\[240b.6\]]ma de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dzam bu'i gling du mngon par phyogs shing chos 'chad pa yang bzhugs te/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug bstan pa ston par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/_tshul khrims 
[\[240b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pa ston par mdzad de/_de ltar de dag 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi rnams la chos rnam pa sna tshogs dag dus dus su 'chad do/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ba 
[\[241a.2\]]spu'i khung bu de dag dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du phyin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_mthu bo che la sogs te lha'i bu 
[\[241a.3\]]tshogs pa dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ba spu'i khung bu gzhan dag mchis sam ma 
[\[241a.4\]]mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo de las mtsho chen po bzhi 'byung ste gting dpog mi nus so/_/gang gi tshe na rkang pa 
[\[241a.5\]]g.yas pa'i mthe bo las chu byung ba de'i tshe rta rgod ma'i gdong lta bur 'bab ste/_de'i tshe thal ba'i phung por 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i byin gyis brlabs ni de 'dra'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[241a.6\]]ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ba spu'i khung bu de yang ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de yang med pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[241a.7\]]la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]kyi dbang po ni dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po rgyu dang bcas te lung bstan pa'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[241b.2\]]gzigs kyi dbang pos 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_dngul gyi kha dog btang nas kha dog de dag dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/song nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor 
[\[241b.3\]]te/_bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por song ngo /_/song nas bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bsil bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du ltas bzang po byung bar gyur pa dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang de lha'i gser 
[\[241b.4\]]rin po cher snang bar gyur te/_dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang de ltar snang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas byung ste/_dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba de logs 
[\[241b.5\]]su song nas rim gyis dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der phyin to/_/de nas dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bya ka la ping ka'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod ngal lam/_khyod nyon mongs sam/_
[\[241b.6\]]khyod kyis sems can yongs su smin par byas sam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin te/_bdag 
[\[241b.7\]]gis de lta bu'i las kyis bsgrubs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis de 'dra ba'i las kyis bsgrubs pa legs so legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la me tog pad ma phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas pas me tog pad ma 'di dag gsol te bsnyung ba ma mchis sam/_'o brgyal ba ma mchis sam/_bzhengs pa yang ngam/_bde ba 
[\[242a.2\]]la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang gsung ngo zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te g.yon phyogs su bzhag go/_/de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[242a.3\]]'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lung ston pa'i bshad pa thob par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_song shig dang khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang 
[\[242a.4\]]pos lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po song ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug chen po chos 'dzin pa/_pad ma'i zhal/_pad 
[\[242a.5\]]ma la dgyes pa/_phyag na me tog pad ma bzang po mnga' ba/_pad ma'i dpal dang ldan pa/_yongs su bskor ba 'gro ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/_sa'i spyan mchog mdzad pa/_sim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos byang 
[\[242a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la de ltar bstod nas kha rog ste 'dug pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos dbang phyug chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi 
[\[242a.7\]]bu khyod ci'i phyir kha rog ste 'dug_/de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa stsal du gsol/_/de nas spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]gyi khams phye ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs 
[\[242b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha mo u ma song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[242b.3\]]kyi dbang po la bstod par rtsom pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chen po srog sbyin par mdzad pa/_sa'i spyan mchog mdzad pa/_pad ma bzang po phyag na mnga' ba/_pad ma'i dpal dang ldan pa/_yongs su bskor ba/_mya 
[\[242b.4\]]ngan las 'da' ba'i sa ston pa/_legs par dgongs par mdzad pa/_chos 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes de ltar lha mo u mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la bstod de gsol pa/_bud med kyi lus smad pa las bdag 
[\[242b.5\]]yongs su thar bar mdzad du gsol/_mngal na gnas shing sha ma gang ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang rtag tu 'dzin pa las bdag yongs su thar bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de la 'di skad ces 
[\[242b.6\]]smras so/_/sring mo khyod 'jig rten gyi khams gangs kyi ri'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos su u ma'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[242b.7\]]mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha mo u mas lung bstan pa thob bo/_/ltos shig sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_dbang phyug chen po'i le'u 'di yang bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib 
[\[243a.2\]]pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchis te/_long ba dag gis ni mig thob bo/_/de ring bdag ni tshe'i 'bras bu mchis par gyur to/_/bdag de ring ni bsam pa bzhin du grub bo/_/
[\[243a.3\]]bdag de ring ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs so/_/bdag de ring ni byang chub kyi lam la bar chad ma mchis par gyur to/_/legs par dgongs pa chos kyi sku mya ngan las 'das pa ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di 
[\[243a.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ring bdag la spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan gyi bye brag bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang /_khor 
[\[243a.5\]]yug chen po dang /_ri'i rgyal po mu tsi lin da dang /_ri'i rgyal po nag po dang /_nag po chen po dang /_ri'i rgyal po gsus shol dang /_ri'i rgyal po mi ston pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po thams cad du gtogs pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i kha dang /_ri'i rgyal po rtse mo 
[\[243a.6\]]brgya pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po khang pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po dang /_ri'i rgyal po ston pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po dus ma yin par ston pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po de dag srang gcig la btab na/_rigs kyi bu ngas ri'i rgyal po de dag srang 'di snyed cig go zhes 
[\[243a.7\]]sam/_srang brgya'o zhes sam/_srang stong ngo zhes sam/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong zhes sam/_grangs su yang /_char yang /_bgrang bar yang nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni ngas bgrang nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[243b.2\]]na rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni ngas thigs pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na shing shir Sha'i tshal ni ngas 'dab 
[\[243b.3\]]ma re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni bgrang mi nus so/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/_dper na ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gro ga'i phung por gyur/_rgya 
[\[243b.4\]]mtsho mching rnam chen po ni snag tshar gyur/_gling chen po bzhi na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag thams cad ni yi ge par gyur te/_ri'i rgyal po mtha' yas mu med pa yi ger bris kyang yi ge 'brum bu re re nas bgrang nus kyi/_byang 
[\[243b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni bgrang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag bcu 
[\[243b.6\]]gnyis dang mnyam pa'i na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi sman gyi yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ni 
[\[243b.7\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skra'i nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la gnas pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam mo/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag du ma dang ldan te/_'di lta ste/_rab tu 'joms zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyan par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyan par mi byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi spyan zhes bya 
[\[244a.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzi can chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dam pa sbyin byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mthu brgya pa 
[\[244a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spobs pa'i phung po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa mang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[244a.4\]]dang /_rtag tu dam pa sbyin byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po yongs su thar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zhe sdang yongs su thar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyin byed dam pa'i mig ces 
[\[244a.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos la mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i mngal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mya ngan 'da' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer mtha' yas sgrub ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[244a.6\]]'dzin dang /_rnal 'byor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ba byas pa la mngon pa zhes bya 
[\[244a.7\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_skye dgu'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi zad par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bstir med skems zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgya mtsho ltar zab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khor brgya pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rigs 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan no/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/_log par dad sel ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[244b.2\]]pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar byang chub sems 
[\[244b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa de lta bu ngas thos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang 'di 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gyes pa yang ngas mthong ngo /_/gang gi tshe na kun du bzang po rdo rje gyen du 'phags 
[\[244b.4\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zla ba dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[244b.5\]]'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nyi ma dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po byugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[244b.6\]]'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dbang po rnam par byed ces bya ba'i ting 
[\[244b.7\]]nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rdo rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dbang po'i 'gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgya mtsho ltar zab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po seng ge glal ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[245a.2\]]zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po seng ge rnam par rol ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dam pa sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs 
[\[245a.3\]]pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bstir med pa skems zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ba spu'i khung bu thams cad 'byed par byed pa de'i tshe byang 
[\[245a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad 'byed par byed nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la spyan 
[\[245a.5\]]ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi spobs pa de 'dra ba legs so legs so zhes smras so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang 
[\[245a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig mthong du zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag la yang mi mnga'o/_/zhes ngas 
[\[245a.7\]]log par dad sel las de skad thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa bshad du gsol/_/de'i slad du bdag cag chos kyi ros ngoms shing dga' 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang dag theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i ming thos pa de dag la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa med do/_/gang dag pha rol gyi bud med la chags shing zhan pa'i las la brtson pa dang /_gang pha 
[\[245b.2\]]dang ma gsod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /_mchod rten 'joms pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /_de lta bu'i sdig pa la dga' ba dag la yang theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pas sdig pa las thar bar byed do/_/
[\[245b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar theg pa chen po'i mdo za ma tog bkod pa sdig pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[245b.4\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu ri rab ri'i rgyal po'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis dri ma dang dri ma med pa'i mthar brtags pa yod de/_da ltar ngas kyang brtags so/_/gang gos dkar po sngon por 'gyur ba dang /_gang gos sngon po dkar 
[\[245b.5\]]por 'gyur ba ni/_gang gos dkar po de sngon por 'gyur ba de ni sdig pa'i phung por blta'o/_/gang gos sngon po de dkar por 'gyur ba de ni chos kyi phung por blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa de ni sdig pa thams cad sreg cing 
[\[245b.6\]]dkar por byed do/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'di lta ste/_dper na dbyar gyi dus kyi tshe rtswa dang nags tshal dag shin tu sngo bar 'gyur te/_de nas klu'i rgyal po kha brgya pa zhes bya ba gnas nas langs te rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dag sreg par byed 
[\[245b.7\]]do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di ni sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do/_/gang theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po thos pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de dag ni so so'i skye bo ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang 'dra bar blta'o/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bcu gnyis gshegs te/_rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po thos so/_/khyod slar 'khor 
[\[246a.2\]]bar mi 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/slar skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'ga' zhig 'dod pa dang phrad la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas 
[\[246a.3\]]pa las dam pa'i chos thos par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar sems can de dag bde bar mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[246a.4\]]phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu song ngo /_/de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dong 
[\[246a.5\]]ngo /_/gang gi tshe na de dag dong ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bslab pa'i sdom pa bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gang dag bsnyen par 
[\[246a.6\]]rdzogs par byed 'dod pa des thog ma kho nar song ste sna tshogs pa dag gi gnas brtag par bya'o/_/brtags nas dge slong dag la btsun pa sna tshogs kyi gnas ni dag ste/_sna tshogs kyi gnas de na rus pa yang ma mchis so/_/bshang gci yang ma mchis te/_sna tshogs 
[\[246a.7\]]kyi gnas de ni yongs su dag go/_/dge slong dag kyang bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyir rung ngo zhes sbran to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas ni bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa dang bzhi pa yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/bar gyi gsol 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ba yang mi bya'o/_/mang du bshad ci dgos te/_dge slong dag tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong gis ni sna tshogs kyi gnas su yang 'gro bar mi bya na gsol ba dang bzhi ba bya ba lta ci smos te/_de dag ni ston pa'i bstan pa 'jig par byed pa'o/_/tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa 
[\[246b.2\]]de dag ni sbyin gnas dag gi nang du gnas sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de dag ni gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du gnas su gzhug ste/_de dag la dge 'dun gyi zas kyang mi sbyin no/_/de dag la dge 'dun gyis yang 'os pa ma yin no/_/de dag la ni dge slong gi dngos po [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang 
[\[246b.3\]]med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe na de 'dra ba'i sbyin gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo sum brgya na de 'dra ba'i sbyin gnas 
[\[246b.4\]]dag 'byung ste/_gang gtsug lag khang la khyim du 'du shes par 'dzin pa de dag ni bu pho dang bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni dge 'dun gyi khri dang /_khri'u dang tshang thur dang sngas dang /_mal stan dag la spyod par ma 'os pa la spyod par byed do/_/dge 
[\[246b.5\]]'dun dag gi nye bar spyod pa la bshang ba dang gci bar byed do/_/mchil ma dag kyang 'dor zhing las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes so/_/gang dge 'dun gyi nye bar spyod pa la mchil ma 'dor ba de dag ni lo bcu gnyis su shing sA la'i tshal du kha khab kyi mig tsam gyi srog chags su skye'o/_/
[\[246b.6\]]gang dge 'dun gyi so shing la spyod du ma 'os pa la spyod pa de dag ni ru sbal dang /_chu srin dang nya'i nang du skye'o/_/gang dge 'dun gyi til dang 'bras dang rgya shug dang /_ku lan tha la sogs pa gang spyod par ma 'os pa la spyod pa de dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du skye ste/_mgal ba 'dra 
[\[246b.7\]]zhing keng rus bsgreng ba lta bu bdag gi skra dang kha spus khebs pa/_kha khab kyi mig tsam du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal de dag lus la myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dge 'dun gyi zas kyis khyi gso bar byed pa de dag ni rigs dma' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po nyams par 'gyur ro/_/sgur 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]po dang khyor por skye'o/_/gzhan gyi bzhin la lta zhing slong mo byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang nad bu can du 'gyur ro/_/lus las rnag dang khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/chu ba rnams 'khums par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe na langs pa de na sha 
[\[247a.2\]]rnams sa la lhags shing rus pa rnams snang bar 'gyur te/_de ltar de dag lo mang por/_lo brgya stong mang por lus kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dge 'dun gyi sa la mi 'os par spyod pa de dag ni bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'o dod 'bod pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por 
[\[247a.3\]]skye ste/_lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa khar bcug nas mchu dang so dag kyang lhags/_rkan yang gas mgul pa yang tshig_/snying dang rgyu ma dag kyang thams cad du thams cad tshig nas rus pa'i lhag ma lus par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag de'i tshe las kyi rlung langs nas shi nas kyang slar 
[\[247a.4\]]'tsho'o/_/de nas slar yang gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bus bzung ngo /_/de nas de dag gi las bdag gis bya ba'i las kyi dbang gis lce chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lce de'i steng du gshol brgya stong gis rmo bar 'gyur te/_de ltar lo brgya phrag stong du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug 
[\[247a.5\]]bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas me'i rdza ma'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/_de nas gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bu dag gis bzung nas lce de nyid la khab brgya stong gis 'bigs par byed do/_/de nas kyang las kyi dbang gis sos nas me'i 'obs su 'dor 
[\[247a.6\]]ro/_/me'i 'obs de nas kyang phyung nas chu bo be'i ta ra ni chen por 'dor ro/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba gzhan dag tu skyes te/_de ltar 'khyam pa las bskal pa gsum zad nas shi 'phos te 'dzam bu gling du dbul po dang /_dmus long gi nang du skye bar 
[\[247a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de lta bas na dge 'dun dag gi rdzas ni bsrung bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang bslab pa sdom pas chos gos gsum bcang bar bya ste/_chos gos gcig ni dge 'dun la yid brtan cing dge 'dun gyis spyad pa'i phyir ro/_/chos gos gnyis pa ni rgyal po'i 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pho brang du 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/chos gos gsum pa ni grong dang /_grong khyer dang grong 'dab dang /_ye 'ur 'khod pa dang tshong 'dus dag gi phyir te/_dge slong dag gis chos gos de gsum bcang bar bya'o/_/gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge slong 
[\[247b.2\]]dag gis ni ngas bslab tshigs bcas pa 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi rdzas la spyod par mi 'os pa dag gis ni yongs su spyad par mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi ni me'i 'obs lta bu'o/_/dge 'dun gyi ni dug lta bu'o/_/dge 'dun gyi ni rdo rje lta bu'o/_/dge 
[\[247b.3\]]'dun gyi ni khur lta bu'o/_/dug la ni gnyen po bya nus kyi dge 'dun gyi la ni gnyen po bya mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i bslab tshigs la dge slong gang dag 
[\[247b.4\]]'dzin par bgyid pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa lags so/_/'dul ba la mngon pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab tshigs kyi rjes su bsrungs pa lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[247b.5\]]bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo /_/lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag kyang dong 
[\[247b.6\]]ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o/_/'phags pa za ma tog 
[\[247b.7\]]bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]{D117}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+na ka raN+Da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkon mchog gi za ma tog ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[248a.2\]]thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_yang de'i 
[\[248a.3\]]tshe bcom ldan 'das smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang lhan cig tu brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig 
[\[248a.4\]]rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[248a.5\]]gsum bskor ba byas te byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang lhan cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces 
[\[248a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar ci'i bka' mchid cig mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das bka' mchid de nyid kyi rjes rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad du gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[248a.7\]]so/_/'jam dpal da ltar ni nyan thos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad na/_'jam dpal bdag gis khyod la bskul gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid brtsam par khyod spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi snod du gyur pa ma yin na/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam cir dgos/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal 'dir gang snod du gyur pa 'byung 
[\[248b.2\]]ba de dag la khyod kyis shod cig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di na snod du gyur pa ni gang dag yin/_snod du ma gyur pa ni gang dag yin shes sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag ni gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pas snod 
[\[248b.3\]]dang snod ma yin pa lta ci shes mod kyi 'on kyang 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam brtsam par spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang su dag skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[248b.4\]]rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag skyon med pa la yang rtog cing sems can rnams la yang lta la skyon med par yang mi ltung zhing skyon dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[248b.5\]]gzhan yang gang dag mtshams la gnas par gyur pa/_slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos la zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad la btang snyoms pa/_srid pa la me 'bar ba lta bur lta ba/_yid yongs su skyo ba/_khams gsum thams cad kyis skrag pa/_skad cig tsam 
[\[248b.6\]]yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par mi dga' ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar go cha bgos pa/_srid pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs mi dngang ba/_khams gsum spyod yul ba/_dri ma 
[\[248b.7\]]gsum dang bral ba/_'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du 'du shes pa/_srid pa 'dod cing srid pa thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang dag 'dod chags 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun du dkris te 'dug pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang 
[\[249a.2\]]dag 'dod chags kyis chags pa yang ma yin la 'dod chags spyod par yang ston pa/_zhe sdang gis sdang ba yang ma yin la zhe sdang spyod par yang ston pa/_gti mug gis rmongs pa yang ma yin la gti mug spyod par yang ston pa/_nyon mongs pa dang yang bral la khams 
[\[249a.3\]]gsum du yang snang ba/_sems can thams cad la byams pa/_ma khengs pa/_ma zhum pa/_sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba/_de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa/_rig pa gsum 
[\[249a.4\]]dang ldan pa/_rig pa mngon du gyur pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal gal te/_chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig_/de bzhin nyid kyang gcig_/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig na snod dam snod 
[\[249a.5\]]ma yin pa de ji ltar mngon/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na rdza mkhan gyis 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig las snod rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/_snod de thams cad so gcig tu btang na/_de la kha cig ni 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod 
[\[249a.6\]]du 'gyur/_kha cig ni sbrang rtsi dang li kha ra'i snod du 'gyur/_kha cig ni ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod du 'gyur te/_'jim pa'i gong bu de dang so btang ba la ni tha dad pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig_/de bzhin nyid kyang gcig_/
