[\[249a.7\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig mod kyi/_ji ltar las mngon par 'du byas pa bzhin du snod kyi khyad par du 'gyur ro/_/de la sbrang rtsi dang /_li kha ra'i snod ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la blta'o/_/'bru mar dang mar gyi snod ji lta ba de bzhin du nyan 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la blta'o/_/ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod ji lta ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la blta'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang 
[\[249b.2\]]dag snod ma yin pa de dag snod du gyur pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor yod do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rnam grangs gang gis na gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag snod ma yin pa 
[\[249b.3\]]de dag snod du gyur pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang la la nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang 
[\[249b.4\]]dag nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du ma gyur pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal snod du ci zhig gzhug par bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun 
[\[249b.5\]]pa rab 'byor ci yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhug pa med pa dang /_dbyung ba med pa la spyod pa de'i tshe snod kyi snying por rig par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gzhug pa dang dbyung ba la spyod pa de'i tshe snod chag par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[249b.6\]]btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyi snod ces kyang bya la gang gi snod kyang ma yin no/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod 
[\[249b.7\]]ces kyang bya la gang gi snod kyang ma yin no/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na sa las skyes pa'i shing rnams ni snod nam mkha' yin pas rnam par skye'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pa las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang snod 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas rnam par skye'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ci byang chub sems dpa' rnam par skye'am/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nam mkha' rnam par skye na/_de'i phyir byang 
[\[250a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye ba zhig na/_nam mkha' ni rnam par skye ba'am/_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/_yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 
[\[250a.3\]]'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/_yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ci las bsams te de skad smras/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nyon mongs pa rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/_
[\[250a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa 
[\[250a.5\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tha dad par bya ba ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'od kyis reg na gzugs thams cad 'di lta ste/_gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[250a.6\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na shes rab dang ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa 
[\[250a.7\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni tha dad pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med de/_de bas na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]btsun pa rab 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_thog ma ji lta bar tha mar yang de bzhin du de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pas de'i phyir ji 
[\[250b.2\]]lta ba bzhin zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal thog ma dang tha ma zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_thog ma ni stong pa nyid/_tha ma ni dben pa nyid de de bas na thog ma dang tha ma zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[250b.3\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gser dang sa le sbram la tha dad du bya ba yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ming du 
[\[250b.4\]]btags pa la ni tha dad pa yod do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid 'di ni ming dang brda tsam du zad de/_ming dang brda la ni mkhas pa rnams mngon par zhen pa med kyi/_byis pa rnams mngon 
[\[250b.5\]]par zhen to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal byis pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/_mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa ni las kyi mtshan nyid do/_/mkhas pa 
[\[250b.6\]]ni chos kyi mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal las kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni las te/_de la gang dag mngon par 'du byed pa de 
[\[250b.7\]]dag gi ni yod par mngon no/_/gang dag mngon par 'du mi byed pa de dag gi ni med par mngon no/_/de la byis pa rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi ni yod par mngon no/_/mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pas de dag gi ni med par mngon te/_de la gang 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]yod pa dang /_gang med pa'i dbus de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/'phags pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal 'phags pa zhes bya bas 
[\[251a.2\]]ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa zhes bya ba de ni rdul med cing nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du ba'i gzhi'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis chos thams cad rdul med 
[\[251a.3\]]cing /_nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor yod do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rnam grangs gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[251a.4\]]na rgya mtsho chen por chu thams cad yang dag par 'du ste/_de yang 'di lta ste/_lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig go/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rdul med cing nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par 'du zhing /_de yang 'di lta ste rnam par grol 
[\[251a.5\]]ba'i ror ro gcig go/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal gang las rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba ston/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang yod na 'ching bar 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras 
[\[251a.6\]]pa/_'jam dpal mi shes pa yod na 'ching bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na mi shes pa las rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba bstan to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad 
[\[251a.7\]]la tha dad par bya ba med na shes pa'am mi shes par ji ltar bstan/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na dpyid kyis bsros pa'i chu la ni dro ba zhes bstan to/_/chu de nyid grang ba'i dus su ni grang ba zhes bstan to/_chu de la ni tha dad du bya ba 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]cung zad kyang med do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas bsros pa'i sems la ni mi shes pa zhes bstan to/_/tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la ni shes pa zhes bstan te/_de la nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu de'i shes pa'am/_mi shes par 
[\[251b.2\]]bstan pa ni gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni mthong bar dka'o/_/
[\[251b.3\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba rnams kyis so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gting ma rnyed pa rnams kyis so/_/rab 
[\[251b.4\]]'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni shes par dka' ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni go bar dka' ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras 
[\[251b.5\]]pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag dang bral ba rnams kyis so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni mos par dka' ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor kun gzhi la dga' ba rnams kyis so/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[251b.6\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni brtag mi nus pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'di ltar der mtshan ma kun du mi 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni rtog ge'i spyod pa can ma yin pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'di 
[\[251b.7\]]ltar de la so sor rnam par rig pa med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de ni mchog tu 'phags pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'di ltar de ni bsngo ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal don de 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ni mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'di ltar de ni bdag nyid kyis rig pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas gang don du na don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bshad pa tshig 
[\[252a.2\]]de'i dgongs pa'i tshig bshad pa ji lta bu yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor don ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to/_/de la gang dag brjod du yod pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gi don ni don ma yin te/_de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis don du na don 
[\[252a.3\]]de ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bka' stsal to/_/gzhan yang btsun pa rab 'byor don ces bya ba ni dben pa'i don to/_/de la gang dag lus dang ngag dang /_sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gi don ni don ma yin te/_de bas na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[252a.4\]]kyis kyang don du na don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te de skad bka' stsal/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[252a.5\]]rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gzings dang 'dra bar shes pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyang spang bar bya na chos ma yin pa lta ci smos zhes de skad ces bka' stsal te/_gang spang bar bya ba de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes mi bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[252a.6\]]'jam dpal ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang chos ma yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni yang dag par grub pa gang yang med do/_/gang yang dag par grub pa ma yin pa de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes mi bya'o/_/
[\[252a.7\]]de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni chos ma yin pa'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag bshad pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_brgya la seng ge'i phru gus seng ge'i sgra thos nas skrag gam/_dngang ngam/_dngang bar 'gyur ram/_ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phru gu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'phur ba na ngang pa'i sgra thos nas skrag 
[\[252b.2\]]gam/_dngang ngam/_dngang bar 'gyur ram/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_seng ge'i phru gu rang gi sgra dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phru gu rang gi spyod yul gyis mi skrag go/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[252b.3\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /_gdung las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid dang /_stong pa nyid las nges par byung ba de rnams ni chos thams cad dang /_sgra thams cad dang /_bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur 
[\[252b.4\]]mod kyi/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'on kyang gang yod na skrag par 'gyur ba shes sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal 'jig tshogs la lta ba yod na skrag par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig tshogs la lta ba de byang chub 
[\[252b.5\]]sems dpas yongs su shes te/_de bas na chos thams cad kyis mi skrag go/_/de sgra thams cad dang /_bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la 
[\[252b.6\]]lta ba yongs su shes na de ji ltar 'bras bu ma thob/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa ma yin gyi/_'bras bu 'thob pa la btang snyoms su bya ba dang /_
[\[252b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'dod pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes te/_de bas na 'bras bu mi 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i thabs 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]gang gis byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes la 'bras bu yang mi 'thob pa de ni thabs chen po yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings ni thabs dang shes 
[\[253a.2\]]rab kyis yang dag par zin pa ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la 'bras bu yang mi thob bo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu chen po che zhig gis mtshon cha rnon pos shing sA la chen po bcad na/_de 
[\[253a.3\]]ril gyis chad bzhin du de nyid na 'dug ste mi 'gyel lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings kyang thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la 
[\[253a.4\]]'bras bu yang mi 'thob bo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang shing sA la chen po de char pa chen po bab ste gsher cing rlan par gyur na slar yang skye zhing yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag kyang 'byung la/_gang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur 
[\[253a.5\]]ba de lta bu'i dus dang /_de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen pos gsher cing rlan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang yongs su shes la khams gsum du yang skye zhing gang sems can 
[\[253a.6\]]thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba tshe dang /_rigs dang /_skye bar yang ston par byed do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang shing sA la chen po de rlung chen po'i shugs kyis phul na sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus dang /_de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[253a.7\]]de bzhin du ye shes chen po'i rlung gi shugs kyis phul na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po 'gog par ltung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa de ni legs par bshad de/_legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal 'on kyang dpe gang dag bstan pas byang chub sems 
[\[253b.2\]]dpa'i thabs dang shes rab shes par 'gyur ba'i dpe ngas kyang bstan gyis nyon cig_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na klu'i rgyal po mthu dang ldan pas sems pa'i dbang gis sprin gyi phung po gcig las char pa'i bdag nyid dang glog gi phreng ba yang gtong ngo /_/skye bar byed 
[\[253b.3\]]pa'i bdag nyid chu'i rgyun kyang gtong ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab dang /_ye shes kyi sprin gcig las sems can so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa yang ston 
[\[253b.4\]]to/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yang ston to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la dri'i shing zhig yod de/_de'i rtsa ba'i dri yang gzhan/_sdong po'i dri yang gzhan/_yal 
[\[253b.5\]]ga'i dri yang gzhan/_lo ma'i dri yang gzhan/_me tog gi dri yang gzhan/_'bras bu'i dri yang gzhan no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du dri'i shing lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus de yang sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du so so ci rigs par chos kyi dri gtong ste/_
[\[253b.6\]]snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'i dri de las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi mgul du thogs na/_de la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas thams cad dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 
[\[253b.7\]]gyi dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad snang yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nor bu rin po che dag pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de yang bya ba thams cad kyang ston la/_thams cad du yang rnam par mi rtog 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che yid bzhin du 'gro ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/_/'jam 
[\[254a.2\]]dpal de bzhin du nor bu rin po che lta bur lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de ni rnam par mi rtog go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[254a.3\]]na nam mkha' la me yang 'bar zhing char pa yang 'bab mod kyi/_nam mkha' la ni tsha ba'ang med grang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang kun du 'bar ba'i khams gsum na yang gnas shing mya ngan las 'das 
[\[254a.4\]]pa'i zhi ba la'ang spyod mod kyi/_tsha ba'ang med/_grang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la dug gi shing yang skye/_sman gyi shing yang skye mod kyi/_nam mkha' la ni dug gi shing gis nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/_sman 
[\[254a.5\]]gyi shing gis rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dug gi shing lta bu'i phung po yang 'chang /_sman gyi shing lta bu'i dbang po yang 'chang mod kyi/_phung po'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par yang mi 
[\[254a.6\]]'gyur/_rnam par dag pa'i dbang pos rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/_gnyi ga'i bya ba yang byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na chu'i snod bu gu brgya yod pa la/_bu gu gcig bkag na thams cad nas mi 'dzag go/_/bu gu gcig phye na thams cad 
[\[254a.7\]]nas kyang 'dzag go/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa chen po la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyi yul la mi 'dzag go/_/yang langs pa na 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la so so ji ltar 'os par 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]chos bstan pa'i phyir yul thams cad du zag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa'i rta cang shes ni rta zhon pa la srung bar byed de/_bdag la ni de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du snying rje chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[254b.2\]]mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa dag ni sems can rnams la srung bar byed de/_bdag la ni de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ni me 'bar ba ma gtogs par cis kyang mi 'jigs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang 
[\[254b.3\]]chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba ma gtogs par cis kyang mi 'jigs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na bal glang gi rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs mod kyi/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 
[\[254b.4\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bsod nams bsags pa'i phyir dga' ba dang rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad so so ci rigs par ston to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song yang 'di lta ste/_sems can 
[\[254b.5\]]rnams so so ci rigs par yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshogs thams cad ston to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na gang gtsub stan las byung ba dang /_gang nor bu rin po che las byung ba'i me de gnyi ga yang tsha ba'i bdag nyid do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[254b.6\]]du byang chub sems dpa' gang sems dang po bskyed pa dang /_gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i sems tha ma bskyed pa de gnyi ga yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i bdag nyid do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na dri'i shing sna tshogs rnams ni 
[\[254b.7\]]de dag thams cad khams bzhis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi tshogs bsags pa de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bzung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]du bsngos na skye'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du 'gro ba der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad 'dong ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[255a.2\]]sems dpa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du 'gro ba der byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dong ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na bya'i rgyal po ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa sgo nga 
[\[255a.3\]]ma chag cing sbubs nas ma byung yang 'di lta ste/_sgra yid du 'ong ba ka la ping ka'i sgra nyid sgrogs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su zhugs pa/_'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pa/_khams gsum nas mngon 
[\[255a.4\]]par ma byung yang 'di lta ste/_sgra stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra nyid sgrogs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na ka la ping ka rma bya'i nang du song na ka la ping 
[\[255a.5\]]ka'i sgra mi sgrogs so/_/ka la ping ka'i nang du song na ni ka la ping ka'i sgra sgrogs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi nang du song na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra mi sgrogs so/_/byang chub 
[\[255a.6\]]sems dpa'i nang du song na ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na rnam par 'thor rlung ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing ngam/_khang pa'am/_gzhal med khang ngam/_sa phyogs rnams kyis bzod par mi 
[\[255a.7\]]nus so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su sgrogs pa na sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mos pa'am/_dad par mi 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]nus te/_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ni mos shing yid ches so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba gnyi ga la 'char mod kyi/_gtsang ba la yang rjes su chags par mi byed/_mi gtsang ba la yang 
[\[255b.2\]]khong khro bar mi byed de/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer kyang nyan thos dang /_so so'i skye bo la 'char mod kyi/_nyan thos rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi byed/_
[\[255b.3\]]so so'i skye bo rnams la khong khro bar yang mi byed/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma lhags par gyur pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ring por mi thogs 
[\[255b.4\]]par shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog dang /_'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ring por mi thogs par byang chub 
[\[255b.5\]]sems dpa' 'di ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me tog dang /_'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bstod par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na shing gang dag rlung gis btud/_kun du btud/_
[\[255b.6\]]rab tu btud pa de dag 'gyel bar 'jigs pa med do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad la 'dud/_kun du 'dud/_rab tu 'dud pa de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'jigs pa med 
[\[255b.7\]]do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na chu ni gang du dma' ba der 'bab bo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der 'gro'o/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam rgya mtsho chen po dang po gnas pa de'i 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]tshe sa chen po thams cad kyi nang na dma' ba'i sa phyogs der dang por gnas te/_de nas 'bab chu'i rgyun thams cad tshegs chung ngus der mngon du 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la tshegs chung 
[\[256a.2\]]ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thams cad du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rjes nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs mod kyi/_nor bu rin po che rdo rje de ni de dag gis mi phigs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[256a.3\]]sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams 'dul mod kyi de dag gi gdul ba der yang mi ltung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na me tog man dA ra ba rlung gis bskyod na dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dris khyab bo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[256a.4\]]sems dpa' 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis bskyod pa yang sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i dris khyab par byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na gang dag me tog man dA ra ba'i dri snom pa de dag ni nad thams cad kyis mi 'debs so/_/
[\[256a.5\]]'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i dri snom pa de dag nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na u dum bA ra'i me tog mi 'byung 
[\[256a.6\]]ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi me tog kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa char 'bebs pa de'i tshe/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad khyab par char 'bebs so/_/
[\[256a.7\]]'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la mnyam par 'bebs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na mtsho chen po ma dros pa las klung gi rgyun bzhi 'bab ste/_rgya mtsho chen 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]po bzhi yongs su 'gengs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi 'bab pas ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'jam dpa' 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po med na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 
[\[256b.2\]]rnams nor bu rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par grol ba'i chos rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na gzugs gang ci 
[\[256b.3\]]yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhis yongs su bzung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad byin gyi rlabs bzhis yongs su bzung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_
[\[256b.4\]]dper na g.yang sa nyam nga ba na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nyan thos 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i g.yang sa nyam nga bar gnas pa rnams ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 
[\[256b.5\]]'di lta ste/_dper na grong khyer gyi nang na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i nang du song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas 
[\[256b.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na gang dbyar byung ba'i chu mig de dag ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyan thos rnams kyis chos bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par mi 
[\[256b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na gang dpyid byung ba'i chu mig de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i shing gang dag bcad pa de dag ni slar yang myur du skye'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nam de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[257a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa de dag gi yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa 'di lta bu 'di dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[257a.3\]]pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa de lta bu de dag thos nas dga' bar mi 'gyur/_rgyags par mi 'gyur ba de'ang mchog tu ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[257a.4\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba dag pa ste/_yang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa brjod pas dga' bar yang mi 'gyur/_rgyags par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[257a.5\]]rtsa ba gang las dag pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag med pa'i rtsa ba dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i rtsa ba dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba dang /_
[\[257a.6\]]ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i rtsa ba dang /_nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba las dag go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dag pa zhes bgyi bas ci zhig bstan pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ma bzung ma btang ba ste/_de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o/_/ma 
[\[257a.7\]]skyes/_ma 'gags ma brtags/_rnam par ma brtags/_ma phyung ma bcug_/ma byas rnam par ma byas/_mun pa ma yin/_snang ba ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_bcings pa ma yin/_thar ba ma yin/_'khor ba 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin te/_de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor ba yang ma lags/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags na de la dag pa de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang mya ngan 
[\[257b.2\]]las 'das par yang rlom sems med la 'khor ba la mngon par zhen pa'ang med pa de nyid 'dir dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' dag pa zhes bya yang nam mkha' ni dag pa yang ma yin kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te 'on kyang nam 
[\[257b.3\]]mkha' ni dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya yang mya ngan las 'das pa ni dag pa'ang ma yin kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te 'on kyang mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/_
[\[257b.4\]]khyod ci dag pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nam kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa de'i tshe bdag dag pa'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[257b.5\]]ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_bdag gis de yongs su rtogs pas de'i slad du yongs su dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/_rab 'byor 
[\[257b.6\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par chos gzhan 'ga' zhig mchis na ni des chos kyi dbyings yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur gyi/_chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[257b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par gang chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa'i chos de yang med na chos kyi dbyings de khyod kyis ji ltar yongs su shes/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]'byor cang mi smra bar gyur to//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[258a.2\]]rmas pa'i lan glan pa las 'dug par gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa de'i tshe kho bo 'dug go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa 
[\[258a.3\]]dang bcas pa/_bar chad dang bcas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/_bar chad med pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la thogs pa'am/_bar chad pa gang yang dmigs 
[\[258a.4\]]sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_chos kyi dbyings la ni thogs pa'am/_bar chad pa mi dmigs so/_/smras pa/_'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa las bar chad du gyur/_smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis chos kyi dbyings 
[\[258a.5\]]la yongs su chad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni 'chad pa bar chad pa yin gyis gang yang chos kyi dbyings la tshad med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni chad par mi 'chad do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad 
[\[258a.6\]]pa gang yang yod dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_chos kyi dbyings ni kun gyi sgo ste/_chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang med do/_/smras pa/_'o na ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad par ston/_smras pa/_'jam 
[\[258a.7\]]dpal nyan thos kyi yul tshad mar byas te chos kyi dbyings yongs su chad par ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad mar byas te/_de ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med par ston to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ngam/_
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ba ma yin te/_'jam dpal de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings ni yul med pa/_yul dang bral ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yul 
[\[258b.2\]]tha dad par ston/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/_bar chad dang bcas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/_bar chad med pa'o zhes dang po nyid du kho bos ma 
[\[258b.3\]]smras sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ma thob bam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal kho bos so so yang dag par rig pa thob bo/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang 
[\[258b.4\]]ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa bar chad/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang bral ba ste/_de bas na 'chad pa bar chad do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[258b.5\]]dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bskyed pa ste/_de bas na 'chad pa bar mi 'chad do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci ye shes kyi dbyings gang gis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[258b.6\]]rab 'byor gyi so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de bar chad pa'i mtshan nyid yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_ye shes kyi dbyings ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[258b.7\]]can no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te ye shes kyi dbyings thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/_'o na ci'i phyir 'chad pa bar chad/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal tshe dang ldan 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pa shA ri'i bu 'di nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs kyis/_'di la dris shig dang /_'di nyid khyod la 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyid 
[\[259a.2\]]kyis shod cig_/kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa nyan par 'dod kyi/_'chad par ni mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga na chos 'chad cing /_nyan 
[\[259a.3\]]thos chen po dag kyang cang mi smra bar gzhog pa kho bos mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag mang po 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[259a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de na nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das des gsungs 
[\[259a.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog de nam nang du yang dag 'jog par gyur pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du mngon par song ste/_thams cad dang 
[\[259a.6\]]ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dun par byas nas chos ston to/_/kho bo dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin te/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_lha'i bu brgya phrag stong 
[\[259a.7\]]yang chos nyan par 'dod pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyir 'brang bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su 'dug ste/_mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po des mgul bsal ba'i sgra de thos pa dang /_mgul bsal ba'i sgra de'i shugs ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor rlung 
[\[259b.2\]]gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du sa la lhung ste/_de dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/_ngo mtshar du bzung ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog de ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[259b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang thos pas bdag mgul bsal ba'i sgra'i shugs de ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin 
[\[259b.4\]]du dog sa la lhung bar gyur pa'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra zab mo 'di lta bu 'di sus bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nga la blta 
[\[259b.5\]]ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_yongs su zhu ba dang /_yongs su legs par zhu bar bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'od 
[\[259b.6\]]gsal gyi lha'i ris su 'dug nas mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/des 
[\[259b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong na legs par 'gyur gyis/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bdag cag gis kyang blta bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bar snang de las babs nas/_
[\[260a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas 'khor dang 
[\[260a.3\]]bcas te ji ltar rang gi smon lam dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sprul pa'i stan la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[260a.4\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong nas 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba can 'dir 'ongs/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_
[\[260a.5\]]yongs su zhu ba dang /_yongs su legs par zhu ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas par 'gyur/_ji ltar 
[\[260a.6\]]na bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur/_ji ltar na yongs su zhus par 'gyur/_ji ltar na yongs su legs par zhus par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nam chos mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba 
[\[260a.7\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das nam lus dang sems kyis 'dud par mi bgyid/_rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing bgyid pa ma mchis/_zhum pa ma mchis par gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob pa/_sems dben pa'i ngang tshul du spyod pa/_dran 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bgyid pa de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nam bdag tu sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/_gzhan du sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam par mi bgyid/_mi mnyam 
[\[260b.2\]]pa nyid la mi mnyam par mi bgyid cing /_bgyid pa ma mchis/_rnam par bgyid pa ma mchis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang spyod pa gcig tu gyur pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /_chos kyi sku'i rjes su 'jug pa/_gang gi lus kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi 
[\[260b.3\]]rjes su zhugs par mthong ba/_mthong ba la mthong bar mi mthong ba/_log par mi mthong ba/_gang la yang ring por mi 'gyur ba/_nye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nam tshul 
[\[260b.4\]]bzhin ma lags par ni ma lags kyi/_nam tshul bzhin du zhu ba/_tshul bzhin ma lags pa/_ci'ang mi mthong ba/_bdag gi tshul bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin gyi rjes su mchi ba g.yengs pa'i sems kyis ma lags kyi/_mnyam par bzhag 
[\[260b.5\]]pas zhu ba/_gang zhu ba dang /_gang gi slad du zhu ba dang /_gang la zhu ba de dus gsum yongs su tshol zhing /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pas zhu ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nam zhu ba mchis pa la rtogs 
[\[260b.6\]]par mi bgyid pa/_ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su 'thun par bgyid pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bgyid pa/_'khor thams cad mgu bar bgyid pa/_yongs su zhu ba la mi chags pa/_yongs su zhu ba des kyang sems can tshad ma mchis pa rnams byang chub 
[\[260b.7\]]tu go cha skon zhing /_go cha de yang nam byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mi 'dor ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su legs par zhu ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]rgyas 'od kyi tog des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/de ltar phyag bya'o/_/de ltar bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de ltar yongs su zhu bar bya'o/_/
[\[261a.2\]]de ltar yongs su legs par zhu bar bya'o zhes smras pa de ni khyod kyis legs par bshad de legs so legs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[261a.3\]]ji ltar mthong /_ji ltar phyag 'tshal/_ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed/_ji ltar yongs su zhu/_ji ltar yongs su legs par zhu/_des smras pa/_'jam dpal bstan pa 'di lta bu ni kho bo cag lta bu nyan thos gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su mos pa rnams kyi yul ma yin no/_/
[\[261a.4\]]smras pa/_'o na gang mngon par rtogs pas tshe dang ldan pa shes rab sgron ma'i sems rnam par grol/_smras pa/_'jam dpal bden pa mngon par rtogs pas sems rnam par grol lo/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bden pa zhes bya bas ci bstan par 'gyur/_des 
[\[261a.5\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal gnyen po med pas rab tu phye ba ni bden pa'o/_/smras pa/_'o na ji ltar bden pa mngon par rtogs pas tshe dang ldan pa'i sems rnam par grol/_smras pa/_'jam dpal kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste de skad ces ston gyi don dam par ni ma yin 
[\[261a.6\]]no/_/smras pa/_ci kun rdzob don dam par 'du'am/_smras pa/_gal te mi 'du na don dam pa med par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'o na ji ltar kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste ston gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin/_gal te kun rdzob don dam par 'du na ni 'di lta ste/_don dam 
[\[261a.7\]]pa'i bden par bden pa gcig pur mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_'jam dpal bshad pa 'di thos na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos/_
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal kho bo skrag par byed mi nus so/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ci skrag pa med pa dang /_skyo ba med pas nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal nyan thos rnams ni skrag pa med pa 
[\[261b.2\]]dang /_skyo ba med par rnam par mi grol lo/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de bas na sngon skrag pa de nyid la bsams nas btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos zhes de skad smras so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub 
[\[261b.3\]]sems dpa' ji ltar rnam par grol/_smras pa/_btsun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni skrag pa med pa dang /_skyo ba med pas rnam par grol lo/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji la bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgyas mi skrag cing 
[\[261b.4\]]sems can rnams la chos bshad pas mi skyo la/_bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas mi skrag cing ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas mi skyo'o/_/de nas 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis me tog sna tshogs kyis 
[\[261b.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gtor to/_/gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snang ba der ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[261b.6\]]gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa kun du shes sam/_kun du shes par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis kyang bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin no zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[261b.7\]]nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/_ci shes rab de 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dam 'on te 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid/_gal te de 'dus 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]byas kyi mtshan nyid yin na ni skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na ni mtshan nyid gsum las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 'phags pa rnams ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye 
[\[262a.2\]]bar ston to/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dus ma byas pa gdags par nus sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_'dus ma byas la gdags pa gang yang med do/_/smras pa/_'o na ji ltar 'phags pa rnams 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu 
[\[262a.3\]]phye ba ston/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[262a.4\]]to/_/'jam dpal chos gang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgo 'ga' zhig rtsoms te/_'khor 'dir khyod kyis ston cig_/'jam dpal gyis 
[\[262a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo ste/_dben pa'i sgo de dag dben pa nyid du ston to/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'jam 
[\[262a.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bstan pa de dag ci dben pa'i sgo ste/_dben pa'i sgo nyid du ston pa yin nam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du 
[\[262a.7\]]sems/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gang nas byung /_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug ni rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa las byung ngo /_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa de yang 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]gang nas byung /_smras pa/_'jam dpal rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa ni phyin ci log las byung ngo /_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu phyin ci log kyang gang nas byung /_smras pa/_'jam dpal phyin ci log ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ngo /_/
[\[262b.2\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa yang gang nas byung /_smras pa/_'jam dpal ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo /_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang gang nas byung /_
[\[262b.3\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni bdag las byung ngo /_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag kyang gang nas byung /_smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag ni gang nas kyang ma byung ste/_'byung ba med pa ni bdag 'byung ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bdag 
[\[262b.4\]]ni phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos gang dag phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa de'i sgo ci zhig yod/_smras pa/_'jam dpal dben pa nyid de'i sgo'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dben pa'i sgo ci yin/_
[\[262b.5\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal sgo med pa nyid dben pa'i sgo'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bos de las bsams te/_chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo ste/_de dag dben pa'i sgo nyid du ston to zhes de skad smras so/_/bstan pa 'di bshad 
[\[262b.6\]]pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der rgya cher chos bstan pa byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang nyan thos sam/_rang 
[\[262b.7\]]sangs rgyas gang gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i spobs pa'i rgyun gcod nus pa med na/_skabs ma phye bar bdag cag lta bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu smra bar ga la nus/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig mthong /_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[263a.2\]]kho bos mngon par shes te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang tshig pa de dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa song ba dang chus yongs su gang zhing /_pad ma mang pos yog par gnas par gyur 
[\[263a.3\]]to/_/gang dag chus yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur te/_me de yang reg na 'di lta ste dper na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'am/_ka tsa lin di'i gos lta bur gyur to/_/gang dag stong pa nam mkhar gyur pa de dag ni [(]changs [,]tshangs [)]pa'i 
[\[263a.4\]]gzhal med khang gis brgyan cing bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur to/_/gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'jig par snang ngo /_/gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song thams cad dang 
[\[263a.5\]]bral bar snang ste/_sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa gang zhe na/_gang la snyoms par zhugs na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[263a.6\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can gang dag nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis gzir ba de dag gi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug shin tu spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam sems pa ste/_
[\[263a.7\]]gang de ltar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i tshe de'i dus na kho bo'i sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gang yin pa dang /_bdag gi gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du gyur pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis kho bo'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa de shes nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me 'bar ba na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[263b.2\]]bar du 'dug ste kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/ci tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'am/_'on te kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgal bar bya/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i 
[\[263b.3\]]mgyogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'o zhes/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i mgyogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad bstan te/_'dom gang tsam khor yug tu me de zhi bar byas nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu nyin 
[\[263b.4\]]zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de brgal to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na de bas kyang shin tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me 'bar ba na 'jig rten gyi bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug ste/_kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[263b.5\]]shA ri'i bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mngon 
[\[263b.6\]]par 'du byed pa'i mngon sum gyi rdzu 'phrul sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de pad ma'i dra bas g.yogs te rgal bar gyur to/_/brgal nas kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag cag gnyis las su'i mthu dang ldan pa'i rdzu 
[\[263b.7\]]'phrul gyi shugs mgyogs/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_bya lang gu li dang /_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gnyis gang gi mthu shin tu mgyogs/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]mthu'i mgyogs pa ni tshad med pa ste dpe blang du sla ba ma yin no/_/de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bya lang gu li'i mgyogs pa lta bur ni kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mgyogs pa blta bar bya'o/_/ji ltar bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi 
[\[264a.2\]]mthu'i mgyogs pa de bas kyang brgya stong gis shin tu lhag par khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mgyogs par blta'o/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang /_bdag gi gang yin pa de 
[\[264a.3\]]gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du ma gyur tam/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_kho bo de snyam du gyur to/_/des smras pa/_ci'i phyir de snyam du gyur/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nyan thos rnams ni bag chags kyi 
[\[264a.4\]]mtshams sbyor ba ma bcad pa'i phyir mi mnyam du zin kyang mnyam du bdag nyid kyis shes so/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu legs so/_/legs so/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgya mtsho chen 
[\[264a.5\]]po'i 'gram na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba dang /_kun byin zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de/_de la chos 'dod ni lnga mngon par shes shing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur to/_/kun byin ni rig pa dang sngags kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la 'gro bar gyur to/_/
[\[264a.6\]]de nas de gnyis dus dus su spyod pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol du 'dong ngo /_/dong nas slar log cing rang rang gi gnas su 'khod do/_/de nas drang srong kun byin de kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang /_chos 'dod kyi gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du gyur to/_/de 
[\[264a.7\]]nas dus gzhan zhig na rgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol du dong ste/_srin mo'i gling du phyin pa dang /_der srin mo de dag gis yid du 'ong ba'i rol mo'i sgra byas par gyur pa yang drang srong kun byin gyis thos/_srin mo de dag kyang mthong nas/_nam mkha'i dkyil nas sa'i steng du lhung 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ngo /_/de'i rig pa dang sngags kyang ma rung bar gyur to/_/de nas drang srong chos 'dod snying rje ba'i sems skyes nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/_slar rang gi gnas su khrid nas bzhag go/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba de gzhan 
[\[264b.2\]]zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tshom mam/_yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kho bo nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya bar gyur to/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun byin zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the 
[\[264b.3\]]tsom mam/_yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun byin zhes bya bar gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe yang mi mnyam par bdag dang mnyam pa nyid du bzhag go/_/de ltar de phyogs gcig pa'i 
[\[264b.4\]]ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir da ltar yang mi mnyam bzhin du bdag dang mnyam par bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bos mngon par shes te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[264b.5\]]gyur pa dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa zhes bya ba na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[264b.6\]]chen srog shing zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phyin te/_de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gang bdag cag 
[\[264b.7\]]gis brgal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngam/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal mthong ngo /_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ci 'dra bar mthong /_de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/kha cig 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ni mes yongs su gang ba'o/_/kha cig ni chus yongs su gang ba'o/_/kha cig ni nam mkhar gyur pa'o/_/kha cig ni 'byor cing rgyas pa'o/_/kha cig ni 'jig pa'o/_/kha cig ni 'chags pa'o/_/kha cig ni ngan song gis yongs su gang ba'o/_/
[\[265a.2\]]kha cig ni ngan song dang bral ba'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar blta bar bya/_de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang dag mes yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag chus 
[\[265a.3\]]yongs su gang ba de dag ni chus yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag nam mkhar gyur pa de dag ni nam mkhar gyur pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag 'byor cing rgyas pa de dag ni 'byor cing rgyas pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag 'jig pa de dag ni 'jig 
[\[265a.4\]]pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'chags pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song gis yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gang dag ngan song dang bral ba de dag ni ngan song dang bral ba nyid du 
[\[265a.5\]]blta bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i ye shes kyi yul ji lta ba bshad pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong /_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[265a.6\]]ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni nam mkha'i zhing du mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mes yongs su gang ba'am/_chus yongs su gang ba'am/_'byor pa rgyas pa 'am/_'jig pa'am/_'chags pa'am/_ngan song gis yongs su gang 
[\[265a.7\]]ba'am/_ngan song dang bral ba de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/rkyen de dag ni glo bur du byung ba ste/_skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan pa'o/_/nam mkha' ni rkyen gyis byung ba ma yin te/_rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du glo bur gyi nye bar nyon mongs pas 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]sems nyon mongs par gyur pa zhes bya ste/_sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang nyon mongs par gyur pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na 'das pa'i dus na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pas bsregs pa byung yang nam mkha' la sngon 
[\[265b.2\]]nam yang tshig pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sems can re res kyang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byas kyang sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang de bzhin du nyon mongs par gyur pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[265b.3\]]bu rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings de lta bu la 'jug pa de dag ni kun nas ldang ba'am/_sgrib pa'am/_mngon par 'du byed pas kun nas ldang bar 'gyur ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med de/_'di ni kun nas ldang ba med 
[\[265b.4\]]pa'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/chos kyi sgo de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par zhugs nas/_nyes pa las 'byung ba la mkhas par shes shing /_de'i sems nams kyang sgrib pa'i chos rnams kyis sgrib 
[\[265b.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_chos bstan pa rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[265b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/_dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 
[\[265b.7\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di nyid na dge slong brgyad brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mnyan yod du dus ma yin pa'i 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]sprin chen po zhig byung ste/_de la nyin zhag bdun du rgyun ma chad par dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab bo/_/de na dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[266a.2\]]thob pa de dag ni bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pas dus 'da' bar byas kyi/_gang dag ma thob pa de dag ni nyin zhag bdun du zas chad par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong de dag nyam chung ba dang ldan te/_bcom 
[\[266a.3\]]ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong yang ma nus nas de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur te/_e ma'o dge slong 'di dag ni rjud par gyur na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste/_tshul de dag bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/_kho bo bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[266a.4\]]ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das e ma'o dge slong 'di dag nyin zhag bdun du 'tshal ma chad de bkres pas nyam chung ba dang ldan nas 
[\[266a.5\]]rjud de/_khri dang khri'u las ldang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i slad du mchi ba'i rngo yang mi thogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo song ste 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshul de dag smros shig dang /_
[\[266a.6\]]des dge slong gi dge 'dun rtas par byed par 'gyur ro/_/kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na brgya byin dang /_tshangs 
[\[266a.7\]]pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang kho bo gnas khang gi nang du 'ongs pa mthong ste/_mthong nas 'di skad ces zer ro/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir rlung dang char gyi nang na 'dir 'ongs/_kho 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshul de dag smras so/_/de kho bo la kun dga' bo song ste stan thing la/_gdugs tshod bab na gaN+DI rdungs shig de skad ces zer nas/_kho bo 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang nas byung ste/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' 
[\[266b.2\]]bar song nas stan bting ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci gnas khang nas byung ngam zhes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya 
[\[266b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sprul pa gzhan zhig sprul te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag la chos ston to/_/de gnas khang nas byung ste mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs na kho bos ni ma mthong 
[\[266b.4\]]ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs na bdag gis 'di mig gis mi rtsol bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_des de nyid kyi tshe mnyan 
[\[266b.5\]]yod kyi grong khyer chen po'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong 'dab dang /_yul mi gang gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mthong ba dang /_gang yang bsur mi 'ong ba dang /_su yang bsod snyoms mi 'bul ba de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[266b.6\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang dang gang du song ba de dag thams cad na sgo dag kyang bcad par snang ste/_gang yang mi bsu bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bsams na/_e ma'o bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'di dag ni ci nas kyang bdag 
[\[266b.7\]]mi mthong ba dang /_gtam mi bya bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs so snyam du bsams nas/_des de'i tshe gang bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gang dag gis bdag gi spu'i khung bu gcig lus la skyes pa'i bsod nams 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]kyi phung po de yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can rnams la med pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs 'di dag med par gyur cig_/bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gi tshul du srang dang /_
[\[267a.2\]]sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo dag na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig_/phul cig_/'di la phul na 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la lo 
[\[267a.3\]]'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/_gus par byas/_phu dud du byas pa bas/_gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo'i rtse mo gang tsam phul na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par 
[\[267a.4\]]gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de byas ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe sgo thams cad kyang bye bar gyur to/_/skye bo mang po thams cad kyang bsu zhing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bde bar 'ongs so zhes 
[\[267a.5\]]kyang rjod do/_/bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gi tshul du srang dang /_sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo dag na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig_/phul cig_/'di la phul na 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[267a.6\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la lo 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/_gus par byas/_phu dud du byas pa bas/_gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo gang tsam phul na de'i bsod 
[\[267a.7\]]nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ci nas kyang lhung bzed der bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba phal cher bcug pa de dag thams cad ji ltar snod so sor bcug pa bzhin du ma 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'dres par 'dug pa dang /_gang dge slong brgyad brgya po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de dag la kha zas ji tsam gyis chog pa lhung bzed des blangs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar rang gi lhung bzed de byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[267b.2\]]nur gyur pas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir spyad nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste/_lam las byol nas lhung bzed de sa'i steng du bzhag ste bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du 
[\[267b.3\]]song shig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhung bzed de sa de las gdeg par byas na gdegs ma nus nas/_des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas gdeg par ma nus so/_/smras pa/_sdig 
[\[267b.4\]]can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin na rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas gdeg par gyis shig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi cho 'phrul thams cad bstan kyang lhung bzed de sa de las tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha 
[\[267b.5\]]tsam yang gdeg par ma nus nas/_de ngo mtshar du gyur te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal kho bo ni 'dod na ri gshol mda' 'dzin kyang lag mthil du blangs te nam mkha' la 'dor na kho bos lhung bzed chung ngu 'di lta bu 'dis 'di'i 
[\[267b.6\]]steng nas gdeg par ma nus na de ci'i phyir de ltar gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sems can chen po rnams dang /_gang zag chen po rnams kyi stobs drangs pa lhung bzed 'dir bcug ste/_de'i phyir khyod kyis gdeg par ma nus so/_/de nas 'jam dpal 
[\[267b.7\]]gzhon nur gyur pa nyid kyis lhung bzed de sa las blangs nas bdud sdig can la byin te 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du song shig_/de nas bdud sdig can de slob ma bzhin du lhung bzed khyer te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]mdun du song ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu dbang sgyur lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[268a.2\]]'tshal nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can bran bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lhung bzed khyer te mdun du 'gro ba 'di ci zhig_/bdud kyis smras pa/_lha'i bu mthu dang ldan pa rnams dang 'gran pa ci'ang med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_sdig 
[\[268a.3\]]can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu dbang sgyur la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_bdud kyi stobs ni gti mug gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[268a.4\]]stobs ni shes rab kyi stobs so/_/bdud kyi stobs ni nga rgyal gyi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni ye shes kyi stobs so/_/bdud kyi stobs ni lta ba 'byung ba'i stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni stong pa nyid kyi stobs so/_/bdud kyi stobs 
[\[268a.5\]]ni phyin ci log gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni bden pa'i stobs so/_/bdud kyi stobs ni nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i stobs so/_/bdud kyi stobs ni 'dod chags dang 
[\[268a.6\]]zhe sdang dang gti mug gi stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi stobs so/_/bdud kyi stobs ni skye ba dang 'chi ba dang /_'byung ba'i stobs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa'i chos la 
[\[268a.7\]]bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i stobs so/_/bdud sdig can gyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu'i 'khor de las lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gyur to//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lhung bzed de 'khor gyi khyams su bzhag ste song yang kho bos ma mthong ma thos nas/_gdugs tshod la bab par gyur kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[268b.2\]]gyur pa gnas khang de nas byung ba'am zhugs par yang ma mthong nas/_de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong gi dge 'dun ma bslus sam/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste tshul de dag gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/_kho bo 
[\[268b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni gnas khang de nas ma 
[\[268b.4\]]byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'khor gyi khyams zlum po der ci yang ma mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de na lhung bzed zas kyis gang ba 
[\[268b.5\]]gcig cig gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo song la gaN+DI rdungs te dge slong gi dge 'dun sdus shig_/bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[268b.6\]]'di dag mang po zhig mchis na lhung bzed gcig gang ba'i zas kyis ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod snying las chung bar byos shig_/kun dga' bo gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 
[\[268b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyis lo 'bum du lhung bzed gcig po de las zos kyang lhung bzed de ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lhung bzed de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad mi shes pa'i bsod nams las byung ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar kho bos mnyan nas sems dga' bas gaN+DI brdungs te dge slong gi dge 'dun yang bsags so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[269a.2\]]pas gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/_lha'i bu de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs te/_rang gi gnas khang nas byung ste/_khyams zlum por song nas lhung bzed de las bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_ji ltar snod so so na 
[\[269a.3\]]bzhag bzhag pa lta bur phan tshun ma 'dres pa phal cher phyung ste dge slong mang po thams cad kyang brtas par byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mang po thams cad kyang tshim par byas kyang zas de ni yongs su zad pa'am gtugs par ma gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'jam 
[\[269a.4\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bar chad bya ba'i phyir sham thabs legs par ma bgos pa/_bla gos legs par ma gyon pa/_sha tshugs ma legs pa/_lhung bzed rdol cing chag pa/_gos ngan pa/_sna leb leb po dang /_zhar ba dang /_'theng po dang /_zha bo dang de las 
[\[269a.5\]]kha cig ni ha cang yang ring ba/_kha cig ni ha cang thung ba/_kha cig ni ha cang gnag pa/_kha cig ni ha cang dkar ba/_kha cig ni ha cang skem pa/_kha cig ni ha cang sbom pa/_kha cig ni sgur po/_kha cig ni mi'u thung ste/_de dag gzhon pa'i mtha' nas phyag 'tshal zhing 
[\[269a.6\]]rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs gang gis mthong ba'i sems skyo bar 'gyur ba'i dge slong bzhi khri sprul par gyur te/_de dag la yang lhung bzed de nas bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba phal cher phyung ste/_byin kyang lhung bzed de zad 
[\[269a.7\]]par ma gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis sprul pa'i dge slong de dag re res kyang 'bras can yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo bcu bcu zos kyang tshim par ma gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_de na rung byed rnams thams cad yongs su skyo bar gyur kyang de dag tshim par byed ma nus so/_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gang dge slong de dag lhung bzed rnams kyang yongs su gang la lag pa na yang kham thogs shing khar bcug pa'i kham yang mid mi nus la/_de dag [(]'grin [,]mgrin [)]pa btsir ba bzhin du mig log ste sa la lhung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de 
[\[269b.2\]]nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyi dge slong 'di dag ci'i phyir zas mi za/_bdud kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag gi dge slong 'di dag ni shi la thug par gyur na khyod kyis dug dang bsres pa'i zas 
[\[269b.3\]]ma byin grang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sdig can dug med pa rnams dug sbyin par ga la 'gyur/_gang dag dug srel ba de dag ni dug sbyin par byed kyi/_gang dag dug mi srel ba de dag ni dug sbyin par mi byed do/_/sdig can dug ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_'dod chags 
[\[269b.4\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug ste/_de dag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la med do/_/dug ces bya ba ni ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa dang /_nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba dang /_rgyu dang /_lta ba dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong 
[\[269b.5\]]khro ba dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_gzhan du lta ba dang /_sgrib pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba dang /_phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams la rlom sems su byed pa dang /_skye mched la yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_yul la chags pa dang /_khams gsum la zhen pa dang /_bsdus 
[\[269b.6\]]pa dang /_g.yengs pa dang /_gzhag pa dang /_gdeg pa dang /_shi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_lus la mngon par chags pa dang /_srog la zhen pa dang /_sdug pa yid la byed pa dang /_phyin ci log tu gnas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung 
[\[269b.7\]]ba dang mi 'thun pa dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_ther zug tu lta ba dang /_'byung bar lta ba dang /_'jig par lta ba dang /_g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_sogs pa dang /_mdud pa dang /_kun gzhi dang /_nges pa'i gzhi dang /_
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]zhen pa dang /_khyim gyi gnas la dga' ba dang /_len pa dang /_'dor ba dang /_stong pa nyid kyis skrag pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang /_dmigs su med pa la dngos por 'du 
[\[270a.2\]]shes pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba'i khams la kha na ma tho bar lta ba dang /_chu bo las rgal bar 'du shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la log par lta bar 'du shes pa dang /_log par lta ba la yang 
[\[270a.3\]]dag par lta bar 'du shes pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sdig pa'i grogs por 'du shes pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang mi 'thun pa dang /_chos spong ba dang /_dge 'dun la ma gus pa dang /_dgon 
[\[270a.4\]]pa'i gnas la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ma spangs pa dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_rtsod pa 'bar bar byed pa dang /_bden pa la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par 'du shes pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa la bden par 'du shes pa dang /_'dod 
[\[270a.5\]]pa la yon tan du 'du shes pa dang /_'dus byas la bden par 'du shes pa dang /_'khor ba la phan yon rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jigs pa rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa'i chos de lta bu de dag ni dug yin te/_sdig can de dag ni legs par 
[\[270a.6\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud rtsi bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bde ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni spros pa med pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni ma smad pa bstan pa'o/_/
[\[270a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni kun nas ldang ba med pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'byung ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'thab pa med pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni rtsod pa med pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdag 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]dang gzhan la mi gdung ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni byams pa dang ldan pa'i bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni gnas dang /_skyabs dang /_gling dang /_dpung gnyen bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_rab 
[\[270b.2\]]tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni dag pa dang /_rnam par dag pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_'od gsal ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yang dag pa'i nan tan bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni mi dkrug
