[\[270b.3\]]pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni shin tu dul ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa ni bstod cing bsngags pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_shin 
[\[270b.4\]]tu nges par bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_yongs su grol ba bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud 
[\[270b.5\]]thams cad 'joms pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni skye ba dang /_shi 'pho dang /_'byung ba las nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar bzhag pas dran pa bstan pa'o/_/sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas yang dag par spong ba bstan pa'o/_/
[\[270b.6\]]lus dang sems yang bas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bstan pa'o/_/dad pa sngon du 'gro bas dbang po bstan pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi bas stobs bstan pa'o/_/'thun par khong du chud pas byang chub kyi yan lag bstan pa'o/_/'byung bas lam 
[\[270b.7\]]bstan pa'o/_/sems zhi bas zhi gnas bstan pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba bskyed pas lhag mthong bstan pa'o/_/slu bar mi byed pas bden pa bstan pa'o/_/don dang /_chos dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_spobs pa dang mi 'gal bas so so yang dag par 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]rig pa bstan pa'o/_/'dus byas la smon pas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba yongs su brjod pa bstan pa'o/_/ya mtshan can thams cad spong bas bdag med pa bstan pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas zhi ba bstan pa'o/_/pha rol du 
[\[271a.2\]]'gro bas pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'o/_/sems can yang dag par sdud pas thabs bstan pa'o/_/zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas byams pa bstan pa'o/_/'tshe ba med pas snying rje bstan pa'o/_/mi dga' ba sel bas dga' ba bstan pa'o/_/bya ba byas 
[\[271a.3\]]pas btang snyoms bstan pa'o/_/nga rgyal med pas ye shes bstan pa'o/_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad pa bstan pa'o/_/yang 'byung ba med pas bde ba thams cad dang 'thun pa bstan pa'o/_/bstan pa'i bshad pa 'di 
[\[271a.4\]]bstan pa'i tshe gang bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lha'i bu gang dag lhags pa de las lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de lta bu dang 'thun par 
[\[271a.5\]]gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dzum pa mdzad de/_kho bos 'dzum pa'i phyir zhus so/_/zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo bdud kyi sprul pa'i dge slong 'di dag khyod 
[\[271a.6\]]kyis mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya 
[\[271a.7\]]tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher 'di bzhin du sham thabs legs par ma gyon pa/_bla gos legs par ma bgos pa/_gos brtul te gyon pa/_lhung bzed chag pa/_shes bzhin med pa/_spyod lam mi sdug pa/_lag 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]na 'khar ba thogs pa/_sna leb leb po dang /_zhar ba dang /_'theng po dang /_zha bo dang /_lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang /_nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de'i tshe dge slong dag phal cher 
[\[271b.2\]]bsnyen bkur la ched che bar byed pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rten pa dang /_bya ba sna tshogs kyi mi khom pas brel ba dang /_'dul ba bor ba dang /_so sor thar pa 'dral ba dang /_mtshams las 'da' ba dang /_tshe 'di ched che bar byed pa dang /_tshe rabs gzhan ched mi che bar 
[\[271b.3\]]byed par 'gyur te/_de dag 'di lta ste/_chos kyi phyir ni ma yin gyi/_bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhar ba dang /_'theng po dang /_zha bo dang /_lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang /_nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rab tu 'byung bar byed do/_/bsnyen 
[\[271b.4\]]par rdzogs par byed do/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di la bltar mi rung ba dang mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyang yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud rnams yi rangs shing dga' ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[271b.5\]]'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdud sdig can rnams yi rangs shing dga' ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar skyes bu blun po de dag bdag nyid bdud kyi las 
[\[271b.6\]]byed par 'gyur te/_de la bar chad bya ba'i phyir phyir zhing bdud sdig can brtson par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdud sdig can ni mi brtson pa rnams la glags mi tshol gyi/_bdud sdig can ni dge slong gang dag yang 'byung ba med par bya ba'i phyir mgo dang 
[\[271b.7\]]gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson par gnas pa de dag la bdud glags tshol te/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byos shig_/bstsal bar byos shig_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'bad par byos shig_/bdud kyi phyogs tshar chod cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar byos shig_/dam pa'i chos yongs su zung shig_/nga la chos kyi mchod pas mchod cig_/'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa yin no/_/bstan 
[\[272a.2\]]pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga stong gis tshe'i 'du byed spangs par gyur te/_bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mthong bar ma gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras nas/_de dag steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/_rang gi me'i 
[\[272a.3\]]khams kyis bdag nyid bsregs so/_/lha'i bu 'bum gyis kyang de dag la mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/dge slong nyis brgya ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems 
[\[272a.4\]]rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag kyang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[272a.5\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mi mthong bar bgyi ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag nams kyang sems le lo'i 
[\[272a.6\]]dri mas kun nas mi gnas par bgyi ba dang /_de dag bdud kyi las byung zhing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das sku tshe ring du bzhugs shing bskyang bar gsol zhes smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam 
[\[272a.7\]]par 'phrul pa dang /_chos ston pa rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos kyang 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa/_kho bo yang rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 
[\[272b.2\]]na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dang po 'ongs par gyur te/_bcom ldan 
[\[272b.3\]]'das kyang mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bca' mdzad do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang der dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang /_dge 
[\[272b.4\]]'dun gyi nang dang bkad sa dang /_gso sbyong dang /_phyag 'tshal ba'i las la kho bo cag gis phyir nam yang ma mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas dbyar zla ba gsum zad de 'das pa dang /_gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhin bstan to/_/de 
[\[272b.5\]]la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod dbyar gyi zla ba de gsum gyi tshe gang na 'dug 'dug des smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i nang na'o/_/de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur te/_
[\[272b.6\]]sems dpa' 'di lta bu ltung ba dang bcas pa dang yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig dgag dbye byar mi rung ngo snyam du gyur nas/_kho bo 'khor gyi khyams de nas byung ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir gaN+DI brdungs so/_/der bcom 
[\[272b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gnas brtan 'od srung chen po ci'i phyir gaN+DI rdungs pa soms shig_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsams na bdag bskrad pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod la ma dad pa chen po byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag nyid tshangs par byos shig_/rang gi spyod yul ston cig_/nyan thos chen po rnams mgu bar byos shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[273a.2\]]gyur pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu na sangs 
[\[273a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba'i dge slong 'od srung chen po 'dra ba sha stag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir gaN+DI rdung bar snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung 
[\[273a.4\]]ci'i phyir gaN+DI rdung /_bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dbyar zla gsum du btsun mo'i 'khor du gnas nas yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig dgag dbye bgyid par 
[\[273a.5\]]'tshal te/_de bskrad pa'i slad du bdag gaN+DI rdung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thams cad las 'od phyung ste/_kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung phyogs bcu na ci snang ba je ltos shig_/kho bos de'i tshe bltas na phyogs bcu na 
[\[273a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_gnas brtan bdag 'dra ba sha stag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir gaN+DI rdung bar mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[273a.7\]]nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung chen po khyod ci 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang nga'i mdun na 'dug pa 'di 'am/_'on te gang 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'am gang bskrad par 'dod/_de'i tshe kho bo ngo tsha ba'i tshul gyis gaN+DI de sa la dor ro snyam na/_dor yang ma nus nas rgyun ma chad par sgra byung 
[\[273b.2\]]ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang chad pa med/_lhag pa med/_skyes pa med par de bzhin du byed par snang ngo /_/kho bos de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[273b.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes pa phyogs gcig pa dang ldan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' yul tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma 'tshal nas gaN+DI brdungs pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod pa gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[273b.4\]]'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyed mthong ba thams cad du khyim pa'i khyim du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbyar zla gsum du gnas so/_/'od srung 
[\[273b.5\]]chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir btsun mo'i 'khor du dbyar gnas par dam bcas pas kyang rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor las bud med lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[273b.6\]]yongs su smin par byas so/_/skyes pa lnga brgya dang /_khye'u lnga brgya dang /_bu mo lnga brgya dang /_smad 'tshong ma lnga brgya yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bzhag go/_/sems can mang po dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg par 
[\[273b.7\]]brtul te mtho ris su 'gro bar byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can de snyed cig yongs su smin par bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid la chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byas zhes khyod kyis dris shig dang /_de nyid khyod la lan ldon par 'gyur ro/_/kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[274a.2\]]nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byas/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po sems can de lta bu de dag ni chos bshad pas yongs su smin par mi 
[\[274a.3\]]'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po sems can gang dag dga' ba'i rtsed mos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yang yod/_rab tu gzung ba dang /_tshar gcad pa dang /_sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa dang /_phongs shing dbul ba dang /_bkod pa chen 
[\[274a.4\]]po dang /_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_brgya byin gyi gzugs dang /_tshangs pa'i gzugs dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i gzugs dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[274a.5\]]sku dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_nyan thos kyi gzugs dang /_'jigs pas bsdigs pa dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig 'jam po dang /_phan gdags pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen 
[\[274a.6\]]po sems can gyi spyod pa ni sna tshogs pa ste/_de dag bya ba yang sna tshogs pa nyid kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur te/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams phyis chos bshad pas shin tu dul bar 'gyur ro/_/de la kho bos 
[\[274a.7\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis sems can gyi khams ji snyed cig spyod pa 'dis yongs su smin par byas/_des smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]kyang ji snyed/_smras pa/_nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa'o/_/smras pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyang ji tsam/_smras pa/_sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa ste/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_sems 
[\[274b.2\]]can gyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med na 'o na sangs rgyas 'byung ba don med par mi 'gyur ram/_des smras pa/_btsun 
[\[274b.3\]]pa 'od srung chen po dper na skyes bu la la zhig mkhris pa'i rims kyis btab ste/_rnam pa sna tshogs su bla bar gyur pa dang /_de la kha cig skyes bu 'di ni gdon gyis btab bo snyam du gyur to/_/de nas sman pa mkhas pa zhig 'ongs te/_skyes bu de la mar blud pa la sogs 
[\[274b.4\]]pa'i bya bas mkhris pa'i rims de zhi bar byas nas/_de phyis rnam pa sna tshogs su mi bla bar gyur na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_de las lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin byung bar gyur pa yod dam/_de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[274b.5\]]dpal de ni ma yin te/_'on kyang mar blud pa la sogs pa'i bya bas mkhris pa de zhi bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po skyes bu de la sman pa des phan pa chen po byas pa ma yin nam/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[274b.6\]]dpal ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du/_'jig rten gnas pa phyin ci log gi rims kyis btab pa dag bdag med la bdag tu 'du shes shing bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par zhen nas 'khor ba na 'khor ro/_/de la sangs 
[\[274b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag 'jig rten du byung ste/_dpe bstan pa de dang de dag dang /_chos la gzhug pa'i sgo de dang de dag gis bdag tu 'du shes pa yongs su shes pa dang /_phyin ci log spang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can de dag la chos 'chad do/_/
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]de dag chos thos nas 'du shes thams cad dang bral zhing phyi phyir zhing mngon par mi chags te/_de dag bdag tu 'du shes pa spangs nas chu bo las brgal te/_de dag brgal ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i grangs 
[\[275a.2\]]su 'gro'o/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_de la bdag gam sems can nam/_srog gam skye ba po'am/_gang zag gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa yod dam/_kho bos de la smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_'on 
[\[275a.3\]]kyang mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pas phyin ci log spong ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di lta bu'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te/_skye ba'i phyir ma yin/_
[\[275a.4\]]'gag pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'ba' zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/kho bos de la 'di skad smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rang bzhin de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings la'ang rtog cing /_sems can thams 
[\[275a.5\]]cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i go cha yang mi 'dor la/_zhum par mi 'gyur/_rangs par mi 'gyur zhing rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ni dka' ba byed pa ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung 
[\[275a.6\]]chen po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa yin no/_/de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'i go cha brtsam par spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun 
[\[275a.7\]]pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_go cha de dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]mtshan nyid kyis 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas tshad 
[\[275b.2\]]med pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/brag ca dang mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad nyan cing 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i mtshan 
[\[275b.3\]]nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/yod pa dang med pa sel ba'i rten cing 'brel 
[\[275b.4\]]bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/phung po thams cad spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha 'o/_/
[\[275b.5\]]mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis tshul khrims dang /_bslab pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad yang dag par len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/khong khro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bzod pa dang /_dul ba dang /_
[\[275b.6\]]des pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/lus dang sems dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/rten thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[275b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/ma rig pa'i gti mug gi lta ba yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thogs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/bya ba thams cad 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thabs chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/zhe 'gras pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/sor mo lnga dang nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid kyis snying rje chen po ni byang chub 
[\[276a.2\]]sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/yongs su mi skyo ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis btang snyoms chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/rnam par grol ba lag mthil 
[\[276a.3\]]du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/skyon med par mi ltung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis thams cad yid la mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/sgyu ma lta 
[\[276a.4\]]bu'i chos legs par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phung po lnga gshed ma lta bur gyur pa yongs su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis khams bzhi la sbrul gdug pa lta bur 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/yul 
[\[276a.5\]]thams cad la mi chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skye mched drug la grong stong pa lta bur rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/kun gzhi med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khams gsum dang mi 'dre ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/srid pa sel ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[276a.6\]]ched du srid pa len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dpa' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/sems can thams cad la so so ji ltar 'os par chos kyi sman sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sman pa chen po ni byang chub 
[\[276a.7\]]sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/theg pa gsum gyi lam ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ded dpon chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'da' ba'i mtshan 
[\[276b.2\]]nyid kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/_/
[\[276b.3\]]btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis ni de dag yin te/_go cha de dag bgos na 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 
[\[276b.4\]]'jigs pa ni med do/_/de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal go cha de dag las 'ga' yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la med do/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni go cha 
[\[276b.5\]]chen po ma bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_go cha gang mthu dang ldan pa'i 'phong gi slob dpon gyis bgo bar bya ba'i go cha de mi phal gyis bgo bar bya'am/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_mi 
[\[276b.6\]]phal gyis go cha de bgo bar mi nus so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du go cha gang byang chub sems dpas bgo bar bya ba de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad mi gyon no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu khri nyis stong 
[\[276b.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_chos ston pa rnam par 'phrul pa gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[277a.2\]]shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer gyi tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[277a.3\]]dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po zhes bya ba gcer bu pa drug khris yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_bsti stang byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas shing yangs pa can gyi grong khyer na 'dug go/_/kho bo ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[277a.4\]]zhugs te/_gzhan mu stegs can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la bltas na/_der kho bos sems can mu stegs can gdul bar bya ba brgya phrag mang po mthong nas/_kho bo der song ste de dag la chos bshad do/_/de dag kho bos chos bshad pa la sri zhu mi byed/_rna blags 
[\[277a.5\]]te mi nyan/_kun du shes par bya ba'i sems kyis mi gnas pa'i steng du kho bo la 'phya smod gad mos 'debs shing tshig rtsub po dag kyang rjod do/_/der kho bos zla ba gsum du sems can de dag las 'ga' yang yongs su smin par bya ma nus te skyo bar gyur to/_/kho bo skyo 
[\[277a.6\]]bar gyur nas slar song ngo /_/de la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mu stegs can lnga brgya sprul te/_bdag nyid slob dpon du bzhag nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /_gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po'i rkang pa gnyis 
[\[277a.7\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/_gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis 'phags pa'i grags pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po thos nas ljongs gzhan nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer 'dir mchis te/_khyod 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ni kho bo cag gi ston pa'o/_/kho bo cag ni khyod kyi slob ma'o/_/kho bo cag khyod las rjes su bstan pa nod do/_/ci nas kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma de dang /_de'i nyan thos rnams mi mthong ba dang /_ci nas kyang de las mi 'thun pa'i chos mi thos pa de ltar kho bo cag la mdzod 
[\[277b.2\]]cig_/gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa pos smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag legs so/_/legs so/_/dad pa dang ldan pa/_dang ba dang ldan pa khyod ring po mi thogs par nga'i chos bstan pa 'di shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa pos rang gi 
[\[277b.3\]]'khor rnams la smras pa/_tshur shog khyed cag bram ze'i bu lnga brgya po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu kun du dga' ba dang /_'thun pa dang /_phan tshun chos la dpyad pa dpyod cing lhan cig tu gnas par gyis shig_/'di dag gis gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci smras pa deng khyed kyis shin 
[\[277b.4\]]tu legs par zung shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor gcer bu pa lnga brgya sprul pa dang /_gzhan mu stegs can gyi nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dug nas/_de dag gi dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_spyod lam dang /_bslab pa'i 
[\[277b.5\]]tshig ji tsam du rgyun mi 'chad pa de bas kyang bdag dang 'khor la lhag par ston to/_/skabs skabs su dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod do/_/skabs skabs ni gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa brjod de/_des de 
[\[277b.6\]]dag yid ches par byas nas dus gzhan dang /_tshod gzhan zhig na mu stegs can gzhan tshogs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gi bstan bcos pa dang /_sngags dang /_rig byed dang /_gzhung 
[\[277b.7\]]las 'byung ba bzhin dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa yang yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa pha dang ma dag pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa/_bsod nams brgya'i 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]mtshan dang ldan pa ste/_btsas pa tsam na brgya byin dang /_tshangs pas yongs su blangs shing /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_ma bzung bar gom pa bdun bor te/_tshig kyang nga ni 'jig rten gyi thu bo ste/_
[\[278a.2\]]skye ba dang 'chi ba mthar bya'o zhes de skad smra zhing /_chu'i rgyun gnyis byung ste/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong bas khrus byas/_lha'i dang mi'i rol mo dag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung /_des 'od gang gis ngan song thams cad so sor thar pa dang /_
[\[278a.3\]]bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bu'i 'od kyang btang ste/_dbang po nyams pa thams cad kyang dbang po ma nyams par gyur/_yud tsam de la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ste mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur/_bram ze rig byed kyi 
[\[278a.4\]]cho ga shes pa rnams kyis kyang de ste khyim na 'dug na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de ste nags su song na chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ste/_de'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bor nas rab tu byung ste/_des byang chub kyi snying por 
[\[278a.5\]]bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgya pa btul te byang chub thob/_des 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang 'thun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_de chos kyang ston te/_tshangs par 
[\[278a.6\]]spyod pa thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de la de'i nyan thos dag gi thog mar dge ba de ni 'di lta 
[\[278a.7\]]ste/_lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang /_ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang /_yid kyi legs par spyod pa'o/_/bar du dge ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sems dang /_shes rab la bslab par bya'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni 'dun pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bag yod pa'o/_/bar du dge ba ni dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni shes rab dang /_lhag mthong dang /_ye 
[\[278b.2\]]shes so/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sangs rgyas la mi phyed par dad pa'o/_/bar du dge ba ni chos la mi phyed par dad pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni dge 'dun la mi phyed par dad pas 'bras bu thob pa'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni gzhan las nyan pa'o/_/
[\[278b.3\]]bar du dge ba ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni 'phags pa'i yang dag par lta ba'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba spang ba'o/_/bar du dge ba ni lam bsgom pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni 
[\[278b.4\]]'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa ste/_'di dag ni nyan thos rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang /_bar du dge ba dang /_tha mar dge ba'o/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang /_bar du dge ba dang /_tha mar dge ba gang zhe na/_de la thog mar dge 
[\[278b.5\]]ba ni byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'o/_/bar du dge ba ni theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas byams pa chen po'o/_/
[\[278b.6\]]bar du dge ba ni sems can thams cad la bya ba ji yod snyam pas snying rje chen po'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mnyam pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni ser sna'i sems tshar gcod pa dang /_'chal 
[\[278b.7\]]ba'i tshul khrims spong ba dang /_gnod sems sel ba dang /_le lo spong ba dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba kun du mi spyod pa dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab spong ba'o/_/bar du dge ba ni sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]gtan dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 
[\[279a.2\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/bar du dge ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni skyon med par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa las srung ba'o/_/gzhan yang thog mar dge ba ni sems sa dang mtshungs pa mi 
[\[279a.3\]]gtong bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/_/bar du dge ba ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i shes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'o/_/tha mar dge ba ni dbang thob pas skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thog mar dge ba dang /_bar 
[\[279a.4\]]du dge ba dang /_tha mar dge ba'o/_/de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khor de na/_de lta de ltar chos ston te/_gzhan mu stegs can lnga brgya ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/gzhan mu stegs can brgyad 
[\[279a.5\]]stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de nas sprul pa lnga brgya po de dag gis yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/_tshig tu yang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/_/de 
[\[279a.6\]]dag gi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/_tshig tu'ang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po 
[\[279a.7\]]brgya byin gyis kyang de dag la khyed 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byos shig ces me tog man dA ra ba dag byin no//_//bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_smyig ma'i 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'khor de dag gis kyang me tog man dA ra ba 
[\[279b.2\]]de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sprul pa lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[279b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/_bdag cag sangs rgyas la blta ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos ni brjod du ma mchis pa ste/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyan pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom 
[\[279b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/_bdag cag dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni yon tan dang phan yon ma mchis pa ste/_bdag cag yon tan don du mi 
[\[279b.5\]]gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu ma byung ba ste/_bdag cag 'byung ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba ni lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang bral ba ste/_bdag cag thob pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/
[\[279b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das yongs su shes pa ni gnyis dang bral ba ste/_bdag cag sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu ma byung ba ste/_bdag cag kun 'byung spong ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom 
[\[279b.7\]]ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu 'gags pa ste/_bdag cag 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das lam ni mchis pa dang /_ma mchis pa dang bral ba ste/_bdag cag lam bsgom pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]'das chos thams cad ni gnas na mi gnas pa ste/_bdag cag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba ni bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma lags pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed dang bral ba 
[\[280a.2\]]ste/_bdag cag yang dag par spong ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gang nas kyang mchi ba ma mchis pa/_gang du yang mchi ba ma mchis par tshad mar bgyis te/_bdag cag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das don ni dbang po 
[\[280a.3\]]dang bral ba ste/_bdag cag dbang po don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stobs ma mchis shing nyam chung ba ste/_bdag cag stobs don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la don dam par na byang chub pa ni gang yang ma mchis te/_bdag 
[\[280a.4\]]cag byang chub kyi yan lag don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi mthar 'gro ba ma mchis te/_bdag cag lam don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbyings la g.yeng ba ma mchis te/_bdag cag zhi gnas don du mi gnyer ro/_/
[\[280a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang mi mthong ba ste/_bdag cag lhag mthong don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar blang ba dang dor ba shin tu ma mchis te/_bdag cag rtsol ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[280a.6\]]kyi dbyings ni yang dag par sangs ma rgyas pa ste/_bdag cag rnam par grol ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong ni chags pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/_bdag cag dge sbyong don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bram ze ni sdig pa thams cad dang bral 
[\[280a.7\]]ba ste/_bdag cag bram ze don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rang bzhin ni tha mi dad pa ste/_bdag cag dge slong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye mched drug nyid 'gags pa ste/_bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ba don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig pa ji tsam chung ngu la yang mi stod pa ste/_bdag cag 'dod pa chung ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos gang yang mi tshol ba ste/_bdag cag ni chog shes pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lus dang /_sems kyis 
[\[280b.2\]]brjod par mi bgyi ba ste/_bdag cag dben pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar khams gsum du mi gnas pa ste/_bdag cag zag pa med pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnyis po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_bdag cag ma 'dres 
[\[280b.3\]]pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar khams gsum thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa'i dgon pa ste/_bdag cag dgon pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnyen po ma mchis pas rtsod pa ma mchis pa ste/_bdag cag nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa 
[\[280b.4\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes spangs pa ste/_bdag cag bsod snyoms pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'khor ba nyid yang dag par na mi mthong ste/_bdag cag 'khor bas mi skrag go/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[280b.5\]]ltar rtog par mi bgyid/_rnam par rtog par mi bgyid de/_bdag cag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spong bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams kyi rang bzhin nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/_bdag cag nyon mongs pa spong ba la mi brtson 
[\[280b.6\]]no/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rang gi lus ni lus ma lags pa ste/_bdag cag rang gi lus las mi g.yo bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mi bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid de/_bdag cag lta bas bgyis pa mi bskyong bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280b.7\]]'di ltar rnam par grol ba ni rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_gtsang ba'i ngo bo nyid de/_bdag cag phyin ci log spong bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar tshu rol nas pha rol rjes su mi mthong bas bdag cag chu bo las rgal bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]ltar rnam par grol ba ni sgrib pa ma mchis shing rnam par ma brtags pa ste/_bdag cag sgrib pa rnams spong bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa ste/_bdag cag kun nas ldang ba rnam par 
[\[281a.2\]]gnon par mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge sbyong ni nongs pa ma mchis pa ste/_bdag cag 'gyod pa bsal bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thog ma nas mos shing dad pa ste/_bdag cag the tsom sel bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[281a.3\]]'di ltar mos pas rnam par grol ba rtogs pa ste/_bdag cag nem nur sel bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa don du mi gnyer ro/_/bstan pa 'di 
[\[281a.4\]]bshad pa'i tshe dge slong nyis brgya ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong bsam gtan bzhi thob pa srid pa tha ma pa/_ma thob par thob pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya ni stan las langs te/_kye ma'o 'di dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang 
[\[281a.5\]]'gal bar chos 'chad de/_sngon bdag cag gis rjes su 'thun par chos 'chad par thos na/_da ltar ni chos ma yin pa/_'dul ba ma yin pa/_ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin pa 'chad do zhes tshig de skad smras te dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[281a.6\]]gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal dge slong nyis brgya po 'di dag stan las langs te/_chos bshad pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba yin no zhes tshig de skad smras te dong ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa gang po rnam grangs gang gis chos bshad 
[\[281a.7\]]pa 'di 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa gang po 'jig rten ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la mngon par zhen pa ste/_'khor ba spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing 'khor ba rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa nyid mya ngan 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]las 'das pa yin par de ltar ni mi shes so/_/'di la gang 'khor ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni gang yang med de/_gang de lta bu'i bzod pa de ni mi 'gal ba'o/_/bden pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa la mngon par zhen pa de ni 'gal ba'i gnas nyid do/_/don dam pa'i bden pa 
[\[281b.2\]]la ni bden pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'ang med de/_de ni mi 'gal ba'o/_/lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_'bras bu thob ces bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gnyis gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba'o/_/lam mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di ni gnyis su med pa ste/_gnyis su 
[\[281b.3\]]med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal ba'o/_/ji srid du ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par brtson pa de srid du mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo/_/ji srid du mngon pa'i nga rgyal ba de srid du 'gal ba'o/_/gang yang chad par mi byed/_lhag par mi byed/_mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam 
[\[281b.4\]]par mi byed/_mi mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam par mi byed cing /_byed pa ma yin pa/_rnam par byed pa ma yin pa de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa ste/_gang lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa de ni mi 'gal ba'o/_/gang mi 'gal ba de ni gnyis su med pa ste/_de la dgongs nas bcom ldan 
[\[281b.5\]]'das kyis kyang nga ni 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu mi rtsod do/_/'jig rten ni nga dang lhan cig tu rtsod par byed do zhes de skad ces gsungs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba bcad do/_/rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de bzhin gshegs pas bcad pa gang zhe na/_
[\[281b.6\]]'di lta ste/_'di ni bden pa'o/_/'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes bya'o/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bram ze bden pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang ci/_ci'i phyir na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes kyang brjod/_gang la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med na/_de la su 
[\[281b.7\]]zhig rtsod pa sbyor bar byed ces gsungs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag lam gang nas dong ba de thams cad mes yongs su gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/_de dag phyogs gang dang gang du dong ba de dang de dag thams cad mes yongs 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]su gang bar mthong ste/_me'i phung po de las rgal bar ma nus so/_/de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng gi bar snang la dong ba dang /_lcags kyi dra bas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad yog par mthong ngo /_/'og tu bltas na yang chu'i phung po chen po 
[\[282a.2\]]mthong ste/_de dag phyogs bslad cing spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi lam du bltas na me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos yog cing /_lam de nas skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[282a.3\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir dong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de nas de dag kyang phyir log ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom 
[\[282a.4\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_de dag la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong dong /_gang nas 'ongs/_
[\[282a.5\]]de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po kho bo cag ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_bsam gtan thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/_kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di las mi 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa thos nas stan las langs te dong na/_kho bo 
[\[282a.6\]]cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mes yongs su gang bar mthong ste/_me'i phung po de las rgal bar ma nus so/_/kho bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i sa de gang lags/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[282a.7\]]to/_/gang po gang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi me la spyod pas me'i phung po las 'da' ba ni gnas ma yin no/_/lta ba'i dra bas bsgribs pas lcags kyi dra ba bcad pa dang /_sred pa'i chur zhugs pas chu'i phung po las rgal ba ni gnas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]na/_gang po 'di ltar dge slong 'di dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi me la spyod de/_de dag me'i phung po chen po las 'da' bar mi nus so/_/de dag lta ba'i dra bas bsgribs te/_lcags kyi dra ba gcad par mi nus so/_/de dag sred pa'i chu bor zhugs te/_chu'i phung 
[\[282b.2\]]po las rgal bar mi nus so/_/gang po 'di lta ste dper na me'i phung po gang yin pa dang /_lcags kyi dra ba gang yin pa dang /_chu'i phung po gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song ste/_gzhan du na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin 
[\[282b.3\]]gyi rlabs kyis snang ngo /_/gang po de bzhin du 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gang yin pa dang /_lta bar byas pa gang yin pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_gang du yang ma song ste/_gzhan du na phyin ci log sngon du 'gro ba'i 
[\[282b.4\]]rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa las bdag po med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su gzung ba med pa'i bdag dang gzhan du sgro 'dogs par 'byung ngo /_/de la rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems rtse gcig tu byed do/_/
[\[282b.5\]]sems rtse gcig pas zhi gnas sgrub par byed do/_/zhi gnas kyi tshogs kyis bsam gtan skyed par byed do/_/bsam gtan thob pas kyang rlom sems su mi byed/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/bsam gtan las su rung bar byas pa'i sems kyis kyang chos rnams la 
[\[282b.6\]]rnam par lta ste/_chos gang gi rgyu dang /_rkyen du 'gyur zhes de so sor rtog pa na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog par byed de/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming 
[\[282b.7\]]dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ni log par bsgrub pa'i 'du byed kyi lam zhes bya'o/_/ma rig pa 'gags pas 
[\[283a.2\]]'du byed rnams 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas 
[\[283a.3\]]tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[283a.4\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di ni yang dag par sgrub pa 'dus ma byas su nges par 'jug pa'o/_/de la ma rig pa 'gags pa ni 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma 
[\[283a.5\]]yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa byung bas ma rig pa 'byung ste/_de tshul bzhin yid la byed pas so sor rtog pa yid la byed na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mi 'byung ba de ni shin tu 'gags pa ste/_de bas na ma rig pa 
[\[283a.6\]]'gag ces bya'o/_/de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba'i lus 'di la 'di lta ste/_lus 'di ni bems po ste/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_rdo ltar snang bar so sor rtog go/_/gang sems sam/_yid dam/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 
[\[283a.7\]]de'ang gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_rnam par mi rig pa/_sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam lta bu ste/_nang dang /_phyi dang /_gnyi ga ma yin par yang mi dmigs so zhes de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]skyes par rtogs par 'gyur te/_gang ma skyes pa de ni don dam pa'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong nyis brgya po de dag gis nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po 'khor dmas par gyur te/_g.yog lnga brgya 
[\[283b.2\]]zhig dang spa gong bar gyur cing /_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_smyig ma'i tshal ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig kun dga' ba 
[\[283b.3\]]dang /_mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gzhan gyi 'khor kha 'dren pa'i sgyus kha 'dren to zhes yang dang yang du thos na/_de da ni mngon sum du gyur te/_'di 
[\[283b.4\]]ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kho bo'i 'khor phye ste dge sbyong gau ta ma la phul lo/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas kyang log pa'i gzung bas bzung ste/_de dag slar kho bo'i drung du mi 'ong /_bsnyen bkur mi byed/_rna blags te mi nyan/_kun shes par bya ba'i sems nye bar mi 'jog go/_/
[\[283b.5\]]de'i tshe kun du rgyu zla ba can zhes bya ba'i snag gi gnyen mtshams kun du rgyu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po bcom ldan 'das dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[283b.6\]]nyan thos rnams dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ma dad par ma byed cig_/khyod la yun ring por don med pa dang /_mi phan pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_rnam par ltung bar gyur ta re/_gcer bu pa 'di lta ste ngas dpe bya bar spobs so/_/gcer bu pa 'di lta ste dper 
[\[283b.7\]]na skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can la la zhig mar gyi nying khu 'dod cing mar tshol la des chu bum pa'i nang du blugs te bsrubs nas de ji tsam na don med pa dang chad pa'i skal ba can du gyur kyang de'i rgyus mar ram mar gyi nying khu ni mi rnyed do/_/
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]gcer bu pa de bzhin du 'di las phyi rol gyi ya mtshan can thams cad rnal 'byor dang /_sgom pa dang /_dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs de dag thams cad ni log par bzung ba ste/_de dag ni chu'i bum pa bsrubs pa lta bu'o zhes nga smra'i steng du/_de bzhin 
[\[284a.2\]]gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la sems gdug par byas pas sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gcer bu pa 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can la la zhig mar gyi nying khu 'dod 
[\[284a.3\]]cing mar tshol la des 'o ma bum pa'i nang du blugs te bsrubs na de tshegs chung ngus mar sar 'byin par 'gyur te/_mar sar las mar ro/_/mar las mar gyi nying khu 'thob po/_/gcer bu pa de bzhin du khyim na gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_rab tu byung ba yang rung de 
[\[284a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dad pa dang ldan zhing mos pa mang bas sbyor bar byed/_rtsol bar byed/_'bad par byed na mar 'dod pa'i 'o ma'i bum pa las mar gyi nying khu thob pa bzhin de dag myur du 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob bo/_/
[\[284a.5\]]gcer bu pa 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu zhig gis skyes bu gnyis pa'i 'jim pa las byas pa'i snod brgya stong bzhag ste/_de snyed kyi rin po che'i snod byin na gcer bu pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci skyes bu des skyes bu de bslus pa yin nam/_smras pa/_rgyal ba'i 
[\[284a.6\]]blo gros de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_gcer bu pa de bzhin du 'jim pa las byas pa'i snod lta bu'i mu stegs can gyi nyan thos rnams bcom ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la chos rin po che'i snod du byed na des mu stegs rnams gang yang bslus par mi 'gyur ro/_/gcer 
[\[284a.7\]]bu pa 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu ded dpon thabs la mi mkhas pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can zhig gis 'dron pa mang po lam ngan par btsud pa las/_ded dpon thabs la mkhas pa lam shes pa/_lam mthong ba zhig gis lam ngan pa de nas bzlog ste/_yang dag pa'i lam du btsud pa de bzhin 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]du/_gcer bu pa khyed kyi ston pa drug po thams cad kyang lam mi shes pa/_lam mi mkhas pa ste/_des khyed cag sems can mang po rnams lam ngan par btsud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni lam mkhyen pa/_lam la mkhas pa ste/_des sems can de dag lam ngan pa de las 
[\[284b.2\]]bzlog nas yang dag pa'i lam du 'dzud do/_/gcer bu pa de lta mod kyi khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag khrid de song shig_/de nas yang gcer bu pa khri nyis stong gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po dang lhan cig tu dong ngo /_lhag ma rnams ni mngon par shes pa thob nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[284b.3\]]dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu rgyal ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros khyod kyis gang dag gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po dang lhan cig tu dong ba'i gcer bu pa khri nyis stong po de dag mthong 
[\[284b.4\]]ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal ba'i blo gros de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de dag gis chos zab mo 'di 
[\[284b.5\]]bshad pa thos so/_/gcer bu ma'i bu bden pa po ni 'di lta ste dper na da ltar nga'i dge slong shA ri'i bu bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i bstan pa la nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni nga la mos pa yod 
[\[284b.6\]]do/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis ni lta ba yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la kun du rgyu rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can ji snyed cig 
[\[284b.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu bsam gtan bzhi ma bskyed par mngon pa'i nga rgyal du ltung bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]phyir zhe na/_de ltar de'i tshe dge slong de dag sems gnas pa yang dkon na gang bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag ci smos/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 'byung ba ni 
[\[285a.2\]]dkon no/_/rigs kyi bu 'on kyang 'di gnyis ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_lta ba la chags pas bsam gtan gyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i 
[\[285a.3\]]yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa tsam gyis mngon pa'i nga rgyal du ltung ba ste/_de gnyis ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can no/_/gang yang mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba spong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[285a.4\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal pha rol gyi sems mi shes par 'di ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can no zhes ji ltar shes par bya/_smras pa/_gal te so so'i skye bo rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/_dgra 
[\[285a.5\]]bcom pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no zhes de skad thos nas skrag par gyur na mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/gal te so so'i skye bo rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong gi_/dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no zhes de skad thos nas skrag par gyur na mngon pa'i 
[\[285a.6\]]nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/gal te so so'i skye bo rnams kyis sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed kyi/_dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no zhes de skad thos nas skrag par gyur na mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/gal te so so'i skye bo rnams kyis de bzhin 
[\[285a.7\]]gshegs pa mnyes par byed kyi/_dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no zhes de skad thos nas skrag par gyur na mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/gang dag nyon mongs pa thams cad las mi g.yo ba de dag ni mi rten pa'o/_/gang dag mi rten pa de dag ni 'jig 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]rten na sbyin pa'i gnas so/_/gang yang nyon mongs pa las g.yo ba de dag ni rten pa'o/_/gang dag rten pa de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin no/_/de la gang dag rtsod par byed pa de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'byung 
[\[285b.2\]]ba'o zhes bya ba'i chos zab mo'i tshul 'di gang gis mi rtogs pa de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/chos thams cad yongs su shes par mi bya'o/_/spang bar mi bya'o/_/bsgom par mi bya'o/_/mngon du mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bden pa'i tshul 'di la gang 
[\[285b.3\]]mi 'jug pa de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i phyag rgya ji lta bu yin/_smras pa/_'gal ba med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[285b.4\]]na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ni sgra thams cad kyis mi skrag go/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni sgra thams cad kyis mi skrag go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rig ste/_sgra brnyan la ni sems med/_
[\[285b.5\]]yid med/_rnam par shes pa med kyang de la rten cing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du des sems dang yid kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/_de sgra thams cad rkyen la rag las par rtogs nas de sgra thams cad la dga' ba yang mi skyed do/_/de sangs 
[\[285b.6\]]rgyas kyi sgra la yang rjes su chags par mi byed/_mu stegs can gyi sgra la yang khong khro bar mi byed/_rnam par byang ba'i sgra la yang rjes su chags par mi byed/_nyon mongs pa'i sgra la yang khong khro bar mi byed cing des sgra thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i 
[\[285b.7\]]mtha' rtogs par gyur pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste/_gzhag pa med pa dang /_gdeg pa med pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]tshul gcig tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya'o/_/dus gsum 
[\[286a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgya'o/_/gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rang bzhin la so sor rtog pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/rigs kyi bu phyag rgya de dag gis btab pa'i chos thams cad mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i dge slong gis thos na nam nur du mi 'gyur/_the tsom du mi 'gyur 
[\[286a.3\]]te/_bdag mi dmigs par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la kun du rgyu rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon yang kun du rgyu lhag spyod dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams kun du rgyu zla ba can las 
[\[286a.4\]]theg pa chen po 'di'i yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa kha cig thos par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da ltar yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las dam pa'i chos bshad pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bcom 
[\[286a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag la ci nas kyang bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsags te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid 
[\[286a.6\]]par 'gyur ba da ltar chos bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos 'di gnyis ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par shes par byed pa'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_
[\[286a.7\]]'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus dang /_bag yod pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus gang zhe na/_gang chos kyis btsal ba'i longs spyod bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/_/bag yod pa gang zhe na/_gang rnam par smin pa la mi re bas byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'o/_/
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]de la brtson 'grus ni gang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rtsol ba'o/_/bag yod pa ni tshul khrims yongs su dag cing skye ba thams cad mi 'dod pas byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'o/_/de la 
[\[286b.2\]]brtson 'grus ni gang lus dang sems la mi lta bas bzod cing des pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kun du srung ba'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pas yongs su mi skyo ba'o/_/bag yod 
[\[286b.3\]]pa ni gang dge ba'i chos yang dag par bsgrubs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par bsgrubs pas yongs su mi sngo ba'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar byed pa 
[\[286b.4\]]las ldog pa'i shes pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang mang du thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes so/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams mi 'dor 
[\[286b.5\]]ba'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs so/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang lus dang sems rab tu 'dzin pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang lus dang sems dben pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang sems can la dmigs pa'i 
[\[286b.6\]]byams pas sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang chos la dmigs pa'i byams pas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la sbyor ba'o/_/
[\[286b.7\]]bag yod pa ni gang sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la so sor rtog pas byang chub kyi sems mi rjed pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang zag pa zad par byed pas kun du bsrung ba'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang mgo 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bus bden pa tshol ba'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang 'gog pa mngon sum du bya bar mi ltung ba'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa bas chog mi shes pa'o/_/
[\[287a.2\]]bag yod pa ni gang chos kyi sku la so sor rtog pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang sems can kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la brtson 'grus ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su 
[\[287a.3\]]rdzogs pa'o/_/bag yod pa ni gang nye bar zhi ba'i rnam par grol bas rnam par grol ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i las ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni brtson 'grus dang ldan par blta bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[287a.4\]]tu phyin pa'i las ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni bag yod pa dang ldan par blta ste/_de bas na thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med 
[\[287a.5\]]do zhes bya'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe kun du rgyu rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de sems dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rangs pa de nyid kyis de shing ta la bdun tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags par 
[\[287a.6\]]gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten khyab par gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang las me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par bab bo/_/sil snyan dang glu dbyangs 
[\[287a.7\]]kyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs pa 'di 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig 
[\[287b.2\]]rten man chad du mngon par byung zhing nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las 
[\[287b.3\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/_
[\[287b.4\]]bsod nams ye shes stobs dpal dpe med 'dom gang 'od kyis brgyan/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan cing dpe byad dag gis spras/_/seng ge dang mchog 'gying 'gro ltar ni brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung /_/ci slad 'dzum mdzad de ni bcom 
[\[287b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bstan par gsol/_/thub pa dbyar gyi sprin dang rnga sgra seng ge'i sgra bas lhag_/ka la ping ka'i sgra dang dril sgra tshangs pa'i sgra bas lhag_/lha 'am de bzhin mi yi sgra gang stong gsum dag na snyan/_/de kun char yang mi 'gro bcom ldan thub 
[\[287b.6\]]pa'i gsung mchog go/_/dgra bcom mchog rab rang rgyal yang dag byang chub sems dpas kyang /_/dpe med thub dbang ye shes rmad byung yul ni mi rtogs pa/_/lha mi lha min klu gang thos nas byang chub mchog 'tshal bar/_/ye shes de yi stobs 
[\[287b.7\]]kyis ci phyir 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol/_/mthar 'dzin kun las thugs grol blo bzang dbus su khyod mi chags/_/chags med nyes med spyod pa gnas med nam mkha' tshad med bzhin/_/dpe mchog gang yang med cing 'jig rten mchog 'drar 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bgrang ba med/_/mkha' 'dra'i blo mnga' sdig med khyod la ci slad 'dzum bstan zhu'o/_/khyod kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs sngo dang dmar dang dkar/_/dri med gser ltar 'tsher zhing dmar ba gang gA'i bye snyed byung /_/grangs 
[\[288a.2\]]med nam mkha'i khams mnyam phyogs kyi 'jig rten des snang byas/_/thub pa'i 'od kyis reg pa'i ngan song ma lus zhi zhing bde dang ldan/_/gal te 'od zer pus mor nub na dgra bcom khyod lung bstan/_/'od zer khyod kyi dpung par nub na rang 
[\[288a.3\]]sangs rgyas su bstan/_/deng ni phan mdzad thub khyod gtsug tu dri med 'od nub kyis/_/kun mkhyen mnyam nyid theg par nges par khyod ni lung ston to/_/de bas legs pa lha lhag lhas mchod 'jig rten gsum mchod 'os/_/srog chags mang po gang 
[\[288a.4\]]thos dga' zhing sems kyang mgu 'gyur bar/_/yang dag bden tshig nges par gsung dag de ni rgyal bas shod/_/ci phyir 'dzum mdzad the tsom chod de slob ma mgu bar mdzod/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[288a.5\]]kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzod pa thob pa steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas nga la phyag 'tshal ba lha brgya stong dag gis mchod pa 'di khyod 
[\[288a.6\]]kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[288a.7\]]las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bzhugs pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mchod do/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis las tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_thams cad 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]du yang dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ngo /_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros 'di da phyin chad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_gus par byed par 'gyur/_btsun par byed par 
[\[288b.2\]]'gyur/_phu dud du byed par 'gyur/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_tshangs par spyad pa yang spyod par 'gyur/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de phyi ma'i dus na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[288b.3\]]chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bskal pa grangs med pa na bskal pa rin po che gcig bkod pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 
[\[288b.4\]]phung po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[288b.5\]]kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug pa de'i longs spyod ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag gi mdun du yul drug las yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[288b.6\]]de dag thams cad gcig gis gcig mthong na dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad rmi lam du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po de mthong zhing de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur 
[\[288b.7\]]te/_de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams de blta na sdug pa zhes bya'o/_/bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa de gcig pu 'byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal par thub par 'gyur te/_de bas na bskal pa de yang rin po che 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gcig bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[289a.2\]]thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_tshig dbye ba la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po de nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe yang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba de la 
[\[289a.3\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba 'di nga'i 'og tu/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi phung po de yongs su mya 
[\[289a.4\]]ngan las 'das nas bar gyi bskal pa bcur dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku yang mi 'jig par 'gyur te/_gang la sems can de dag mchod par byed pa'i mchod rten rin po che las byas pa rgyar dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/_'phang 
[\[289a.5\]]du dpag tshad brgyad cu pa rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa gcig cig yod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rigs kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros bar snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[289a.6\]]gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bdag gi dbyings dang sems can dbyings/_/chos kyi dbyings dang de dag mnyam/_/de yi dbyings ldan ye 
[\[289a.7\]]shes dbyings/_/de bas khyod kyis bdag lung bstan/_/chos kyi dbyings dang nyon mongs khams/_/stong pa'i dbyings dang de dag mnyam/_/chos kun de yi dbyings ldan te/_/de bas khyod kyis bdag lung bstan/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/gang 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]gzhan khams kyang gsum po dag_/nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa ste/_/de bas khyod kyis bdag lung bstan/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_chos kyi dbyings dang de dag mnyam/_/rlung gi khams dang chu dang me/_/sa rnams de yi khams ldan 
[\[289b.2\]]no/_/phung po'i khams dang mnyam pa ste/_/mig la sogs pa'i khams rnams dang /_/yid kyi khams dang chos khams dang /_/de dag dbyings kun mnyam pa'o/_/'dus byas dbyings ni gang yin dang /_/'dus ma byas dbyings gang yin pa/_/de dag 
[\[289b.3\]]chos dbyings gnyis med de/_/de bas khyod kyis bdag lung bstan/_/phung po rnams ni shes dang bral/_/khams dang skye mched rnams kyang ste/_/ming la med cing gzugs la'ang med/_/nang na med cing phyi na'ang med/_/sgra gang dag gis rig 'gyur ba'i/_/
[\[289b.4\]]thub pas bdag ni lung bstan pa/_/ji lta bur ni sgra gsungs pa/_/de ltar bdag ni lung bstan to/_/gang gis bdag ni lung bstan pa'i/_/sems ni sangs rgyas mi mnga' ste/_/bdag la'ang yang dag byang chub tu/_/lung bstan rnam shes ma mchis so/_/
[\[289b.5\]]ji ltar sangs rgyas bdag de bzhin/_/bdag ltar bde gshegs de bzhin te/_/sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra/_/de bas khyod kyis bdag lung bstan/_/lung bstan 'di ni yang dag pa/_/de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa ste/_/yang dag mtha' la gnas pas na/_/chos 
[\[289b.6\]]kyi dbyings la tha dad med/_/chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung /_/nam mkha' lta bur ye shes zab/_/thabs la mkhas shing legs sbyangs pa/_/bcom ldan khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis chos kyi 
[\[289b.7\]]dbyings dang tha mi dad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_chos ston pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[290a.2\]]nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par rtse ba'i cho 'phrul dang /_chos bstan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ji ltar mngon sum du gyur pa dag phan tshun du rjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam 
[\[290a.3\]]grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag yang rgya cher yang dag par shod cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_
[\[290a.4\]]'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bas na kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas 'joms shing tshar gcod pa 
[\[290a.5\]]dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas bstan pa dang /_dkon mchog gi za ma tog ces bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[290a.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/dkon mchog gi za ma tog ces bya ba 
[\[290a.7\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de rat+narak+Shi tas zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]{D118}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+na ko Ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[290b.2\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan mo srod la bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs 
[\[290b.3\]]khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bzhugs khang gi sgo drung na 'greng ste bcom ldan 'das la sdod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 
[\[290b.4\]]'dzin de las bzhengs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sgo na 'dug pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'jam dpal khyod nang du shog ces de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so zhes gsol te/_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[290b.5\]]nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo /_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'greng ba dang /_
[\[290b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis stan la 'dug ces gnang ba mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[290b.7\]]'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da gdod ting nge 'dzin gang gis bzhugs bzhugs pa las bzhengs lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin des nga da gdod gnas gnas pa las langs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 
[\[291a.2\]]de la rin po che'i mtha' zhes bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che shin tu dag cing shin tu byi dor byas pa sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhag na de gang dang gang kho nar bzhag pa de dang der rin po 
[\[291a.3\]]che bye ba gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du nga ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas shar phyogs su bltas te/_shar phyogs su bltas na ngas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[291a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_'og dang /_steng nas phyogs bcu'i bar du bltas na ngas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[291a.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal 
[\[291a.6\]]yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya 'di ngas phyag rgyar bzhag ste/_dad pa can gyi rigs kyi bu rnams dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis phyag rgya 'di la spyad na spobs pa mi chod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs lags so/_/
[\[291a.7\]]bde bar gshegs pa spobs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod spobs par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che de nyid ngos gang dang gang kho nas phab ste gzhag pa'i rin po che'i ngos de dang de kho na 'bab cing gnas 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' kho nas gnas lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/_/
[\[291b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'o na yang dag pa'i mtha' gang na 'dug_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni bdag gi mtha' gang na mchis pa de na mchis lags so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang na ma mchis 
[\[291b.3\]]pa de na mchis lags so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni las sam/_rnam par smin pa yang ma lags la chos thams cad kyi mtha' yang de kho na lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba ma mchis lags 
[\[291b.4\]]so/_/gang dag gang las kyang grol ba ma mchis pa de dag ni log pa las rnam par grol ba lags so/_/gang dag log pa las rnam par grol ba de dag ni yang dag par rnam par grol ba lags so/_/gang dag yang dag par rnam par grol ba de dag ni spyod yul 
[\[291b.5\]]ma lags pa la zhugs pa lags so/_/gang dag spyod yul ma lags pa la zhugs pa de dag ni yang dag par zhugs pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba ni spyod yul des bgyis lags pa ste/_
[\[291b.6\]]de'i slad du spyod yul ma lags pa zhes 'dogs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig
