[\[291b.7\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal lam sgom pa zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam bsgom pa zhes bgyi ba de ni lam sgom pa ma mchis pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]khyod las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chos ji ltar ston/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams la 'jig tshogs dor du ma mchis par chos ston 
[\[292a.2\]]lags so/_/bdag ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams spang du ma mchis par chos ston pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni spang bar rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du lags so/_/
[\[292a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs sam/_'jig tshogs kun 'byung ba spong bar 'tshal ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' spong bar bas te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[292a.4\]]tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzung bar mi bgyi ba'am/_mngon sum du mi bgyi ba dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lhag par mi dmigs pa'am/_spang bar mi bgyi ba de lta bur chos ston lags na gdul ba las dang po pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das ji 
[\[292a.5\]]ltar chos ston par mdzad lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal nga ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_skye ba med par chos ston to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_skye ba 
[\[292a.6\]]med par chos ston to/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnams kyang thob pa med par chos ston to/_/ngas ni 'di ltar chos gang yang ma bshig ma bskyed pa 
[\[292a.7\]]de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_ma 'dres pa 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]la thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag yin pa de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kho na yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/ngas ni chos kyi dbyings la 'di lta ste/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sam/_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[292b.2\]]rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rung ste/_de dag tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal dbyings de la ni bye brag med de/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings so/_/chos kyi dbyings ni ma 'dres pa'i 
[\[292b.3\]]dbyings so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na chu klung ming tha dad pa dang /_kha dog tha dad pa dang /_ro tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i nang du bab pa rnams la ni 'di lta ste/_'di ni gang gA'o zhe'am si ta'o zhe'am/_ya mu na'o zhes bye brag tu dbye ba'am tha dad du byar mi nus 
[\[292b.4\]]so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du ming tha dad pa'i chos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zhe'am/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags 
[\[292b.5\]]par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na 'bru'i phung po sna tshogs la ni 'di ni 'bru che ge mo zhig gi phung po'o/_/'di ni che ge mo zhig go zhes gdags su yod pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la ni 'di dag so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zhe'am/_nyan thos dang /_
[\[292b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na 'bru'i phung po sna tshogs la ni 'di ni 'bru che ge mo zhig gi phung po'o/_/'di ni che ge mo zhig go 
[\[292b.7\]]zhes gdags su yod pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la ni 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams so/_/'di dag 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus so/_/'di ni chos kyi dbyings te de ni 'di na 'dug go zhe'am/_ga ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes de ltar bstan pa'am gdags par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[293a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings ni bltar mi mthong zhing bstan du med de/_gdags par bya ba ma yin zhing gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba 'di de lta bu'i dbyings yin par ngas ji skad bstan pa la gal te mtshams med pa byed pa de ltar mos te/_mtshams 
[\[293a.3\]]med pa yang de lta bu'i dbyings yin par shes na/_de kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal mtshams med pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par mnyam pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar mtshams med pa'i dbyings dang /_chos 
[\[293a.4\]]kyi dbyings 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_'di la ni 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba'am/_kun nas ldang ba mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[293a.5\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi dbyings ngan song du mchi ba'am/_mtho ris su mchi ba'am/_mya ngan las 'das par mchi bar ma mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gal te/_la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du 'dri ste/_
[\[293a.6\]]khyod kyi ston pa 'gro ba drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba ji ltar 'dogs zhes de skad dris na 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad lan gdab/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de skad du smras na bdag gis 'di skad du lan gdab par bgyi ste/_dper na mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi 
[\[293a.7\]]lam du sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul lam/_lha ma yin gyi ris sam/_lha rnams sam/_mi rnams mthong na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar g.yar lam rmi ba'i mis sna tshogs mthong yang g.yar lam sna tshogs 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]ma mchis pa de bzhin du bdag gis 'gro ba tha dad pa bstan kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa gdags par rngo mi thogs te/_de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni de skad 'dri ba la de skad ces lan gdab par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs 
[\[293b.2\]]rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang tha dad par gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gnas pa dag kyang tha dad par gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de 
[\[293b.3\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar chos kyi dbyings las tha mi dad pa'i slad du lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru la sogs pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_mchog rnams la 'di ni rin po che che ge mo zhig go/_/'di 
[\[293b.4\]]ni rin po che che ge mo zhig go zhes tha dad par gdags su mchis lags kyi/_chos kyi dbyings la ni de ltar tha dad par gdags pa'i rngo mi thogs la/_gdags pa de la yang tha dad par dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de la ni 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba tha dad par gdags pa'i rngo mi thogs 
[\[293b.5\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings la ni 'chi 'pho'am/_skye ba'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so/_/chos kyi dbyings ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lags/_chos kyi dbyings ni 'dres pa ma lags te/_chos kyi 
[\[293b.6\]]dbyings la ni gang dag spang bar bgyi ba'am/_bskyed par bgyi ba'i chos de dag ma mchis lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings shes sam/_gsol pa/_
[\[293b.7\]]gal te dmigs na bdag gis 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gang la spyod shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i mi gang kho na la spyod pa de la spyod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas te/_
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]bdag gis ni gang bstan par bgyi ba'i 'jig rten gyi dngos po dang /_'jig rten gang la spyod pa yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/_bdag gis ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ma mchis 
[\[294a.2\]]pa'i slad du lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gang la spyod ces bka' stsal pa de yang /_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de la ni 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang ma mchis/_de la ni 'jig pa'am/_rab tu 'jig pa yang ma mchis na gang la spyod par 'gyur lags/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_
[\[294a.3\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de ni gtan ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba'am 'gag pa ma mchis la/_mtshan nyid gcig las mi 'da' ste/_'di lta ste mtshan nyid gcig pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_nga da ltar 
[\[294a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'di la khyod 'di snyam du 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'am/_mi snang bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi 
[\[294a.5\]]dbyings ni yang dag par grub pa ma lags pa'i slad du lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings yang dag par grub pa zhig lags na ni de'i slad du de mi 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/_de la ni yang dag par grub pa mi dmigs pa ste/_de mi gda' ba'am/_yongs su mya ngan 
[\[294a.6\]]las 'da' bar lta ga la 'gyur lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i dbyings lags te/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das ni skyes pa yang ma lags/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'o na khyod 
[\[294a.7\]]'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes de la khyod ji ltar mos/_gsol pa/_gal te de dag gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mthong na ni bdag mos lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyod so so'i skye bo shi ba rnams nyid 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]mtshams sbyor bar 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das so so'i skye bo nyid kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs na de'i nying mtshams sbyor ba lta ga la dmigs lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos gnas par bzhed kyis khyod spobs 
[\[294b.2\]]par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_ci zhig las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings las rtsoms shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal 
[\[294b.3\]]pa/_'jam dpal mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par 'gyur na ni de'i slad du mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang skrag par 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' yang 
[\[294b.4\]]gzhan la mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang gzhan pa ni ma lags kyi/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi mtha' gang lags pa'i mtha' de nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' lags la/_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang lags pa de yang chos thams cad kyi mtha' lags te/_de'i slad du mi skrag lags so/_/chos 
[\[294b.5\]]thams cad yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir na 'di rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bya/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mi phyed pa lags te/_de'i slad du 'di rdo rje'i gzhi lags 
[\[294b.6\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags te/_ci'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bgyi zhe na/_chos thams cad sems ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so/_/chos thams cad byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi 
[\[294b.7\]]lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos thams cad brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_'di na ming gang dang gang gis chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i chos de dang de chos de dang de la ma mchis lags so/_/gang ma mchis pa de ni stong pa lags so/_/gang stong pa de ni med pa lags so/_/gang med pa de ni 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]brjod pa'i rngo mi thogs pa lags so/_/brjod du ma mchis pa de ni byang chub lags te/_de'i slad du/_'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lags te/_'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ci'i phyir rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bya/_
[\[295a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rang gi yul las dben pa lags te/_de'i slad du 'di rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal dge slong kun dga' bo de yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun 'dzin par 'gyur na/_'dir 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma ngas bya'am/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[295a.3\]]ldan 'das 'di ni chos brjod pa'am/_bstan pa mchis lags sam/_bdag gis ni yi ge gcig kyang bstan par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags na/_mang po lta ga la mthong lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du 'chad pa ni khyod kyi tshig 
[\[295a.4\]]'di legs par smras pa yin te/_'jam dpal khyod legs so/_/'jam dpal ngas ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos nyid 'di kho na ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[295a.5\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rang gi gnas khang nas byung nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga la ba der song nas/_bzhugs khang gi phyi sgo na 'greng ba dang /_gsung 
[\[295a.6\]]ba'i gsung thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di gnas khang gi phyi sgo na 'greng ste/_chos nyan par 'dod na 'jam dpal shA ri'i bu chos nyan par nang du 'ong bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_mtha' 
[\[295a.7\]]'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' lags na/_gang gi slad rol dang /_nang dang gnyis ka ma mchis par gda' lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma mchis pa lags te/_de lta bu'i mtha' 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gang lags pa de la ni tshur mchi ba'am/_phar mchi ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mtha' can gyi btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ni tshur mchi ba'am/_nang du mchi ba'i mi rigs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gal te nga gnas khang gi nang na nyan thos dag dang lhan cig tu gtam zer 
[\[295b.2\]]zhing 'dug la/_khyod ni phyi rol na 'dug ste/_nang du 'ong du yang mi dbang na ci khyod sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes 
[\[295b.3\]]brjod pa gang lags pa 'di yang chos kyi dbyings lags te/_mtshan nyid gcig pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags so/_/chos sam chos bstan pa zhes bgyi ba'am/_chos nyan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di dag kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i 
[\[295b.4\]]slad du tha dad pa ma mchis te/_de'i slad du yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad pa ma lags so/_/'jam dpal zhes bgyi ba'i yi ge gang lags pa 'di dag kyang chos kyi dbyings su gtogs te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bdag [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gdung ba ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[295b.5\]]bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du chos ston du lags kyang bdag der mchi yang mi mchi/_der mchir dga' ba'am/_yongs su gdung ba yang mi skyed lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis shig mchis na ni dga' ba'am/_yongs su gdung ba skyed par 'gyur na chos kyi 
[\[295b.6\]]dbyings de ni gnyis su ma mchis te/_de'i slad du bdag dga' ba'am/_yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa mdzad pa'i chos bstan pa des kyang chos gang yang sogs pa'am/_'bri ba'am/_'phel ba'am/_'grib par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar chos bstan 
[\[295b.7\]]pa de ni chos gang yang dmigs pas nye bar gnas pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yang bdag dga' bar mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thos sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thos lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thos kyang ci ma rung snyam ste/_de'i slad du bdag 'di na mchis lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[296a.2\]]ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang du mchi bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad du shA ri'i bu khyod gnas khang gi nang du shog ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas 
[\[296a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gnas khang du 'ongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod don gyi dbang gang 
[\[296a.4\]]mthong bas 'dir 'ongs/_smras pa/_'jam dpal kho bo ni chos nyan par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_'di ltar gang na bcom ldan 'das dang /_skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu gnas pa de na bstan pa zab mo yang dag par phul du byung ba yod de/_de'i phyir kho bo 'ongs so/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ni de 
[\[296a.5\]]bzhin te bstan pa 'di ni zab bo/_/smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs cig tu brtsams pa'i chos bstan pa de ji tsam du zab/_smras pa/_de ni btsun pa shA ri'i bus rtogs par mi 'gyur te/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos 
[\[296a.6\]]bstan pa 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ni chos gang dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhugs pa ma yin no/_/'di ni gang 
[\[296a.7\]]du zhugs pa'am ldog pa yang med de/_chos thams cad shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ci las bsams te/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin zhes de skad smra/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa nyid ni/_'dod 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug zad pa yin na de gang gi snod yin zhing /_de gang ji lta bu zhig gi snod du 'gyur snyam ste/_de las bsams nas dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin no zhes kho bo de skad smra'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal kho bo ni chos bstan 
[\[296b.2\]]pa 'di'i don du gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas khang nas gnas khang dang /_phug nas phug tu khyod tshol te/_bdag gis khyod las zab pa zab pa yang dag pa'i spobs pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos kyang ci ma rung snyam ste/_'jam dpal kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[296b.3\]]khyod kyi chos bstan pa la chog mi shes so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod chos bstan pas chog mi shes sam/_smras pa/_kho bo chog mi shes so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu ci chos kyi dbyings chos tshol bar byed dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal mi byed do/_/smras pa/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[296b.4\]]kyang gzhan la/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni gzhan pa ni ma yin na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos mnyan pa la chog mi shes/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings ni chos tshol bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te de tshol bar byed na ni de'i phyir de chog shes par 'gyur ba 
[\[296b.5\]]zhig na gang gi phyir tshol bar mi byed pa de'i phyir chog mi shes so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par kho bo lta bu chos nyan pa de lta bu khyod kyis ga la rnyed/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can yin par 
[\[296b.6\]]mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pas na kho bo yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can yin no snyam du de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod shi 'pho med pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i 
[\[296b.7\]]chos can yin par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i phyir te/_chos kyi dbyings la 'chi 'pho'am skye ba med pa de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mi shes 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]pa dang ldan par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_shes pa dang /_mi shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mi shes pa dang ldan te 'di ltar mi shes pa dang /_shes pa ni mi zad pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir dben pa ste/_
[\[297a.2\]]de bas na mi shes pa dang /_shes par rnam par mi rtogs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mi shes pa dang ldan par mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_shes pa dang bral bar mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_
[\[297a.3\]]'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ste/_de bas na dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa shes pa dang bral bar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_rnam par ma grol ba'i chos can du mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_nyon 
[\[297a.4\]]mongs pa med pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar nyon mongs pa med na gang dag las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/_de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung zhing yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar 
[\[297a.5\]]mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la ni skye ba med de/_gang mi skye ba de la mi snang bar 'gyur ba'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ga la yod de de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas thams cad gcig yin par 
[\[297a.6\]]mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad pa med pa de de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yin par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras 
[\[297a.7\]]pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni mi zad pa nyid kyi zhing yin te de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod chos thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dang /_mngon sum du bya ba ma yin pa dang /_
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]bsgom par bya ba ma yin par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid yongs su mi shes pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin spong ba dang /_mngon sum du mi byed pa dang /_sgom par mi byed pa dang /_skyed par mi byed pa dang /_'gag 
[\[297b.2\]]par mi byed pa dang /_len par mi byed pa dang /_'dor bar mi byed pa dang /_mtha' de ni mi gnas pa nyid de/_de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings ni phung por mi 'dug pa'i dbyings yin pa dang /_chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa med pa dang /_chos gang yang phung por 'dug pa 
[\[297b.3\]]med par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_phung por 'dug pa de mi dmigs te de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod shes rab gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings yin la/_chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 
[\[297b.4\]]shes rab yin te/_chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob pa dang /_de'i phyir yang dgra bcom pa zhes bya bar mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyis dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings yongs su 
[\[297b.5\]]shes par zad kyi chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa ni 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid dam/_zhe sdang gi bdag nyid dam/_gti mug gi bdag nyid kyang ma yin la/_chos kyi dbyings las kyang dgra bcom pa gud na med de de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi khyu 
[\[297b.6\]]mchog dang mnyam par mos sam/_smras pa/_mos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar mos/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ltar mos so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyi yul ji tsam pa de tsam du 
[\[297b.7\]]khyod kyis lan btab pa legs so legs so/_/de tsam zhig khyod la dris kyis da ni rang gi gnas su song shig_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar 'di nyid ni bdag gi ji srid 'tsho'i bar gyi gnas yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rigs 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_'chang ba'am/_klog pa'am/_kun chub par byed pa des ni spobs pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags te/_ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[298a.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi slad du chos kyi phyag rgya 'di bzhag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags te/_de dag de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_
[\[298a.3\]]'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas zhus nas ngas lan btab pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/chos kyi 
[\[298a.4\]]dbyings zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba dang /_rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_sgom pa 
[\[298a.5\]]dang /_sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa de dag ni rin po che dang 'dra ba yin te/_mi skye ba'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/chos nyung ngu kun chub par byas pas kyang chos mang po ston 
[\[298a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa mi chod par yang 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[298a.7\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
